104b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu dang bcas pa mtha' yas par 'jig rten gyi sgron ma bye ba mtha' yas par shar ba de dag kya nga 'khor ba thog ma tha ma med pa nas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i
104b6(rnying rgyud): khams su bskal pa thog ma tha ma med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i skabs la rtag par rgyun gyi 'khor mor 'byung zhing sgron ma'i bya bas lha mi'i 'jig rten gyi mun pa bsal nas sems
104b7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te/ nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor nub pa ltar yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su gags shing rnam par snang ngo // sangs
104b8(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thun mong bca' bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas ji ltar de ltar 'di ltar mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
105a1(rnying rgyud): khams na bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdo rje thub pa'i dbang po de skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa la byung ste/ yul ha cang mi ring ba zhig bzhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par dgongs
105a2(rnying rgyud): nas yul yangs pa can zhes bya bar 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs par dbyar gyi ngo bo gsum 'das nas 'jig rten gyi slob ma la gdams ngag gsum bzhag pa'i slad
105a3(rnying rgyud): du 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul cher spyod la bka' stsal pa// rdzu 'phrul can khyed deng la 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na nga'i slob ma gang dag 'khod pa 'di par phyogs
105a4(rnying rgyud): pa dag gang ji snyed pa rnams bsdus shig/ nges par bzha dag par bya ba dag yod do zhes gsungs pa dang / rdzu' phrul can des chos kyi skad cig gis go bar bsgrags nas/ 
105a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa ni 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba'i zhing 'gyurar ris drug gang su dag/ 'di par nges shing phyogs pa kun nyon cig/ deng 'dir rgyal ba bdud rtsi gsum 'jog
105a6(rnying rgyud): gis dan dug gsum 'joms par 'dod pa kun 'das cig/ de skad ces bsgrags pas dam pa'i rigs can lnga ma gtogs 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi bsam gtan chen po'i nang du
105a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag 'jog pa bskul ba chen po lang ka'i mnga' bdag blo gros thabs ldan la sogs pa las gzhan thams cad 'das par gyur to// de nas 'dus pa de dag las bka' stsal
105a8(rnying rgyud): btad kyi grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// 'byor pa thams cad ni mthar rgud pa'o// dngos po thams cad ni nges par 'jig pa'o// gang zag
105b1(rnying rgyud): gi srog gi dbang po la skye zhing yod pa'i phyir nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas su dag the tshom mchod pa rnams dri bgyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor der 'dus
105b2(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kun dza ra zhes bya ba de rang gi stan las langs te/ seng ge'i sta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni na mkha'i
105b3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin te/ 'da' dang mi 'da' yong mi mnga'// 'jig rten pa la 'thun 'jug tu// 'da' bas yongs su 'dul bar dgongs// khyod ni 'jig rten sgron mar shar// lha mi'i 'jig
105b4(rnying rgyud): rten thams cad kyi/ mun pa'i dkyil 'khor kun bsal nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad de/ sad dang rnam thar la spyad pas// byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yi// 
105b5(rnying rgyud): 'dren pa'i theg pa rnam gsum la// gang dag rim par/ bkod lags na// mnyam pas blang dor med spyod ci nga // byang chub gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i// thabs mchog
105b6(rnying rgyud): dpag gis mi lang ba'i// nges pa'i theg chen yong ma gsungs// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po// gad mo ngag lung du ma bzhig na/ blo chung mun pas rmongs pa rnams// nges pa'i
105b7(rnying rgyud): blo gos gang la bzhag/ rnam par thar pa'i theg pa gsum// gang bsdu gang la gang gis bsdu// 'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi nub ma// sgron ma gang gis mdzad par 'gyur// snyan pa 'jig
105b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i log sde pa// rgol ba gang gis tshar gcod 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ reg pa 'dzin pa chen po legs so// khyod kyis dri ba lnga
106a1(rnying rgyud): dris pa ni shin tu legs so// 'di lta ste/ de kho na nyid du nges pa'i theg pa chen po ste/ gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/ gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba na yang 'byung / 
106a2(rnying rgyud): gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung // gang gis nges pa snyed pa na yang 'byung // snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung // dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa na
106a3(rnying rgyud): yang 'byung // gdul bya'i skabs la bab pa'i ched na yang 'byung // byin gyi brlabs las snang ba na yang 'byung // rgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung // gang gi ched du mdzad pa
106a4(rnying rgyud): na yang 'byung // lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang 'bru dang // las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang 'byung // dgongs pa rnam par 'gro ba na yang 'byung // de dag ni
106a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi thams cad nas thams cad du kun tu yo ngas su rnam par snang ngo // snang bar gyur to// snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba dang po'i yongs su
106a6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa chad do// de nas yang ston pas dri ba gnyis pa bka' stsal pa// rig pa 'dzin pa chen po blo dang ldan par bya'o// gros kyis mchod par bya'o// thabs kyis zin par bya'o// bsam
106a7(rnying rgyud): pa dag par bya'o// brjod pa drang por bya'o// spyod pa legs par bya'o// don btsal bar bya'o// dgos ched brtag par bya'o// nges pa rnyed par bya'o// bden par smra bar bya'o// tshig mi
106a8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bar bya'o// ji skad smras pa bzhin du bya'o// sgo gsum la mkhas par bya'o// sngags gsum la bslab par bya'o// grong khyer gsum gshig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ dri ba
106b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad do// de nas yang ston pas dri ba gsum pa bka' stsal pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'di lta ste/ nga yis sgron ma gang bzhag pa/ snod gsum dag tu snang ba ste// zhi gan \u0f7f
106b2(rnying rgyud): mthong las mtha' gsum// dang por shes pa'i rgyud gsum la// de nas yi ge'i tshogs nyid la'o// cha chung rim pa'i blo yod phyir// theg pa'i rim pa de bzhin te// bsdu ba'ang che chung
106b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis so// rnam pa gnyis kyi khyad par las// 'jug pa'i yul yang de kho na'o// gang la mos pa de nyid du'o zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba gsum pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad do// 
106b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pas dri ba bzhi pa dang lnga pa tshig le'u gcig pa bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang dri ba tha ma gnyis// gcig gis yongs su chod par byas// chos kyi spun
106b5(rnying rgyud): du byas pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/ sgron ma byed pa'i bya ba yang // sngon du 'byung ba'i lung bstan pa'i// 'gro ba'i lus kyi sems dpa' dag/ byung nas
106b6(rnying rgyud): gsal byed logs sun 'byin// de skad ces bka' stsal pas dri ba bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa
106b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gdams ngag nges par bzhag pa'i le ru ste gnyis pa'o// / de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag mi chen po rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med pa
106b8(rnying rgyud): nang du yang dag 'jog go// byis pa rnams ni yongs su gdung bar gyur te blo ya ya bor gyur cing shin tu blong nas rtag par rab tu ngu'o// 'jig rten pa la la ni shi la thug par gyur/ 
107a1(rnying rgyud): la la ni brgyal cing 'bog par gyur// la la ni khams nas ro bam pa bzhin du gyur to// de bzhin du thams cad khu co mang po pa shi ba bzhin du kyi hud kyi hud zhes gdung ba'i sgra
107a2(rnying rgyud): sgrogs so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang snod ni yid du mi 'ong bar gyur to// bcud kyang sems kyi dkyil 'khor mog mog par gyur to// chos 'di par phyogs pa rnams ni mdangs
107a3(rnying rgyud): nag por gyur to// bdud kyi cha 'dzin cing gzhan gyi bde ba rnams ni bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dkar por gyur te kun kyang bca' ka'i tshig sgrogs par gyur to// de nas lo brgyad dang bcu gnyis
107a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa na dam pa'i rigs can sems dpa' chen po dag nang du yang dag 'jog las langs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi ston pa nub par gyur pas rmag chad par ngus nas kyang
107a5(rnying rgyud): rang rang gi mngon par shes pas lang ka'i yul gyi gong / rdal gyi mtsho gling ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse la rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas mngon par rab tu 'dus so// / 
107a6(rnying rgyud): yongs su 'dus nas 'dus pa de kun kyang mgrin gcig tu shin tu nyams thag pa'i nga ros smre sngags kyi gdung ba bton pa ni 'di lta ste/ a me'o kyi hud e ma'o blong // ston pa'i sgron ma'i
107a7(rnying rgyud): 'od nub na// 'jig rten mun pa gang gis sel// tshad ma'i zhal de mi bzhugs pas// tshad mas gsungs pa'i bstan pa la// 'jug par 'tshal ba'i 'gro ba rnams// log par 'jug par
107a8(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur ram// tshad mar dam bcas gang zag gis// nges ma rnyed pa'i gang zag la// phan par bya phyir bka' bkrol bas// gtan la phebs par 'gyur zhig gu/ legs nyes 'byed
107b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyan zum pas// bka' nyid khyad du gsod pa yi// skyon gyi spyi gtsug mthar phyin pas// log stobs 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram// log pa'i bstan pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas// bden
107b2(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis kyi nyi zla nub// 'gro ba gang zhig la ma tshol ba// mun par 'khyams par mi 'gyur ram// ston pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// bdud dang srin po mu stegs dang // gnod sbyin 'byung po mi
107b3(rnying rgyud): ma yin// ma rungs bdug pa gsus 'dul 'gyur// dri med bstan pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// nub na shin tu ma rung na// rdul dang ldan pa su zhig gos// 'bar zhing snang bar byed par 'gyur// 
107b4(rnying rgyud): bslab pa dam pa'i rin po che// bral na shin du ma rung ni// / skyes bu dam pa gang zhig gis// tshul rnams 'dzi/ na par byed par 'gyur// ston pa mi bzhugs de rjes na/ 
107b5(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i slob ma ji snyed pa// 'phags dang gang zag tha dad pa/ lung bstan 'byung ba gang su zhig/ bstan pa na mkha'i 'dra ba la// mos pa tha dad par bzung nas// 
107b6(rnying rgyud): yin dang ma yin cha 'dzin cing // rtsod pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram// de nyid nges par rigs gcig la/ mr-im zung pa' byung / blagacig pa dang rigs rnams sa// bslad cing bcos par mi 'gyur ram/ 
107b7(rnying rgyud): rin thang med pa'i rin po che// mi mkhas gang zag tha dad pas// nyon mongs 'dod pas khrid dbang gis// dug dang rje bar mi 'gyur ram// chos kyi rgyal po ston pa ste// 'di mngon phan chad
107b8(rnying rgyud): zhal bzhugs tshe// ma rungs pa rnams tshe bgyid na// gdug pa dar bar mi 'gyur ram// gang 'dir bstan pa gnas pa'i yun// ji srid gcig tu gnas par 'gyur// gang 'dir sngar
108a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung gang sngar 'byung // phyis 'byung dus 'di ji ltar 'gyur// ston pa'i bstan pa tha ma'i tshe// nges par ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ bslab pa 'dzin pa'i slob ma rnams// tha ma ji
108a2(rnying rgyud): ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ 'di nas mya ngan 'das 'og tu// gang ltar su'i ston par gshegs// zhing khams phyogs ni gang na bzhugs// de nas bstan pa ci zhig sgrogs// da yong 'jig rten mgon
108a3(rnying rgyud): mod rnams// mgon dang skyabs su gang zhig 'gyur// 'phrul gyi blo dang gros stor na// blo dang gros ni gang nas btsal// nges pa'i don 'di ma rnyed na// da yong nges don gang las gzung // mchod gnas
108a4(rnying rgyud): yid rten mi bzhugs na// sku gdung ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ slad kyis mchod gnas ci la bgyi// da ltar ston pa 'das 'og tu// gdung 'tsho ba skyes bu 'byung 'gyur ram// e ma'o// 
108a5(rnying rgyud): kyi hud e ma'i'o blong zhes yongs su gdung ba bton to// sang / sa rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po la/ sa thog mar dam pas gdung ba gton pa'i le'u ske gsu
108a6(rnying rgyud): pa'id// / de skad smras te gdung ba las// srid gsum 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsan// snying rje'i bdag po de dag kun// lcang lo can gyi po dang
108a7(rnying rgyud): dudad gsang ba'i bdag po gnas su 'dus// bskul ba chen po 'di skad gsungs// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod// sngon gyi go cha yal lam ci// 'jig rten sdug bsngal mi shes sam// 
108a8(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i sa la babra nas kyang // 'jig rten gdung ba gsal ba'i rigs// so so'i rigs kyi cha gzung bas// ma rungs pa dag kun btul te// 'dod khrid thabs su tshig rnams kyis// las kyi cha dang / 
108b1(rnying rgyud): spyod 'thun par// 'du shes bsgyur ba byas nas ni// bka' yi 'gro ba bshad sbyar nas// yang dag don la dgod pa'i rigs// de skad rnam par bskul ba las// dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// 
108b2(rnying rgyud): gdul dka' 'dul la mkhas pa'o// 'jig rten kun la rgyal ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i rtags 'dzin rdo rje can// dgyes shing gdan las bzhengs nas ni// cho 'phral chen po kun bstan
108b3(rnying rgyud): nas dang 'jig rten log pa'i gtso bo rnams// skal dang ldan par lung bstan pa// las dang skal par rab ldan zhing // rgyal bas 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i// bsod nams chen po'i skal
108b4(rnying rgyud): can rnams// sprul pas ji ltar lung bstan bzhin// da ltaradus la 'dir bab gyis// 'khor ba'i snying por lung ba da stan phyir// cho 'phrul rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis// bstan
108b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po dam pa zhig/ ji ltar bshad cing lung bstan/ bzhin// skal ldan can la bgro bar bya'o// drag shu/ la tsan zhes bya ba'i ri// dgon po chen po'i gnas 'di
108b6(rnying rgyud): nidad ye shes snying po can rnams kyi// theg chen gsang ba 'byung bI gnas// thog ma tha ma'i dus med par// dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// rgyal ba
108b7(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med pa yis// dam pa'i dgon gnas chen po der// sems kyi dkyil 'khor me long bzhin// bstan pa de ltar bdag gis kyang // thog ma tha ma med pa ru// bskul ba'i dus ni
108b8(rnying rgyud): gar byung bar// bdag kyang de bzhin cho 'phral snang zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi gdung ba sel bar bgrod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 
109a1(rnying rgyud): de nas de'i tshe de nyid du// gnod 'dul rgyal pos de gsungs nas// mi yi gnas kyi 'jig rten khams// gling bzhi pa las 'dzum gling gi/ drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri// 
109a2(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin 'du ba'i sa yin te// chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnas su// thugs rjes la mngon sprul gshegs// sa rnams yongs su g.yos 'gyur te// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis// thams
109a3(rnying rgyud): cad sbyangs te bde bar snang // sngon du snang ba'i skal ldan can// dman pa'i lus 'dzin dam pa'i rigs// mi las rgyal rigs dra ma che// rgyal bu rgyal byin ltas su shar// de tshe dam pa'i rigs can
109a4(rnying rgyud): rnams// dga' ba dang bcas the tshom skyes// spobs pa chen po'i dri ba dris// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad re che// skyes bu chen po khyod su zhig/ gang nas byon te gang ltar byung // gang
109a5(rnying rgyud): la brten nas gang du byon// don gyi ched ka ci zhes dris// cho 'a phral chen pos 'di skad du// nga ni cis kyang mi bskyod/ de// mi 'khrug rdo rje sems dpa' yin// snying rjes g.yo
109a6(rnying rgyud): zhing bskyod pas na// srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcig po// stong pa chen po nga yi yul// rdo rje rigs chen nga yi gdung // pha ni thabs mchog dpag tu med// ma ni shes rab brjod las 'das// 
109a7(rnying rgyud): thog ma med pa'i dus kyi tshe// nga yi yid bzhin nor bu stor// nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi de// yod par ma shes stor bar tsher// de tshe kun nas dbul ba dang // thar med nad kyis gzir 'gyur
109a8(rnying rgyud): zhing ta ta mun pa mun nag smag tu 'khyams// bgrod par bya ba'i lam yang stor// gdungs par gyur kyang der ma shes// de tshe nga yi bshes gnyen mchog/ byams mgon dam pa zhig gi
109b1(rnying rgyud): bstan// e ma'o khyod ci mi shes sam// mthong yun kun du bde ba yi// don srid chen po 'byung 'gyur ba// nor bu rin chen ma brlag gam// 'on te yod par mi shes sam// 'di ci chad par
109b2(rnying rgyud): 'dug gam ci// de skad pa shes gnyen mchog des spyan// de tshi nga yis slar sman ga/ don srid chen po 'byung ba de// yod par ma shes stor bar tshor// 'di dang phrad par bya yi thabs// 
109b3(rnying rgyud): bshas gnyen khyod kyis lung ston cig/ dam pa de yis dmigs bstan pa// de dang myur du phrad 'dod na// btsal ba'i thabs la brtson bya dgos// sa mkhan dam pos dmyigs mtsho// 
109b4(rnying rgyud): te datamun snang khams dang sa khams dang // sna tshogs la ma rnams bgrod byas nas// btsal kyang gzhan nas mi rnyed de// rang gis khams nyid nas byung // de ni rin chen
109b5(rnying rgyud): sngar rnyed pa'i// dam pa'i nas kyi khyim yin te// de ni snga// ra rnyed gyur pa yi// rnyed pa rnams kyi rnyed gnas yin// de skad thos nas de tshe ngas// gang tshe btsal ba'i ched phyir// 
109b6(rnying rgyud): dud dam pa de la lam ltos te// blo gros dam pas nges btsad nas// thig chen cang shes de zhon te// mun snang gnyis kyi khams nas 'ongs// gcan 'phrang chu bo bzhi rgal te// sna
109b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs lam bgod kun btsal nas// dam pa rnams kyi lam du zhugs// sa dang rnam thar lam bgrod de// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer bsnyags// nor bu rin chen tsad bcad na// ma
109b8(rnying rgyud): byung ma rnyed rang nyid kyi// chos nyid dbyings kyi khyim nas rnyed// rnyed pa nyid na rnyed med de// stor ba nyid na'ang stor bral med// yod min med min stor rnyed med// gzhan nas ma byung
110a1(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung bar// shes la rnyed btags ma shes la// stor zhes tha snyad btags par zad// yod dang stor dang rnyed pa'i dus// thog ma med pa'i dus nas so// de ltar chos
110a2(rnying rgyud): nyid med pa las// sprul pa snang ba'i dus 'dir ni// mun snang gnyis kyis khams 'dir 'ongs// nga ni thabs kyi gnyen pa mkhan// 'khor ba'i chu bo mtha' med las// srid gsum bsgral
110a3(rnying rgyud): bar dam bcas kyis// thar par 'dod pa lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi mig mkhan te// 'jig rten long ba dpag med rnams// ling thog bsal bar dam bcas kyis// gang zhig mthong
110a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi sman pa ste// grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa rnams// gcong rnying sbyar bar da ma bcas kyis// gang zhig bde 'dod lam 'dir shog/ 
110a5(rnying rgyud): nga ni thabs kyis mkhan te// 'gro ba lam log lam stor rnams// ma nor khrid par dam bcas kyis// yang dag lam 'dod lam 'dir shig/ nga ni thugs rje
110a6(rnying rgyud): spyan ras mkhan// 'khor ba'i ngag dpung 'jigs pa las// thams cad bskyab par dam bcas kyis// 'jigs dang bral 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni rdo rje rdzong chen te// 'khor
110a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i g.yul chen dmag dpung las// 'gro ba'i 'khras sar dam bcas kyis// gang zhig mkhar 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi tshong dpon te// 'dod pa rgya mtshes mi
110a8(rnying rgyud): ngoms rnams// gter chen sbyin par dam bcas kyis// gang zhig gter 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyis sgron ma ste// mun nag smag tu khyams pa rnams// mun nag
110b1(rnying rgyud): gsal bar dam bcas kyis// gang zhig snang 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni yid bzhin nor bu ste// yang dag yid bzhin 'dod pa rnams// yid bzhin bskang bar dam bcas kyis// lhun gyis/ 
110b2(rnying rgyud): grub 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni bka' yi lde mig ste// bka' sgromathar ram gsang ba rnams// rnam par 'byed par dam bcas kyis// gang zhig grong 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni bka
110b3(rnying rgyud): yi 'grel pa ste// gsung gi glegs bam zab mo rnams// nges par dgrol bar dam bcas kyis// gang dag shes 'dod lam 'dir shog/ rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol 'dir// skal ldan
110b4(rnying rgyud): gang zhig su bzhugs pa// nor bu rin chen 'od 'bar ba// de sa par 'char gyis brtson par gyis// de nyid sems kyi me long ste// mngon sum gsal bar rtogs ma thag/ 'gro
110b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje gsang chen gsang pa'i// nges don pa'i mdzod mchog rnams// 'dir ba gros gsal bar shad sbyar bas// lha dang mi'i rig 'dzin
110b6(rnying rgyud): las data rim par brgyad de grags par 'gyur// lha mi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// mun pa'i gdung ba kun bsal nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsol bar 'gyur// ci phyir mun
110b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdung bar zhugs// thub pa mya ngan 'das gdung ba// de ni na mkha'i sku mnga' ba// 'da' dang mi 'da' mi mnga' ste// 'pho 'gyur med pas na mkha' bzhin// de skad sprul pa'i sgra
110b8(rnying rgyud): 'byung bas// sngon du byung ba'i rigs can rnams// mchog tu dga' ba tshor skyes te// dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa yis// lus btud shin tu gus sbyar nas// spyan sngar 'dug te
111a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad gsol// mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin rum nas// glog 'gyur bar snang ston lta bur// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rnam dag lam
111a2(rnying rgyud): chen de nyid du// byung ba'i skyes bu don grub khyod// dam pa rnams kyi gsang 'dzin cing // gsang ba pa'i bdag por grags// bka' rnams 'gro bar khyod bsngags pas// khyod ni bka' 'grel
111a3(rnying rgyud): chen por grags// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la// mdzod gsum gsang ba'i nyi shar bas// shes bya'i mun pa kun gsal phyir// khyod ni gsal ba'i nyi mar grags// gdul
111a4(rnying rgyud): dka' ma lus kun 'dul zhing // bdud kyi bdud sde bdud da rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshegs kyang 'dzem das byed pas// khyod ni bdud kyi bdud du grags// de bzhin
111a5(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// chos kun gzugs brnyan snang bas na// chos kyi me ma nga zhes kyang grags// dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor
111a6(rnying rgyud): gyis tad zug rngu 'dzin pa bla na med// nad do cog gi dgar gyur pas// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal por grags// dga' mgu rangs par mdzad pas na// khyod ni gdung ba sel bar grags// 'dod
111a7(rnying rgyud): pa yid bzhin skong bas na// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bur grags// dam pa rnams dang 'thun mdzod la// bdag cag rig pa 'dzin rnams la// dam pa'i sprul pa gang ltar nub// dam pa'i
111a8(rnying rgyud): sgron ma ji ltar bkod// dam pa'i gsang lung ji ltar 'byung // gsang ba rgyud kyi 'gro ba mdzod// dgongs pa'i tshig gsum bgro ba mdzod// na mkha'i rdo rje bgro ba mdzod ces gsol
111b1(rnying rgyud): ba btab bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las lung dam pa bgo bar gsol ba btab pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de skad ces gsol ba btab pa
111b2(rnying rgyud): las tata gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// sngon du byung bar lung bstan pa'i// 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams// gdung sngags dri ba dang bcas pa'i// sgyu ma'i rtog pa dgrol
111b3(rnying rgyud): gyis nyon// sems kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid// na mkha' bzhin du nub pa med// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal bas// de la gang sgrib de nyid sel// tshad ma gnyis kyis gang gzhal ba// 
111b4(rnying rgyud): shes bya de yang tshad mar 'gyur// legs nyes rtsa ba'ang / de nyid pas// de nyid de la 'gyur pa med// sems kyis rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// dkar bas dkar ba'i nyi zla
111b5(rnying rgyud): med na na sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// le lo can la phan gdags phyir// sprul pa rnams ni 'da' tshul ston// ji ltar na mkha'
111b6(rnying rgyud): zhig 'gyur na// de tshe mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// gang dag gdug pa ma rung ba// bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis 'dul// rang bzhin 'od gsal spros bral ba'i// bstan pa rgya mtsho
111b7(rnying rgyud): 'ang de nyid pas// rang 'byung seng+ge rtsal can gyis// kun du 'bar zhing snang bar byed// bslab pa lhag pa'i sems nyid pas// bsgrub pa kun gyi mchog 'di ni// sa rab snang ba phyis 'byung ba'i// 'gro
111b8(rnying rgyud): ba lus kyi sems dpa' 'dzin// mtha' thug med pa'i sems can rnams// byang chub snying por ye gnas pas// de bzhin nyid du rgyud nges phyir// kun kyang mi slob de lung ston// sems
112a1(rnying rgyud): nyid yod dang med do zhes// byis pa rnams ni rtsod par byed// mkhas pa ye nas rtsong dang bral// yod med rtog pa'i tshig mi brjod// nga yi gsang sngags gsang ba 'di// 
112a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang yin phyir// gang mi dpogs par gzhan dpagos pa// gsang bar sgra gcig tha dad 'byung // dam pa rnams kyi gsang lu nga 'di// gang dag mi shes rmongs
112a3(rnying rgyud): 'phyar bas// dug dang bdud rtsir rje bas ni// phung byed gnyi ga sreg par 'gyur// kun gsal me long 'od po che// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ston pa de// mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med pas
112a4(rnying rgyud): na don 'tshe ba'ang glog 'gyu sprin bzhin med// byang chub snying po yod kyi bar// de srid bstan pa gnas pa yin// thog ma tha me med pa nas// byung bas snga phyi yod ma yin// dang po med
112a5(rnying rgyud): las byung brjod pas// tha ma'ang brjod bral med par 'gyu/ ra// gdung 'dzin thog ma'ang de bzhin nyid// tha ma/ 'ang de las gzhan mi 'gyur// 'di nas de bzhin
112a6(rnying rgyud): nyid 'dir gshegs// bdal khyab chen po'i zhing na bzhugs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid du rnam par snang // byis pa'i ched du cho 'phrul zhig/ me tog
112a7(rnying rgyud): bkod pa'i 'jig rten na// ma grags pa zhes bya bar snang // snang ba'ang nyid na snang ba med// de bzhin zhing khams gang dag tu// sprul pa yi sangs rgyas snang mdzad pa// sgyu ma'i
112a8(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa ji bzhin du// mi snang 'od kyang gzhan du snang // mi bskyod rdo rje thugs mchog kyang // thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med// mun
112b1(rnying rgyud): snang rang 'byung rang bzhin yin// skye med ye shes nyid kyi dbyings// gdod nas bder gshegs snying po las// rnam rtog blo bur las kyis bsgribs// de nyid 'gro mgon skyabs chen yin// 
112b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po// 'phrul gyi blo dang gros mchog ste// yun gyi don srid chen po las// blo gros dam pa'i yul du snang // rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'jug pa// ji bzhin
112b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i de kho na// nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la// blo bzhag de nyid nges pa yin// chos kun na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// ye shes sku can rgyal ba rnams// sku la dngos can dngos med par// sku gdung
112b4(rnying rgyud): ring bsrel ji ltar byung // sems can rnams la phan don du// med pa nyid las sprul pa yi// sgyu ma ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam// thugs rje thabs kyis bzhag tshul bstan// / 
112b5(rnying rgyud): nges par ring bsrel gang 'dod pa// bye ma dag las mar/ 'dod 'dra// gang tshe 'bras bti ba til 'bru smin// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// gzugs snang brab
112b6(rnying rgyud): sgrogs snying po can// sku dang gsung thugs snying po can// mchod gnas yid rten dam pa zhes// 'gro mgon rdo rje sems dpas bshad// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// 'khor
112b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems can rgyud las byung // 'khor ba'i sems can rgyun bcad na// sangs rgyas rgyan yang chad pa yin// dper na na mkha'i gzha tshon ni// dang po gzhan nas 'ongs pa dang // tha
112b8(rnying rgyud): ma gzhan du song ba med// de nyid ra 'byung rang zhi ltar// sprul pa rang 'byung rang zhi bas// de nyid de la nub pa med// 'das kyang ma bral tha dad min// ma 'das pa na'ang gcig min te// 
113a1(rnying rgyud): 'da' dang mi 'da' las 'das pas// bral dang ma bral ga la yod// des na gang la ci phyir gdung // gdung ba rmongs pa 'khrul pa yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar ji lta bu/ 
113a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ge ji ltar 'khrul zhig gu zhes gsang ba'i bdag po des seng+ge rnams pa lta ba'i tshul gyis gzhas btab pas rmongs pas gdungs pa rnams dga' mgu rangs nas gdung ba yod/ 
113a3(rnying rgyud): su sangs te sems ma bcos par gnas te de bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od gsal bar gyur to// de nas lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol ba// gsang ba
113a4(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po chen po gdung ba thams cad sel tam// 'o na te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi gdung ba 'ba' zhi gsel// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// lang ka'i
113a5(rnying rgyud): bdag po kho bo ni gdung ba thams cad sel ba ste// 'das pa'i dus kyi gdung ba ji snyed pa yang bsal to// da lta mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yi
113a6(rnying rgyud): gdung ba yang gsal// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rdul snyed kyi gdung ba yang bsal// ma 'ongs pa'i gdung ba ji snyed pa yang sel bar 'gyur ro// de bas na gang dag yongs su
113a7(rnying rgyud): gdung ba rnams ni mi shes pa// rmongs pa/ shed ma bye ba kho na yin gyi shes pa/ ma rmongs pa mkhas pa shed bye ba rnams ni gang du yang gdung ba med pa gdung ba dang bral ba yin no
113a8(rnying rgyud): zhes thos pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yongs su gdung ba las sangs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
113b1(rnying rgyud): gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang rmongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi
113b2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa dang po'o// / de nas lang ka'i bdag pos sngon du gnad pa'i tshig bcu ga TIg rjepa gang du sgron ma yongs su bkod
113b3(rnying rgyud): pa na yang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongs su dri ba'i phyir gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon bdag gis phyin ci ma log par thos pa// gang rmongs pa rnams kyi
113b4(rnying rgyud): gdung ba sel cing sems can rnams kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor ra gsal bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rna dmas kyi blo gros dam pa'i mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa
113b5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi dgongs pa de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa phyin ci ma log pa yang dag po'i lta ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis/ bsngags pa// theg pa chen po de 'degs pa'i yul tshad
113b6(rnying rgyud): ma nub par gyur phan chad du 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu zhes dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// lang ga'i bdag po cig 'di ji snyam du sems// khyod mi shes sam// yul
113b7(rnying rgyud): tshad ma nyid kyis bka' stsal gyis// kun dza ra chos kyi spun la bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa khyod kyi dri ba 'di lta ste/ de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de ni gnas skabs gnyis
113b8(rnying rgyud): dang bcur 'byung ba ste// gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba na yang 'byung // gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongs su bkod pa yang 'byung // gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung // snying po
114a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung // dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa na yang 'byung // gdul bya skabs la bab pa'i ched na yang 'byung // byin gyi rlabs las snang ba na ya
114a2(rnying rgyud): 'byung // brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung // gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang 'byung // lung chen po nges par bstan pa na yang 'byung // las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang 'drum
114a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa rnam par bgro nga na yang 'byung ste/ de dag ni thams cad dang thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su rnam par snang ngo // snang bar gyur to snang bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa ga
114a4(rnying rgyud): du grogs pa mi shes sam zhes smras pa las// lang ka'i bdag/ dngos smras pa/ e ma'o gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngan dbadag gis thos pa dam pa thos so// thos pa'i mchog
114a5(rnying rgyud): thos so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po yongs su rmongs pa gdung pa ni sangs pa lta na/ sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin du grags pa lag/ 
114a6(rnying rgyud): mi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir da ltar yongs su 'das pa 'di sgron ma bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ram/ 'das pa 'di yang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi zhing khams 'di 'ba'
114a7(rnying rgyud): zhig gi sgron ma sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam// 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag na zhing khams ji snyed pa'i sgron ma bkod pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
114a8(rnying rgyud): zhes dris pa la// gas ba po'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag bod ji snyam du sems/ 'di yang sgron ma zhes bya ste// da ltar 'das pa ni zhing khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas
114b1(rnying rgyud): lta zhog 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag sa ya'i sangs rgyas lta yang zhog/ 'dzam bu'i gling gcig gi sangs rgyas gcig yongs su mya ngan las 'das par zung cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhing
114b2(rnying rgyud): khams 'di ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi zhing khams yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa na
114b3(rnying rgyud): sgron ma'i bya ba mdzad do// de dag ji lta ba de ltar sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed kyang de bzhin du blta'o// de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
114b4(rnying rgyud): dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi mdzad kyi zhing khams 'dzadam bu'i gling gcig gi sprul pa'i sangs rgyas nyag ga/ cig mya ngan las 'das pa 'di sangs rgyas gang gi
114b5(rnying rgyud): sprul par yongs su bzung bar bgyi// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sa smras pa// lang ka'i bdag po 'di ni rdo rje sems dang pa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las sprul pa cha
114b6(rnying rgyud): gcig 'ba' zhig kho nur zung shig/ smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhing khams 'dir shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar grags na 'di ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ smras pa/ lang
114b7(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po de ni rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa'i bla dgas 'ba' zhig go/ lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'khor bsam gyis
114b8(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa'i dpung gtan bcom pa'i phyir thub pa chen po zhes yongs su grags so// ji ltar 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur yang thub pa chen po zhes bya bar yang grags pa ni 'di lta
115a1(rnying rgyud): ste/ lha'i gnas su thub pa chen po srid thub 'dzin zhes bya bar grags so// lha ma yin gyi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so// mi'i gnas su
115a2(rnying rgyud): thub pa chen po shAkya sang ga zhes bya bar grags so// byol song gi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bar grags so// yi dgas kyi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par snang
115a3(rnying rgyud): byed ces bya bar gegs so// dmyal ba'i gnas su thub pa chen po chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// kye lang ka'i bdag po der yang ma zad de/ de ji lta ba de ltar de bzhin du mi mjed
115a4(rnying rgyud): kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na thub pa drug gi sgron ma yongs su snang ba de lta de ltar rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
115a5(rnying rgyud): bcu mtha' yas pa na rdul snyed kyi thub pa drug gi sgron ma mtha' yas par snang ba yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyo gas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa stong phrag bcu
115a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhing khams de thams cad rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa// de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams tshe dang longs spyod thams
115a7(rnying rgyud): cad sum bcu rtsa gsum dang mnyam pa/ bar ma dor 'chi ba med cing brdzus nas skye ba shad dag kyang 'did pa thams cad bsams pas 'grub ste/ de na sbyin pa yang med/ gtong ba
115a8(rnying rgyud): yang med/ len pa dang spong ba po yang med de 'jig rten gyis khams gzhon dag ni gtong slong yod bdag gi gtam thos pa na de la yongs su smin pa yin to// den rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul
115b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dbang pod de bzhin gshegs pa shAk+Sha thub pa dri med smra zhes bya bar bstan nas theg pa chen po chos sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ga// gsang sngags kyi ngob nyid skyon mtshan
115b2(rnying rgyud): po yongs su snang ngo // de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug go phyogs bcun yang thub pa drug gi skyon ma snang bas 'gro ba drug gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bar byed do// yang thub pa'i dbang
115b3(rnying rgyud): de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya bar
115b4(rnying rgyud): sprul nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid yongs su snang bar byed do// de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang thub pa chen
115b5(rnying rgyud): po drug gi sgron ma snang bas 'gro ba drug gi sems kyi dkyi la 'khor gsal bar byed do// yang thub po'i dab po de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag nyi shu
115b6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bkram pa zhes bya ba na gang zag brdzus nas skyes pa shed dag ste/ tshe lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas pa'i zhing khams de na de bzhin gshegs
115b7(rnying rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya bar bstan nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid ston to// de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu// 
115b8(rnying rgyud): na yang thub pa drug go sgron ma snang bas semos kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed do// yang thub pa'i dbang po de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu 'ongs pa na
116a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bag che ba med pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de seng+ge s+tha zhes bya bar bstan nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang
116a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi ngo bo nyid ston to// de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang thub pa drug gi sgron ma snang bas 'gro ba drug gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du thub
116a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang po de shar lho'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de
116a4(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i tog ces bya bar sprul nas gong ma bzhin du tshe/ rdzas ston to// lho nub mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bdun bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu
116a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de gzi brjid rgyan zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma/ bzhin du chos ston to// nub byang mtshams kyi 'jig rten
116a6(rnying rgyud): gyi khams stong phrag lnga bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de tsan+da di mchog dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma bzhi
116a7(rnying rgyud): du chos ston to// byang shar mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
116a8(rnying rgyud): pad snying rje'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma bzhin du chos ston to// de bzhin du rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas myur du 'dzin pa zhes bya bar
116b1(rnying rgyud): bstan nas chos ston to// yang rin chen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan sprin zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rnam par bkram pa
116b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgongs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang baiDUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
116b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas gser gyi 'od zer zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang 'od dam pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
116b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'od kyi dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i 'jigarten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa zhi pa'i dbang po
116b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// ya nga sprin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bar
116b6(rnying rgyud): bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang yid mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bstan nas
116b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas me long gi 'od snang ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta
116b8(rnying rgyud): bde bzhin du chos ston to// yang zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas zla 'od dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang nyi ma'i
117a1(rnying rgyud): 'od zer brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po'i dngal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang spos
117a2(rnying rgyud): dri ngad ldan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rnam par spros pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams
117a3(rnying rgyud): na sangs rgyas mngon par spros pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rin po che spros pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal
117a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang 'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i de zhing khams na sangs rgyas 'od zer dpal zhes bya bar
117a5(rnying rgyud): bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang dka' ba rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas dka' thub rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas
117a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang gtsug tor bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas gtsug tor snying po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag po ji lta ba de bzhin
117a7(rnying rgyud): du chos ston to// yang nges pa can zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas nges par gshegs pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang nges par
117a8(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams nas sangs rgyas nges par gsungs pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang bde spyod ces bya ba'i zhing khams
117b1(rnying rgyud): na sangs rgyas bde ba chen po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas me tog dbang po'i dbyangs zhes
117b2(rnying rgyud): bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang yongs su grags pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas grags pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba/ 
117b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rnam
117b4(rnying rgyud): par sbyangs pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs ra mi zad pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de de bzhin du chos ston to// yang sman gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i/ 
117b5(rnying rgyud): zhing khams na sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan/ nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang gser gyi 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sadra/ 
117b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas gser gyi 'od 'phro zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar/ 
117b7(rnying rgyud): bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang gser gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas gser gyi gzub zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba
117b8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du chos ston to// yang dpal gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// 
118a1(rnying rgyud): yang snang ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang mya
118a2(rnying rgyud): ngan med pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang dga' ba'i mdangs zhes bya ba'i
118a3(rnying rgyud): zhing khams na sangs rgyas dga' mchog dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas
118a4(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji da lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang sangs rgyas ma dang po 'du ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas kun gyi
118a5(rnying rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya bar bstan nas yang da ga pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang yod sa su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas ngan
118a6(rnying rgyud): song thams cad sbyong ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang tha dad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun gyi slob
118a7(rnying rgyud): dpon zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba
118a8(rnying rgyud): zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang me tog mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
118b1(rnying rgyud): bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas thams cad snang ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de
118b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du chos ston to// yang tsAn bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas tsAn dri zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang seng+ge 'byung gnas zhes
118b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas seng+ge 'bum gzugs zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mi mdzes ces bya ba 'di na
118b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thub pa chen po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag dpa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to// de bzhin du 'a dag rten gyi khams bye bas yang rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan bye
118b5(rnying rgyud): pa sa yar bstan nas chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar mdzad de// la lar ni mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgyas// la lar ni da dung du yum gyi lhums na bzhug/ 
118b6(rnying rgyud): la lar ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs// la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// la lar ni 'da' ba'i tshul bstan nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas gzhan gyi sgron mar snang // 
118b7(rnying rgyud): la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs kyis theg pa chen po'i chos bston// la lar ni nyan thos kyi cha byad kyis theg pa chung ngu'i chos ston// la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
118b8(rnying rgyud): cha byad kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis chos ston// la lar ni snying po byang chub na bzhugs// la lar ni skul ba'i sa la bzhes// la lar ni thar pa'i cha lugs kyis so// la lar ni khyim pa'i cha
119a1(rnying rgyud): lugs kyis so// la lar ni lha'i cha byad kyis so// la lar klu'i cha byad kyis so// la lar ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni bdud kyi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni gnod
119a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin gyi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni srin po'i cha byad kyis so// la lar ni 'byung po'i cha byad kyis so// la lar ni na mkha' lding gi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni ya mtshan can gyi cha byad kyis so// la lar
119a3(rnying rgyud): ni byol song gi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni yi dgas kyi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni bzod ldan gyi cha byad kyis so// la lar ni shan pa'i cha byad kyis so// la lar ni smad 'tsheng ma'i cha byad kyis so// 
119a4(rnying rgyud): la lar ni na chung gi cha byad kyis so// la lar sku gdung lta bu da ra snang ngo // la lar ni ring bsrel lta bur snang ngo // la la dar ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid lta bur snang ngo // la lar ni rnam
119a5(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad lta bur snang ngo // la lar ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur snang ngo // la lar ni snang ba mtha' yas lta bur snang ngo // la lar ni don yod grub pa lta bur snang ste/ 
119a6(rnying rgyud): de dag kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to// gzhan yang gti mug gi rgyal po dgol bar bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i gzugs lta bur snang ngo // zhe sdang gi rgyal po dgol bar bya/ 
119a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir khyab 'jug gi gzugs lta bur snang ngo // 'dod chags kyi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir drag po'i gzugs lta bur snang ngo // nga rgyal gyi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir
119a8(rnying rgyud): tshogs bdag lta bur snang ngo // phrag dog gi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dbang po lta bur snang ngo // de bzhin du skye ba thams cad kyi gzugs su snang ba ni 'jug sred dang / sred med
119b1(rnying rgyud): dang tadabang phyug dang / stobs ldan dang / nor 'dzin dang / spre'u dang / ra dang / lu 'di dang / khyi dang / sbrang ma dang / bya rog dang / me khyer dang / srog chags dang / gang zin pa de dang de'i gzus
119b2(rnying rgyud): snang bar mdzad cing de'i cha byad kyis gang dag ji ltar mos pa rnams la de bzhin du snang ste/ ji ltar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan gzhal med khang las ma g.yos par chu tha
119b3(rnying rgyud): da pa'i nang du gzugs brnyan tha dad par snang ba bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las ma g.yos bzhin du zhing khams dpag tu med par sangs rgyas mtha' yas par snang ngo / 
119b4(rnying rgyud): de ltar na gang ming sna tshogs su btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mtha' yas pa na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan
119b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs par shes pa ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bskal par smras kyang shar phyogs gcig pu'i sangs rgyas/ kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i mtshan gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs
119b6(rnying rgyud): sotata de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bskal par smras kyang mtshan gyi mtha' ni mi rdzog so// ji ltar sen
119b7(rnying rgyud): mos pa chung ngu rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams tshad med pa dang mtshan mtha' yas pa thos na glo ga chad pa dang myos par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams de
119b8(rnying rgyud): dag thams cad na sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu phyin ci ma log par rims kyis dang gcig car ba
120a1(rnying rgyud): ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams na 'khod pa'i sems can chen po de dag ni sems kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i phyir/ blo shin tu zab pa dang / mi
120a2(rnying rgyud): zab pa dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa dang / brtan pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / rno ba dang / rtul ba dang / myur ba dang bul ba dang / shas rtag pas bsngags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gtam rims kyis pa dang
120a3(rnying rgyud): gcig char bar thos nas de dag la yang mi skrag mi dngang gi dga' zhing mgu ba dang / rangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sna tshogs su snang ba'o// de na gnas pa'i cha'i tshad kyang thung ba dang / ring ba
120a4(rnying rgyud): dang / dpag tu med pa dang / brgya pa dang / brgyad khri bzhi s+ho/ dang thub pa yin no// longs spyod ni ji lta bsams pa ba/ bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod// dka' bas 'byongs pa dang // 
120a5(rnying rgyud): mi 'byongs pa yang yod/ kun kyang lung bstan pa thob pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gang gis thos pa des rgyal ba mang po la sngon du bya ba byas pa yin/ 
120a6(rnying rgyud): nod/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no// rgyal ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// theg pa chen por nges par 'byung ba dag yin no// mngon par she
120a7(rnying rgyud): pa dag dang ldan pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi sras su nges pa dag yin no// lhag mthong gi migo dang ldan pa dag yin no// kye lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir 'jam+bu'i gling gcig gi sangs rgyas
120a8(rnying rgyud): nyag cig 'di mya ngan 'das pa yin no// de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag la mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod ma 'das pa yang yod do zhes smras pas lus
120b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sems dpa' de yid yongs su rangs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
120b2(rnying rgyud): de nas lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes dngos gang la bgyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' ni sems kyi dkyil
120b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo ji bzhin pa'i de kho na la bya'o// lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag pos sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba ni gang
120b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba dang / gsang sngags dkyi ngo bo zhes bya ba dang / ji bzhin pa'i de bzhin pa de kho na nyid ces gang la bgyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos
120b5(rnying rgyud): smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po sems shes bya ba ni ma bya/ sa ma bcos sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o// dkyil 'ja ra zhes bya ba ni thig le gang yin pa nyid do// 'od ces bya ba
120b6(rnying rgyud): ni snang ba'o// gsal ba zhes bya ba ni gang mi shes pa las gzhan gang gis kyang ma bsgribs pa'o// gsang ba zhes bya ba ni smrar byed pa spyod yul du ma gyur pa la bya'o// sngags shes bya ba
120b7(rnying rgyud): ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa la bya'o// ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ni dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa kun 'byung po'i gzhi la bya'o// ji bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni mi bcos ma smad pa la bya'o// 
120b8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni ma byas ma gtags pa la bya'o// de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni ma nor mi 'gyur pa la bya'o// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ma byas ma bcas
121a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba ni gang // sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po byed pa po mod la bya bas btsal du med pa'i phyir ma byas
121a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o/ gzhi ji bzhin pa'i phyir ma bcos pa'o// gang med pa las rgyun du 'byung zhing yul tha dad la 'gro ba legs pa dang / nyes pa dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa sna tshogs 'byung ba ste// 
121a3(rnying rgyud): gang de nyid ni nam mkha' lta bu'o// de rgyun ni 'byung ba ste/ sprin dang khug rlangs dang 'ja' rlan la sogs pa lta bu'o// yang dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'// 
121a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bgyi/ smras pa lang ka'i bdag po de kho na nyid ji de bzhin pa de ni thams cad nas thams cad du gnyen po med pa// pho 'gyur med pa/ skye 'gags med pa/ de lo/ 
121a5(rnying rgyud): na nyid sems rang rig pa/ dgongs pa nges par 'gel pa las cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dngos po ma da pa nyid bcom pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o// / 
121a6(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya'o// chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid ces kyang bya'o// sems kyi stong pa nyid ces kyang bya'o// mtha'
121a7(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o// dbu mar mi dmigs pa zhes kyang bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi zhes kyang bya'o// sprul pa kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o// sangs rgya
121a8(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes kyang bya'o// zhing khams kun gyi sgron ma zhes kyang bya'o// thugs rje thabs kyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o// chos thams cad kyi gzugs
121b1(rnying rgyud): brnyan snang ba zhes kyang bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po dag kyang gang gi don du de ltar btags kyi de kho na nyid la ni ming du btags pa med de/ de dag ni bla dgas nyid du rig par bya'o// lang ka'i
121b2(rnying rgyud): bdag po de'i phyir ni sangs rgyas ni bla dgas so// chos kyang bla dgas so// byang chub kyang bla dgas so// de bzhin du dbyings dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku dang / sku tha dad pa dang / sems
121b3(rnying rgyud): can dang / 'jig rten la sogs pa thams cad du btags shing chags pa ji snyed pa dag bla dgas 'ba' zhig tu rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po bla dgas gang yin pa ni blo bur du
121b4(rnying rgyud): btags pa ste ye nas ldan pa ni ma yin no// lang ka'i bdag po gal te ye nas ldan pa zhig yin na ni// ga dang blo bur pa thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lang ka'i
121b5(rnying rgyud): bdag po blo bur ni sprin bzhin te thar zug pa ma yin// ye nas ldan pa ma yin// brtag bzod pa ma yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir ming dang / brda' dang
121b6(rnying rgyud): tha snyad dang mtshan ma dang / btags pa dang / las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad ni blo bur pa ste 'byung ba dang / sangs pa dang / sgribs pa dang / dang bar rig par bya'o// / 
121b7(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po gal te las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la sogs pa blo bur du ma btags na ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de de ltar ma rung ba zhig na lang ka'i bdag po de bzhin nyid
121b8(rnying rgyud): de ni gang gi dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i bla dgas su rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir chos thams cad ming med// tshig med/ brjod du med/ tshig gi lam chad pa'o// 
122a1(rnying rgyud): smras pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang ming du btags pa'i gzhi la gzhi'i don tsam du yang mi rtog gram/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po bzhi'i don tsam du yang mi
122a2(rnying rgyud): rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi'i don tsam zhig ni 'di zhes sangs rgyas nyid kyis bcil kyang mi brnyes so// de bas na blo bur gyi rtog pa dang / mi rtog pa la sangs
122a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang / sems can zhes btags par zad kyi de bzhin nyid de la ni sangs rgyas sems can du cung zad kyang med de/ 'on kyang byis pa rnams ni blo bur dag gis sprin gyis bsgribs
122a4(rnying rgyud): pas blo bur gyi chos dag ched du byed cing 'khor ba dang byad chub gnyis su rtog par byed do// sems can dang sa ngas rgyas gnyis su rtog par byed do// smras pa/ gsang ba
122a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po 'o na sems can dang sangs rgyas 'di gnyis ji ltar shes par bya/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po ste nga ba nyid du shes par bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
122a6(rnying rgyud): po stong pa nyid ci la gnas// smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad la gnas so// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad ci la yang gnas/ smras pa/ lang ka'i
122a7(rnying rgyud): bdag po chos thams cad stong pa nyid kho na'i phyir ci la yang mi gnas so// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci la gnas pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po
122a8(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni byams pa chen po gnas pa ste gang stong pa nyid des sems can gyi don yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang sems can la
122b1(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid las don ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas dang sems can kun stong na gang gi thugs rje chen pos gang la ji ltar mdzad/ thugs rje chen po de
122b2(rnying rgyud): gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis gnas pas na gnyis su ma mthong bas snying rje'i yul med pa ni thams cad kyi
122b3(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub tu yo bsgral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po yin la/ byis pa'i snying rje dag gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i sems can srog bton pa dang gang thar par bton pa de ni snying rje
122b4(rnying rgyud): chung ngur rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de bas na snying rje chen po la rgyun tu gnas pas gnas par bya'o// la dang ka'i bdag po gang snying rje chen po la gnas pa dag ni sem
122b5(rnying rgyud): can 'ga' yang grol bar mi byed 'ching bar yang mi byed de/ rdo rje mtshon gyis dngos su bsad pa med par bas da pa kho na'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa las
122b6(rnying rgyud): sems can du btags pa'i phyir ro// snying rje chen po de ni de bzhin nyid dang glo bur gnyis kyi khyad par gyi tshig bla dgas su rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de lta bas na 'di lta ste
122b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas ming du btags po'i// yod mthong snang grags chos rnams kun// bla dgas tsam du btags par zad// de la dngos gzhi ga la yod// gang la ming du btags pa'i gzhi/ 
122b8(rnying rgyud): med rgyu btags chags bsgrubs 'grub cing // gang du bltas par snang ba yin// des na bya med byas pa zin// mi snang ba las kun snang ba// thams cad thams cad glo bur snang // 
123a1(rnying rgyud): snang nyid med pa'i snying po ste// yod med gnyis su'ang dmigs pa med// sangs rgyas med las sangs rgyas dang // byang chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i// tha dad ming gi bla dgas
123a2(rnying rgyud): rnams// mi shes rmongs la bstan phyir btags// de nyid la ni sangs rgyas dang // byang chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i// tha snyad ming gi bla dgas rnams// ming med tshig tu brjod pa med// 
123a3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid na mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// ye shes nyi ma'i sku gsal bas// thugs rje sgron ma'i 'od zer gyis// gti mug mun gsal rnam par snang zhes smras pas// lang ka'i bdag po la
123a4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gzhan la da re rtsol med par dbugs phyin par gyur to// sangs/ rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
123a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // thigs pa chen po nges pa ra 'byung ba'i tshul las sgrol ma yongs su bkod pa'i
123a6(rnying rgyud): gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa gnyis pa'o// // bam po gnyis par zug pa// de nas lang ka'i bdag pos
123a7(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung zhes bstan pa dris pa// kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg
123a8(rnying rgyud): pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtan du brjod pa'i skabs su gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig du rnyed de grags
123b1(rnying rgyud): pa lags/ smras pa/ lad ka'i bdag po gang gis gsang sngags kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid kyi nges pa phyin ci ma log pa rnyed pa de kho na nyid la bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
123b2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' du gang nas byung / gang na gnas/ gang du snang / ji ltar byung de skad ces dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye lang ka'i bdag po
123b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sdigs kyi ngo bo nyid rdo sems dpa' de ni 'khor ba dang bcas mya ngan las 'odas pa gnyis kyi khams nas byung ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang sems can kun gyi sems la
123b4(rnying rgyud): gnas so// zhing khams mtha' yas par snang ngo // ya dzi bzhin pa dang / rgyud dag par rang byung ngo // yang la nga ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo
123b5(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpa' nyid du nges pa gang la bzhag par bgyi/ ga/ sang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' ni gcig dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid lnga
123b6(rnying rgyud): grol te chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma bcos ma smad pa/ snying po byang chub tu ya nas gnas pa de la ya ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so// sems can kun gyi sems kyi
123b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gang mthong ba'i gnas skabs la ni rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ya ji bzhin pa dang / rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas
123b8(rnying rgyud): su rnam par snang ngo // de bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i nges pa ni thams cad kyi ya ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid la bzhag par bya'o// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
124a1(rnying rgyud): sems can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid de gang lags// gang zhig mthong na de mthong ba lags// de skad ces dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i
124a2(rnying rgyud): bdag po sems can kun gyi ji lta ba de mthong na mthong ba yin no// sems can kun gyi ji lta ba de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub yin no// de la ni chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs so// / 
124a3(rnying rgyud): de ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// de la ni byang chub pa yang med la byang chub par bya ba'ang med do// de la ni sems can yang med la sems can du gdags pa yang med do// chos can
124a4(rnying rgyud): yang med la chos can du gdags pa med do// de ci'i phyir/ do zhe na/ chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yi na la byang chub ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ na mkha' ni
124a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid thams cad bral ba'o// de'i phyir byang chub ni se mas las btsal bar bya'o// sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang na yang med// phyi
124a6(rnying rgyud): rol na yang med gnyi kar yang mi dmigs so// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs/ mi gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ji ltar ma gzigs na kha dog tu ma gzigs
124a7(rnying rgyud): sodatadabyibs su ma gzigs so// mun par ma gzigs so// snang bar ma gzigs so// pho mor ma gzigs so// ma ning du ma gzigs so// khams gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma
124a8(rnying rgyud): gzigs so// lha'i sems su ma gzigs so// klu'i sems su ma gzigs so// de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi sems dang / dri za'i sems dang lha ma yin dang na mkha'i lding dang mi 'am/ 
124b1(rnying rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / byol song dang / yi dgas dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa 'gro ba ris tha dad pa'i sems su ma gzigs so// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa
124b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang bral ba'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin la ye shes de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te rang bzhin med
124b3(rnying rgyud): phyir ro// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ kye gseng ba pa'i bdag po sems can gyi sems de ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras
124b4(rnying rgyud): bod lang ka'i bdag po sems can gyi de bzhin nyid grang yi na pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yi/ dan pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// / 
124b5(rnying rgyud): de ji lta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chags pa'i sems kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de du zhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid grang yin/ 
124b6(rnying rgyud): pA da ni de kho na nyid do// gang chags pa med pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang zhe sdang gi sems
124b7(rnying rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang byams pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// 
124b8(rnying rgyud): rje sems dpa'i de bzhin ni de kho na nyid do// gang gti mug gi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang shes/ 
125a1(rnying rgyud): rab chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang the tshom gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa
125a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang nges pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid
125a3(rnying rgyud): dod/ gang mun pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang snang ba'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
125a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang nga rgyal gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sem sa dpa'i de bzhin nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de / 
125a5(rnying rgyud): na nyid do// gang phrag dog gi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de/ bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// gang bsdu ba'i sems kyi de
125a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do// de bzhin du spro ba'i sems kyis de kho na nyid dang / 'byed pa'i sems kyis de kho nyid dang / 
125a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrug pa'i sems kyi de kho nyid dang / zhi ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 'thab pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 'jar ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / rtsod pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 
125a8(rnying rgyud): 'thun pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / brjod pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / brjod pa med pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / klu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid
125b1(rnying rgyud): dang dbadud kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / lha ma yin gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / gnod sbyin gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / mi'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / lto phye'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 
125b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung po'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / na mkha' lding gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / dri za'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / grul bum gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / skyes pa'i sems kyi de kho na
125b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dang / bud med kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / ma ning gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / bdag gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / nga'i sems kyi de kho na nyid
125b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / pu nu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / dgra bo'i sku mas kyi de kho na nyid dang / dbang phyug gi sems kyi de kho na
125b5(rnying rgyud): nyid dang / tshangs pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / ga 'dod kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / dbang po'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / tshogs bdag gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 
125b6(rnying rgyud): kun du rgyu ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / tshong pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / zhing pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / chu bo lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / lteng ka lta bu'i sems kyi de
125b7(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid dang / khron pa lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / bkod pa lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / 'khor lo lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / zo chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid
125b8(rnying rgyud): dang / bskol chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / gser chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / ser sna lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid
126a1(rnying rgyud): dang dgatong ba lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / byi la lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / lce 'bab pa lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / glog lta bu'i sems kyi de
126a2(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid dang / sprin lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / byi ba lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / khyi lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / glu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / gar lta bu'i sems
126a3(rnying rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid dang / sil snyan lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / rma bya lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / dus kyi 'brug sgra lta bu'i sems dang / seng+ge
126a4(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i sems dang / bung ba lta bu'i sems dang / sbrang ma lta bu'i sems dang / chu san lta bu'i sems dang / rus sbal lta bu'i sems dang / sprul pa lta bu'i sems dang
126a5(rnying rgyud): ma he lta bu'i sems dang / 'ug pa lta bu'i sems dang / spre'u lta bu'i sems dang / bya rog lta bu'i sems/ dang / rta lta bu'i sems dang / gzhad lta bu'i sems
126a6(rnying rgyud): dang dkang ka lta bu'i sems dang / spyang ka'i sems dang / wa'i sems dang / glang po lta bu'i sems dang / lug lta bu'i sems dang / khwa lta bu'i sems dang / khyim d+ha bu'i chu pa kyi ched
126a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems dang / thar pa'i sems dang / mthar pa'i sems dang / srin po'i sems dang / mi rgod kyi sems dang / na chung gi sems dang / rgyal po'i sems dang / smad 'tshong ma'i sems da
126a8(rnying rgyud): 'phyon ma'i sems dang / bram ze'i sems dang / shan pa'i sems dang / yi dgas kyi sems dang / dmyal ba'i sems dang / tshor ma'i sems dang / shing bal gyi sems dang / 
126b1(rnying rgyud): sa 'og gi sems dang / nam pa'i sems dang / dA ba'i sems dang / rgyu'i sems dang / zhags pa'i sems dang / lig rwa'i sems dang / lcags kyu'i sems dang / tho ba'i sems dang / dzu b+hur
126b2(rnying rgyud): gyi sems dang / snod kyi sems dang / khri mon gyi sems dang / me lce'i sems dang / thu lum gyi sems dang / mar me'i sems dang / nyi ma'i sems dang / zla ba'i sems dang / dngul gyi
126b3(rnying rgyud): sems dang / gser gyi sems dang / me stag gi sems dang / rlung gi sems dang / chu'i sems dang / mdung shing gi sems dang / gtun shing gi sems dang / sgo yi sems dang / shing
126b4(rnying rgyud): leb kyi sems dang / me'i sems dang / sa'i sems dang / 'dam gyi sems dang / rnyog chu'i sems dang / tshon de rtsi'i sems dang / nor ba'i sems dang / dug gi sems
126b5(rnying rgyud): dang / sman gyi sems dang / kha zas kyi sems dang / chu bo gi sems dang / mda'i sems dang / ral gri'i sa mas dang / 'khor lo'i sems dang / gzhu'i sems
126b6(rnying rgyud): dang sgrog gi sems dang / shing gi sems dang / lan tshwa'i sems dang / spu gri'i sems dang / thig gi sems dang / rdo rje'i sems dang / ri rab kyi sems dang / rgya mtsho'i sems dang / 
126b7(rnying rgyud): pha bong gi sems dang / zhang gi sems dang / phug gi sems dang / skye ba'i sems dang / me tog gi sems dang / 'bras bu'i sems dang / rtsa ba'i sems dang / yal ga'i sems
126b8(rnying rgyud): dang / sdong bu'i sems dang / mngar ba'i sems dang / kha ba'i sems dang / skyur ba'i sems dang / tsha ba'i sems dang / blag pa'i sems dang / bska ba'i sems dang / yi ge'i
127a1(rnying rgyud): sems dang / tshe tsha'i sems dang / lde mig gi sems dang / byagag lta bu'i sems dang / kun dga' ra ba lta bu'i sems dang / dbyar sbyin lta bu'i sems dang / me long lta bu'i/ 
127a2(rnying rgyud): sems dang / til gyi mar khu lta bu'i sems dang / dgun chad lta bu'i sems la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid
127a3(rnying rgyud): do// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ji bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid do// kye lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos ma smra
127a4(rnying rgyud): ma byas ma gtags ji bzhin pa yin la// sems can dkun gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de yang dam bcos// ma bskrad ma byas// ma gtags ji bzhin pa
127a5(rnying rgyud): de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan gyis kyang de gnyis kyi rang bzhin so sor ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// / 
127a6(rnying rgyud): gang rgyal 'chab kyis bu rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis kyang so sor ma phyed mi phyed phyed par mi 'gyur ro// kye lang ka'i bdag po gang gsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyed par 'dod
127a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis sems kyi de kho na nyid ngo shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems tha dad par spang ba rnams bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems de kho na
127a8(rnying rgyud): nyid gcig tu snang la de kho na nyid gcig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa yin po'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje sems dpas kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas
127b1(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyes so// de ji lta zhe na sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rnam par dag pa'i sgo yin no// chos snang ba'i sgo yin no// chos kyi dbyings yin no// chos kyi glegs bam chen po yin no// 
127b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin chen po yin no// kye lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di lta ste/ gang gis sems kyi de kho na// gsang ba'i snying po des rnyed na// 'dren pa'i tshig gis ma bkrol yang // 
127b3(rnying rgyud): sems la chos 'byung 'bum phrag yas// smra ba'i sgro mor thams cad gsal// don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs ni// tshig tu mtshon te 'dzin par nus// chos rgyun ting 'dzin thob pa yin// kye
127b4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na sems kyi de kho na nyid ni byang chub chen po yin la byang chub chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i nga ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsir gyur pa 'di lta ste/ 
127b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi chu med na// rgyal ba rnams kyang skams par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi chu bo 'dis// sngon zhe na/ mtha' dang rdos skams rlan// sems kyi rang bzhin stong nyid/ 
127b6(rnying rgyud): pas da/ de las byung ba thams cad stong // de stong pas na byang chub kyang // stong nyid snying po de kho na// rang 'byung ye shes chu chen po// rmad 'byung rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil nas// byang chub bdud rtsi'i
127b7(rnying rgyud): chu byung bas// rgyal ba thams cad bsil bar mdzad// 'di ni gsang ba'i snying po ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na// nyid tu nges pa'i ngo bo yin// rgyal ba kun gyis dam par bsngags// de bla
127b8(rnying rgyud): de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid ngo shes par bya ba ni yun gyi don srid chen po'i zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag po des de skad smras pas thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na
128a1(rnying rgyud): nyid du rnam par grol ba'i lam du gyur to// sangs rgyas kun sti dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mngotshan po las rdo rje sems dpa'i di khon nyid bston pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
128a2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de sems kyi de kho na nyid de gang gi spyod yul du gyur/ smras pa/ lang ka'i
128a3(rnying rgyud): bdag po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur gyis dang / sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar brtags par dka' zhing bstan
128a4(rnying rgyud): par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba'i phyir ro// // yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de gang
128a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa rnams kyi spyod yul las ma gtogs pa gzhan dang thun mong ma lags na ni 'o na gang bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid la lta zhing sems kyi
128a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud kun du btsal na gang de'i tshe nang gi sems kyang ma mthong // phyi'i sems kyang ma mthong // nang dang phyi'i sems kyang ma mthong / gang phung po la sems ma mthong / khams la ma mthong / 
128a7(rnying rgyud): skye mched la ma mthong / des sems ma mthong ba dang / sems 'di ga las byung zhes bltas na de 'di ltar sems so// gang dmigs pa yod pas na sems 'byung ngo // de yang 'di ltar
128a8(rnying rgyud): sems so// dmigs pa de yang gzhan nam ci// sems dpa' de yang gzhan nam gang // dmigs pa de nyid sems yin nam// sems dpa' de nyid dmigs pa'am// gal te dmigs
128b1(rnying rgyud): pa yang de yang gzhan/ sems dpa' de'ang gzhan na ni de kho na nyid mi gcig ste gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te gcig pa zhig yin na ni sems la sems kyis rjes su lta zhing sems kyis
128b2(rnying rgyud): sems mthong ba mi rigs so// 'di lta ste dper na ral gri des de nyid gcod mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo des de nyid la reg par mi nus pa bzhin sems de la sems des dmigs mi
128b3(rnying rgyud): nus so zhes bltas na 'di ltar mthong ste/ gang rag ma las pa/ sems la gnas med pa/ rten med pa/ chad par ma yin/ rtag par ma yin/ spungs par ma yin/ rgyu las ma byung / rkyen
128b4(rnying rgyud): kyis ma bskyed/ de las ma yin/ gzhan las ma yin/ de nyi dra ma yin/ gzhan ma yin/ rigs med pa/ rgyu med pa/ mi 'a phro ba/ mi snang ba/ ngo bo nyid med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mthong ngo // 
128b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag po mi g.yo ba// bden pa/ cung zad kyang ma mtho// nga / rnam par ma mthong / ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtog// mi bskyed mi sems/ mi spro/ sems gzugs med pa/ 
128b6(rnying rgyud): gang byung ba yang gzugs med pa/ gang la gzugs med pas byang chub la yang gzugs med do// sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad do// / 
128b7(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni de kho na nyid do// sems 'di ni 'di ltar myur ba/ rab tu myur ba mi gnas pa/ rgyu ba/ spre'u lta bu/ rlung lta bu/ smig rgyu ba lta bu/ chu'i rgyun lta bu/ mar me
128b8(rnying rgyud): lta bur lus gzugs lta bu/ ring du 'gro ba/ gar yang mi g.yo ba/ slar log pa/ yul la gnas pa/ drug go spyod yul ba kun shes pa/ gcig tu thub pa/ mi 'byung ba/ thams
129a1(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung gzhi gnas pa/ tha dad pa gcig pa mi g.yeng gzhan du me lan du mnyam par shes pa/ sems de khon par shes pa/ ji ltar rang gi sems shes pa de ltar
129a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi sems kyang rab tu shes so// rang gi sems ji ltar stong pa de ltar thams cad kyi sems stong par rab tu shes so// rang gi sems mnyam par shes pa de bzhin du thams cad
129a3(rnying rgyud): sems mnyam par rab tu shes so// des chos thams cad mnyam par rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pas byang chub mnyam par rab tu shes so// des sems chos thams cad
129a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi dbyings de ni ku dan gyi thun mong ma yin no zhes sems la gnas pa sems la spyod pa/ sems la dbang ba sems la lta ba/ 
129a5(rnying rgyud): sems mthong ba sems ngo shes pa lags na gsang ba po'i bdag po ci'i phyir dam pa 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul yin gyis po rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin zhes smra/ gas
129a6(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de de ltar yin mod kyi/ de dag thams cad nas thams cad du sems kyi de kho na nyid la rgyu'i mtshan nyid 'ba' zhig tu nges par zad kyi
129a7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu nyid du yongs su mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang sa dang sa pa rnams ni dra ba bzhi'i rgyar yongs su chud pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang dra ba chen po dang dra ba dang
129a8(rnying rgyud): dra ba byed pa dang / dra ba gcig pa'o// de yang byis pa rnams dang / smon pa rnams dang / 'du shes chung ba rnams dang / 'du shes gcig pa rnams kho na ste/ gangs pa rnams ni sam
129b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'bar zhig las mi shes pa'i phyir 'du shes gcig pa ste/ de dag ni dra bar chud pa/ drangs bcings pa she dag pas 'bras bu nges par rnyed par shin tu dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir
129b2(rnying rgyud): zhenan lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar sems 'bras bu'i de kho na gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung du med pa/ rdo rje sems dpas kyang mtshan du med pa yin na byang
129b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ci smos/ yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ci nyid kyis kyang sems 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid du nges pa de ma rnyed dam de skad ce
129b4(rnying rgyud): dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po kho bosad dung nges pa ma rnyed pa'i phyir gnan la bstan par rab tu dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
129b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyag gcig gi dge/ nges pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'o zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dri skad ces smras paso/ thams cad//
