154a8(rnying rgyud): 'dres yongs rdzogs pa// nges pa ji ltar yin pa'i don// phyin ci ma log nyid brjod pa// de nyid rnam dag lam chen yin// sku dang gsung thugs rang bzhin yang // gang na med de de kho
154b1(rnying rgyud): nad dpag med rgyal ba mtha' yas kyang // gzhan na med de de nyid yin/ gti mug ma 'dres kun nas rmongs// yongs su rdzogs pas stong dag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma
154b2(rnying rgyud): bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// zhe sdang ma 'dres mnar sems pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag mang // de nyid ma 'das yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// nga rgyal ma
154b3(rnying rgyud): 'dres ri bo che// yongs su rdzogs pas sdong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// 'dod chags ma 'dres kun du zhe na/ yongs su rdzogs
154b4(rnying rgyud): pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// dam bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// phrag dog ma 'dres kun nas 'khrugs// yongs su rdzogs pas stong
154b5(rnying rgyud): bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bco sa de bzhin nyid kho na// gzugs ni ma 'dres 'a jigs pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag
154b6(rnying rgyud): med da de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// tshor ba ma 'dres myong ba nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcwo
154b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kho na// 'du shes ma 'das 'dzin pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dis yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// 'du byed ma 'dres mngon
154b8(rnying rgyud): du byed dang yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// rnam rig ma 'dres tha dad shes// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag
155a1(rnying rgyud): med da/ de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid khon// sdug bsngal ma 'dres kun gdung ba// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs
155a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// khams ni ma 'dres sa bon nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// skye mched ma
155a3(rnying rgyud): 'dres skye ba'i sgo// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// rgyu rkyen ma 'dres 'du 'phro nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med
155a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// ma chags ma 'dres gtong ba nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzog
155a5(rnying rgyud): na ta ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// dag pa ma 'dres gdu nga ba med// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid
155a6(rnying rgyud): kho na ta mi g.yo ma 'dras mi 'khrug pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// brtson 'grus ma 'dres thub pa med// 
155a7(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med // de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// bsam pa ma 'dres sdud pa nyid// yong su rdzogs phra stong bdag /  tsod ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcom
155a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kho na// gcod pa ma 'dres chags pa med// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// bsam pa tshad med snyoms
155b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa ni// ma 'dres mi 'khrug yongs rdzogs pas// stong pa bdag med chos nyid de// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// kun kyang ma 'dres 'byung ba nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid
155b2(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// stong nyid rnam thar ma 'dres dben// mtshan med ma 'dres zhi ba nyid// smon med ma 'dres sdug bsngal sal// yongs su rdzogs pas stong
155b3(rnying rgyud): bdag med// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// rnam thar ma 'dres rnam par 'grel yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// stobs
155b4(rnying rgyud): ni ma 'dres gdon mi za// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag/ med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de de bzhin nyid kho na// mi 'jigs ma 'dres shin tu brtan// 
155b5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// snying rje ma 'dres skyob pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag
155b6(rnying rgyud): med da de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// byams pa ma 'dres phan 'dogs pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// 
155b7(rnying rgyud): ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// dga' ba ma 'dres 'gyod pa med // yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// gtang snyoms ma
155b8(rnying rgyud): 'dres yangs pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// gzugs ni ma 'dres 'brel pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas
156a1(rnying rgyud): stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// ting 'dzin ma 'dres mi g.yeng ba// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres
156a2(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// ma 'dres pa nyid mi 'phrogs pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho
156a3(rnying rgyud): nadang kun grol ma 'dres mngon gsum pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// chos can ma 'dres sna tshogs pa// 
156a4(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// ye shes kun mkhyen skye 'gag med// yongs su rdzogs pas
156a5(rnying rgyud): stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// me ba chos de bzhin nyid kho na// dbyings nyid med la mi zad/ pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres
156a6(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// sprul pa med 'byung rgyan mi 'chad// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid
156a7(rnying rgyud): kho na da rdzogs sku ma 'dres phun sum tshogs// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'das yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// chos sku rnam par dag
156a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas steng bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// thams cad ma 'dres tha dad pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong
156b1(rnying rgyud): bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// chos kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul las// ma bcos de bzhin nyid snang ba// dbu mar mi dmigs gsang ba nyid// 
156b2(rnying rgyud): skyes bu dam pa'i spyod yul yin// gsang sngags rdo rje theg chen 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsal// ci phyir rdo rje gsang sngags dang // sems can sangs rgyas tha dad min// 
156b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags rdo rje rnal 'byor pa// skyes bu thabs kyi pha rol phyin// rdo rje rnal 'byor mi ldan na// de nyid thabs dang shes rab bral// de bas rnal 'byor chen po yis// rdo rje gsang sngags dam/ 
156b4(rnying rgyud): pa yi te cho 'phrul bzhi yi rang bzhin las// nam yang 'a da' bar bya ba min zhes smras pas// ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni chos thams cad kun tu bzang po nyid do
156b5(rnying rgyud): zhes yongs su grag cing grags par 'gyur ro// lang / ka'i bdag po de dag ni kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul te// de dag kyang so sor ma 'dres par de kho na nyid gcig tu
156b6(rnying rgyud): yongs su 'grel to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // lang
156b7(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po de la rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na// zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa ni 'di lta ste/ ji snyed pa thams cad ji bzhin pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa 'ba'
156b8(rnying rgyud): zhig go// de ji lta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de nyid mi g.yon mkha' la// g.yo rdul tha dad ji snyed pa// mi rtog ye shes rgya mtsho che// gcig las rnam pa yongs kyi med// rang bzhin lhun grub
157a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor che// de na dman dang sems dpa' dang // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ming yang med// lhun mnyam byang chub snying po las// nges pa'i dgongs pa'i mnyam rnyed nas// 
157a2(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin ma bcos de kho na// zab mo dam pa nges pa'i don// ngo mtshar dam pa chen po yis// rdo rje snying po nyid la nyid// dgongs pa'i don la 'di skad 'grel// e ma'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 
157a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa
157a4(rnying rgyud): med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa me do// e mo'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmig pa med las thams cad
157a5(rnying rgyud): dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o// ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // mi gnas pa las thams cad gnas// 
157a6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa nyid na gnas pa mang // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'ong mod las 'gro 'ong nyid// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// e
157a7(rnying rgyud): ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ma bcos ma slad byas pa med// ji bzhin rang bzhin rnam par dag/ a ma'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
157a8(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin las// bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzog sa/ kun gyi gsang // gzhi rtsa med pa'i
157b1(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // stong pa ma yin ma stong min// dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// 
157b2(rnying rgyud): e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // nges par brtags na rtag pa nyid// rtag chad de nyid gnyen po med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa
157b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // nges par chad na chad pa med// byang chub nyid de log rgyun chad// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // chos so cog
157b4(rnying rgyud): gi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi tshe// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan
157b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// e ma'i mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasakun gyi gsang // rab 'byam mtha' yas gang nas kyang // 
157b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yong mi tshol// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sems nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas te// de las gzhan du yod ma yin// 
157b7(rnying rgyud): e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // srid gsum ye nas snying po nyid// ma nor ma bcos lhun gyis grub// e ma'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chas// rdzogs pa'i
157b8(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// brtsal ba med par rdzogs sangs rgyas// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 
158a1(rnying rgyud): kun nas kun du dang bzang ngo po// thams cad ye 'byam rmad du grags// e ma re ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // snying po byang chub de nyid las// ma/ 
158a2(rnying rgyud): gtogs gang yang yod ma yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // thams cad sangs rgyas yin pa la// rtog pas bsgribs pas de ma shes// e ma'o
158a3(rnying rgyud): mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rtog pa nyid na rtog med phyir// bde gshegs snying po gzhan nas min// a ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
158a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsang // kun gyi snying po byang chub la// ye nas dgongs dpa lhun gyis grub// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rdo rje gsang ba'i snying
158a5(rnying rgyud): po la ta sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // / ye nyid 'bras bu dam pa la// thob par bya ba ga la yod// e
158a6(rnying rgyud): ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gsang // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 
158a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'dus pa gsang ba rmad 'byung ba// rdo rje snying po 'dus pa nyid// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 
158a8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa'o// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // zla ba gsang ba las byung ba'i// gsung gi
158b1(rnying rgyud): thig le zab mo byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// gzugs snang mkha' la 'ja' ltar gsal// e
158b2(rnying rgyud): ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // snang srid sgyu ma'i ye shes las// sprul pa'i dra ba sprin phreng byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs
158b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gsang // sprul pa thabs kyi dra ba las// mtha' gnyis 'dzin pa'i zhags pa byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // bya bral
158b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor mthun 'jug spyod// sbyor thabs bya ba las rgyud byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // lhag par mthong dang zhi bar
158b5(rnying rgyud): gnas// dag pa'i mtha' gnyis nges par byung // e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa kun gyi gsang // sde mdzod dam pa'i bka' lung rnams// 
158b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa'i// gsung gi sgo yang de snyed
158b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rab 'byam rmad du grags pa 'di// bka' yi rang rgyud dam pa nyid// e ma'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 
158b8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// bstan pa 'byung ba'i snying po mchog/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // zab
159a1(rnying rgyud): mo 'dus pa'i gtan tshigs 'di// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i snying po'i yum// rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar mdzad// mi 'gyur mi 'jug rdo rje sems// dpag tu med
159a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsung mtha' yas// yon tan rin chen sna tshogs 'byung // mtha' dag lhun grub gdon mi za// rdo rje snying po nyid la nyid// nyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor shar// bsam med bsam/ 
159a3(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i// dpag med brgyad khri bzhi stong sgo// grags pa'i rnam grangs bsam yas kyang // nges pa'i theg pa gcig las med// gsang nyid ma nges 'jug par du// theg pa'i
159a4(rnying rgyud): sgo yang bsam mi khyab// gsang nyid nges par snang ma thag/ theg pa'i sgo yang de las med// brjod dang bstan pa'i rnam grangs kun// bkri ba'i don de de nyid min// tshig
159a5(rnying rgyud): rnga brjod pas don snyed pa// sgron mes mun khung gser tshe la ltar// gsang ba'i snying po'i mdzod brtol te// dam pa rnams kyi gter chen 'byin// thig le gcig
159a6(rnying rgyud): gis kun la khyab// thams cad lung chen nges par bstan// de dag de nyid ngang grol na// gsang sngags mthong ba sangs rgyas te// kun kyang bde chen byang chub sems// rtog bral dri med
159a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ bde chen nyid la bde chen rdzogs// ye shes nyi ma'i snying po shar// ma lus mtha' dag thig le'i rgya// ye nas btsal med brtsal mi dgos// rgyu 'bras dbyar mod de nyid
159a8(rnying rgyud): de/ ta mi g.yo mi rtog yul 'das la// rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog 'dzin gyis// thams cad sgyu ma 'khrul pas bcings// rang byung ye shes nyi ma nyid// mi bcos ji bzhin gnas
159b1(rnying rgyud): pan tata snying po nyid du golas med// thams cad byang chub snying po bas// kun kyang ma btsal bde bar mnos// snang snying 'khor ba'i ba brgyad kyang // snying po dbyings las gar mi phyin/ 
159b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' thug med pa'i gni bapyod kyang // snying po de las g.yos pa med// dpag med rgyal bkun bskrun kyang // snying po yongs su 'brel ba med// sems can mthar thug mod
159b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung yang // de nyid de las 'grib pa med// skye gan rgyud lngar gang snang ba// sangs rgyas nyid de yi shes sku// thams cad de nyid de gcig pas// yi nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// 
159b4(rnying rgyud): skye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin// bya byed med pa'i la 'khor gsum// ye nas bsgrubs zin lhun gyis grub// sgrub pa 'di la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor de
159b5(rnying rgyud): nyid bskal pa bzang // ji ltar bsgoms sbubs ci spyad/ kyang // de nyid yin te don gyi mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi snying po nyid// byin rlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung // 
159b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi yum// sangs rgyas bde chen de las byung // ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di// spros med thig ler gnas pa las// rgyal sas sems can kun gyi phyir// / 
159b7(rnying rgyud): nyid la 'chad cing nyid la 'brel// zhi gnas mi rtog mkha' khyab la// lhag mthong ma rmongs 'ja' tshon gsal// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa las// dgongs pa nges par
159b8(rnying rgyud): 'grel par bshad// lang ki'i bdag po stong pa nyid las de skad du sgra brnyan byung bas thams cad ma 'dres pa dang // yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa ni kun du bzang po nyid do// 
160a1(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na gang gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa de dag kyang gzhi dang / 'jug pa dang / sbyor ba dang / rtsa ba dang / nges pa 'ba' zhig las gyur pa dang // 
160a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba dang / brjod pa dang / bstan par rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yid rangs te/ thams cad ma
160a3(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par thugs su chud nas mtha' dbus med par grol te dbugs phyin par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang
160a4(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa 'o// // theg pa chen po nges pa dar 'byung ba'i tshul las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa
160a5(rnying rgyud): nges par 'grel pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phya ga rgya ye shes rnam par 'gros pa ste byung tshul ba/ stan pa lnga pa'o// // de nas yang
160a6(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i drug pa gdul bya'i skabs la bab pa'i
160a7(rnying rgyud): shes 'gyu ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po'i gsang ba dam pa 'byung gyi chul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su// 
160a8(rnying rgyud): gdul bya'i skabasel bab pa'i chen yang 'byung zhes bkod pa de 'jig rten pa gang zhig gdul bya'i skabs la bang nas yongs su gdul ba grags pa lags// smras pa/ langagis
160b1(rnying rgyud): bdag po gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu gdul bya khyad par can 'jig rten sreg par byed pa khro bo tshul rngam pa gdul bya'i dus la nges par bab pa'i tshe yongs su gtul ba na phyogs dus kun gyi
160b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dus nas skyes bu dam pa dag la rnam par bskul bas ji lta ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma yongs su bkod pa lta bu'i
160b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i sprin rnam par 'jigs pa rdul snyed kyis btul ba de kho na'i tshe de kho na'i dus nyid du 'byung zhing grags so// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gdul byed gang las byung // de las dang
160b4(rnying rgyud): skye ba ji ltar lags// gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyur ji da ltar 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa las// gsang ba dpa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye lang ka'i bdag po de ni 'di lta
160b5(rnying rgyud): stotata dran pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba ni sangs rgyas mi skyod pa zhes bya ba bskal pa kun dag 'a zhes bya ba la zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar
160b6(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu zhes bya ba gang ji lta ba bzhin theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba// thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos ma
160b7(rnying rgyud): smad pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa// skyes bu dam par chud pa zhig byung ba des sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su mthong zhing de dag yongs su bskul ba la brtson pa 'ba' zhig
160b8(rnying rgyud): byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor ba thog ma da pa ma med pa skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i las dang skye ba dpag tu med pa'i brjod kyis mi rdzogs te/ las skabs gcig gis skye ba cha gcig
161a1(rnying rgyud): la gzung na 'di lta ste/ nye 'khor du khyim bdag ke 'u ga sa zhes byab la bu thar pa nag po zhes bya ba zhig yod de// bu de la g.yog ngan pag zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de'i tshe
161a2(rnying rgyud): dus na mi gang dag dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu la rnal 'byor gyi lam bslabs te// kun kyang rnal 'byor gyi lam la gnas shing rnal 'byor la spyod par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na thar pa nag
161a3(rnying rgyud): bai de 'di ltar rtog go// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu 'dis/ thams cad ji lta ba bzhin ston par thos nas thams cad ni dga' bar spyod pa bzhin du lam yod pa'i chos dag 'byung ngam zhes rtog
161a4(rnying rgyud): la/ gang dag la yang dris pa las thams cad kyis de ltar 'byung bar smras so// de nas g.yog dang bcas pas dge slong ga la ba dar zhugs te gnas su phyin na de 'dun pa
161a5(rnying rgyud): legs par 'dun nas gsol pa/ dge slong chen po thams/ cad ji lta bar spyod pa bzhin du lam ston pa'i thab/ sa la mkhas par thos na de de lta nyid du nges sam// de
161a6(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol pa las smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de lta nyid du 'byung ba dag yod par rung ngo // de skad ces smras pas/ thar pa g.yog dang bcas pa dga' mgu yid rangs te/ bdag
161a7(rnying rgyud): g.yog dang bcas pa 'di khyod kyi bka' bar gzung du gsol// bdag kyang khyod la thams cad mi 'gag pa'i lam blangs te rnal 'byor du gnas par 'tshal bas dam pa nyid du nges par
161a8(rnying rgyud): gzung du gsol zhes 'dun pa las// dge slong des smras pa/ yin no// legs so// de ltar bya'o zhes legs pa byin nas thar pa nog po rab tu byung nas dam par bzung // ngan bag
161b1(rnying rgyud): ni dus 'dzin du bzung ste dge slong thar pa'i g.yog tu byas so// de nas thar pa dge slong gis gsol pa/ dge slong chen po thams cad ji lta dri lam dam pa de gang lags/ smras pa/ ji bzhin nyid
161b2(rnying rgyud): de ma bcos na// dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang // nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te// 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam/ de skad ces smras pas/ thar pa g.yog dang bcas pa yi rangs te// e
161b3(rnying rgyud): ma'o thabs la mkhas so// nges so// yin no// bstad do// bdag thams cad du de la yongs su gnaso zhes gsol te/ sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du spyad pa las thar pa dge slong ni blo gros kyi nges
161b4(rnying rgyud): pa ma rnyed de// sgra 'ba' zhig la phyogs pas dngos po bzhi kho nas spyad de zhen nas lus dam pa'i cha byad du bcug na sa sems ngan 'gro ba'i lam du zhugs so// g.yog ngan
161b5(rnying rgyud): bag ni sgra bzhi'i don gyi nges pa rnyed nas blo gros dam par 'a/ grel te/ don 'ba' zhig la phyogs pas ji bzhin pa kho nar spyad de zhen nas yongs su rnal 'byor pas lus
161b6(rnying rgyud): ma rabs kyi cha byad du bcug nas sems dam par nges pa'i lam du zhugs so// de nas thar pa g.yog dang lta ba ma mthun to smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis ni dpon gcig la sgra gcig/ 
161b7(rnying rgyud): tu byung ba 'di la so sor ma 'thun pa 'di ji lta zhig/ ngan bag gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni da ltar nges par 'jog pa 'di kho na las gzhan ma thos lag so// smras pa/ bdag gis
161b8(rnying rgyud): kyang da ltar nges pa rnyed do spyod pa 'di kho na las gzhan ma thos so zhes smras pas// de la rtsod pa chen por gyur te/ lta ba ma mthun pas g.yog dang so sor bskal te ma mthong ma phrang
162a1(rnying rgyud): par dam bcas nas g.yog khams ring por bshugs te spangs so// de nas thar pa dge slong de mngon pa'i nga rgyal log pa'i ri bor skyes te dpon la so sor nges pa rnyed
162a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsol ba las// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu ma bcos ma smad pa'i rnal mar spyod pas kha gsag med de rang bzhin gsong por smra bas na dan bgo ltar nges so zhes bsgo bas thar
162a3(rnying rgyud): pa kun nas 'khrugs te smras pa// dben par 'dra na gnyi ga ltar ro zhes kyang ma bsnyams par nges par bdag dkar bcag pa dang sun phyung ba 'dis byas pas dpon 'di yang khams 'dir
162a4(rnying rgyud): ma chags par byas la/ 'di dag bdag gi khams su bya'o/ da zhes dam bcas nas che ba'i nga rgyal skyes te dpon yang khams ring por bshugs te yongs su spangs so// / 
162a5(rnying rgyud): de nas thar pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgo gangs mang zhing rgya che bar gyur pas thams cad du ston du ston pa dpag par dka' ba'i phyir yongs su
162a6(rnying rgyud): ma chud de gzhal ba gnyis kyis gzhal ba ma byas par thar pa rang gi tshad ma la zhe na phyogs su gangs nas thams cad kyang log par bsgyur// nyid kyang log pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs te/ 
162a7(rnying rgyud): log pa'i dka' thub drag po dang / log pa'i brtul zhugs chen po la zhugs pa ni dur khrod kyi mi ro dag blangs te kha zas su byed cing lpags pa dag ba shus te ga yang gzhir gyon te
162a8(rnying rgyud): longs spyod pa lce spyang nag po dang / 'phar ba rkang rdebs dang / dred mo lag rdebs dang / bya gcan gsod byed dang / dur bya kang ka dang / za byed dur phag la sogs pa'i gson ma mang
162b1(rnying rgyud): po brten te thams cad kyi srog gcod cing sha khrag la longs spyod pa/ smad 'tshong ma'i cho gas mang por bsdus te chags pa chen por spyod pa// dngos po bzhi las mi 'da' bar dngos po
162b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i rang bzhin ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid las yongs su 'das par gyur to// de nas skye ba de 'phos par gyur te/ de skye ba de'i phyi ma lo lce spyang nag po'i lus su skye ba lnga brgya blangs te srog
162b3(rnying rgyud): chags 'ba' zhig gsod pa'i las spyod cing sha dang khrag dron mo za bar gyur to// skyo ba de'i phyi ma dag la khyi lu 'di la sogs ku za gsod pa'i las can sha khrag zas su byed pa tha dad
162b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lus su skye ba lnga brgya blangs shing gzhan gyis bsad da cing skye ba 'pho ba sho dag tu gyur to// skye ba de'i phyi ma dag la bya na le sha zan dang / khrag 'thung mchu dmar dang / 
162b5(rnying rgyud): dur bya kang ka dang / ru rtse rkang ldag la sogs pa tha dad / nga'i lus blangs shing gzhan gyis bsad cing skye/ ba 'pho bo she dag tu gyur to// skye ba de dag gi phyi ma dag la
162b6(rnying rgyud): sbrang bu tre ma dang / srin bu pu ka dang / ro za skang 'ji ba la sogs pa 'bu dang shin du 'bu chen tha dad pa'i lus su skye ba blangs shing de dag kyang gnyen pos gsad cing skye ba 'pho ba she dag
162b7(rnying rgyud): tu gyur to// skye ba de'i phyi ma dag la ngan skyugs kyi 'dam na gnas pa'i skye bor skyes pa skye ba lnga brgya blangs te gnyen pos gsad cing skye ba 'pho ba she dag tu gyur to// skye ba de dag gi phyi
162b8(rnying rgyud): ma la srog chags dag gi lus la gnas shing zas kyang de dag la byed pa'i skye bor skye bo lnga brgya blangs te gnyen pos gsad cing skye bo 'pho ba she dag tu gyur to// yang skye ba de'i phyi ma
163a1(rnying rgyud): dag la gsad pa'i sha dang / shi ba'i ro dang / rnam par rul pa dang / lung pa tha dad rdo dang / gam brag dang / sdong chen la sogs pa'i nang du gnas pa'i skye bor gyur/ 
163a2(rnying rgyud): te de la gnas shing zas kyang des 'tshe ba gnyen pos gsad cing skye ba 'pho ba 'ba' zhig tu gyur to// skye ba de'i phyi ma dag la mngal gyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bor skye ba lnga
163a3(rnying rgyud): brgya gnas de gnas dang 'tsho ba yang de las byed par gyur to// yang skye ba de'i phyi ma la mnar med pa'i gnas rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar de nyid kyi tshe'i tshad brgyad khro'i bar du gnas/ 
163a4(rnying rgyud): te/ dmyal ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshad ni brjod du mi rung dngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi mdun du sdug bsngal gyi tshad de brjod na gang gis thos pa de brgyal bar 'gyur
163a5(rnying rgyud): ro/ tade'i tshe de'i dus na dmyal ba des e ma'o 'di ci nye/ sa smras pa'i skad cag gcig gis phyin par gyur to// rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa'i dbang po chos kyi rgyal po
163a6(rnying rgyud): des kho na nyid kyi las yin zhes chos bstan pas las de yid la byas pas yongs su shes te 'gyod par gyur to// 'gyod pa tsam gyis gnas de nas 'phos nas rab tu che ba'i dmyal
163a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas su yang de nyid kyi tshe tshad brgyad khrir gnas te mnar med pa ji lta ba bzhin no// de nas yang 'phos nas che ba chung ngu dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / ngu 'bod dang / bsdus
163a8(rnying rgyud): 'joms dang / thig gnag dang / 'bar ba dang / yang sos la sogs pa'i dmyal ba'i gnas su yang de dag gi tshe tshad brgyad khrir gnas te mnar med pa dang rab tu tsha ba ji
163b1(rnying rgyud): lta ba bzhin no// de dag nam zhig pa na yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi dmyal ba rnams su de ltar 'phen no// de dag las 'phos nas kyang gang 'jig pa'i bskal pa mu ge dang nang dang
163b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshon gang du byung ba de dang der skye bar byed do// 'jig pa de dag gis de dag gang stongs pa yang gzhan dag gang 'dzag pa'i dus su yang der skye ba len par 'gyur ro// de dag las thar nas kyang
163b3(rnying rgyud): sha dang rus pa'i ched du gsod pa'i skye ba'i rigs su bskal pa brgyad khrir skye ba len cing 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de las thar nas gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba lnga brgyar gdung
163b4(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// de las 'phos nas lus srul po'i rigs su skye ba blangs so// skye ba de'i phyi ma la sha za'i rigs skye ba blangs so// skye ba de'i phyi ma la srul po'i rigs su skye ba
163b5(rnying rgyud): blangs te/ srul po gnya' dreg can zhes bya ba'i bu srul pa/ gtogs 'dod can zhes bya bar skye ba blangs so// skye ba/ de'i phyi ma la yul lang ka pu ra zhes bya ba'i smad 'tshong ma
163b6(rnying rgyud): zhig gi mngal du chags te skye bar smin to// de der skye ba blangs te zla ba dgu na ma shi bar gyur pa dang / mi gang dag gis da bu rkog bu 'di gso ba byar yul gang sme bar 'gyur pas ma'i mtshan
163b7(rnying rgyud): du bzhag par rigs so zhes glengs nas dug shing nal byi zhes bya ba'i rtsan dur phag gti mug gi tshang 'chas pa'i bar ni dug sbrul zhe sdang gi 'khras sar byed pa kha la 'dod chags dug bya'i
163b8(rnying rgyud): tshang 'chas pa'i rtsar kun gyis ma'i ro khang brtsigs te/ ro khyogs la blangs te der bcug nas bu yang ma'i ro mtshan du gzhag go/ dI bu des ma'i ro la 'jus nas nu ma la 'jibs
164a1(rnying rgyud): bas chu ser du grangs te zhag bdun gyi 'tsho ba byas so// de nas khrag tu 'jibs pas nag bdun gyi 'tshobs 'tsho'o// de nas nu ma zos pas nag bcu'i 'tsho bas 'tsho'o// 
164a2(rnying rgyud): de nas ma'i nang grol zad par zos pas 'tsho ba'i bya bar gyur to// de nas sha zad par zos pas zla ba bdun gyi 'tsho ba'i bya ba byas so// de nas gzhon nu de rtas par gyur nas dur khrod kyi
164a3(rnying rgyud): ro rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i bya ba byas so// de nas shin tu rtas par gyur pa dang / ro rnams zas su za zhing ro gos dang lpags pa rnams gyon te/ dur khrod kyi ma mo dang / sha za dang / yi dgra
164a4(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs dang / mi ma lags pa'i tshogs mang po yang mi ro rnams kyi sharjen zos pa'i rang bzhin gyi mthus dbang du 'dus te/ dur khrod kyi gdug pa can kun gyi
164a5(rnying rgyud): bdag por gyur te/ gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa// mi gang dang gang dag gson por za zhing mdangs 'phreng/ pa/ shin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma rungs par
164a6(rnying rgyud): gyur to// ma'i sha rjen zos pas na ma za na ma tang ka zhes ming gang dag gis yongs su grags so// yi dgas chen po de'i khwa rlangs las ni tsha ba'i nang byung bas 'byung bas khyab ste/ 
164a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba gang lus can rnams zug rngu drag pos gzir ba// sna nas grang ba'i nad byung bas 'byung ba khyab ste kun du gdung bar byed do// mig dug gis phog pas 'chi bar nges pa// drag po
164a8(rnying rgyud): / sngags gzer bzlas pa byas pas thams cad dbang du 'du bar gyur pa/ lus chen po la mdog thal kha sngo skyar 'dug pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig las brgyan pa// thod pa'i phreng ba se ral
164b1(rnying rgyud): du thogs pa/ dmar po khrag gis bskus pa'i lpags pa bgos pa/ thod sgyogs khrag gis bkang ba rtag par 'thung ba/ ska ral pa kham nag 'ban cing gnyigs pa/ 'bru mar thod rus zas su
164b2(rnying rgyud): zab tata thal ba dang sro tsa an 'dza' nas lus brgyan pa/ bya'i shog pa lus las byung bas na mkha' la bya bzhin bya ba byed pa/ gcer bu pa thogs med thogs pa med pas chu la nya bzhin bya
164b3(rnying rgyud): pab byed pa/ gang gis mthong ba mig rtsa rig rig sdang zhing brgyal bar byed pa/ lus phag gi spu can rtsub la yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sen mo kang ka'i mchu sder du byung bas gang zin pa'i
164b4(rnying rgyud): lus can sha rus myags par byed pa/ sngon goms pa'i ma thus lus can tha dad gsad par dmigs pa/ gang mo'i dbang po thams cad sdud par chags pa/ lus can
164b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag hag sngags te zil gyis mnan nas 'dar ye da yad 'jog pa/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo dang / 'byungapo dang / gnod sbyin mthu can gyis phyag byas te gtso bor
164b6(rnying rgyud): mthong ba// gdug pa can mtha' dag mngag gzhug pa dang / pho nya dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang / bran dang / yang dran du 'khol zhing kun la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang phyug chen por gyur
164b7(rnying rgyud): tod ta sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang yongs su ma dag pa'i skye spyad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas yi dgas drag po dang
164b8(rnying rgyud): rgyal gyi gtum skad 'byin te/ e ma 'o thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po ni bdag yin na/ bdag las gzhan pa'i dbang phyug dang phru ma yod na de yang bdag gir 'gyur na// bdag
165a1(rnying rgyud): ni 'gran gyi zla med che bcan gcig pur byung ngo zhes nga rgyal gyi gdangs ngar sgrogs so// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams kyi tshul 'di ltar byung ste/ shes blo thams cad rmugs shing
165a2(rnying rgyud): bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad kyang shin du stong pa rgyun chad du gyur te mtha' zad par she drug go// bdag tu zhen par gyur te ther zug pa she dag go// 'gog pa 'jug
165a3(rnying rgyud): par gyur te 'gags shing 'dras pa she dag go// bdud cing gtum par gyur te'i'adod 'bod par ltung ba sha dag go// log ltar gyur te mnar med par ltung ba she dag go// brkam zhing
165a4(rnying rgyud): 'jungs par gyur te gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltungadabashe dag go// shin tu g.yeng ba chen por gyur te mi khom pa'i gnas su ltung ba she dag go// shin tu gti
165a5(rnying rgyud): mug gis rmongs par gyur te byol song gi gnas su ltung ba sha dag go/ shin tu chags pas myos par/ gyur te mngal gyi khams su 'gro ba shaM dag go/ byang
165a6(rnying rgyud): chub kyi shing skabs pas sems kyi rtsa ba tshig pa she dag go// lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar grags shing grags te grags par gyur to// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag
165a7(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de che sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// stong pa nyid
165a8(rnying rgyud): du mu chad pas// chad pa'i khams chen nyid du gyur// de nas slar yang 'phos pa yis// grol thar lam ni chad par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po
165b1(rnying rgyud): rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu bdag tu lta la brtson// ther zug rtag pa bdag chen gyis// 
165b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas de nyid blar byung bas// dam pa dag la rmongs par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs/ 
165b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu 'gog la brtson par 'gyur// shin tu 'gog pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gags shing yongs/ 
165b4(rnying rgyud): su 'das par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshes sa pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// 
165b5(rnying rgyud): de che sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur// shin tu khro gtum gdug pa ma sa// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos
165b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can de// bag chags las kyis mtshams sbyor nas// shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur// blo yang bdud kyis byin brlabs nas// dug nad ro mi nad dang 'phra man ma// gnod
165b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i zug rngu gzer mda' 'phro// bdud dang log 'dren rnam thar 'tshe// shin tu gtum rnga ma ma rungs pas// 'jig rten gsum dag 'jig byed cing // dam tshig dag la za ba dang // dam pa'i
165b8(rnying rgyud): chu bo rka bzlog ste// lha mi 'jig rten 'pho bar byed// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// 
166a1(rnying rgyud): / de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par gyur// lta ba shin tu log pa yis// mnar med dmyal ba chen por ltung // de nas gal te slar byung na// dam pa'i lam
166a2(rnying rgyud): nyid chad par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad
166a3(rnying rgyud): ni da/ shin tu brkam zhing 'jungs par 'gyur// shin tu gdungs 'jungs brkam pa yis// yi dgas shin rje'i khams su lhung // de nas de nyid slar byung bas// shin tu skem po dbul por
166a4(rnying rgyud): gyur da/  bkres skom shin tu gdungs pa yis// phan tshun gsol cing 'joms par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin
166a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung @// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu le los g.yeng bar 'gyur// shin tu g.yeng ba'i le lo yis
166a6(rnying rgyud): mi khom gnas su ltung bar 'gyur// de nas de nyid slar byung bas// bskal pa gsum gyi bskal par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin
166a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du gti mug rmongs par gyur// shin du gti mug rmongs pa yis// gti mug
166a8(rnying rgyud): byol song nyid du ltung // de nas de nyid slar byung bas// mthong snang lam yang chad par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa
166b1(rnying rgyud): gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu chags pas myos par 'gyur// shin tu chags pas myos pa yis// mngal gyi grong khyer nyid du lhung // 
166b2(rnying rgyud): de nas de nyid slar byung bas// 'dod pa'i me yis gdud par 'gyur zhes thams cad du grag go// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'das pa sngon byung ba'i le'u
166b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de ltar yi dgas drag po des mi gang ji snyed pa dbang du gyur pa'i che ba
166b4(rnying rgyud): bcom zhing / a ma'o dbang phyug bdag las su dag che su da dag yod ces nyid la dam pa dang / lang ka yul gyi grong rdal mtsho rko rka thang mar gyi gling byan lag mchongs
166b5(rnying rgyud): kyi ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse zhes bya ba na lang ka'i mnga' bdag srin po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sang sa rgyas thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i slob mar gyur pa// 
166b6(rnying rgyud): mthu dang rtsal rmad du byung zhing ngo mtshar che ba// blo gros yongs su chub pa// thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba sprin lta bu 'byung ba zhig 'jig rten na che'o zhes grags pa las// yi dgas bya'i gshog pa
166b7(rnying rgyud): can de rab tu 'khrugs khams nas ru da'i me dpung du 'bar nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang 'phur rtsal gyis byan lag mchongs pa'i ri'i rtse mo la babs nas nga rgyal gyi gtum skad ru dra ma dra
166b8(rnying rgyud): mar dri zhes bsgrags pas// lang ka'i yul gyi grong rjel zhig gag pa shig/ a ma yom du gyur pas lang ko'i srid kun dang srin mo kun kyang skrag cing sngangs nas// e me'o 'od ji ltar zhig/ 
167a1(rnying rgyud): mig rtsa rig rig sngags yod yeng gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin bya'i gshog pa can gtum rngam 'khrugs pa zhig bdag cag gi 'khras sa na gnas pa mthong zhing thos par
167a2(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag chen po la sogs pa srin po'i tshogs kyis dmag gi tshogs kyi bsdu ba byas te gzhom par 'bad cing 'bad pa las// yang srin po bya'i gshog
167a3(rnying rgyud): pa can des srin po'i tshogs bag 'khum pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon du byas nas/ nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste// rgyal chen ris bzhi nga'i g.yog/ lha srin sngo brgyad nga'i
167a4(rnying rgyud): bran ta rta gsang ba mchog gi bdag yin pas// su zhig nga la/ 'gron zla yod// ru da ma dA ma ra dwa zhes nga rgyal gyi gtum skad bsgrags pa las srin po zil gyis non zhing bag
167a5(rnying rgyud): 'khums nas// la la ni 'di ni srin po'i khams rgyal bar bya/ da pa zhig ste bdag cag gi gtso bo'i 'os so zhes sgro gas la la ni 'di ni 'jig rten 'jig par byed pa zhig
167a6(rnying rgyud): ste bdag cag gi gnyen por 'gyur pa zhig go zhes sgrogs// la la dag 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po zhig go zhes sgrogs// la la dag 'di ni mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi tshegs
167a7(rnying rgyud): bdag go zhes sgrogs srin po'i rgyal po lang ka'i mnga' bdag ni 'di ni 'byung po'i bu gtogs 'dod can zhes bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten gsum skrag pa de kho na nyid ma gtogs pa/ thams
167a8(rnying rgyud): cad rlag cing dbang du byed pa log pa'i tshogs bdag ste/ 'di gzhan gyis mi thul te/ 'di'i gnyen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad de sprul pa rdo rje can gyis
167b1(rnying rgyud): gtul nas nges pa dam par bgod de yang dag par lung ston pa zhig pas 'di'i rgyus gsang sngags dam pa'i nges pa theg pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
167b2(rnying rgyud): nges te/ bdag cag kyang 'di'i g.yog tu byas nas sangs rgyas rdo rje snying po'i zhal mthong zhing gsang sngags dam pa'i nges pa rnyed par 'gyur bas 'di la nges par 'dun pa 'dun cig ces
167b3(rnying rgyud): sgo bas/ srin po'i tshogs rnams yid rangs te rang gi sde dpon ci smra ba mi 'dor bar de ltar 'dun pas na kun srin po bya'i gshog pa can de'i g.yog tu dong ste kun gyis smras pa/ bdag
167b4(rnying rgyud): cag kyang dbang phyug chen po kho na nyid ltar 'dun no zhes ga/ dgas te gtso bo dam par 'dzin to// des de dag 'khor nga du 'dzin par byas so// de nas yang srin pa bya'i gshog
167b5(rnying rgyud): pa can de srin po de'i ded dpon ma tang ka ru da zhes bya bar gra/ gas pa de nga rgyal gyi che ba bcom ste bdag las che/ ba gang zhig yod yongs su zhig yin ru dA ma dra ma ra dra zhes
167b6(rnying rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa las/ lha'i daded dpon ma tang ka ru na zhes bya ba mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thabs dang che ba khyad par du byung ba de dpags so zhes grags pa las/ bdud ru dra nag po de shin tu kham
167b7(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs nas nga rgyal gyi gtum skad bsgrags/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang 'phur rtsal gyis ma tang ka ru na'i gnas su babs te yong sad par dzams na/ rnga zha mar sad pa mi 'dra nas lus
167b8(rnying rgyud): can yin pas rung nas 'thabs 'thabs su byung ba'i ngad la tsha grang dbugs ham nas nad kyi mtshon cha spros nas kho na de'i lus la khyab ste/ lus med dpal nag po'i 'brum pas
168a1(rnying rgyud): gang nas mi bzod pa'i zug rngus gdungs te kho na ngo bo de 'ung thabs su bsnyad do// kho na de'i bam 'dzum+bu'i gling du han pa las dge gnas kyi yul brgyad du snang ngo // rung
168a2(rnying rgyud): nas kho na nyid bsad pa'i khyo mo dang bu 'khor rnams ni gnod sbyin bya'i gshog pa can de'i 'khor du dzin// lha ma yin dang / sha za dang / ro langs ril bdud de'i sar dzi ni// rgyal po
168a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi yang gang gi skyabs su brgyugs kyang yongs su mthar par de'i bran du dzin// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / drag po la sogs pa kun kyang gang gi skyabs su
168a4(rnying rgyud): brgyugs kyang mthor bar de'i bran du dzen/ de dag gi khyo modaril yang phrogs nas la la ni khyo mor byas// la la da ni slas su byas/ la la ni byi mor byas/ lo la ni 'dza'
168a5(rnying rgyud): mor byas/ la la ni bran mor byas// la la ni pho nya dang ma ngag par byas// lha mi yongs su srid rlag nas tham sa cad nag po bkrag mod kyi khams su gyur to// de yang
168a6(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar grags shing grags te grags par gyur to// nag po khyung gshog 'phur rtsal can// gtum rngam shin tu ma rungs pa// mi sdug gdong mi sdug gzugs dang // mi snyan sgra yi tsham rngam
168a7(rnying rgyud): dang // sha spungs rus spangs 'bu dang rnag/ khrag dang gshang gci'i khu ba la// longs spyod byed cing rtag tu 'tsho// leg pa'i sde dpon drag po des// 'di na lha mo'i srid rlag nas// lha yi sde
168a8(rnying rgyud): dpon ka ru ni// kho na ngo bo nyid bsad nas// 'khor yang rang gi phru mar byas// gdug pa'i zug rngu mer 'bar bas// kun kyang sde dpon bzhi la dong // de dag spu zing rab 'jigs par// pa
168b1(rnying rgyud): / po dag la skyabs su dong // de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// gtogs 'dod la ni skyabs su dong // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod
168b2(rnying rgyud): lha dbang bcas// grag po'i skyabs su nye bar dong // tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang po drag/ shin tu skrag cing 'jigs 'gyur te// rdo rje can la skyabs su dong // de bzhin gang la skyabs yod
168b3(rnying rgyud): par tatanye bar brgyugs kyang ma thar bar// 'jig byed de'i bran du rjen zhes thams cad du grags par gyur to// 'ung nas bdud ru da nag po lta zhig/ lha mi g.yo 'gul thams cad du mdzad
168b4(rnying rgyud): de/ lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal mche rkorka thang mar byan lag/ mchongs kyi ri bai ri thod pa mkhar zhes bya bar 'khras te/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ni phug tu btsugs// bdud kyi ru
168b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon ni sgor phyar te rang gi phra mas yongs su bskor// drag po rang gi rdzu 'phrul bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul gyis ri rab 'dzub mo'i rtse la bzhag ste// spyi bo la 'gying bag tu bsko
168b6(rnying rgyud): zhing nga rgyal gyi gtum skad sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste// ru dA ma dra ma ra dra sa khams na bdag las su zhig cha gang zhig yod// e ma'o sngon dpal shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas 'chi bdag gi bdud
168b7(rnying rgyud): btul ba'i tshe de'i bstan pa la byung ba'i mchog chen po nyan thos rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar lhan pa'i smra bas smras te/ nga'i bka' nyon cig ces zer ba las kyang bu chung go zu 'phrag
168b8(rnying rgyud): pa la khol la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar gnos cig ces byas nas mnyan nas des kyang bdag dbang du byed ma nus so// de'i drung na dpal rdo rje snying po ngag gi dbang phyug lta zhig sna
169a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul nas hI zhes dbang rgyud du nyan nu// kho na nyid kyis thab brdab pa byas nas 'gron bu khyod kyang bde bar gnos shog ces spo bas de yang thag khos
169a2(rnying rgyud): slar chen no// gnam rim pa bcu bzhin dpal rdo rje snying po lta zhig 'gran gyi zla med par thos nas de yang bdag dbang du byas la thams cad 'ub la rjen dran zhes sgrogs shing 'gran gyi zla med
169a3(rnying rgyud): rje btsan cig pu nyid du lta'o// ji lta ji ltar thar pa nag po gang yin pa ru dA nag por smin par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gang thub dka' gzhon nu de ni snying po byang chub gang na bar rdo rje sems
169a4(rnying rgyud): dpa'i de bzhin nyid du gyur to// gang ngan bag de ni de'i dus na rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba nyid du gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa
169a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las ru dA nag po'i spyod yul bsta/ na pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // bam po bzhi par zug pa// de nas de bzhin
169a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub gong na bar 'dus nas stong pa nyid du bshig nas skyes bu dam pa stong pa nyid la snang bar mdzad de/ de nyid kyi sgra de nyid la gag pa/ skyes bu
169a7(rnying rgyud): dam pa khyod kyi zhing khams kyi bya bo yongs rdzogs par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma rdzogs par ci'i phyir byang chub por bya
169a8(rnying rgyud): snyam ta/ tha dad du rnam par snang bar ma mdzad par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam/ de skad ces grag pa las stong pa nyid de las 'di skad du grag go// kyong
169b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don gang gi dbang gis zhing khams kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang tha dad du rnam par snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ 
169b2(rnying rgyud): de skad du grag pa las/ yang thams cad kyi de kho na nyid las bskul ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dang po 'di skad du grag go// stong nyid mi g.yon mkha' la// mi skyod bde bar gshegs
169b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// mi dmigs mi rtog de bzhin nyid// rtog pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzod ces grag go// de la yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du glag go// mi rtog dang las rtag nyid du// 
169b4(rnying rgyud): brtags pas stong pa gang byung ba// de nyid rtog pa chen po ste// gang mi rtog pa rtog par rgyu zhes grag go/ yang tha ma/ sa cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// na mkha'i
169b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi snying po las// rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i 'od// yongs la khyab pa snying rje'i yum// mtha' yas rgyal sri nga skyed par mdzod ces grag go/ yang skyes bu dam pa de
169b6(rnying rgyud): nyid las 'di skad du grag go// kun 'byung kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes mi 'gag kun tu snang // smra bas ma rjod med yul las 'das// mtha' yas mtha' yos bskyed pa'i
169b7(rnying rgyud): yul zhes grag go// yang thams cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// tha dad rnam par snang mdzad na/ gsung gi phyag rgya'i ye shes las// rgyal ba rnams ni yi ger snang // yi ge'i
169b8(rnying rgyud): ye shes skyed par mdzod ces grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du gag go// de nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// rang byung ye shes mu du gsal// sems nyid yi ge'i
170a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin te// sna tshogs yi ge hUM du snang // rgyal ba'i yi ge'i rang bzhin te/ phyag rgya yi ge oM la sogs// thams cad yi ge'i rang bzhin te// ma skyes gsang ba'i yi ge ma zhes
170a2(rnying rgyud): grag go// yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go// ye shes pha rol phyin rdzogs pas// rnal 'byor rig pa'i sgo mtshon pa// thugs kyi rtags snang snang ba mdzad// rnam grol ye
170a3(rnying rgyud): shes bskyed par mdzod ces grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes na// rtag tu rnam rtog med las 'byung // mi rtog rnam grol ye shes
170a4(rnying rgyud): thugs// rtog la rnam rtog mtshan mar snang zhes grag go// ya dang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go// stong nyid mi rtog me long las// ma skyes mi 'gag gzugs
170a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du// dbyings las phyag rgyar bzhengs su gsol zhes grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grog go// de bzhin nyid
170a6(rnying rgyud): du mi dmigs kyang // rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i dbyings// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas na// phyag rgya'i gzugs mchog rnam par snang zhes grag go// de ltar bskul ba dang po des yod
170a7(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs par bskul bas skyes bu dam pa de kho na nyid de stong pa nyid kyi dbyings de las stong pa nyid kyi sku rnam par snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'am// na mkha' la 'ja'
170a8(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i tshul du byung nas gang ma nges pa'i ye shes kyi gnas pas gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gnyis pa 'dis nges par bskul pa ni 'di lta ste/ rang
170b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin ma byung ma bcos de bzhin nyid// ye nas mi g.yo bde ba chen po'i ngang // brtsal zhing g.yo ba 'di la ci yang med// ye shes dbyings nyid tshig gi tha snyad de// de nyid dngos dang dngos min 'bru/ 
170b2(rnying rgyud): gnas nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs mi chod mi shigs pa'i// ye nyid ji bzhin bde mchog mi g.yo ba// rdo rje sems mchog na mkha'i snying po che// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bshes
170b3(rnying rgyud): gnyen po// 'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas// kun gyi rang bzhin me long 'od po che// rgyal ba mtha' yas skyed pa'i yab yum mdzad/ gang dag byang chub snying por mtshungs pa
170b4(rnying rgyud): yid te rang dag dbyings las ma g.yos byang chub sems// gang du dang po rnam dag sangs rgyas kun// khams// gsum nas byung rdo rje snying po'i lus// mtha' yas
170b5(rnying rgyud): rtog las yi ge sna tshogs sprul// sras kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil// gzugs skur bstan nas nyon mongs sbyang du gsol// gang du dang po rdo rje snying
170b6(rnying rgyud): po ni da/ khams gsum nas byung bde chen lhun gyis grub// gtum thung gdug pa thabs kyis gol mdzad phyir// dri mang sna tshogs blos ni hwA du sprul// 'od zer tshul gyis phreng bas bskor
170b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi thugs dam smon lam dbang gis na// cis kyang mi bskyod gzugs sku bstan du gsol// gang du dang po rnam par snang mdzad ni// khams gsum nas byung cir yang snang
170b8(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad// rmongs byed mun pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rnam dag byang chub blos ni oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam thugs
171a1(rnying rgyud): dam dbang gis na// cir yang snang ba'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol// gang du dang po yon tan 'byung gnas ni// khams gsum nas byung yid bzhin rin po che// 'dod pas
171a2(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rnam dag 'byung gnas blos ni sr-i du sbrul// rin chen phreng bas mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na// 'dod
171a3(rnying rgyud): pa kun 'byung gzugs sku bstan du gsol// gang du dang po 'od dpag med pa ni// khams gsum nas byung gsung rab snang mtha' yas// chags pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// 
171a4(rnying rgyud): rnam dag dri med blos ni oM du sprul// gsung snyan yi ge phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dadabang gis na// sna tshogs ston pa'i gzugs sku bstan du
171a5(rnying rgyud): gsol// gang du dang po gdon mi za ba ni// khams gsu/ ma nas byung sna tshogs cir yang mdzad// bya ba rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rnam dag nan tan blas
171a6(rnying rgyud): ni haM du sprul// mdzad pa gar gyi phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam thug de dbang gis na// thams cad mdzad pa'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol zhes bskul ba gnyis pa des
171a7(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas chos nyid sgyu ma las ye shes sgyu ma'i sku snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar me long gi dbyings su bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin du ye shes rang snang bar gnas
171a8(rnying rgyud): pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gsum pa 'dis mngon du rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs par bskul ba ni 'di lta ste// de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa khyod// 
171b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mngon rdzogs rgyas mdzod la// snying po byang chub ji bzhin pa// sems can don du snang bar mdzod// 'jig rten khams ni dpag med du// ji snyed bde bar gshegs pa yi// sprul
171b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // mtha' dag don du rnam snang mdzad// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa la// gzhan gyis phan pa'i sman ma mchis// yang dag bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas// 
171b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i gcong rnyeng sbyang mdzad pa// sdug bsngal zug rngu'i nad sel ba'i// sman pa che mchog gtso bor gshegs// nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pa// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgya mtsho yis// log
171b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nad dgras gzir po yi// nad pa'i tshogs kun bsla/ dang bar mdzod// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu nyid// snyi dang po byang chub la dgongs la// 'od zer snang ba rgyas bkye ste// 
171b5(rnying rgyud): mun pa bsal ba'i dgongs pa mdzod// kye ma skyes bu don grub pa// bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjes thob pa// gang 'dir 'dul ba'i dus la bab// ga
171b6(rnying rgyud): ma'i gnas mchog 'og min gyi// chos kyi mthong ba'i gzhal yas su// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur gshegs te// snying po bskul ba'i bya ba mdzod ces rnam par bskul bas// ji lta ji
171b7(rnying rgyud): ltar sprin mthongs nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba ltar// mi g.yo ba yi dbyings nyid las// gzugs sku nyi ma shar ba ste// chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i gzhal yas su rnam par
171b8(rnying rgyud): snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi cho 'phrul bskul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas chos kyi
172a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rdzogs longs spyod pa de rdo rje go 'byed yongs su bsdu ba'i mtshan ma mdzad pas mtha' thug pa med pa'i zhing khams stug po bkod pa nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyal
172a2(rnying rgyud): bkun nas yongs su 'dus par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas snying rje yongs su rol pa'i tshogs kyis gcig tu 'thun par 'gros pa// kye kye sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po 'brung/ 
172a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshogs snang ngo kun du rab tu 'dar 'byung ba/ srid pa log pa'i gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa byon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po'i yi dgas rnams// las kyis 'jig rten
172a4(rnying rgyud): khams 'dir 'byung // drag po log pa'i dka' thub kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// dregs par dra'i gdug dpal gyis// 'gro rnams mthar rlog
172a5(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed 'di// gdul ba'i zhing mchog rmad du byung // snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus nas// las ngan las kyi rgyun bcad de// bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs
172a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis gcig par bgros pa// kye me'i 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar// da ltar dus 'di nyid
172a7(rnying rgyud): du byung // lung log mngon pa'i ri bor bsregs// rang rgyud bsregs pa'i bslad pa can// bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi// glang chen myos pa drag po che// shin tu mi bzang dug chen
172a8(rnying rgyud): gyis dana'adod 'bod par gsad bslag pas// ro gling dur khrod mthar zhen pa// ji lta'i thabs kyis phan par 'gyur zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis
172b1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'thun par 'gros pa// nag po'i gdug pa bskyon pa 'di// ji ltar de dgar bzhag 'gyur na// mi bzad dug mtsho chu rlabs kyis// nag po'i khams su rgyas 'gyur bas// dam pa rnams
172b2(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyun gcod cing // nyi ma sgron ma 'dzag par 'gyur// de tshe las kyi mun pa yis// thams cad mun nag smug tu 'khyams zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin/ 
172b3(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'thun par bgros pa// gang 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// las kyi 'khor los 'phangs pa yi// blo gros log pa'i ru dra de// snying po dbyings nis byung ba ni// skyes bu dam pa'i sbyor ba
172b4(rnying rgyud): yis da bdud kyis bdud btul gnyer bkod ltar// da ltar nga 'di tshe byung ba ni// dug 'gyur brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di/ rdo rje khros pa'i the chen gyis// brlag cing gzhom po dus
172b5(rnying rgyud): la bab ces bgros so// sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gdung dang sgra/ 'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu 'thun par bgros pa / khong nas 'khyal ba'i dug chen po// thar med mi bzang
172b6(rnying rgyud): nad kyis zin// rtag chad khams su shi ba'i ro// lam log lom stor dmus long 'di// ye shes khros pa'i cho 'phrul las// 'bar 'phro 'khrug pa'i gzer chen gyis// smag chen mun
172b7(rnying rgyud): nag gzhom pa'i phyir// ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus te// ye shes rdo rje khros pa yi// cho 'phrul sprin phung gtibs pa'i sa// 'thun 'jug byis pa'i cha
172b8(rnying rgyud): byad kyis// rnam par rol pa'i mngon spyod kyis// dug chen rgya mtsho ma bskams na// 'dir ni snying rje rkyen mtshams mam// chos nyid snying rje chen po yi// gang 'dir dam tshig dam
173a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// dngos po bzhi yi bstan pa mdzod ces 'gros so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'dus pa chen pos rnam par 'gros pa'i le'u
173a2(rnying rgyud): ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de ltar 'dus pa chen po'i dka' 'gros yongs su chad nas las rnam bzhi gang gi gdul ba'i skabs la bab par dgongs pa yis gang de rnam par
173a3(rnying rgyud): brtag pa'i phyir thub dka' gzhon nu rdo rje snying por gnas gyur pa'i 'od zer las sprul pa thub pa'i dbang por byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sprul pa de la bsgo ba// thub
173a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang po dus 'di lags// ji bzhin bden pa'ibyin brlabs kyis// dngos po bzhi yi me dpung bzlog byang chub snying po bskul bar mdzod ces yongs su
173a5(rnying rgyud): bskul nas thub pa'i dbang po des dur khrod kyi bdag ma de'i phru mar snang bar mdzad nas thams cad zhi ba'i/ smra bar smras pa las// dur khrod kyi bdag po des tha'i
173a6(rnying rgyud): kha brdabs nas 'di skad du smras so// bu chung khyod kyis bdag thul ba ma yin te// sngon nga gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon drag po zhes bya bar gyur pa na kho na nyid lta bu mang po byung nas nga'i
173a7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la zhugs shig/ nga'i bka' nyan cig zer ba las kyang ma mnyan nang khyed kyi dbang du bdag gi la rjen go zu se mo dor gzod la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar mnos
173a8(rnying rgyud): shig ces bsgo nas bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa la bzhugs nas phyir log go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad
173b1(rnying rgyud): kyis yang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sprul pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su bsgo ba// rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung // chos rje 'od dpag med pa rdo rje chos
173b2(rnying rgyud): spyan ras gzigs sprul hI las rngam chen ston// ngag gi dbang phyug rta gdong zhal gyis gnon zhes yongs su bskul bas sprul pa rdo rje rta gdong chen pos dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i gnas
173b3(rnying rgyud): snang bar mdzad nas he ha hi hi hri hu lu hu lu hu lu zhes lhang lhang cher cher rta skad drag po'i dbyangs phyung ba las// srin po'i phyi ma yongs su s+tha zhum zhing bag 'khums pa tsam du gyur yang
173b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod kyi bdag po kho na ngo bo des rang gi nga rgyal gtum ska dad du ru dra ma tra ma ra tra zhes bsgrags nas rnam par brjid phyung ste 'byings pa las zil gyis ma non te slar kho na ngo bo
173b5(rnying rgyud): des slar bsgo ga/ mgrin bu sngon yang khyod lta bus bdag mnon pas khyod kyis bdag dzin pa ma yin te nyid kyig nas gang yin par bde bar nos shig ces mtha'i kha brdab
173b6(rnying rgyud): pa byas te// yang bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa skyes nas phyir log snyam pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' lta bu la gtsang
173b7(rnying rgyud): sme mi mnga' bas ma log par slar hen pa las kho na ngo bo des thim par dzams nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi dbang phyug des 'thun 'jug tu kho na dga' ltar thim du han no// de nas
173b8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa des dbu kho na'i gtsug tu phyung zhabs kho na'i mthil du byung nas rdo rje hUM zhes rgyas par lus kun du rgyas te kho na des ma bzod pa'i nga ro 'od kyi sgra mthar bton pa ni
174a1(rnying rgyud): a tsa ma'o// ci mdzad myur bar mdzod ces bton no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kho na de'i sgrib pa sbyang ba mdzad nas bde ba kho nar kho na'i gtsug tu phyung ste na mkha' la rta'i
174a2(rnying rgyud): dbyangs phyung bas srin po'i tshogs bur mer thor shug tu gyur te zil gyis non cing bag 'khums nas gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces
174a3(rnying rgyud): nus pas// de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/ ngas ni khyod ma btul gyis khyod kyi gnyen po rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang gis dbang bskur ba shin tu
174a4(rnying rgyud): gtum rngam 'khrug pa ma rungs shing mi bzad pa bdud kyi bdud chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba zhig 'byung gis de la skyabs su dong cig ces gsungs te/ chos kyi
174a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi pho brang du mi dmigs par gshegs so// de nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadad kyis 'dus pa chen po rnam par bgros nas phrin las
174a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi sgo gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab pa brtags na// gang zhi rgyas kyis 'dul ba mi 'dra nas dbang drag gis 'dul bar dka' bgros dam par nges par bcad pa'i mdo yongasu gsung
174a7(rnying rgyud): ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol spyod pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu 'gog pas zhi ba la// khros pas phan par mi 'gyur te// rnal 'byor
174a8(rnying rgyud): ma bcos de nyid las// zhi bar de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod// rnal 'byor tshul can zhi bas kyang // srid pa'i myu gu 'gag nus ni// rnal 'byor yod med stong pa'i mthus// 'gog
174b1(rnying rgyud): bslang ba smos ci dgos// shin+da rdo skams rlan pa la// gang du 'gog rnams bslang ba'i phyir// 'gog med stong pa'i chos nyid las// sna tshogs mi 'gog ji bzhin mdzod ces nges pa dam par
174b2(rnying rgyud): bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu stong pa rgyun chad la// dngos pos phan par mi 'gyur te// rgyun gyi
174b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub stong nyid las// med 'gyur de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod// stong nyid tshul can stong pas kyang // ci yang med par gnas 'gyur na// med las byung rnal 'byor mthus// mthar
174b4(rnying rgyud): zad mu zlog smos ci dgos// shin tu rgyun chad bzlog pa dang / gang du med las skyes pa'i phyir// rgyun dang bcas pa de'i stong nyid la// che yon rgyun gyi 'chad par mdzod ces
174b5(rnying rgyud): nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu ther zug rtag pa la// / 
174b6(rnying rgyud): med pas phan par mi 'gyur te// snying po byang chub de nyid las// bdag nyid chen por thams cad mdzod// mi 'gyur tshul can rtag pas kyang // dngos po brtan g.yor byed nus na// 
174b7(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen por lhun grub mthus// ther zug zlog pa smos ci dgos// bdag tu zhen pa zlog pa dang // dngos 'dzin bka' mgo bsgyur ba'i phyir// bdag med rtag pa chos nyid las// byed
174b8(rnying rgyud): med rang bzhin nyid du mdzod ces nges par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu gdug cing gtum
175a1(rnying rgyud): pa la tad ni bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum da/ 
175a2(rnying rgyud): skrag nus na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba dang // dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// 'bar ba chen po gar dag/ 
175a3(rnying rgyud): las / dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying po de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo
175a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa shin tu log par zhen pa la/ bden pas phan par mi 'gyur te// gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs las// thams cad 'thun 'jug nyid du mdzod// mdzad
175a5(rnying rgyud): spyod tshul can spyad pas kyang // thams cad bka' zlog bye/ da nus na// thugs rje 'thun 'jug mdzad spyod kyis// lam log drang song smos ci dgos// dngos pos dngos
175a6(rnying rgyud): po dgol ba dang // dug gis dug nad bsal ba'i phyir// thabs mchog dpag gis me lang ba'i// mdzad pa gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin
175a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu 'dzungs shing bskams pa la// btang bas phan par mi 'gyur te// med la mi zad
175a8(rnying rgyud): kun 'byung las// thams cad mi zad nor bur mdzod// dka' thub tshul can 'gags pas kyang // tshe gcig 'tsho bar byed nus na// med la 'dod dgur 'byung ba yis// khams gsuM
175b1(rnying rgyud): gdung ba smos ci dgos// 'jungs pa tshim par bya ba dang // yongs su gdung ba bsal ba'i phyir// theg chen gsung ba'i longs spyod las// na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa
175b2(rnying rgyud): dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu le lo g.yeng ba lo// bskul bas brtson par
175b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur te// bya btsal med pa'i chos nyid las// thams cad bya ba med par mdzod// mi g.yo'i tshul can gnas pas kyang // dam pa'i las lam gcod byed na// bya bral mi g.yo bde/ 
175b4(rnying rgyud): chen pos// 'jig rten g.yeng ba smos ci dgos// mi khom de lam rgyud bcad pa dang // le lo g.yang ba'i dgrag/ zhom phyir// gtang snyoms rnal 'byor chen po las// bya
175b5(rnying rgyud): med gnas par phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par ba cad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i gdu nga dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs
175b6(rnying rgyud): padata shin tu gti mug rmongs pa la// bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur te// khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa las thams cad gti mug chen por mdzod// gti mug tshul can rmongs
175b7(rnying rgyud): pas kyang // thams cad mun par byed nus na// mi 'byed blang der med pa yis// khams gsum rmongs pa smos ci dgos// mun pa'i skye mched gzhom pa dang // rmongs pa na mkha'
175b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i phyir// gti mug rnam dag ye shes las// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i
176a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// shin tu chags shing zhen pa la// gnyen pos phan par mi 'gyur te// chags rab chen po'i ye shes las// tham
176a2(rnying rgyud): cad chags pa chen por mdzod// chags pa'i tshul can spyad pas kyang // khams gsum khrag tu byed nus na// 'dod chags rnam dag chags spyad pas// khams gsum zhen chags
176a3(rnying rgyud): smos ci dgos// 'dod chags khrag mtsho bskam pa dang // tshogs pas chags pa bcad pa'i phyir// 'dod chags rnam dag ye shes las// 'dod chags gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod ces
176a4(rnying rgyud): nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa// / shin du dngos por zhen pa la// bkag pas phan par mi
176a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// thams cad 'thun 'jug spyod par mdzod// 'thun 'jug tshul/ can 'thun pas kyang // khams gsum log par byed
176a6(rnying rgyud): nus na// thugs rje gar gyi mdzad spyod kyis// 'jig rten blo log smos ci dgos// de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyedang // 'jig rten 'jig rten mtha' yas kun// 'dul ba'i thabs
176a7(rnying rgyud): ni sna tshogs kyis// drangs te yang dag gsang bar sbyor// khro la byams dang khro tshul mdzod// zhi la zhi ba slong sbyong nyid// drag shul can la drag po nyid// g.yam la g.yem dang gce
176a8(rnying rgyud): bor mdzod// chags la chags dang rnam spong nyid// g.yeng la sems sdud g.yeng ba nyid// rmongs la khyab par mnyam pa nyid// ri la ting 'dzin ri bo nyid// phrag dog can la
176b1(rnying rgyud): phrag dog tshul// de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed// kun gzhi mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// na mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas par// khyad par 'dod pa'i lus can gyis// kun bzhi kun
176b2(rnying rgyud): gyi dbyings na dpa'// rdo rje snying po rab tu gnas// sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi dbyings// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid// ye nas yin par nges pa na// mtha' thug med pa'i sems/ 
176b3(rnying rgyud): can rnams// ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa bzhin// ma bkag ma bcos ji bzhin par// nges pa nyid du gyur pa yi// thabs mchog dpag gi mi lang ba'i// mdzad spyod gar thabs sprin phung gI/ 
176b4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar spyad kyang de nyid las// ma g.yos mi gos dbyings dan dpa'// nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo las// mtha' yas da dpag tu med pa yi// sgo nas thams cad ma bkug par// 
176b5(rnying rgyud): ci dga' nyid du bde drangs te// dam pa rnams kyi nges pa ra mdzod// 'dir ni nan tan drag shul gyis// mi zad/ 'bar ba'i ye shes las// dur khrod bdag po rab 'jigs
176b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i nga che mchog 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar mdzod ces nges pa dam par bcad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bka' bgros dam pa bcad pa'i le'u
176b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ste/ nyi shu lnga pa'o// // lang ka'i bdag po de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa zhig gis shes bzhin du gang yongs su sad pa'i phyir
176b8(rnying rgyud): yang 'khor der 'khod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i go cha blo gros thabs ldan zhes bya ba zhig la yongs su dris pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po yi dgas chen po 'di
177a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu ni gang las byung // rkyen ni ci las byung / 'bras bu ni cir smin/ rigs ni gar gtogs/ las skal gyi spyod pa ni ci spyod/ ma btul na ci gnod/ btul na ci zhig dgos/ de skad
177a2(rnying rgyud): dris pa las/ bskal pa'i go cha chen po des smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po yi dgas chen po 'di gang legs pa'i rgyu rkyen las ni ma byung / nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi rgyu rkyen las
177a3(rnying rgyud): byung ste/ rgyu ni mun pa'i ri bo las byung ngo // rgyan ni bka' bgo log pa'i dka' thub drag po las byung ngo // 'bras bu ni sdug bsngal gyi ri bor smin no// rigs ni rmang rigs 'khor ba gdol pa 'brung
177a4(rnying rgyud): po yi dgas su gtogs so// las skal gyi spyod pa ni 'khor dpa'i dngos po bzhi la 'jol nyag tu spyod do// 'di me ba/ da la na lus can gyi byang chub snying po ring du nub pa'i rkyen du
177a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// btul na ni kun gyi snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du nye bar 'chang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa da nga / kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// oM ma'o sems
177a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po 'o na dus 'di ni dus la bab pa'o// las 'di las kyi mchog go// gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba'i yang gsang ba dam pa'o// thul kun du rab tu thul// dus la bab pa'i bskabs
177a7(rnying rgyud): chen 'dir// lus la bab pa'i sems can 'di// stongs la bab pa'i thugs rje yis// 'du shes bsgyur ba thugs rje'i mchog/ stong gsum ma lus bsten pa bas// 'bum gyi char yang
177a8(rnying rgyud): mi phod do zhes nye bar bskul lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan bag gnas gyur pa skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin du snang ba nyid la yongs su bsgo ba mdzad pa/ 
177b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi gsang 'dzin pa// thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin// drag po btul zhugs chen po can// dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// sngon gyi go cha chen po'i mthus// sangs rgyas sangs
177b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// gdul dka' drag po 'dul mdzad pa// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'jom// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i sku// 'jig su rung ba'i dpa' byad can// gtum rnga ma
177b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrug pa'i ngo bo yis// dur khrod bdag po rab tu chom zhes yongs su bskul bas// skyes bu rdo rje 'dzin pa de// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// 'byung po'i rgyal pos dbang du byas// 
177b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu gtum rngam 'khrug pa des// lha mi 'jig rten brlag/ ma khang // bzhin dang mdangs kyang mi gsal bar// kun du mog mog por gyur nas// dus ma yin pa'i mun
177b5(rnying rgyud): pa yang // mun nag smag tu gyur pas 'thibs// tsha dang glang dang nad dam rims// mi ngas sna tshogs kun tu rgyas// rlung ma ra 'brug dang sel ba dang // rnag khrag rdo dang mtshon cha'i char// 
177b6(rnying rgyud): dus ma yin par kun du 'byung // skye dman 'tsho ba'ang log par gyur// gdug pa sna tshogs sems can gyis// shin du nyams thag gdungs 'gyur ba'i// mgon med pa yi 'jig rten te// mkhyen te/ 
177b7(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes gdung ba ni// rab tu rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// rdo rje chos kyi rta gdong la// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad du// ngag gi dbang phyug rdo rje'i gdong // lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal gyi// dbus kyi
177b8(rnying rgyud): ri bo ma la ya// rkorka thang mar rgya mtsho'i dro// drag shul yod pa'i rtse la dong / rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul// dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcas// mi ngams skyabs langs chen po la// 
178a1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rdo rje bya sbyin thong // dris kyang mi bskyod 'khrugs pa'i// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid// rdo rje snying po srid
178a2(rnying rgyud): gsum mgon// stong pa chen po'i na mkha' la// 'bar ba chen po gar dgur mdzad// thugs rjes la gshegs nas kyang // 'thun 'jug byis pa'i spyod pa mdzod// med la kun 'byung
178a3(rnying rgyud): stong nyid las// ji bzhin pa yi rgyal ba dang // stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na// rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal ba rnams// bdag ni bka' yi las mkhan te// bka' yi las kyi
178a4(rnying rgyud): dus byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul bka' ba// de dag ma lus bdag gis btul// ma grol ba yang ba dedag gis dgrol// gang ma bsgral ba bdag gis bsgral
178a5(rnying rgyud): dbugs ma byung ba dbugs phyung ste// yang dag nyid la dag par bgyi// dgongs pa gsang ba kun 'dus la// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// mtha' thug med
178a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams// snying po bskal ba'i byin rlabs mdzod ces rdo rje 'dzin pa des dag tu bskul ba las// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ya
178a7(rnying rgyud): shes chen po'i ma dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i thugs rje'i sprin phung na mkha'i mtha' klas par 'thibs nas// 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mngon spyod du mdzad nas
178a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i rta'i tshogs la bkas bsgo ba// song kun du rab tu song // rta yi rdo rje stabs dgu yis// 'jig rten blo dgu'i 'dod pa ston// 'jig rten nag po gtum pa'i tshogs// dur khrod
178b1(rnying rgyud): skyabs lings spyod pa la// rdo rje rtog pa'i bya sgron gyis// 'khor ba ma bsgral bar du 'di// dam bcas go cha gyon pa yi// snying rje chen po'i rtog 'jug gis// 'khor ba'i so mtha' chos par
178b2(rnying rgyud): gyis zhes drag tu bsgo bas// rdo rje chos rab dga' 'khor lo// gzigs dbang rdo rje spyan rab ste// rdo rje pad+mo rab dga' ba// snang mdzad ngag gi dbang phyug tshogs// byang chub chen po cang
178b3(rnying rgyud): shes gtso// thabs chen dgu yi rdzu 'phrul gyis// rdo rje rta gdong sprul pa'i tshogs// na mkha'i khams kun yongs bkang nas// ma la ya yi rtse la lhags// 'khor ba ma stongs par du ni// 
178b4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje dbang gis spyan ras gzigs// stug po bkod pa de'i rgyal ba yang // dgongs pa gsang ba gcig tu 'du/ sa// khams gsum yo bsgrol snying por dgongs// dus
178b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gtan sprugs byin rlabs mdzod// 'khor ba chos nyid spyan ras gzigs// sdug bsngal byang chub lam du mdzad// las nyid rang byung ye shes 'grel// rnam smin
178b6(rnying rgyud): sun phyung rdo rje nyid// ye nas ji bzhin ma bcos pa'i// rang byung dkyil 'khor chen por dgongs// gseng bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las// sprul pa'i sras
178b7(rnying rgyud): mchog rdo rje 'dzin// gzhon nu bye bas yar mdzad// thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin// na mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas par// ma la ya yi rtse la lhags// 'thun 'jug
178b8(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi cha byad du// gang 'dir byis pa'i spyod pa yis// bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de// 'jig rten khams su byis par bstan// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i ma
179a1(rnying rgyud): chen po lnga las bzhi rdo rje skos kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas 'thun 'jug skyes bu nges// 'thun pa'i spyan gyis gang gzigs na// las kyi
179a2(rnying rgyud): yi dgas drag po do// dngos po bzhis ni dbang byas pa// rnam par smin pa'i dngos po ni// bam ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsar// khrag dang bshang gci sha chen dang // rkang dang glad pa glad rgyas
179a3(rnying rgyud): dang dang rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i// 'dam gyis phru ma yongs su bskor// 'bu dang shin du 'bru chen po// sbrang ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang // sprul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs// kang
179a4(rnying rgyud): ka khwa sgeg 'ug pa'i tshogs// lce sbyang stag seng la sogs/ pa'i// gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis bskor// lha yi/ desde dpon ka ru ni// bu mo chung ma ma sring dang // 'jig rten
179a5(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug lha chen gyi// ma sring chung ma bu mo rnams// phra gas nas dbang du byas pa yi// slas dang bye mo bran mo 'i tshigs// bcu gnyis dang ni rgyas la sogs// ma mo
179a6(rnying rgyud): phra men gnod sbyin mo// srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma// bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla rkun ma// blon mo dmag dben sde dpon ma// rung dpon po nya mngag par bcas// rang rang stan dang lag
179a7(rnying rgyud): char bcas// ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' sdod 'khor// spyod gtong rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// srin po'i bu mo dri za brgyad// stag seng wa spyang bzhad tshogs dang // dur bya bya rog 'ug pa'i
179a8(rnying rgyud): tshogs// bstod cing rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// srin po'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad// ke ru rtsi ro pra mo ha// pi ta li dang puk+ka sa// g+has ma~M ri dang sma sha ni// tsaN Da lo la sogs pa yi// 
179b1(rnying rgyud): gtum zhing rngam pa'i mchogs ma// shin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs su 'khod// dur khrod sa yi sgo srungs pa ni// brtson mo gdong mo gar log mo// de bzhin 'jug mo chen mo bzhi// gsang
179b2(rnying rgyud): sgra 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung // dur khrod bdag mo gru 'degs ma// bskam pa shin du bskam ma dang // ra ro dang khrag 'thung ma// chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// ba ma ri
179b3(rnying rgyud): thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis// brtan par btab pa'i nang bdag mo// nye gnas kI d+hi shwa ri ma// thod skyogs khrag gis bkang ba dang // 'bru mar rdzas
