179b4(rnying rgyud): lnga chang sbyar ba// rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'dzin// chag nges pas myos shing brkam pas na// 'dod pa'i dbang ma brkam par grags// ru tra'i phru ma grong rdal de// 'bar ba
179b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gar dgu yis// bcom ldan dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir// sde dpon btul ba'i 'khor 'dus pa// 'jigarten dbang phyug mthu chen rnams// phal cher las la gram
179b6(rnying rgyud): skabs su// dpa' chen rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i// de nyid yang dag dngos min pa'i// gzhon nu snum nas bton pa'i sras// rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs// mthing gnag khro gnyer ral pa can// 
179b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mdzad// dur khrod bdag po ji bzhin du// dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// bshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur// thams
179b8(rnying rgyud): cad stong nyid bdud rtsir sbyangs// nye gnas las sogs 'khor mo rnams// spyod la ma chags ye shes dang // byas la mi sogs phrin las kyis// 'thun 'jug khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis
180a1(rnying rgyud): dbang bsdus dang sbyangs sprul pa ni// sems dpa' ye shes sprul pa'i cho gas// ke'u rtse'u la sogs mtshogs dang // seng stag la sogs yul du snang // 'dod pa'i dbang mo/ 
180a2(rnying rgyud): brkang pa deng // chags pa'i dbang gis gang mthong ba// spyir ni rang gi khyo bdag lte// lhag pa'i gzi chen 'bar bar mthong // snyam pa'i dbang gi the tshom skyes// e ma'o bdag gi bdag po
180a3(rnying rgyud): bas dang shin tu 'od 'bar gzi byin che// 'di ji lta bar sprul pa zhig/ mnyam du yid gnyis rtog pa las// thabs mchog rdo rje gzhon nu des// srin skad thang gsum phyung ba las// the tshom
180a4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa chad par gyur// chags pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyu das kyi// sku la nges par 'khril pa ni// tsan dan dasbrul gyi gdong po la// chad pas bdas pa'i sbrul 'khril pas// 
180a5(rnying rgyud): mi rtog tshad ma'i gdung sel ltar// gang la chags pa ma mnga' bar// gang gi gdung ba rnam par sel// de nas sme ba brtsegs pa des// thams cad ci dga' 'byung
180a6(rnying rgyud): ba yi data yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po de// nye ba'i rig pa 'di brjod pas// bya ba thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ oM b+hu ra kur// i tsaM/ ki pi/ u tsu sma krota hUM phaT/ yang dag dngos min
180a7(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul 'dis// snang mdzad chen po'i cho 'phrul bsdus// gang du dang por sprul pa yi// oM gyi 'od zer mngon phab nas// dbang po brkam pa'i lhums su bzhag/ gsang sngags
180a8(rnying rgyud): mngon pa'i mthu ca ni 'dis// srin po'i cha lugs ci 'dra bar// yi ge de yang der bsgyur te// gang de mngon sum lhums su bzhag/ rdo rje lcags kyu 'od zer las/ rak+Sha shrI
180b1(rnying rgyud): ka dA ru dra ma dra ha ha ha ma// bskyed rdzogs 'joms byed yi ge yi// mthu yis byin brlabs brtan par byed// dngos min rigs pa'i skyes bu de// rdo rje yab kyi sku la bsdus// drag shul stobs
180b2(rnying rgyud): ldan skyes bu de/ sgyu ma rdo rje cho 'phrul gyis// sangs rgyas gdul dka' rnams btul nas// bdud dang 'jig rten log pa'i cha// byis pa'i spyod pa de bor nas// thugs ni snying po byang chub la// 
180b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa nges par 'grel te bzhugs/ sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sngar byung rgyal 'tshab skyes bu yis// lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi// gsang mdzod chen po dam pa'i lung // gas/ 
180b4(rnying rgyud): ba 'dzin pa'i bdag po mjed// de nas yi dgas drag po da de// rang gi gnas su phun po las// rang gi gan das dang longs spyod dang // 'khor rnams mi snang mi 'dra ba// sngon
180b5(rnying rgyud): ma mthong ba phal cher snang // kho na shin du ma rangs te// e ma'o bdag gi phru ma 'di// ji ltar 'gyur na sa rnam par rtog/ de tshe nye gnas dbang mo yis// rang gi
180b6(rnying rgyud): bdag lon 'un te/ e mi'i sgeg po dpa' bo khyod// gang 'dir ngan du rtog pa'i tshig/ 'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam ci// dpa' bo khyod kyi dgongs pa gang // deng hun ha na phan nyob ti// 
180b7(rnying rgyud): kho na 'am tsa sma ra tsa// dpa' po sgeg po zhe'am nyid// kun lan tra tsa pu tha tha// gang du de ci ji ltar 'khral// da skad tshig tu nyon pa las// mdangs la chags pas 'dun pa dang // kho na'i rigs
180b8(rnying rgyud): nyid nges 'dzin pa'i// snyam nas dga'i thabs su bzung // de nas dbang mo bskam pa las// pu tra myu gu 'thon 'byung ba'i// thabs gsum drag pa'i sgra phyung bas// dpal gyi rngam skad
181a1(rnying rgyud): drag po yis// drag po drag mo la sogs brgyal// de las slar log mthong snang ba/ 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la// sngog nag rngam pa'i ral pa can// dbung dgu phyag
181a2(rnying rgyud): ni bco brgyad pa// rdo rje gshogs pas bar snang khebs// ba spu lcags kyu bsregs 'dra ba'i// sdom dang sdig dang snyigs dang sbrul// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa bzhi khabs// thod sgyogs
181a3(rnying rgyud): stir rgyu zhags dang // nyi zla khyung dang 'ug pa khwa// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang // za ma rtog dang rdul yab rje// ri rab spyi skor stong gsum 'phen// klu dbang 'bum gyis brgyan cing klubs// dus mtha'
181a4(rnying rgyud): bskal pa me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer sdang mag 'bar ba yi// nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs// zhabs brgyad 'bar bas lha brgyad gnon// rdo rje srin po khyo bor gyur// lha
181a5(rnying rgyud): dang bdud las rnam par grags// de nas yi dgas drag po de// kho na'i sems rtog rtas nas kyang // nga rgyal dag gre/ 'i gtum skad kyis// 'khor gyi dbang phyug rnam par bskur
181a6(rnying rgyud): ru dra ma dra ma ra dra/ 'du 'du dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs// kun du rab tu dam la 'du// gram gram dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs// kun du rab tu las la gram// thung thud dbang phyug chen po'i
181a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs// kun du rab tu 'di la thung // dbang phyug nga yi phru ma la// gang 'dir gdug pa chen po 'di// khyed kyis brlag pa'i dus la bab// gang 'dir bya mi bya rtog na// khyed ni shin tu rlag ma khadang// 
181a8(rnying rgyud): mdza' bo gang la bya mi bya ba yi// yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas na// de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer// rgol ba gang la bya mi bya ba yi// yongs su rtog pa
181b1(rnying rgyud): de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas na// de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer// dam tshig gang srung mi srung ba'i// yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i dam tshig sgyu ma yin pas na
181b2(rnying rgyud): de la dam par su zhig 'dogs// thams cad bya mi bya ba yi// yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i spyod pa sgyu ma yin pas na// de la byed ces su zhig zer// gang la gang 'dir gang
181b3(rnying rgyud): gi las rnams dus la bab ces dbang phyug chen po rnams la bskul bas// bdud kyi gzi byin ma bzod de bdud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu bye ba dung phyur gyi dmag tshogs dang dbang phyug
181b4(rnying rgyud): chen po rnams shin tu sngangs 'khrugs rngam nas rod rong po der gyur te// mya ngan gyi dug lo 'tshubs pa bzhin bdud kyi phru mar 'dus te bdud kyi ru mtshon phyar// mtshan
181b5(rnying rgyud): cha'i sprin btibs// bdud kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba bkram ste bso dang phya'i sgra bsgrags nas spags pa las/ rdo rje rta'i tshogs kyis rdo rje snyam pa na'i stobs kyis rdzu 'phrul mu
181b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdur shugs drag pos khro bo thag chen kun kyang mthun thag gcod pa'i rta'i mdur glu 'dis rnam par bskul ba/ hri sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang / dgod dang gshe dang
181b7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa dang / snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yi// gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar bas dbang phyug gnon// hri myos byed stong pas lhag par
181b8(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs ston la// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par 'jigs gzugs ston// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag par rab tu ston// thams ca
182a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod// hri rnam par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis gnon pas gnon// ho ho ha ha he he hi hi dgyes pa'i bzhad mos khong // dbang phyug
182a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon dbang phyug gnon// hri rtsal chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs// hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyid
182a3(rnying rgyud): mthon mthu chen gnon// ru tra ma tra'i snying las dpal mos drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon tshangs pa non// tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig slar tha// 
182a4(rnying rgyud): hri rab kyi rtsal gyis ngo mthon dga' dbang non// sbyor chen dkun gyis bdag la dag drangs shig/ hri rab kyi rtsal dgyi stobs kyis ngo mthon ru tre non// sbyor chen kro d+ha shA
182a5(rnying rgyud): ri dbang mo drongs shig rabs drongs shig/ snying rje gang bya mi bya ba mi// yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i snying rje sgyu ma yin pas na// de la su zhig snying
182a6(rnying rgyud): rje zer// gdul bya gdul bar bye mi bya ba yi// yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i gdul bya sgyu ma yin pas na// de la gdul bar su zhig zer// hri ha ha ho ho sbrul rab tu
182a7(rnying rgyud): sbrul dang kun tu rab sprul snang por mdzod// gtum thung rngam 'khrug 'bar bar mdzod// rnam pa mang po sna tshogs khro bor log par lta ba yi// khro bo snang ba'i 'gro rnams rnam mang
182a8(rnying rgyud): po/ khro bo rgyud kyi ma lul sus med par 'dul mkhas par// rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu ma rab sprul rnam par sprul// khro la ma g.yos ye shes bzhi mchog kun du bzhen
182b1(rnying rgyud): shig bsnams// rnam pa mang po sna tshogs 'dod par snang bar 'gro ba rnams// rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyis ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa// rgyal ba kun gyi thabs
182b2(rnying rgyud): mchog sgyu mar rab sprul rnam par sprul// spyod la ma chags ye shes bde mchog kun du myong mdzad bzhengs shing rol// rnam pa mang po sna tshogs rmongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnam/ 
182b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa mang po gti mug rgyud kyis ma lus lus par 'dul mkhas pa// rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu mas rab sprul rnam par sprul// mnyam la ma rmongs ye shes ma 'dres yongs
182b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bzhengs shing dgongs zhes khro mo ma rangs mi bsnyed das drag po dgyes pa'i sgra 'brug stong 'dir ba byung bas dbadud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i bdud bye bdung phyur rnams bge bzhi
182b5(rnying rgyud): bskums te zil gyis non// ru mtshon la sogs pa mtshon cha'i sprin phung ni stong pa nyid du sangs par gyur// mi snyan pa'i ngag rnams ni mngon du gyur te theg pa chen po
182b6(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgra ni di ri ri sgregs par gyur to// dur khrod kyi bdag po ru dri nag po lta zhig rang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bor te rje btsan dam pa de la skyabs su dong // blo gros kun gyi
182b7(rnying rgyud): yul dang bral// yi khos bsam pa chad cing thabs rlag nas kun nas 'khrugs te rnam par 'khrugs te rnam par 'khams nas rang gi ru dA lnga yi sa bon mngon du phyug pas// ru la
182b8(rnying rgyud): ru lu b+h+yo zhes brjod// mgo gsum lag drug rkang bzhi pa// khros pa'i tshul du gyur pa las// rje ba can rdo rje srin po des// kho na nyid du der mdzad do// byin brlabs yi ge me phyed pa'i// nga
183a1(rnying rgyud): du 'khor ba'i sa bon lnga// byas nas ngag gi sprul pa phrogs// khon ngag gi dbang po nyams// de nas dur khrod bdag po ngas ral ra la b+h+yo brjod pas// mgo gu bco brgyad lag tu
183a2(rnying rgyud): gyur da/ gang der rje btsan dam pa des// ngag gi sprul pa nges par bcad// yang der dur khrod bdag po des// hu lu hu lu b+h+yo brjod pas// mgo brgyad bcu drug lag tu gyur// dpal chen rje bcan
183a3(rnying rgyud): srin po des// kho na ci 'dra der mdzad de// der yang ngag gi brjod pa bcad // gang de dur khrod bdag po des// ha la ha la b+h+yo brjod pas// nyi shu rtsa gcig mgo bo la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lag tu gyur// 
183a4(rnying rgyud): yang du rdo rje srin po des// de ci kho na de mdzad nas// gang 'dir smra ba'i dbang po bcad// yang der kho nar de nyid kyi das// ra li ra li b+h+yo brjod pas// lus ni tshad med po li ni// nad
183a5(rnying rgyud): kyi bskal pa tshub mar gtong // gdug pa'i mtshon cha lus las 'gyed// rje btsan rdo rje srin po des// kho na de 'drar nyid mdzad de// ngag phrogs ngag gi sprul pa chad// dper na
183a6(rnying rgyud): skyes bu gang ba zhig/ lce bcang khrag gis bor ba bzhin// shin du myos te 'gyel bar gyur// kun gyi mnga' bdag chen po des// sa ma ya hUM gsung bsgrags pas// sngon byung dus na 'brel
183a7(rnying rgyud): pa yis// srog gi dbang pos ma bzod de// gang der mdun gyis phyogs pa dang // rtse gsum khaT+wAM 'bar ba yis// ru tra'i ri bo bcom dbang gi/ phyag rgya sa rol te phyag du sbyangs// nye gnas
183a8(rnying rgyud): dbang gis mtshams sbyar ba'i// rang gi dam pa la sogs pa'i// mtha' thug med pa'i sangs rgyas dang // dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems// stug po bkod pa'i mthong ba'i mthus// 
183b1(rnying rgyud): thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// zhen pa'i mun nag sangs gyur te// skye ba dus mtha' med rnyed du// lus blangs las ni ci sprad dran// snum du bton te zhabs drung 'khod// rab dga' btud
183b2(rnying rgyud): nas gnod tshul du// gang der shin du ngus nas smras// e ma e ma'o e ma yang // dpa' bo lha rje thugs rje chung // shin du bde ba'i gnas gcig nas// snam du bton pa thugs rje chung / 
183b3(rnying rgyud): cim nga byu chod// myur du bsgral ni yun 'di'o// 'bangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul// 'bangs la nan tan mchung tsog/ deng nas slan chad bka' bzhin du// bka' yi lung bzhin
183b4(rnying rgyud): rjes su sgrub// gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis sam// dam pa'i nga lung las 'gal gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // rul myags skams nas tshig par 'gyur// 
183b5(rnying rgyud): ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams// 'bang su 'bul lo ches ma chung // / dbus su mchi skal mi ldan gyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog/ phud la 'tshal skal mi
183b6(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis// lhag ma zhal chab bron la stsol// nye gnas gdung ba'i ma sring rnams// de nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis// khyed ni ci bgyi bka' yi las mkhan te// bka' yi las byung rtag
183b7(rnying rgyud): par myur du sgrubs// bdag kyang deng sngon lam log las spyad pas// dpag tu me bI 'khro ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud// da ni thugs rje las 'phro gnyis phrad pas// bde ba can gyi zhing du myur
183b8(rnying rgyud): 'gro yi// rjes su bstan pa'i bka' la nyams sa re// ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin// dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bA gyis// gang du sring byams ming la gdung ba bzhin/ 
184a1(rnying rgyud): yal gam can la ljang lhang brtse bar gyis// mdza' mo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin// rnal 'byor can la kril kIl zer bar gyis// ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse
184a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dam pa rnams la nges par nye bar gyis zhes 'khor nye gnas rnams la gdams ngag bor nas dpa' bo chen po la skyabs su dong ste bka' che ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir rang rtags
184a3(rnying rgyud): srog gi snying po phul te mna'ador ro// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes rang gi srog la tshad bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gnang ba na 'di lta ste// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes byin gyis
184a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs te bsregs sbyangs btul nas dgongs khral chung bar bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs par dus pa'i mdo chen po las bdud yongs su btul ba'i
184a5(rnying rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas der/ tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnam sa 'di ltar rtog ste// e ma'o drag po chen po 'di// 'di ltar
184a6(rnying rgyud): mthu che ba// 'di ltar dregs pa// 'di ltar gti mug pa/ 'di ltar chags pa/ 'di ltar nga rgyal ba/ 'di ltar gtum pa 'di dpa' bo chen po 'dis rnam par non// nges par yang dag par non// 
184a7(rnying rgyud): kun tu rab tu non to snyam du rtog go// de'i tshe de'i dus na de dag gi sems kyi rtog pas rtog pa drag po ru dra dro'i sems kyis yongs su shes nas smras pa// kye nye gnas dam pa rnams gang
184a8(rnying rgyud): de ltar ma rtog shig/ sngon kho bo'i las kyi 'phro dang 'brel pa nye gnas dam pa kun gyis pashes gnyen de dang phrad pas las shes so// skye ba shes so// las mthong ngo // skye ba mthong
184b1(rnying rgyud): ngotodata las mngon du gyur to// skye ba mngon du gyur nas rang gi las la rang thag khos par gyur// gang skad cig mar bde ba chen po'i g.yung drung gi pho brang mthong bas gang 'di ltar bud med
184b2(rnying rgyud): dag sbrum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen par gyur pa na 'di snyam du sdug bsngal 'di ni sngon du skyes pa bsten cing mang du spyad pa'i las 'bar zhig kho na'o snyam du yid la byed pa bzhin kho bo yang
184b3(rnying rgyud): las 'ba' zhig la khe thog chad nas ji ltar ri gzer rtse nas sbab 'dril ba gang gis mi zlogs pa bzhin gdung ba chen po'i shugs kyis mthon pas shin du gdung ba yin te// nye gnas
184b4(rnying rgyud): khyed kyang rang gi las yid la gyis shig dang // gdung ba'i shugs rab ltar 'dril bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas rmag chad par ngus nas shin du smras te yongs su
184b5(rnying rgyud): gdung ba'i don bton pa 'di lta ste/ thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems// dri med dung mdog mchog du gzugs bzang ba// rnam dag 'od gsal nyi zla 'bum bdag
184b6(rnying rgyud): zhing da/ dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba// 'jig rten gsum gyis mkhan ston par grags// khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po// byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod
184b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs su gsol// bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// lam log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams// sngon tshe las log srid pa spyad pas nongs// sdig pa'i las
184b8(rnying rgyud): rnams ci spyad rab gnod 'gyod// dar cing dregs pa'i las dbang de rtsan nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mos ni rang rgyud bsregs// gti mug
185a1(rnying rgyud): mun pa 'thibs pos shes rab ljongs// 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i 'dam du rnam shes bying // nga rgyal drag po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan// phra dog rlung mar mtshubasams
185a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar g.yengs// bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 'dod pa me 'dag dong 'dra'i 'obs su ltung // sdug bsngal drag po mi zad char du 'bab// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal shin
185a3(rnying rgyud): tu bzod dka' zhing // sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas// rnam shes dbang po myu gu gdungs 'gyur te// phung po rgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis
185a4(rnying rgyud): bzod lags sam// bdag ni blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams ru trar skyes// skyes par 'gyod do las la yi chang // yi chad 'gyod/ 
185a5(rnying rgyud): kyang las dbang bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra// las dbang chu klung 'phra la du ga la zlogs// rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las
185a6(rnying rgyud): byung dan las kyi rlung mar drag po des bdas pas// bdag ni deng sngon bskal pa grangs med du// 'khor ba'i brtson ra mun par 'khyams pa la// nye gnas khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin
185a7(rnying rgyud): rlabs kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa gtan sbyangs nas// ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung da ltar 'khod// nyi ltar 'od 'bar zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta
185a8(rnying rgyud): bas mi ngoms pa'i// thog ma med nas ma rig long thog gi/ ljongs po'i chu bur mig gis mi mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon khyod dang snga gang na bzhugs// las dbang drag po shin tu ma
185b1(rnying rgyud): zad pas// shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas// drung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing // nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ro gdon lags na// byams mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir ma
185b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs na// nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus dang bral ba'i tshe// dge ba shes grogs dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid// de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te// las kyi dbang gos bdag 'dra gcig pu
185b3(rnying rgyud): khrid dad dus der bdag la mchog skyabs ma mchis kyis// gang gi phyi shel dus la ma bzhes par// da lta nyid du bsnun de mngon spyod mdzod// las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra la// thog/ 
185b4(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las mthar te// bskal pa gra sa med skye ba de skad du// gdos bcas lus blangs grangs med ni/ 
185b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang ma nyam// rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam / las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang / khams
185b6(rnying rgyud): gsum bgrangs shing kha brgyud kyang // byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos// skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la// skye ba gcig gcig kho na tsam gyi las// bla med byang chub don du
185b7(rnying rgyud): rang spyad na// da tsam byas pa'i las la don yod pas// don gyi yong ye mya ngan 'das zin na// las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas// sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar
185b8(rnying rgyud): 'khyams// sdug bsngal bzod bka' srin pa'i btson rar chud// mi zad sdug bsngal drag pa 'di lta bu// nye byas thams cad rang gi las las byung // thugs rje chen pos las ngan chung
186a1(rnying rgyud): bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol// ma rig log pa las kyi dbang bcan pas// mi shes mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na// ye shes sgron ma'i zer gyi
186a2(rnying rgyud): mi stongs sam// nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na// thugs rje chen po'i phrin las mi mdzad dam// phyin ci log gi g.yeng sar ltung lags na// thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi
186a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nam// dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis mi gso'am// las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal me 'bar na// thugs rje bsil
186a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i char rgyun ma 'bebs sam// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying 'gyur na// thabs mkhas thug das rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam// khams gsum 'khor ba'i
186a5(rnying rgyud): gnas su sbyang sbyang nas// nam zhig rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe// 'phags pa'i thugs rje ci 'tshal don mam chis// bdag nyid las 'phro brtsan pas bdag na lta// thugs rje
186a6(rnying rgyud): zhes na su la ci zhig bgyi// dpa' bo khyod la thugs rje stobs mnga' zhing // sngon byung 'brel pa las kyi 'phro brtsan na// yal yol gtang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par// snying nas da gzi / 
186a7(rnying rgyud): rje rgyal ba'i lha// zhes rang gi nga rgyal gyi ri bo bcag nas lus seng ger mngon par sprul nas zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po
186a8(rnying rgyud): las tha ma dman pa'i gdung ba pa ton pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje srin po des las kyi srin po de log par lta ba sun phyung bas las kyi sgrib pa
186b1(rnying rgyud): rgyun gcad pa'i phyir spyo ba'i brgyad chen pos rnam par spros pa ni 'di lnga ste/ sdig can log pa'i stobs ldan 'di// thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams par
186b2(rnying rgyud): nges dan nyes byas rtsa ba rang nyid las// thams cad 'byung bar nyes par nges// bskal pa grangs mang de skad du// skye ba mang po lus blangs nas// gzugs phung grangs med zhig 'gyur zhing
186b3(rnying rgyud): sha rus stong gsum 'jig rten tsam// rnag khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil 'gyur yang // don med par ni chud zos po// sus kyang ma byas rang gi las// de tsam cha gcig don spyad na// da tsam
186b4(rnying rgyud): don gyi sangs rgyas zin// lus rnams yongs su gtong da pa yi// ma chags stobs ldan chen po rnams// bkres pas nyen pa'i 'gro ba la// sha rus khrag tsam btang
186b5(rnying rgyud): bas kyang // zag med rnam thar bde thob na// zab mo'i don lta smos ci dgos// rang lus gtong bar ma ma da cing // chags pa'i mtha' la mngon zhan pas// khams
186b6(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i kha brgyud cing // zug rngu'i nad kyis gzir ba yin// srid pa'i brtson rar chud pa 'di// mkha' la mdud pas nyes par nges// mun pa'i glong du 'khyams pa 'di// 
186b7(rnying rgyud): khyad par rmongs pas nyes par nges// thar med 'dam du bying ba 'di// 'dod sred 'dun pas nyes par nges// blo ngan tshabs gdungs pa 'di// tsha ba'i las kyis nyes par nges// sdug
186b8(rnying rgyud): bsngal ri bos non pa 'di// nga rgyal brtsegs pas nyes par nges// 'khor ba'i rlung sgor lhung ba 'di// las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges// rang gis mnar ba'i ru tra khyod// ye nas rgyal
187a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sras yin na// srid pa'i 'khor lor ci ste 'khor// des na rang gi las yin te// sems nyid na mkha' lta bu la// gzugs snang glo bur sprin gyis bsgribs// gzugs/ 
187a2(rnying rgyud): snang rtag pa rnam sbyang phyir// shes rab bskal pa'i rlung gis gtor// dang po bka' mgo log pas nyes// de nas mngon pa'i ri bo brtsegs// de nas yid bzhin nor bu bsregs// tha mar dang
187a3(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi spyad pas// rnal 'byor theg pa chen po'i don// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtog yang dag nyid ma rtogs// dri bzhin ma spyad 'phra men gyis// ngan 'gro'i las lam
187a4(rnying rgyud): rgyun btogs pas// srid pa log pa'i 'bras bur smin/ e ma'o las ngan snying re rje// nga ni bka' yI las ma khan te// bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas// ngan 'gro
187a5(rnying rgyud): gnas su 'khyams pa 'di// 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don pa'i phyir// las ngan las rgyun gcad par bya// da por smin pa'i sdig pa 'di// rdo rje na mkha'i mtshon gyis
187a6(rnying rgyud): bsad// shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na// yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa// 'byung po gtum po gdol pa can// khyod ni de bzhin nyid la sgrig// yang dag nges pa'i blo gros kyi// 
187a7(rnying rgyud): khungs bcad rtsad bcad bdag las byung // bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa yi// phyin ci log stobs brtson 'grus kyis// gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed// de nyid bdag rtog yin
187a8(rnying rgyud): bas na// bdag med nam pa'i stobs kyis gzhom// dbang sgyur gnon pa'i thabs chen dang // gcod pa mngon pa'i mthu can dang // gzir ba'i byin gyis brlabs can gyis// dus
187b1(rnying rgyud): gsum bgegs kyi bdag po non// a na ya/ ma hA shA n+ya tA/ a ko ta ya nAM/ sarba pA pa ma tang kha ru tra nan/ sarba pA paM kha T+Ta ka ru dA naM/ thams cad stong nyid ma skyes pas// bsad pas
187b2(rnying rgyud): bsad pa med pa'i phyir// sgyu ma sbyong ba'i chu 'phrul 'di// snying rje chen po'i dam tshig go// nges par bsad pa'i dam tshig 'di// don ston bsad pa ma yin te// rnam shes gzugs bral/ 
187b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer bya// de nyid slar phab dam tshig mchog/ rnam shes hUM gis bsdus nas ni// kho na de nyid gzugs la dbab// sngon du gnas pa'i tshul bzhin du// ma nyams bde ba chen por sbyang
187b4(rnying rgyud): ro langs rdo rje dam tshig 'di// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs da dam ste// rdo rje mtshon gyis gang bsad pa// srog ni log rtog rdo rjer shi/ rnams kyang ldang ba'i dus med/ 
187b5(rnying rgyud): pas// slar skye ba dag ga la yod// rnam shes gzugs dang ma bral na// 'khor ba'i gnas las rnam thar 'a/ phags// 'tsho med rdo rje byang chub sems// stong nyid ye
187b6(rnying rgyud): shes bdud rtsi'i chu// dug chen 'thungs pa kun gyi gsos// shi ba kun slong sbran pa'i mchog/ lang ka'i bdag po de skad ces bka' stsal pas// ru tra nag po rgyud yongs su byang ste/ 
187b7(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i don nges par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rgyud yongs su sbyangs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / 
187b8(rnying rgyud): de nas de nyid du nges par phyogs pa'i phyir zhabs kyi 'khor lo spyi bos bteg pa'i mdun pas 'dun nas// 'di skad du thams cad du brgyud pa rnam par grags pa sangs rgya/ 
188a1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa skul ba zhes bya ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo// oM chos kun rang bzhin dag byas na// bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshes
188a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi// thugs dam dbyig mtshig bdag nyid ni// sems can 'byam klas ma lus kun// mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas// sku yi dbyig
188a3(rnying rgyud): tu bdag skyed cig/ ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog/ gzi brjid phung po bla na med// sangs rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa'o// rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyig gi ye shes
188a4(rnying rgyud): gtso mchog nyid// rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa// khyod ning dam tshig gtso lags kyis// dbang phyug rgyal porabadag skur cig/ bdag ni rdo rje mngon du dbang skur bas// 
188a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis deng nyid bdag dbang bskur// bcom lnga na thams cad mchog ni bdag lags te// mchoganyid sgrub phyir rdo rje blang bar bgyi// rdo rje rgyal por khyod bzhugs
188a6(rnying rgyud): pas dad sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid kyis// grub pa phun gsum dbang bskur tsag/ chos kun rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje la yang mtshan nyid med// rdo rje lta
188a7(rnying rgyud): bu'i rnal 'byor pas// don kun rdo rje nyid du gsal// 'di ni sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs nyid// ye shes sems dpa'i dam tshig bsnams// rdo rje sems dpa'i dka' thub dam// rtag tu
188a8(rnying rgyud): bdag gis bcang bar bgyi// hUM rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dam pa srung // ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyod// rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la bstan par dgongs// gsang ba'i dbang
188b1(rnying rgyud): phyug bdag nyid gso bar gsol// rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes bskyed// 'dod pa kun zhen bdag la chags par mdzod// dang po sangs rgyas mnyam nyid thugs rje can// las rnams
188b2(rnying rgyud): kun la dpag sems dge bar sbyar// dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gnas thams cad du// rdo rje can dang dam tshig sems dpar bsgrubs// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dgyes
188b3(rnying rgyud): pa ces// rdo rjes bdag yong bstan du ma btang zhig/ kye rdo rje chos dbyings kun gyi gtso// mi gnas chags pa chen po ste// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ bde ba mchog gi dam pa/ 
188b4(rnying rgyud): lags// khyed ni dam tshig kun gyi gtso// rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad ma// sems can don bsgrubs phrin las da la// thugs rje mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas
188b5(rnying rgyud): yon tan kun 'byung phyir// rin chen rdo rje bla na med// rdo rje/ chos kyi glu blangs pas// las kyi rdo rje byed gyur ga/ sa ma ya ho zhes dam tshig nye bar blangs so// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 
188b6(rnying rgyud): zhes dam kun tu bcas so// de nas yang dag dngos min pa'i// rdo rje sme ba brtsegs pa'i sras// bdud 'dul rdo rje srin po des// rdo rje shugs kyi dam pa byin// hUM hUM hUM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maH
188b7(rnying rgyud): DA phaT phaT ha la ha la raM zhes gdul sbyong drag po'i dkyil 'khor du sbyangs so// ta ke ta kai phaT// ha la ha la raM/ tIk+Sh+Na tIk+ShA khaM/ kro d+ha kro d+ha yaM zhes dngos po thams cad stong par sbyangs so// 
188b8(rnying rgyud): oM zhes rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug go/ muM zhes yaM ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so// hUM zhes rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas so// 
189a1(rnying rgyud): i ngan te/ na ra gan te/ ba ri hri da ye/ nA ma bsti naM/ sa ma ya rak+Sha si/ si ti bi na badz+ra/ a mr-i to ta kaM zhes dam tshig de pa byin no// oM AHhUM zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs
189a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa byin no// oM badz+ra a mri ta/ e h+ye hi sarba ma na hUM hri tha zhes dbang dam pa byin no// de nas yang las kyi srin po des rang gi ris kyi lha la gsol ba btab pa// sngon che gong nas 'brel pa
189a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gi nye gnas gang lags pa// las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis// da lta nyid du 'bar bar shog ces bskul bas// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' na mkha'i dbyings nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
189a4(rnying rgyud): hUM gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas kho na nyid kyi snying khar da thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyu dar to// he zhes mthong ba yongs su dag ste thams cad ma 'dres
189a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // rdo rje zhes ming ba gas nas rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhag go// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
189a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas las kyi srin po de'i nyi gnas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams rang rang gi las
189a7(rnying rgyud): dag pa dang // sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang // byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyud sbyangs pas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang / skye ba snga phyi mtha' yas pa dus gcig tu
189a8(rnying rgyud): gshegs par 'gyur te/ the tshom chad pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te/ gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol// 
189b1(rnying rgyud): bdag cag ru tri'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams// lus dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di// bka' yi gtan tshigs zhib mos ma bkrol zhing // shes rab zab mo dmigs pus ma phye bas// 
189b2(rnying rgyud): rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing // nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de// gar thabs glog gis zhags pas ma zin pas// rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te// de
189b3(rnying rgyud): nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo ma 'tshal gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs// shin tu 'gyod pas gnong ba'i tshul bzung bas// dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi// dngos po sbyang / 
189b4(rnying rgyud): phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul// thabs mkhas thugs rjes da lus 'di bzhes su gsol zhes rang gi lus zhabs da kyi gdan khrir phulo// de nas 'gro na nag po la sogs pa klu chen
189b5(rnying rgyud): po rnams kyis ngus nas smras te/ gsol pa// gzi brjid rgyal po mnga' bdag dgongs su gsol// srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams// bcing ba lnga yI
189b6(rnying rgyud): kun du bcings gyur pa// sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar byed med de// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcings// sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes gnas la sogs// bdag 'dzin grong
189b7(rnying rgyud): khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir// 'khor ba'i brtson chas rnams shes bcings pa la// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas// kun tu bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad// mi
189b8(rnying rgyud): shigs dgrol bar dka' yi sdug bsngal las// thugs rje'i mdud dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul lo// de nas srin po'i rgyal po sha trang gseng bu la
190a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa rnams kyis shin du ngus nas skyes te gsol pa/ dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgongs su gsol// mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams// me chen 'bar
190a2(rnying rgyud): bas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba// gsus kyang ma bsregs sreg par byed med de// mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid las byung // zhes sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud bsregs pa la// bdag 'dzin
190a3(rnying rgyud): khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas// kun du sreg cing gdung ba rgyun mi 'chad// mi zlogs zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las// thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun dbab du gsol// ji ltar khab le/ 
190a4(rnying rgyud): rdol lcags 'du ltar// de nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangs su mchi zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bstab so// de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas
190a5(rnying rgyud): smes te gsol pa// kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongs su gsol// mun nag smag tu 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams// lam nor lam stor kun du 'thoms 'gyur te/ 
190a6(rnying rgyud): sus kyang ma kag 'gog par byed med de// bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas bsgribs// rnam shes gti mug mun pas 'thibs pa la// bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma gsal bas// 
190a7(rnying rgyud): kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad// smag chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la// mkhyen rabs gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo // de nas
190a8(rnying rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyis shin du ngus nas smras te// gsol pa/ thabs mkhas thug rje sman pa dgongs su gsol// grong khyer gsum du 'khyamos pa bdag cag rnams// 
190b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i gcong snying nad kyis zin gyur pa// sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin par byed med de// bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma rig nad kyis bzung // zug rngu bzod dkas rnam shes gzir ba la// dngos
190b2(rnying rgyud): por 'dzin pa'i gcong rnying ma sbyangs pas// kun nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chang // thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang du gso
190b3(rnying rgyud): zhes lus 'bangs su phul lo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin du ngus nas smras te gsol pa// thabs mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongs su gsol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam/ 
190b4(rnying rgyud): pa bdag cag rnams// sdug bsngal rba klong 'jigs su bying gyur pa// sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med de// rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan// 
190b5(rnying rgyud): las kyi chu bos 'khor bar g.yengs pa la// dngos pora'adzin pa'i bka' mgo ma bsgyur bas// las dbang drag po chu bo rgyun ma 'chang // mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug
190b6(rnying rgyud): bsngal las// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i gru yis bsgral du gsol zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo // de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin du ngus nas smos te/ gsol pa/ rang 'byung bdud
190b7(rnying rgyud): rtsi'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams// kun nas myos pa myos shing nyam gyur pa// sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de// phyin ci log
190b8(rnying rgyud): tu lta ba'i dug gis myos// dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba la// khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsam bcad pas// dug nad 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad// mi zad bzod par
191a1(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la// rang 'byung dag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo // de nas yang rdo rje srin po des bka' stsal pa/ yin no legs so rigs kyi
191a2(rnying rgyud): budad ru da dag gis khyod re 'khor// ru dwa dag gis khyod re 'chog/ bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod ro 'khor// bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'chog/ zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'khor// zhe sdang dag
191a3(rnying rgyud): gis khyod re 'tsheg/ gti mug dag gis khyod re 'khor// gti mug dag gis khyod re 'chog/ 'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'khor// 'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'chog/ chu bo bzhi yis
191a4(rnying rgyud): khyod re 'khor// chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 'tshog/ log par lta pas khyod re 'khor// log par lta bas khyod re 'tshog/ ji ltar khyod ni thams cad du// ye nas rgyal ba'i sras
191a5(rnying rgyud): yin na// grong khyer gsum du ci ste 'khor// rang rang rnam to/ ga las kho na'o// las kyi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs dang // bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dang // khong nas 'bar ba'i
191a6(rnying rgyud): me chen dang // kun nas 'thibs pa'i mun nag dang // dngos po rtog pa'i gcong snying dang // rnam par g.yeng ba'i chu bo dang // khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa rnams// rang byung rdo rjes ma byas
191a7(rnying rgyud): nadatagazhan la re gsol gdung smras pa// chu 'dod smig rgyu snyeg pa 'dra// gang 'dir nyid bder ma sbyar na// gzhan gyis bde bar ga la 'gyur// ye nas bde bar gnas bzhin du// da gdod
191a8(rnying rgyud): gang du bde tshol ba// btsal bas rnyed par yong ma 'gyur// sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyu// 'o ma dag las mar byung ba// de nyid ye nas mar med pa// thabs mchog dpag med rgyal
191b1(rnying rgyud): bas kyang // bsrubs pa ma gtogs de mi rnyed// de bzhin rang gi de nyid las// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi bsnyes na// khyed ci gzhan las bde 'dod dam// mi shes blo chung snying re rje zhes bkar
191b2(rnying rgyud): stsal pa dang // lang ka'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'dus pa phal po che'i tshogs kyis gsol pa// kye skyes bu chen po bdag cag rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid blta bar
191b3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal na de ji ltar yongs su blta bar bgyi zhes gsol pa las/ skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs rgyal ba'i sras rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid mthong bar
191b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod na dkyil 'khor chen po gsum gyi sgo 'ba' zhig tu 'jug par bya'o// de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig gi sgor 'jug par bya'o// de
191b5(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor chen po gsum dang rang rang gi de kho na nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad do// de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i phyir
191b6(rnying rgyud): ro da de skad ces bka' stsal pa las// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po bdag cag dkyil 'khor gsum du gzhug tu gsol// skyes bu chen po yang
191b7(rnying rgyud): dag par gzhug tu gsol// de skad ces gsol pa las// skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor 'jug par byis pa khyed// 'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang // 
191b8(rnying rgyud): 'das dang ma 'das sa mtshams kyi// 'gyur dbang ma nges sa la bzhag ces gsungs so// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad gsol to// dpa' bo dgongs su gsol// bdag
192a1(rnying rgyud): cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs// sgo 'dis 'jug par 'tshal lags na// rgyal ba'i sras su gzung du gsol zhes gsol pa las// skyes bu chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 
192a2(rnying rgyud): skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen khyed// bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs// grub pa lung gi gsang sgo 'dir// su dag 'ongs pa slar mi ldog ces gsungs so// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs de
192a3(rnying rgyud): dag byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i sems 'di ltar skyes so// bdag cag mtha' yas sems can rnams// don gyi sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la// byang
192a4(rnying rgyud): chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa las// mun pas bsgribs pas de ma shes// bya ngang chub sems kyi lam 'di nas// sangs rgyas sa la 'jug
192a5(rnying rgyud): par bgyi zhes gsol to// de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bde chen lhun grub gzhal yo/ sa 'dir// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi nas// tshad med thugs
192a6(rnying rgyud): rje'i sgo phye nas// byams pa'i zhal bzangs bstan du gsol zhes gsol to// de nas skyes bu chen po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma'o skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i
192a7(rnying rgyud): lam sgo kun bcad de// byang chub lam la gzud pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang sgro dbye bar bya zhes gsungs te zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs las 'od zer phyung bas don la nges par 'jug pa'i
192a8(rnying rgyud): sgo bye bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams mgu zhing rangs pa'i sgo nas rnal 'byor du rnam par 'dun nas 'di skad ces gsol to// pho brang rmad 'byung gzhal yas nas// 
192b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun bzhugs la// rnal 'byor nges par lhag par mos// rdo rje gdung la skyabs su mchi zhes gsol to// de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// thog ma men
192b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus mtha' nas// ma rig log rtog dbang gis na/ sdig pa bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad so sor bshags shes gsol to// yang 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag gis 'di skad ce
192b3(rnying rgyud): gsol to// rig 'dzin rdo rje rgyal ba yis// 'khor ba ji ltar bsgral ba ltar// bdag cag rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// rdo rje nyi ma stsal du gsol zhes gsol to// de nas skyes bu chen pos bka'
192b4(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ khyed ni dga' ba ci la dga'// khyed ni dad pa ci la/ da dang // khyed ni mos pa ji la mos// khyed ni 'dod pa dza lta dab// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs
192b5(rnying rgyud): kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag skal ldan bde chen po// rab dgyes sems la bdag cag dga'// mchog nyid do na la bdag cag dang // e ma'o bde mchog dga' tshal
192b6(rnying rgyud): 'dir// sangs rgyas mdzad dka' spyad nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar mos shes gsol to// yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa// rgyal mchog skyes bu khyed ci 'dra// 
192b7(rnying rgyud): de 'dra kho nar spyad par bgyi// spyod pa bsam rgyal rmad 'byung ba// 'gro la phan pa'i don du spyad// 'khor ba'i mtha' rings 'jig rten pa// ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol
192b8(rnying rgyud): pa ni grol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs phyung ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i zhing khams su// snying po byang chub nyid du sbyar zhes gsol to// de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis dam tshig
193a1(rnying rgyud): bskul bar gsol pa// mi phyed gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gnyis med don gyi dbyings las byung // dbyings ni mi 'jig rdo rje ste// 'du 'bral med par gcig pas na// 
193a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nyid du// gnyis su med par nan tan mdzod ces gsol to// de nas skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor khyed// rdo rje can du gcig nges na/ 
193a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gsum du mnyam pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni// gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas phyung // dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dam tshig ni// grub na 'jig pa'i dus med do zhes bka'
193a4(rnying rgyud): stsal to// yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa// 'du ba bral med par chos kyi spun// rigs mi 'thun yang dam tshig gcig/ 'da' bar dka' bas bsdus pas na// dam
193a5(rnying rgyud): tshig can du nan tan mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas yang skyes bu chen po des yang 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// gsang ba gsum gyi dam pa rnams// khyed kyis rab
193a6(rnying rgyud): tu bslus gyur na// de kun khros nas khrag chen po// nyams pa'i snying nas drangs te 'thung zhes dam tshig dam pa byin no// de nas yang skyes bu dam pa des bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs sangs rgyas
193a7(rnying rgyud): blo ldan khyod// bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// rgyud sbyong gsang ba gsum du bzhugs// rang gi me long nyid la ltos// gnas gsum nyid du bkod pa yi// gsang chen gsang ba rab gsang
193a8(rnying rgyud): bad te mthong bas de bzhin nyid du 'gyur// gzhan min rang byung de kho na// blo chung rnams la ma smra shig/ gal te smras par gyur na ni// tha tshig drag pos nyams 'gyur nas// me chen
193b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i gnas su sreg ces dam tshig dam pa bsgrags so// lang ka'i bdag po 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag 'di ltar gsang ba gsum gyi dam par bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na la la ni 'dun
193b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa she dag tu gyur to// la la ni rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa she dag tu gyur to// la la ni dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas
193b3(rnying rgyud): pa she dag tu gyur to// la la ni lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa she dag tu gyur to// la la ni rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa she dag tu gyur to// de ltar na de'i
193b4(rnying rgyud): tsheche de'i dus nyid na 'dus pa'i tshogs phal mo che de dag ni rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te// la/ da la ni rdo rje myu gu zhes bya bar grags par gyur to// de bzhin
193b5(rnying rgyud): dul la ni chos kyi myu gu zhes bya bar grags so// la ni rin chen myu gu zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni zla ba'i rtsal zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni nyi ma'i
193b6(rnying rgyud): mdangs zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni seng ge'i rtsal zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni na mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya bar grags so// de dag las ma rungs pa kha cig ni la la ni rdo rje spyang ki zhes
193b7(rnying rgyud): bya bar grags so// la la ni rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni rdo rje phyogs 'dul zhes bya bar grags so// la la ni rdo rje dur khrod zhes bya bar grags so// rung nag po de kho na nyid
193b8(rnying rgyud): ni rdo rje ro langs dur khrod kyi bdag po zhes bya bar grags te/ bskal pa chen po bzang po'i yun du gnas nas rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po dge bsnyen legs ldan nag po zhes bya ba/ 
194a1(rnying rgyud): gyur nas gang dag chos srungs pa rnams kyi srungs ma'i bya ba byed do// bskal pa de'i phyi ma la 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thal bas khebs pa zhes bya bar
194a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// lang ka'i bdag po de'i tshe de'i phun
194a3(rnying rgyud): rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul to// ldag rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg go// 'ur
194a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur ro// che ma rab tu chem// kun du rab tu chem mo// mtha' mthon dbus dma'o// dbusamatho na mtha' dma'o// sher mthon nub dma'o// nub maH/ 
194a5(rnying rgyud): na shar dma'/ byang mtho na lho dma'/ lho mtho na byang dma' bar gyur to// 'jig rten pa kun kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te mngon par bstod do// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
194a6(rnying rgyud): rten pa kha cig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa la rjes su yid rang bar gyur to// kha cig ni ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kha cig ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing
194a7(rnying rgyud): dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// kha cig ni lung bstan pa thob pa she dag tu gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na ru dra thar pa nag po
194a8(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa mi'i thod pa can ma rungs pa rnams skyes bu chen po rdo rje ma rungs pa de la lus kyi ngag gnyis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas nas thal mo sbyar spyi bos btud nas
194b1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// a ho su kha k+She bar+ya de ba shi sha/ e ma'o skyes bu chen po g.yo ba phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo // chos nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs lags sam/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa
194b2(rnying rgyud): byung ngo // gzugs gnas su dag gam// snying rje'i gzugs lags sam/ sgra phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo // sgra gnas su dag gam/ shes rab kyi sgra lags sam/ dri phun sum tshogs pa
194b3(rnying rgyud): byung ngo // dri gnas su dag gam/ byang chub sems kyi dri lags sam/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo // ro gnas su dag gam/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ro lags sam/ rig phun sum chog pa byung
194b4(rnying rgyud): nged te reg gnas su dag gam/ dam tshig gi reg lagasadasam/ tshor ba phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo // tshor ba gnas su dag gam/ tshor ba ga tAng snyoms legs so/ 
194b5(rnying rgyud): bdag cag ni sngon pas mthu rtsal skyes pa snyam bskyed do// rdzu 'phrul skyes pa snyam bgyid do// dbang thob pa sA ma mo// reg pa shar ba snyam mo// de lta bu'i 'byung gan+da
194b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dam po 'di ni 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya che ge mchog dam pa gya nom pa/ phul du gyur pa/ 'di mthong bar mdzad pa'i skyes bu chen po khyod bdag cag
194b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis pha lags so// bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so// skyes bu chen po nyid lta ma lags kyi dam pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag gang zhig kyang bdag cag rnams kyi pha lags
194b8(rnying rgyud): so// bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so// srid pa 'gre bzlog kyang bka' 'gro mi bzlog/ kye ma'o skyes bu chen po khyed lta ci smos// khyod kyi dam pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag kyang
195a1(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar lha'i dbang po gtsug gi nor bu bzhin spyi bos bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i khyo mo dang bu dang bu mo dang / nor dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang / 'khor dang / nye du
195a2(rnying rgyud): dang / snag gi gnyen 'tshams dang / phru ma dang / yul 'khor dang / yul khams kyi skye bo gang chos yongs su srung ba rnams kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// chos srung
195a3(rnying rgyud): ba de dag la 'tshe ba'i mi dang mi ma lags pa gang lags pa de dag kyang yongs su gzhom zhing brlag par bgyi'o// mtshams gcad cing bcings par bgyi'o// de dag gi gang bsam pa dang
195a4(rnying rgyud): ci bcol ba'i ril yang bran gyi bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa/ ra bgyi'o// de dag gis kyang chos srung zhing chos bzhin du gnas nas bdag cag rnams kyi ci yang yid bzhin du
195a5(rnying rgyud): grub pa lha chen po rnams kyi gsang sngags 'jig rten ma/ don rtags kyi 'byung gnas rdo rje thu bo ches mngon pa/ 'i mthu can du brjod pa dang / dam rdzas dang / dge mtshan/ 
195a6(rnying rgyud): dang / rtags rten rnams kyang bdag cag dang 'brel pa'i ched du bcang bar bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bdag cag gi dam pa lags pa'i slad du'o// kye ma'o skyes
195a7(rnying rgyud): bu chen po 'di lta ste/ bdag cag rnams kyi gsang sngags mngon pa'i mthu can 'di ni bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa ste/ de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ oM bur khur ma hA pad+ma// 
195a8(rnying rgyud): rde bur tsi bur byig gi byi ma na s+ye/ e tse shi mo// kre ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ skyes bu chen po de ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag lags so// oM b+hu du gurma/ a pran/ bud ci kyi phyi/ ma ni s+yai/ 
195b1(rnying rgyud): kha she mo ga kro ta/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ skyes bu chen po 'di dag kyang re re zhing 'bum 'bum rdzogs nas gdod cig gang bya ba'i las la 'jug na the tshom ma mchis par 'grub pa lags so// de
195b2(rnying rgyud): ci'i slad du zhe na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mngon pa'i mthu can du bsngags pa brjod pa lags so// rdo rje mthu bo ches kyang 'jig rten gyi mngon rtags 'dis mdzad
195b3(rnying rgyud): pa lags so// bdag cag rnams kyis kyang cho 'phrul gyi mngon 'dis bgyid pa lags te/ skyes bu chen po gsang sngags 'di gang gis ched du gnyer bar mngon rtags ma mchis na bde
195b4(rnying rgyud): ba yod ma mchis pa lags so// bka' tshad ma rnams kya nga nges par ma mchis pa logs so// bdag cag rnam nas kyang rang rang gi ngag bden pa'i dam pa las nyams
195b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i slad du dmyags ma mchis par mgo 'gas shing khra ga tu skyug pa lags so// skyes bu chen po de bas nags nga sngags 'di la ni the mtsho ma mchis te gang zhig gang la
195b6(rnying rgyud): phan pa bsgrub cing ngo mtshar bskyed pa dang / blun po dag sangs rgyas kyi bka' la yid ches par bgyi ba'i thabs dam pa rnams kyis bshad pa lags te/ de dag gis yan lags bzhi
195b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'di rtag tu bsten na legs so zhes gsol pa las// skyes bu dam pa des bka' stsal pa/ a ho/ rigs so// snyad do// yin no// nges so// bden no// legs so// ma rungs
195b8(rnying rgyud): pa khyed ma dang bcas// chung ma dang bcas/ bu dang bu mo dang bcas// g.yog dang yang g.yog dang bcas pa khyed rnams brtse ba dang ma bral na mar bya'o// gdung ba dang ma bral na
196a1(rnying rgyud): sring mor bya'o// brtson pa dang ma bral na dran du bya'o// byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral na bur bya'o// 'du 'bral med na slob mar bya'o// bskul ba la mgyogs na po
196a2(rnying rgyud): nyar bya'o// bka' bzhin byed na bka' la gdags so zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i gral du bzhag ste/ chos dang gang chos srung ba rnams kyi srungs mar dbang byin no// sangs rgyas kun gyi
196a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thar pa nag po grol ba la ma gol bar lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ sum bcu gcig pa'o// // theg pa chen po nges par
196a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshul las gdul bya'i skabs la bab pa'i tshe da na ru tra yongs su btul ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par 'gros pa ste
196a5(rnying rgyud): byung tshul bstan pa drug pa'o// // bam po lnga par zug pa// de nas yang lang ka'i ba dag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
196a6(rnying rgyud): des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bdun pa byin gyis brlabs las snang ba na yang byung zhes 'byung ba 'di skad ces dri ba yongs su dris pa/ 
196a7(rnying rgyud): kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su byin gyis brlabs las snang ba ni yang
196a8(rnying rgyud): byung zhes brjod pa de ji lta bu zhig tu snang zhing grags pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang gdul bya'i skabs la bab par gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu de dag yod
196b1(rnying rgyud): su snang ba de kho na nyid la bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gdul bya skabs la bab par gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gang du ji ltar snang bar 'gyur// de
196b2(rnying rgyud): skad ces dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos 'di skad ces smras so// kye lang ka'i bdag po gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni thams cad yongs su spang bar 'gyur ro// 
196b3(rnying rgyud): dris pa/ de ji ltar yongs su snang bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid las mi gzhan la/ de las ni rnam shes dang / ye shes
196b4(rnying rgyud): dang rta sku dang / sprul pa dang / yi ge dang / tshig dang / chos da dang / sku gdung dang ring srel la sogs pa chos thamasadang du snang ngo // lang ka'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyi byin gyi brla/ 
196b5(rnying rgyud): 'ba' zhog las snang bar 'gyur te/ lang ka'i bdag po rje lta ji ltar na mkha'i dbyings na nyi zla skar tshogs las ma g.yas pa'i gzugs brnyan chu dang ba tha dad par snang ba
196b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gsang ba'i dbyings rnam par dag pa las chos thams cad snang ba yin la// chos thams cad ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga kho nar zad de/ de ni
196b7(rnying rgyud): gang theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags mtshon par byed pa'i sgor snang ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gsang ba'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po'o gsang
196b8(rnying rgyud): sngags de kho na nyid yin par phyin ci ma log par nges pa'i phyir ro// de la ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya bar grags shing grags par gyur to// lang ka'i bdag po gang sems kyi chos nyid las ni
197a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par shes pa bzhir snang la/ rnam par shes pa bzhi ni rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / kun du snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
197a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa bzhi las ye shes chen po lngar snang ste/ sems kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid las chos nyid kyi dbyings kyi ye shes snang ngo // rtsa ba'i rnam
197a3(rnying rgyud): par shes pa las me long lta bu'i ye shes su snang ngo // dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su snang ngo // kun tu snang gi rnam par shes pa las so sor rtog pa'i
197a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes su snang ngo // 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa las byA dab grub pa'i ye shes su snang ngo // lang ka'i bdagapo de yang min pa zhig yin par bsgrubs pa'am/ mi 'dra
197a5(rnying rgyud): ba zhig 'dra bar bcos pa ni ma yin gyi// ma bcos/ ma bsla da/ ma byas pa/ ma brtsams par ye nas rang bzhin gyis de ltar snang ba nyid du zad do// de nas lang ka'i bdag
197a6(rnying rgyud): pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi ye shes 'di ltar lnga kho nar zad dam/ 'on te gzhan tha dad par yang snang smras pa// lang ka'i bdag po ye shes ni gang gi dbang gis lngar
197a7(rnying rgyud): yang snang la// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang // skad cig bcu drug dang / rigs pa dang / rnam pa gsum dang / de kho na nyid gsum dang / rnal 'byor bzhi dang / rang 'byung ba gcig go// 
197a8(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de la ye shes lnga so sor ma 'dres pa las ni rigs lngar snang la// yongs su rdzogs pa las ni sku bzhir snang ngo // 'di lta ste/ rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa me long lta
197b1(rnying rgyud): bu'i ye shes las ni rdo rje'i gdung dang // sde'i sangs rgyas she dag du snang ngo // sems kyi chos nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de kho na nyid las ni glang po'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas she dag tu
197b2(rnying rgyud): snang ngo // de nyid la ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes snang la// ye shes de gnyis 'dus pa las ni chos kyi skur snang ngo // dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni nor bu'i
197b3(rnying rgyud): gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas sha dag tu snang ngo // kun tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas she dag tu snang ngo // ye shes de gnyis
197b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa las ni rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur snang ngo // 'jug dpa'i rnam par shes pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la das gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas she dag tu snang
197b5(rnying rgyud): ngota de nyid las ni gsang ba'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku tha dad par snang ngo // sprul pa'i sku tha dad pa las ni yi ge tha dad pa dang / tshig tha dad pa dang / chos kyi sgo dpag tu med/ 
197b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sku gdung dang ring bsrel tha dad par snang ste// de dag ni theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo mtshon par snang ba yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de bas gsang sngags ni chos thams cad
197b7(rnying rgyud): la thams cad du rang bzhin gyis snang ba yin la// skyes bu dam pa rnams ni gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis snang bar ston par mngon pa yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na// gsang
197b8(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis ma khyab pa dang // mi gnas pa dang / gsong sngags su ma gyur pa'i chos ni gang yang med de// gsang sngags kyi nges pa phyin ci ma log par rnyed pa'i skyes bu dam pa la la dag
198a1(rnying rgyud): / gsang sngags mthong bar 'dod pa'i me long du ni thams cad 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas nas srog chags ldem bu dang na mkha' nas phra rdul yan chad kyis lhan ne/ 
198a2(rnying rgyud): lhang nge/ lhag ger gsal bar byed pa'o// the tshom gcod par byed pa'o// mdzod dam par gyur pa'o// glegs bam chen por gyur pa'o// rgya chen por bshad pa'o// yongs su go bar sgrogs
198a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ta lang ka'i bdag po de bas na/ gsang sngags ni rang bzhin gyis snang bar zad la// skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis ni byin gyi rlabs kyis ston par zad do// lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ 
198a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po cig thams cad snang ba de gsang da sngags sam// 'on te thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi snang ba de gsang sngags sam// ci gnyi ga ma yin pa zhig
198a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye lang ka'i bdag po thams cad snang ba de ya nga gsang sngags ma yin// gal te gsang sngags yin
198a6(rnying rgyud): na ni gsang sngags zhes brjod pa nyid 'gal la// gang sems can gyi 'du shes dang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yang khyad par med par 'gyur ro// de las gzhan yang gsang
198a7(rnying rgyud): sngags yod pa ma yin// gal te de las gzhan pa 'ba' zhig gsang sngags yin na ni thams cad chos nyid du ma 'dus par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi snang
198a8(rnying rgyud): bde yang gsang sngags yin na ni// gzhan du mu chud pa dag yang dag par rdzogs pa nyid du gyur to// gang gnyi ga ma yin pa de yang gsang sngags ma yin pa zhig gsang sngags
198b1(rnying rgyud): ma yin/ gal te gnyi ga ma yin pa zhig gsang sngags yin na ni gsang sngags zhes bya ba zhig btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas gzhan na med do// lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ 
198b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na cigasang sngags shes bgyi ba gang lags gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gsang sngags shes bya ba ni snang
198b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang ma snang ba gnyis su med pa/ gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid las grol ba/ dbu mar mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de kho na nyid do// lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ 
198b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i na gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de rab ra tu dpag par dka' zhing blta bar dka' na de gang gis blta bar bya/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos
198b5(rnying rgyud): smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de ni gang gi blo shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa/ shi na tu zab pa/ ches zab pas blta bar bya'o// smras pa/ 
198b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po blo zhib pa/ shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa ni gang lags/ shin tu zab pa/ ches zab pa ni gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po blo shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa ni 'di lta ste/ 
198b7(rnying rgyud): gang la la dag sa'i khams 'di la dpag tshad gcig la rdul phra rab mi 'brug khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum bcu dang / bye ba drug bcu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang khri nyis stong yod la/ 
198b8(rnying rgyud): de dag la yang me dang / chu dang / rlung gi rdul phra rab tu phye nas stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po gcig la rdul phra rab tu yod pa'i rtsis kyis gcod pa dang / gzhan yang phyi'i sa chen po 'di la dbyibs tha dad pa mthar yA ba dag brtags te/ 
199a1(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ni 'byung ba 'khrugs pa dang / 'khrul pa dang / 'bris pa dang / 'khyogs pa dang / 'brel ba dang / 'khyil pa dang / ldar ba dang / ga shar ba dang / zha ba dang / 
199a2(rnying rgyud): ldems pa dang / 'bus pa dang / 'khris pa dang / 'chus pa la sogs pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis so sor rtog pa dang / gzhan yang ming dang / brda dang / mtshan ma dang / tha snyad dang / 
199a3(rnying rgyud): btags pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug cing so so'i mtshan nyid mtha' yas pa'i rjes su rtog mtha' mangs pa dang / dpyod mtha' cher 'gro ba dag gi rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dag
199a4(rnying rgyud): gi rgyur 'gro zhes zer ba dag yod de/ lang ka'i bdag po/ de dag la ni shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa zhes ni/ dbya'i/ de dag ni rtsing ga che se rtsing ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
199a5(rnying rgyud): zhe na/ blun po gang dag bye ma la gser phye ba tsag par 'ad da na lhang tsher la gser phyer 'du shes te tshol ba bzhin/ rnam pa thams cad mthong zhing rnyed par mi 'gyur/ 
199a6(rnying rgyud): ro/ tade ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni rnam pa thams cad yod de ye shes med pa'i phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po gang blo zhib pa/ ches zhib pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos gcig gi chos nyid de kho na nyid
199a7(rnying rgyud): phyin ci ma log par shes pas chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par shes pas so// gang rdul phra rab dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / ming dang / brda' dang / 
199a8(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa thams cad dang gis shes par 'gyur te/ de la ni rnam pa thams cad dang / ye shes gnyis su med pa/ gnyis kyi ngo bo las grol bar yod/ 
199b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ma mthong mi shes pa'i chos gcig kyang med do// lang ka'i bdag po blo zab pa/ ches zab pa ni gang zhe na/ gang la la dag chos thams cad la mu dang / gting dang / mtha' dang / dbus tshol
199b2(rnying rgyud): zhing 'byed pa dag yod de/ de dag ni blo zab pa ches zab pa zhes mi bya'i// thug pa nyid du thug pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang 'khrul pa dag yig rgyu la chur 'du she te rnyed pa 'am/ ljongs
199b3(rnying rgyud): pa dag na mkha'i mtha' tshol ba bzhin/ chos thams cad kyi mu dang / gting dang / mtha' dang / dbus btsal bas kyang mi rnyed la dbye bar yang med do// lang ka'i bdag po 'on tang ni chos thams
199b4(rnying rgyud): cad la mu dang gting med pa/ mtha' dang dbus med par chub dpa gang yin pa de ni blo zab pa/ ches zab pa zhes bya'o// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa thams
199b5(rnying rgyud): cad ni rtog dpyod dang bral ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyi/ ra gsang sngags kyi ngo bo la ni rab tu dpag par da/ 'a ba'i phyir blo zhib pa/ ches zhib pa/ zab pa/ ches zab pas
199b6(rnying rgyud): blta bar bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i dbyings de dpe gang las ltos te shes par bya/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba'i dbyings der dper bya ba ni 'jig
199b7(rnying rgyud): rten na med do// re shig dper nye bar mngon sum par bya na na mkha' la gzung bar bya ste/ na mkhas kyang bskrun du yod pa ma yin te/ 'jig rten na mngon sum pa'i dper de las med
199b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir dper na mkha' las ltos te de las shes par bya'o zhes dam pa rnams kyis bshad do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i dbyings dang na mkha' gnyis chos ji ltar
200a1(rnying rgyud): 'thun par sbyar bar byas/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba'i dbyings dang na mkha' nyid kun du chos 'thun pa ni ma yin te/ rang rig stong pa nyid dang / rig med stong pa nyid
200a2(rnying rgyud): kyi phyir ro// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na cig gsang ba'i dbyings der na mkha' ma 'dus pa zhig gam/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de ji snyam du sems/ gsang ba'i dbyings der ni
200a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' 'dus pa/ nam mkha'i khongs su ni gsang ba'i dbyings ma 'dus so// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po na mkha' gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po na mkha' ni gang go skabs
200a4(rnying rgyud): yod pa kho na'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on / dag gsang ba'i dbyings de na mkhas ji ltar mtshon te shes par 'gyur/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos 'thun pa'i
200a5(rnying rgyud): dpe nye bar gzung ba ste/ gang gi go skabs yod pa dang med pa la zad mi shes pa dang / stong pa la thams cad 'bru/ nga ba ste/ phyogs tsam du chos de dag 'thun kyang rang rig
200a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dper ni phyogs med do// gsang ba'i dbyings de ni thams cad rang rig pa'i phyir rang 'byung gi ye shes zhes bya ste/ ye shes de la ni skabs kha cig tu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
200a7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni rnam dag gsal ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni mnyam
200a8(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// kha cig tu ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag la ni namakha' lta bu'i ye shes
200b1(rnying rgyud): dang ta me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / chen po lta bu'i ye shes dang / sna tshogs bkod pa'i ye shes dang / yid bzhin nor bu'i ye shes zhes kyang bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po me long ni chos 'thun
200b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste/ skyon sel ba dang / legs pa bskyed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / gzugs brnyan 'byung ba dang // rtsol ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 
200b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mi nye ba dang / mi ring ba dang / kun nas 'byung ba dang / tshad yongs su ma chad pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / bsgribs pa ma yin pa dang
200b4(rnying rgyud): mun pa ma yin pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa ste/ lang ka/ de'i bdag po phyogs tsam du chos de dag 'thun kyang rang rig pa nyid kyi dper ni phyogs med do// lang ka'i bdag po
200b5(rnying rgyud): chen po ni chos 'thun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste/ yongs su rdzogs par rig pa nyid de/ che chung med par yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ring thung med pa dang / bzang ngan med
200b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / skyon yon med pa dang / glang dor med pa dang / legs nyes med pa dang / gtsang sme med pa dang / bde sdug med pa dang / mthon dman med pa dang / yangs dog med pa dang / sgro
200b7(rnying rgyud): skur med pa dang / 'dres pa med pa dang / mi phyed par yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ lang ka'i bdag po phyogs tsam du chos de dag 'thun kyang rang rig pa nyid kyi dper ni phyogs med do// lang
200b8(rnying rgyud): ko'i bdag po sna tshogs bkod pa ni chos 'thun pa'i dper nye bar bzung ba ste/ gnas pa dang / 'jug pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / gsal ba dang / rnam par phye ba dang / longs spyod sna
201a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / snang ba dang / kun du ma rmongs pa ste/ lang ka'i bdag po phyogs tsam du chos de dag 'thun kyang rang rig pa nyid kyi dper ni phyogs med do// lang ka'i bdag po
201a2(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin po che ni chos 'thun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste rnam par mi rtog pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / 'dod pa 'byung ba dang / dgos pa tshang ba dang / re bskong ba dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa
201a3(rnying rgyud): dang / dga' ba skyed pa dang / mi zad pa dang / bde ba la 'god pa dang / thams cad du grub pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / mi sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyin pa dang / dgos pa grub pa ste/ lang
201a4(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po chos de dag phyogs tsam du 'thun kyang rang ri dag pa nyid kyi dper ni phyogs med do// smras pa/ gsang dab pa'i bdag po ye shes zhes bya ba de gang don gyi dbang / 
201a5(rnying rgyud): gis tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad ye ji bzhin pa'i don phyin ci ma log pa'i skye 'gag med par mkhyen pa las btags pas
201a6(rnying rgyud): na de ni don gyi dbang de kho na'i tshig bla dgas su shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang 'di ltar na mkha' lta bur gyur pa dang / me long lta bur gyur pa dang / mdza' tshon lta bur gyur pa
201a7(rnying rgyud): dang / dbyibs dang kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang / sprin rlangs lta bur gyur pa dang / ma bcos par snang ba de phyogs tsam du chos de dag 'thun kyang rang rig pa nyid kyi dper ni phyogs
201a8(rnying rgyud): med do// lang ka'i bdag po thams cad gsal ba dang / sgo ma 'gag pa dang / cho 'phrul 'byung ba dang / gcig tu sdud pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa ste de dag ni bya ba byed par ri
201b1(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po ma 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ril pa dang / rgyun dang / dmigs pa med pa ste/ de dag ni blta bar snang bar rig
201b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po ma 'gags pa dang / ma 'phros pa dang / ma 'chol ba dang / ma lus pa dang / rgyur gyur pa ste de dag ni rtsal gyi nus par rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po
201b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar na sems las ni sems snang ba yin la/ snang ba ni ye shes ngos zin par bya ste/ de dag kyang gsang ba dam pa de kho na nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs snang bar rig par bya'o zhes smras pas// 
201b4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi se/ dmas dpa' rnams thugs yongs su rtog pa'i the tshom chad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo
201b5(rnying rgyud): chen po las thugs ye shes snang ba dam pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems
201b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid ni gang lags/ rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/ ye shes ni gang
201b7(rnying rgyud): lags/ sku zhes gang la bgyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po dris pa de bzhin ni 'di skad du thos so// sems ni sems dang / sems snang ba dang / sems
201b8(rnying rgyud): las byung ba ste/ de nyid dang / de 'jug pa dang / de rgyun no// rnam par shes pa ni kun gzhi dang / 'jug par byed pa'i yid dang / rgyun du 'byung ba'i sgo lnga'o// ye shes ni gang
202a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid du ngos zin pa'o// sku ni gang gi 'byung 'jug snang ba'i gzhi'o// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngos zin pa ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang
202a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa ni gang / snang ba ni gang / gzhi ni gang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang dri ba de lnga ni 'di skad du thos so// gang ngos zin pa ni gzhan nas ma byung bar
202a3(rnying rgyud): zin pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lang ka'i bdag po gal te gzhan nas 'byung ba zhig ni blo bur pa ste ye shes shes bya ba de nyid de ltar mi rung ngo // 'byung ba ni sprul pa la bya'o// de ci'i
202a4(rnying rgyud): phyir zhe na/ sprul pa ni ma byung ma myong gang du rgyun du 'byung pa'o// 'jug pa ni rdzogs longs spyod pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni nang du yang dag gnas pa nyid du gang gi
202a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor 'jug par byed pa nyid do// snang ba ni chos kyi sku ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnyis 'dus pa las gnyis 'byung ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba'o// gzhi ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste/ de
202a6(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sprul pa ni gang / rdzogs longs spyod pa
202a7(rnying rgyud): ni gang / chos kyi sku ni gang / ngo bo nyid ni gang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang 'di ltar dri ba 'di bzhi ni 'di skad du thos so// sprul pa ni gang med pa las rgyun
202a8(rnying rgyud): gyis 'byung ba la bya'o// rdzogs longs spyod pa ni smin pa phun sum tshogs pa la bya'o// chos kyi sku ni yongs su rnam par dag pa la bya'o// ngo bo nyid ni ji bzhin pa de nyid la bya'o// yang la
202b1(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rgyun gyi 'byung ba ni gang / smin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang / yongs su rnam par dag pa ni gang / ji bzhin pa de nyid ni gang / gsang ba pa'i bdag
202b2(rnying rgyud): pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar dri ba bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ rgyun gyi 'byung ba ni sems las gyur pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// smin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni sems las byung ba'o// yongs
202b3(rnying rgyud): su rnam par dag pa ni sems snang ba'o// ji bzhin pa de nyid ni sems nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gyur pa mun pa sangs na sprul pa mngon du snang ngo // gang 'byung ba
202b4(rnying rgyud): mun pa sangs na rdzogs longs spyod pa mngon du snang ngo // / gang snang ba mun pa sangs na chos kyi sku mngon du snang / ngo // ngo bo nyid la ni mun pa dang / snang ba dang / sangs pa
202b5(rnying rgyud): dang / 'thibs pa las 'das pa'i phyir tshig gi lam dang ngas su bral ba nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag nyid la ni snying po gsang ba'i khyad par gyis dag pa dang ma dag
202b6(rnying rgyud): pa yod par rig par bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dag pa ni gang lags ma dag pa ni gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ gang
202b7(rnying rgyud): du dag pa dang / phyogs su dag pa dang / yongs su rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad nas thams cad du dag pa chen po'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la gang du dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang gsum
202b8(rnying rgyud): du snang ba zhi ba ni rnam par dag pa'o// chos kyi dbang phyug ni smin pa'o// chos kyi rgyal tsha ba ni rgyun no// phyogs su dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang la ma rig par rang rig pa ni rnam par dag
203a1(rnying rgyud): pa'odate bde bar zhugs pa ni smin pa'o// gang du snang ba ni rgyun no// yongs su rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang na mkha' nyid ni rnam par dag pa'o// bde ba la longs
203a2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa ni smin pa'o// yongs su bsgyur ba ni rgyun no// thams cad nas thams cad du dag pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gang gzhir snang ba/ gang ma smad pa ni de nyid do// gang sku med pa ni rnam par
203a3(rnying rgyud): dag pa'o// yongs su rdzogs pa ni smin pa'o// cir yang 'byung ba ni rgyun no// lang ka'i bdag po de la gang du dag pa dang / phyogs su dag pa dang / yongs su rnam par dag pa ni ma dag pa
203a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad du dag par byar mi dad pa la dag par 'dod cing dag par byed pa'i phyiradaro// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po cig de la gang du dag
203a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / phyogs su dag pa dag yongs su rnam par dag pa de la dag pa zhes ci'i phyir brjod// smras pa/ lang ka 'i bdag po de dag ni gang yongs su bsgribs pa las gang
203a6(rnying rgyud): du sangs pa dang / phyogs su sangs pa dang / yongs su rnam par sangs pa'i phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po thams cad nas thams cad du dag par byar med pa la ni dag pa zhes bya'o// de
203a7(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni dag par bya ba'i rgyu ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rgyun yin la smin pa ma yin pa ni gang / smin pa yin la rgyun
203a8(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa ni gang / gnyi ga yin pa ni gang / gnyi ga ma yin pa ni gang zhes dris pa las/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po ji skad du dri ba bzhin 'di lta ste/ rgyun yin la smin pa ma yin pan
203b1(rnying rgyud): gang 'das kyang pad+mo'i dbang gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa la phan 'dogs pa'o// smin pa yin la rgyun ma yin pa ni sa'i snga rol nyid do// gnyi ga yin pa ni gang lhag ma dang bcas pas 'das pa'o// / 
203b2(rnying rgyud): gnyi ga ma yin pa ni rnam par dag pa'o// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag gi mdzad pa ni gang lags/ sku ni gang lags/ dgongs pa ni gang lags/ gzhi ni gang
203b3(rnying rgyud): lags smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de dag gi mdzad pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mdzad pa ste rgyun gyi bya ba car yang snang ba'o// sku ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ste yongs su smin pa'o// dgongs
203b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste rnam par dag pa'o// / gzhi ni sangs rgyas kun gyi 'byung gnas te de nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag na mang po dang / gcig dang / gci/ 
203b5(rnying rgyud): mang po dang / de dag las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o// de ci'i bya/ ra zhe na/ rgyun ni sna tshogs dpag gis mi lang ba'i// phyir mang po zhes bya'o// sman pa ni gang thams cad gcig pa'i
203b6(rnying rgyud): phyir gcig ces bya'o// rnam par dag pa ni rgyun dang smin pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir gcig mang po zhes bya'o// de nyid ni de dag gi 'byung 'jug gis zad 'phel med pa'i phyir de dag las
203b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa zhes bya'o// yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag rtag pa zhig gam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig/ yod pa zhig gam/ 'on te med pa zhig/ gcig pa zhig
203b8(rnying rgyud): gam ta tha dad pa zhig ces dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po ji skad du dri ba drug ni 'di lta ste/ de dag ni rtag pa yang ma yin no// mi rtag pa yang ma yin no// 
204a1(rnying rgyud): rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa yang ma yin no// rtag pa yang ma yin// mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// de dag ni yod pa yang yin no// med pa
204a2(rnying rgyud): yang yin no// yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa yang yin no// yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa yang yin no// gcig pa yang yin no// tha dad pa yang yin no// gcig pa
204a3(rnying rgyud): yang ma yin no// tha dad pa yang ma yin pa yang yin no// gcig pa dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo las grol ba yang yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di lta ste/ mi 'gyur zhing gnyen
204a4(rnying rgyud): po med pa dang / gang 'byung ba mi dmigs pa dang / kun dgyi gzhir gyur pa dang / mtha' yongs su mi dmigs dpa dang / ther zug ma yin pa dang / rgyun du 'byung ba dang // 
204a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dam pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / rgyud dag pa'i yul du gyur pa dang / mtha' dbus las 'das pa dang / tha snyad las 'das pa dang / ye rje bzhin pa dang / 
204a6(rnying rgyud): bsam du med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / so so'i spyod yul dang / khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa'i phyir rtag par yang zung zhig/ mi rtag par yang zung zhig/ yod par ya
204a7(rnying rgyud): zung zhig/ med par yang zung zhig/ gcig par yang zung zhig/ tha dad par yang zung zhig/ gcig dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo las grol bar yang zung zhig/ lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na
204a8(rnying rgyud): 'dul bya'i dbang gi phyir skul ni nges pa med de bsam gyis mi khyab par zung zhig/ lngar yang zung zhig/ gzhir yang zung zhig/ gsum du yang zung zhig/ gnyis su yang zung zhig
204b1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu yang zung zhig/ nges par sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las zhes tha snyad du btags par zad kyi/ sku ni namakha'o// gsung ni sgra brnyan no// thugs ni chos nyid do// 
204b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan ni sgyu ma'o// phrin las ni sprul pa ste/ de dag ni gang la 'dul ba'i dbang du byin gyi rlabs la snang bar zad kyi yang dag par na snang ba ni cung zad kyang med do// lang ka'i bdag
204b3(rnying rgyud): po de dag gi ngo bo ni rnam par shes pa'o// ngos zin pa ni ye shes so// mngon sum pa ni sangs rgyas so// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de ni yongs su dpag par dka'
204b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir gang mun pa'i khams pas ni rnam par shes pa zhe sa bya bar btags so// snang ba'i khams pa dag gis ni ye shes shes bya bar btags so// mig dang ba rnams
