204b5(rnying rgyud): kyis ni sangs rgyas su btags so// dam pa'i mig can/ rnams kyis ni gsang sdigs su ngos zin pa yin no// de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i
204b6(rnying rgyud): bdag po de dag gi zhing khams ni gang / 'khor ni gang / bstan pa ni ci zhig sgrogs/ dus ni gang mdzad pa ni gang zhes dris so// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po
204b7(rnying rgyud): ji skad du dri ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ gang ngo bo nyid med pa de'i zhing khams ni bskyed du med pa'o// 'khor ni sangs rgyas pa med pa'o// bstan pa ni bsam du med pa'o// dus ni tshad las 'das pa'o// 
204b8(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa ni cir yang mdzad pa'o// gang rnam par dag pa de'i zhing khams ni bdal khyab chen po'o// 'khor ni ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs so// bstan pa ni bya ba med pa'i chos so// dus ni zad
205a1(rnying rgyud): nas thams cad du'o// mdzad pa ni chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'o// gang smin pa de'i zhing khams ni bde ba can no// 'khor ni yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs so// bstan
205a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni brjod du med pa'o// dus ni gang nam gnas gtsang ma na'o// mdzad pa ni rnal 'byor dam pa nyid do// gang gsang ba de'i zhing khams ni pad+mo can no// 'khor ni rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs so// 
205a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni gsang sngags rgya mtsho nyid do// dus ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'dod pa na rgyal ba kun gyi sku skrun par 'byor pa'i dus nyid na'o// mdzad pa ni skyes bu dam pa rnams dgongs pa dam
205a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i the tshom gcod par mdzad pa'o// gang rgyun gyi zhing khams ni mos pa can no// 'khor ni mos pa tha dad pa'i tshogs so// bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dus ni sgron ma
205a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su bkod pa na'o// mdzad pa ni gang gi mun pa sel bar ma dzad pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag kyang so sor blta bar ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ngo bo nyid med pa las
205a6(rnying rgyud): de ltar snang bar zad de/ de ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'ba' zhig snang ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po de bas na gsang ba dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa de ni nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o// byin
205a7(rnying rgyud): gyi rlabs las snang ba ni zer dang 'od lta bur rig par bya'o zhes smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams sku yongs su rtog pa'i the tshom chad par gyur
205a8(rnying rgyud): totatasangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sku yongs su snang ba dam pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang lang ka'i bar/ 
205b1(rnying rgyud): po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi byin gyi brlabs ji ltar snang ba dpag par bya ba'i phyir dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang
205b2(rnying rgyud): gi thugs dang sku'i byin gyi rlabs las snang ba yongs su bkod pa de dag gi gsung gi byin gyi rlabs las snang ba ji ltar dpag par bgyi/ de skad ces dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras
205b3(rnying rgyud): pata lang ka'i bdag po ji skad du dri ba de ni 'di lta ste/ ngo bo nyid med pa gsang ba dam pa gsang ba de la ni tshig dang sgra'i tha snyad med de/ thams cad nas thams cad du gsung ba med pa kho na'o// gal
205b4(rnying rgyud): te gsang ba de dag dpag par ni gang yongs su dag pa'i skyes bu dam pas kyang mi dpogs te// gang gi phyir de dpogs da pa nyid na ngo bo nyid med pa gsang ba dam pa nyid du nges pa'i
205b5(rnying rgyud): phyir dpag par rab tu dka'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'on kyang 'di lta ra rig par bya ste/ gang ngo bo nyid med pa'i gsung ni nam kha' lta bu'o// rnam par dag pa'i gsung ni nyi ma'i snying po
205b6(rnying rgyud): lta bu'o// yongs su smin pa'i gsung ni me long lta bu'o// gsang ba dam pa'i gsung ni seng+ge lta bu'o// rgyun du 'byung ba'i gsung ni gsung gcig yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab par 'byung ba'i
205b7(rnying rgyud): phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang bzhar 'byung zhing bzhir snang ba/ bzhi las rgyas par shes par bya'o// gzhi gang zhe na 'di
205b8(rnying rgyud): lta ste/ gsung gi rang bzhin dang / rnam grangs dang yan lag dang / gzugs brnyan rnams su shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rang bzhin gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gdangs su che ba dang / 
206a1(rnying rgyud): yongs su khyab pa dang / go bar myur ba dang / the tshom gcod pa dang / gcig la gzigs snyam pa dang / nyi tsher ston pa dang / kun nas 'jug pa dang / bdun pa skyed pa dang / khyad du zhugs
206a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / thams cad 'dul ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po rnam grangs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa lta bu dang / sil snyan lta bu dang / glu gar lta bu dang / ka la bing ka lta bu dang / 'brug dbyangs lta bu
206a3(rnying rgyud): dang da sgra brnyan lta bu'o// lang ka'i bdag po yan lag ni 'di lta ste/ 'du shes bskyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / mi 'thun pa med pa dang / shin du zab pa dang / 
206a4(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'byung ba dang / gang gis mi tshugs pa dang / rnar snyan pa dang nga rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang / shin du gsal ba ste/ rnam grangs kyi sgo re rar gang du byung ba de dang dar yan lag
206a5(rnying rgyud): kun rdzogs par 'byung ngo // lang ka'i bdag po de la gzugs/ brnyan gang zhe na/ gzugs brnyan ni yi ge'i tsho gas/ su snang la// yi ge ni gsang ba dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs las
206a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni yi ger yang ma zad de yi ge la sogs pa'i chos thams cad med pa las 'byung zhing btags pa ltar chags/ 
206a7(rnying rgyud): gang ltar bsgrubs pa ltar 'grub/ gang du mthong ba de ltar bltas par snang ba'i phyir yi ge yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs las gsung gi gzugs brnyan du 'byung bar
206a8(rnying rgyud): zad do// lang ka'i bdag po 'on tang na thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang gis ma bcos yong gis 'od gsal bas btsal du med cing ye nas byang chub pa las gang byang chub don
206b1(rnying rgyud): du gnyer zhing 'bad pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na sems can dang sangs rgyas gnyis ci'i phyir tha dad / smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de ni rkyen ji bzhin pa'i
206b2(rnying rgyud): phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po de bas na 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan gyi rgyu dang / gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i sgo dang / gzugs brnyan gyi gzungs dang / gzugs brnyan gyi dam tshig dang / gzugs
206b3(rnying rgyud): brnyan gyi sprul pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la gzugs brnyan gyi rgyu ni dang ba mi dmigs pa ste ci yang med pas ci yang 'byung ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i sgo ni gang
206b4(rnying rgyud): du gnyis 'dus pa ste ci yang min pa las cir yang rig par byed pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzugs brnyan gyis mtshon par byed mod kyi gzugs brnyan las dngos gzhi/ 
206b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yang ma yin// mi 'byung ba yang ma yin/ snang ba yang nga ma yin/ mi snang ba yang ma yin/ khyab pa yang ma yin/ ma khyab pa yang ma yin// dper na na mkha'i sgra
206b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrags par ni kun gyis nus mod kyi na mkha' gang zhe na/ 'di kho na'o zhes ni gang gis kyang bstan par mi nus so// lang ka'i bdag po de bzhin du gzugs brnyan gyis kyang dngos gzhi
206b7(rnying rgyud): mtshon par nus kyis 'di kho na'o zhes bstan par ni mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan ni dngos gzhi las byung bas mtshon par yang nus la// gzugs brnyan yin pa'i phyir/ 
206b8(rnying rgyud): gang gi spyod yul du yang gyur pa yin la/ dngos gzhi ni gang gis kyang spyod yul du ma gyur pas 'di'o zhes bstan par mi nus so// de bas sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa gsang ba de ni
207a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyang rung / ma rgyas kyang rung / thams cad kyi rang bzhin du ye nas gnas
207a2(rnying rgyud): shing thams cad la khyab kyang thams cad kyis mthong ba ni ma yin no// de las byung ba thams cad ni shes par yang rung la/ des ni de nyid mtshon par yang rung na/ de las byung bas de nyid ni
207a3(rnying rgyud): 'di kho na'o zhes bstan par ni mi nus so// lang ka'i bdag po gzugs brnyan gyi gzungs ni ci yang med cing ma mthong ba de nyid ci yang 'byung zhing ci gang dang yang ma bral ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ 
207a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs gang yin pa de ni dngos gzhi'o// dngos bzhi gang yi/ dran pa da ni gzugs brnyan no// dngos gzhi dang gzug/ das brnyan gang yin pa de ni gsang ba dam pa'i dbyings so// / 
207a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dam pa gang yI pa de ni dad+mo gzhi dang gzugs brnyan no// 'on tang na gsang ba dam pa ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra la/ byin gyi rlabs las byung ba thams cad ni rlabs dang
207a6(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba ste 'di gnyis su med pa/ gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba/ dbu mar yang mi dmigs pa/ gnyis su mi 'gyur bar gzigs pa ste de kho na nyid de ni gzugs so// de bzhin du cis
207a7(rnying rgyud): kyang mi phyed mi shig pa dang / gang du yang mi dmigs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / na mkha'i rang bzhin dang / ming dang / tshig dang / don dang / gsang sngags
207a8(rnying rgyud): kyi gzung so// 'on tang na gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la dngos gzhi'i rang bzhi yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyings kho na bas de ni de gnyis kyi gzungs// 
207b1(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs pa'i dbyings de ni thams cad du sems can dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad skyed cing de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir gcig pas na so so ma yin pa'i gzungs so// lang
207b2(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po gzugs brnyan gyi dam tshig ni gang gi gzugs brnyan gang de las mi 'da' ba ste/ ji ltar snang yang dngos gzhi de las mi 'gyur mi 'da' ba ste/ de ltar 'byung 'jug med
207b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ phyi nang med pa/ sgo phugs med pa/ 'du 'bral med pas na dam tshig go// thams cad de'i ngang las mi 'da' ba'i phyir dam tshig ces bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po dper na rdo rje sems dpa
207b4(rnying rgyud): ni gang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dgongs pa dam pa yi// na na de'i gzugs brnyan zhig blun po gang zhig gi ma/ dun du bzhag na blun po de ji snyam du sems/ smras pa/ gas
207b5(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po de ni 'di ltar 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ma yi na te/ de'i 'dra ba 'ba' zhig go snyam du rtog pa'o// sgra sa pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de bas na gang dam pa dag gis
207b6(rnying rgyud): bltas na mi dmigs pa'i dbyings na rdo rje sems dpa' dang de'i gzugs brnyan gnyis gzhan dang gzhan na so so na gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gnyis kyi rang bzhin de kho na
207b7(rnying rgyud): nyid de de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de so so ba zhig yin na ni dmigs pas 'bras bu skye bar mi rigs so// lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la khyal bar ma
207b8(rnying rgyud): mchis sam/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po mi shes pa'i dbang du gzugs brnyan dang des mtshon pa'i don zhes brjod cing snang bar zad kyi/ dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid brtsan par byas na
208a1(rnying rgyud): de la ni khyad par cung zad kyang med do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na chos rnams brjod pa dang / mtshon pa dang / tha snyad kyis ci zhig bgyi/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de ni kho hA
208a2(rnying rgyud): gang gi dogs pa bsal zin to// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na gang blo chen po dag bya dka' ba chen pos 'bad cing legs par bskrun te ci zhig bya/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po de de lta mod kyi
208a3(rnying rgyud): gang mtshan ma la zhen pa dag khrid pa'i phyir dang / gang blo che yang da dung tshegs chung ngu'i thabs rlabs po ches don chen por red zin pa'i nyams ma rnyed pa'i phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po de kho na nyid las
208a4(rnying rgyud): ni rgyun du cho 'phrul rnams snang ba yin te/ rin po che'am sprin lta/ dbur ci yang med pa las ci yang snang zhing gang chu las mang por mched pa'i srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa
208a5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad snang ba 'di ci yang med pa las snang ngo // de bas na gsung gi gzugs brnyan 'di dag kyang ci yang mo'i pa kho na las snang ba'i chos nyid du rig par bya'o// lang ka'i
208a6(rnying rgyud): bdag po gzugs brnyan gyi sprul pa ni tha dad de gsung gi gzugs brnyan ni yi ger snang ba yin la/ yi ge'i sprul pa ni 'di lta ste/ ming dang / byung tshul dang / gzugs dang / rang bzhin dang / sgra
208a7(rnying rgyud): dang da las dang / sgo dang / rnam grangs dang / yi ge'i gzhi rnams kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de mthong zhing shes par 'gyur ro// des chos thams cad la mkhas shing grol bar 'gyu ro// 
208a8(rnying rgyud): de la lang ka'i bdag po yi ge de'i ming ni 'di lta ste/ gang la yang med la gang mtshon pa'i bla dgas te/ gang skye ba med pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming a zhes bla dag su btag so// 
208b1(rnying rgyud): byang mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming ga nas tshigs bla dgas su btags so// khyab ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming bzhes tshig bla dgas su btag so// skye ba mtshon par byed pa'i sa
208b2(rnying rgyud): ge la ni ming gnas tshig bla dgas su btags so// grol ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming g+ha zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// 'dzin pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming
208b3(rnying rgyud): zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// spyod pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming tsa zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// 'du 'bral mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming tsha zhes bla dgas su
208b4(rnying rgyud): btags so// mi gnas pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming dadza zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// dri ma mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming dz+nyA zhes tshig bla dgasu btag
208b5(rnying rgyud): sodang shes pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi gro la ni ming nya zhes tshig bla dgasu btags so// de nyid mtshon par byed pa'i/ yi ga la ni ming tra zhes bla dwags su btags so// byed pa
208b6(rnying rgyud): mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming tha zhes bla dgas su btags so// nyer zhi mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming nga zhes
208b7(rnying rgyud): bla dgas su btags so// chos mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming d+ha zhes bla dgas su btags so// ming mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming na zhes bla dgas su btags so// lamatshon
208b8(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming Ta zhes bla dgas su btags so// gnas mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming tha zhes bla dgas su btags so// kun nas 'khrul mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge
209a1(rnying rgyud): la ni ming / zhes bla dgas su btags so// rang bzhin mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming D+ha zhes bla dgas su btag so// yul mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge le ni ming / zhes bla
209a2(rnying rgyud): dgas su btags so// don dam pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming pa zhes bla dgas su btags so// 'bras bu mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming pha zhes bla dgas su btags so// 'ching grol
209a3(rnying rgyud): mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming ba zhes bla dgas su btags so// srid pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming b+ha zhes bla dgas su btags so// dran pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming ma
209a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bla dgas su btags so// mi 'gyur ba mtshon par byed pa'i de yi ge la ni ming ya zhes bla dgas su btags so// rgyu rkyen mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming wa zhes bla dgas
209a5(rnying rgyud): su btags so// rdul mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming ra zhe sa bla dgas su btags so// bcom pa mtshon par/ byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming la zhes bla dgas su btags so// 
209a6(rnying rgyud): zhi ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming sha zhes bla dgas su btags so// shes pa skye bar byed pa mtshon pa'i yi ge la ni ming tha zhes bla dgas su btags so// rnam pa thams cad shes pa
209a7(rnying rgyud): mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming sa zhes bla dgas su btags so// rgya mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming ha zhes bla dgas su btags so// mthar zad pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni
209a8(rnying rgyud): ming kA zhes bla dgas su btags so// bdag mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming oM zhes bla dgas su btags so// ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming A zhes bla dgas su btag so// 
209b1(rnying rgyud): g.yeng ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming i zhes bla dgas su btags so// ri mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming I zhes bla dgas su btags so// zhen pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni
209b2(rnying rgyud): ming u zhes bla dgas su btags so// mun pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming A zhes bla dgas su btags so// gdung mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming e zhes bla dag su btag so// 
209b3(rnying rgyud): mnar sems mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming I zhes bla dgas su btags so// 'jig pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming o zhes bla dgas su btags so// stong pa mtshon par byed
209b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yi ge la ni ming AM zhes bla dgas su btags so// nub par ma tshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming a zhes bla dgas da su btags so// sku mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming
209b5(rnying rgyud): o zhes bla dgas su btags so// ngag mtshon par byed pa'i yi/ ge la ni ming AHzhes bla dgas su btags so// thugs mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming hUM zhes bla dag
209b6(rnying rgyud): su btags so// yon tan mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming swA zhes bla dgas su btags so// phrin las mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming hA zhes bla dgas su btags so// gdug
209b7(rnying rgyud): pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming lcags kyu zhes bla dgas su btags so// sdud pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming 'od dpag zhes bla dgas su btags so// 'dren pa mtshon
209b8(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming re pa zhes bla dgas su btags so// sbyor ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming zla tshes zhes bla dgas su btags so// ming mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la
210a1(rnying rgyud): ni ming thig ces bla dwags su btags so// gcod pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ming dbyug pa zhes bla dgas su btags so// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yi ge'i
210a2(rnying rgyud): ming du rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la yi ge'i byung tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa gsang ba mchog nyid kyis// 'dus pa dag la bos te gsungs// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal
210a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor rnams// yi ge'i rjes su don dpags na// yi ge'i don ni gsal bar ston// ci phyir don nyid yi ger snang // dbyings las a byung a las ni// yi ge yid bzhin sprin tshegs 'phro// 
210a4(rnying rgyud): a ni rang bzhin yi ge ste// rten dang bral bas rgyu rkyen med// / khong nas kun khyab namakha' 'dra// chos nyid skye meng zad mo yis// chos kun khyab gnas zin pa ltar// khyab gan+d+ha
210a5(rnying rgyud): a yi rang bzhin gyis// yi ge kun khyab kun zin te// mri nga dang tshig tshogs sna tshogs bsgyur// skyes bu thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// thams cad 'byung ba kun gyi gzhi/ 
210a6(rnying rgyud): mgur gyi gsang ba'i dbyings su shar// cho 'phrul yi ge lngar snang ba// mgur gyi sgra byung mgur las grags// a ka kha ga g+ha nga / a las yig 'dra zer 'phros pas// ljags kyi dbang
210a7(rnying rgyud): po zlag 'phyos// cho 'phrul yi ge lngar snang ba// ljags kyi sna byung ljags las grags// tsa tsa dza dzAnya// a yi 'od zer rtse mo las// lcags kyi zla ga rtse mo 'phros// cho 'phrul lnga gnyis yige/ 
210a8(rnying rgyud): snang nyin rtse mo sna byung thor tor grags// ti zad d+ha ne/ rnga Na Da d+hiH/ de bzhin de las de byung ba// zhal gyi smos las 'khyil 'bar bas// de bzhin yig 'bru lngar snang ba// zhil gyi sgor thung
210b1(rnying rgyud): zhal las grags// ba pa bab+ha ga yig 'bru kun gyi mchog de nyid// gsung gi rgyun lam der byung ba// yul la rig pa'i 'brur shar ba// cho 'phrul yi ge sna tshogs snang // ya wa ra la/ shA Shas
210b2(rnying rgyud): kA a A i I u A i oM I atsau re rI li lI a ho// rang 'byung gnas khyab dbyings las ni// smra ba'i phreng ba'i 'od zer shar// smra ba'i ye shes las bskrun na// 'dren pa sprul pa'i sa ngon/ 
210b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // dpag med rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// yi ge sprul pa de nyid yin// ma skyes pa yi thugs nyid de// dang po mgur gyi gzugs brnyan te// gnyis pa ljags kyi gzugs brnyan yin// gsuM
210b4(rnying rgyud): partse mo las byung ba// bzhi pa 'byung ba'i spros la shar// lji/ gsung gi rgyun lam yin// thams cad sdung pa'i yi ge ya/ sreg pa 'byung ba'i yi ger// 'joms pa chen po yi ge la/ 
210b5(rnying rgyud): mun pa sel ba'i yi ge wa// mtshan ma dag pa'i yi ge sha/ stong pa chen po'i yi ge la// cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yi ge kA/ rnam pa kun gyi yi ge sa// 'khor ba gnon pa'i yi ge ha// 'bru
210b6(rnying rgyud): ba kun gyi yi ge a// brjod pa kun gyi yi ge A// tshad med pa dang lam rnams kyi// yi ge bcu drug rdzogs pa nyid// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan gyi// tshig 'byung smra ba'i yi ge bzhi// bdun
210b7(rnying rgyud): dang bcu gnyis gsung gi rgyun// 'byung ba nyid du mgon pos bshad// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yi ge'i byung tshul du rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di la yi ge'i gzugs
210b8(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang kha dog dang dbyibs 'ba' zhig go// lang ka'i bdag po de la kha dog gang zhe na/ rang bzhin dang / rigs dang // sna tshogs dang / ma nges pa'o// lang ka'i
211a1(rnying rgyud): bdag po dbyibs ni tha dad pa ste/ 'di ltar a 'ba' zhig la yang a seng ge g.yal ba lta bu dang / a seng ge bsgyings pa lta bu dang / a seng ge sgra 'byin pa lta bu dang / a bin du
211a2(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa lta bu dang / a a mo ka'i khra 'dra ba dang / a 'od dpag thig lta bu la sogs pa tha dad do// de bzhin du ka la yang ka pi wang lta bu dang / ka tri shu la lta bu dang / ka spung ki lta
211a3(rnying rgyud): bu dang / ka ru la sbal lta bu dang / ka bdan rtse gsum pa lta bu la sogs pa tha dad do// gzhan yang kha ni bong bu lta bu'o// ga ni bse lta bu'o// g+ha ni bum pa lta bu'o// nga ni kang ga lta bu'o// tsa ni tsa sha'i
211a4(rnying rgyud): kha lta bu'o// cha ni gdugs lta bu'o// dza ni dra ba lta bu'o// dz+nyA ni dA ba chen po lta bu'o// nya na ba dan gyi kha lta bu'o// ta ni 'dza dam bu dI ba lta bu'o// tha na tha gu ra'i kha lta bu'o// da ni mkha' 'gro/ 
211a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i kha lta bu'o// d+ha ni dad pa'i kha lta bu'o// na ni to la kha lta bu/ 'o// Ta ni dang bza ba lta bu'o// dza ni pha bang lta bu'o// ni mche ba lta bu'o// D+ha ni gzhu lta bu'o// Na ni ma he'i kha lta bu'o// 
211a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni ri rab lta bu'o// pha ni khyung lta bu'o// ba ni 'dam bya lta bu'o// b+ha ni kha lag tshe lta bu'o// ma ni spreru skyong ba lta bu'o// ya ni zla ba tshes pa lta bu'o// wa ni rka ti ka'i kha lta bu'o// ra ni kun tsi ta'i kha lta/ 
211a7(rnying rgyud): bu'o/ ta la ni bya rog sha then lta bu'o// sha ni ri bong lta bu'o// Sha ni shan tra kha lta bu'o// sa ni bram ze slong ba lta bu'o// ha ni ra ka lta bu'o// kla ni srin po'i kha lta bu'o// i ni lcags kyu bsnol bas re bas
211a8(rnying rgyud): rten pa lta bu'o// u ni 'od dpag brtsegs pa re bas drangs pa lta bu'o// e ni rab brtsegs pa 'od dpag gi drangs pa lta bu'o// o ni gzhu gdungs pa lta'o// oM na gdugs phub pa lta bu'o// 
211b1(rnying rgyud): aM ni drang srong tshul brtan pa lta bu'o// ri ni lcags sgrog kyo gas drangs pa lta bu'o// li ni bya gag kyogs drangs pa la sogs pa ste/ yi ge re re la yang dbyibs tha dad yod de/ de ltar na 'dren pa
211b2(rnying rgyud): ni gu gu lcags kyu lta bu'o// 'od dpag ni zhabs klung dkris pa lta bu'o// re pa ni bse'i rwa bsgreng ba lta bu'o// zla ches ni na ro'i rwa lta bu'o// thig le ni li tshig tshig gi mig lta bu'o// dbyug pa ni 'a
211b3(rnying rgyud): mdud lta bu ste/ so so'i dbyibs tha dad pa de lta bu yod do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yi ge'i dbyibs te yi ge'i gzugs su shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la yi ge'i rang bzhin
211b4(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de yi ge gzhan gyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur la/ yi ge gang gi sa yi ge gang dag gi rang bzhin rnam grangs su mtshon par mi
211b5(rnying rgyud): nus so// lang ka'i bdag po de la gang gi rang bzhin gang / du mi 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ a'i rang bzhin skye ba ma da pa yin/ de ni a 'ba' zhig las ma gtogs pa yi ge
211b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gang gis kyang skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin shes par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de bzhin du ka'i rang bzhin byed pa yin la byed pa ni ka 'ba' zhig las ma gtogs pa yi ge gzhan gang / 
211b7(rnying rgyud): kyang byed par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na ming du btags pa gang zhig la dngos gzhi gang yin pa de ming gi rnam grangs gzhan brjod pas kyang shes
211b8(rnying rgyud): par rung ba ni yod mod kyi/ yi ge ni shes par mi rung ba'i phyir yi ge'i rang bzhin ni mi 'gyur ba kho nar shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la yi ge'i sgra gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
212a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyi sgra dang / bsgyur ba'i sgra dang / sbyar ba'i sgra dang / drangs pa'i sgra'o// de la rang bzhin gyi sgra gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge gang la dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / skad dang / brda
212a2(rnying rgyud): tha dad kyang a dang ka la sogs pa'i ming du btags pa'i sgra ji lta ba de kho na nyid ltar grags pa'o// bsgyur ba'i sgra gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge gang dang gang du bsgyur ba'i sgra des don dang tshig
212a3(rnying rgyud): tha dad par 'gyur ba'o// sbyar ba'i sgra gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dbyibs gang dang gang la yi ge gang dang gang gi gzugs su sbyar bas de dang de'i don 'byung ba gang yin pa'o// drangs sgra gang zhe na/ 'di lta
212a4(rnying rgyud): ste/ yi ge gang dang gang las tshig gang ltar drangs pa'i sgra de da dang de las don gang 'byung ba gang yin pa'o// lang ka'i ba dedag po 'di la yi ge'i las gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang du
212a5(rnying rgyud): spel ba dang / gang shes par byed pa nyid do// gang du spel pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang med pa las gcig tu byung ba dang / gcig las gsum dang / lnga dang bzhi bcu dang / 'bum
212a6(rnying rgyud): sde dang / bye ba dang / sa yar 'phel bas thams cad shes par byed pa'o// gang shes par byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ ming klag pa dang / tshig klag pa dang / gzugs klag pa dang / don klag pa dang / 
212a7(rnying rgyud): sgra klag pa dang / gcig klag pa dang / mang po klag pa dang / gcig mang por klag pa dang / mang po gcig tu klag pa dang / gcig dang mang po tha dad par klag pa'o// yang lang ka'i bdag po 'di
212a8(rnying rgyud): la yi ge'i sgo ga she na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge'i sgo dang / tshig gi sgo dang / don gyi sgo dang / dbyangs kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la yi ge'i sgog
212b1(rnying rgyud): zhe na/ gang gis gang la bris pa'o// tshig gi sgo gang zhe na/ gang yi ge'o// don gyi sgo gang zhe na/ gang tshig gi tshogs so// dbyangs kyi sgo gang zhe na/ gang gi yi ge bcu drug go// lang ka'i bdag po yi ge/ 
212b2(rnying rgyud): bcu drug kyang gang zhe na/ 'grar dang cang 'ba' zhig tu shes par bya'o// de ni ring po dang thung ngu nyid du rig par bya'o// gang thung ngu dang ring po de nyid las dbyangs kyi yan lag drug byung bar rig par
212b3(rnying rgyud): bya'o tata thung ngu las gnyis dang / ring po las gnyis dang / gang de gnyis las gnyis 'byung bar rig par bya'o// thung ngu las yan lag gnyis 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ sha ta ba dang ga ra d+ha ba
212b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis so// ring po las yan lag gnyis byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ breng nge ba dang thung nge ba gnyis so// gang de gnyis las ya na lag gnyis byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ tsAng ka de'u dang pAng ka
212b5(rnying rgyud): de'u dang gnyis so// lang ka'i bdag po yan lag 'di drug/ kyang gang 'gro ba drug gi khams su gsung ba'i sgo drug las drug drug tu bsgyur ba byas pa las drug dang bcu gsuM
212b6(rnying rgyud): du bsgyur bar rig par bya'o// drug bcur bsgyur bas yan lag drug bcur 'byung bar rig par bya'o// drug drug bcur bsgyur ba byas pas yan lag sum brgya drug bcur 'byung bar rig
212b7(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzungs kyi sgo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi gzungs dang / tshig gi gzungs dang / chos kyi gzungs dang / sngags kyi gzungs su rig par bya'o// lang ka'i
212b8(rnying rgyud): bdag po don gyi gzungs gang zhe na/ yi ge gang snang ba'i don de nyid de dang ma bral bar bya'o// tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ yi ge gang las tshig gang byung ba'o// chos kyi gzungs gang ni
213a1(rnying rgyud): nad gang yi ge ni chos thams cad dang 'brel cing chos thams cad mi dmyigs pa'i sgor rig par bya'o// sngags kyi gzungs gang zhe na/ yi ge'i sgo nas tshig brtsan par red
213a2(rnying rgyud): pa gang yin pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yi ge'i sgor rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di la yi ge'i rnam grangs gang zhe na/ rang bzhin gyi yi ge dang / cho 'phrul gyi yi ge'o// de
213a3(rnying rgyud): la rang bzhin gyi yi ge gang zhe na/ gang thams cad kyang yi ge 'ba' zhig pa'o// cho 'phrul gyi yi ge gang zhe na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang thun mong pa'o// 'jig rten lnga
213a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i yi ge gang zhe na/ oM dang / hU dang / mU dang / swaM dang / a dang / ha dang / a rnams so// lang ka'i bdag po 'di la 'jig rten pa'i yi ge gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtsa ba
213a5(rnying rgyud): dang zin pa dang / grags pa'o// rtsa ba gang zhe na/ sa bon drugagang yin pa'o// zin pa gang zhe na/ gang 'gro ba rnam sa kyi sgra skad kun yi ges zin pa kho na'o// grags pa gang zhe
213a6(rnying rgyud): nad lha'i yi ge dang / klu'i yi ge dang / lha ma yin gyi yi ge dang / mi'i yi ge dang / gnod sbyin gyi yi ge la sogs pa 'jig rten tha dad kyi yi ger grags pa gang yin pa'o// thun mong gi
213a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge gang zhe na/ a dang ka la sogs pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di la yi ge'i gzhi gong zhe na/ a dang / oM dang / hUM dang / mAM zhes thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur pa'o// gas
213a8(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/ lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus can gyi sems dpa' rnams thams cad gsung gi mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lor rig par gyur
213b1(rnying rgyud): tota/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byang
213b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras te dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs las snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon
213b3(rnying rgyud): tan dang phrin las ji ltar snang ba lags/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs las snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang phrin las ni
213b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar snang bar rig par bya'o// gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtog/ gang la rtag nyid du// brtags las rtogs pa'i byin rlabs 'byung // mi zad rin chen na mkha'i mdzod// byin
213b5(rnying rgyud): rlabs chen po rgyun mi 'chad// gsang nyid snying po'i byin rlabs ni// gang du rnam par mi rtog bzhin// 'dod 'byung ba thams cad byed// de la byed pa ci yang med// ku ba gcig
213b6(rnying rgyud): gis byin rlabs kyis// ljags ni stong snyed bsgyur ba bzhin// gsang ba'i don mthong skad cig gis// thams cad gsang ba'i snying por 'gyur// mar me gcig gi byin rlabs kyis// bskal pa'i mun
213b7(rnying rgyud): nag sel ba bzhin// snying po don rig skad cig mas// bskal par gnas pa'i sgrib pa sel// nor bu rin chen gang sel ba// dbul ba'i 'jigs pa med pa ltar// snying po don sang gang sel ba// ltung
213b8(rnying rgyud): gnas 'khor ba'i 'dzags pa med// nyi zla'i 'od 'bar rin chen gyis// rin chen rin thang 'bum char min// dkar por mthar thug bsod nams kyis// gsang nyid skad cig 'bum char min// 
214a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro gang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho ji snyed du// seng ge'i 'o ma gcig drugs rlag pa ltar// las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgya mtshor ni// gsang nyid skad cig snang bas thams cad med// 'khor
214a2(rnying rgyud): los sgyur rgyal gang rten 'jigs med ltar// gsang nyid nges la log pa'i dgras mi 'jigs// rdo rje nyams kyang rin chen zil gnon cing // rin chen mi brlag dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sel// 
214a3(rnying rgyud): gsang nyid rdo rje snying po nyams 'gyur yang // nyan thos la sogs dbu ma zil gnon cing // gsang nyid nges snang chos kyi dbul bsel// seng ge phrug gu'i dris ni gar khyab par// gang dag mi bzod
214a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'bros par 'gyur// snying po don la rig pa'i mthu med kyang // sems bskyed tsam gyis dbu ma zil gyis gnon// log pa'i dgra rnams zil gnon skrag 'gyur zhing // 
214a5(rnying rgyud): rang rang gnas nas zug rngus gzir bar 'gyur// skyes bu rkang lag bcad de nyams kyang 'tsho// ji ltar snying phyung 'tsho ba 'i glags med ltar// yan lag lta bu'i dbu mo nyams kyang
214a6(rnying rgyud): 'tsho ta snying dang 'dra ba'i gsang nyid med na rlag/ gang zhig rdo rje snying po gsang 'dzin pa// shing rta la sogs rta la 'dug spyod pa// de yi bya ba byed pa gzhan med ltar// de yi rta stegs rgyal ba'i dbus
214a7(rnying rgyud): bkur mdzad// dbu ma rnam thar gsum sgor bskal spyad kyang // de la rgyal ba mi dgongs bkur mi mdzad// snying po don rig skad cig tsam gyis kyang // byin rlabs yon tan rgyal bas bshad mi
214a8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// dkar po mthar thug bsod nams kun// sen mo thog gis rdul 'dra// rdo rje snying por gcig skyed pa// sa yi dkyil 'khor chen po tsam// dkar po phyogs kyi mtha' thug pa// de ni mun
214b1(rnying rgyud): khang sgron me tsam// rdo rje snying por gcig rig pa// dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me chen 'dra// dbu mar snang ba'i na mkha' ni// gang gi gseng khung na mkha'o// rdo rje gsang ba'i na mkha' ni// 'byung chen gtos
214b2(rnying rgyud): kyi na mkha' 'dra// mdzad pa'i rlabs kyi zhi ba ni// stongs pa'i bskal pa lta bur snang // thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa yang // gnas pa'i bskal pa lta bur snang // thugs rje'i dbang du mdzad pa
214b3(rnying rgyud): yang tan chags pa'i bskal pa lta bur snang // mngon par spyod pa mdzad pa ni// 'dzag pa'i bskal pa lta bu'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yon tan mi zad pa mdzod kyi bkod pa dang phrin las
214b4(rnying rgyud): rlabs kyis mdzad pa'i byin rlabs las snang bar rig par bya'o// / de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dang / 'a rnams gsang ba dam pa kho na nyid de byin gyis rlabs las
214b5(rnying rgyud): snang bar rig par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las spyod pa mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu lnga pa'o// / 
214b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po des nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las byin gyi rlabs kyi snang ba na yang 'byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa bdun pa'o// 
214b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i brgyad pa brgyud pa thabs kyis
214b8(rnying rgyud): grags pa na yang byung zhes 'byung ba la 'di skad ces dri ba yongasu dris so// kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa
215a1(rnying rgyud): gtan rgyud tu brjod pa'i skabs su brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji ltar brgyud cing gang du grags pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po
215a2(rnying rgyud): dgongs pas brgyud de tshig tu grags pas lha dang ma'i 'jig rten du snang bar gyur pa yin no// lang ka'i bdag po de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang gis gang la gang brgyud pa/ de bzhin nyid de de'o zhes
215a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po rgyal 'tshe ba la// dgongs pa gsang ba nges par brgyud// lha gnas ma yi 'jig rten du// gsang ba'i bdag po gang bgros pa// sngon du gnang 'byung skyes bu dag/ dman pa'i lus
215a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sems par grags// grags pa de yang jig gang // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// 'gro mgon rdo rje snang dpo yis// nag po rang thag 'khor ba can// gdul bya'i nang
215a5(rnying rgyud): du smin mdzad tshe// smin dang ma smin 'dus pa'i 'khor// kun nas 'dus par gyur pa la// yang dag gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs// lang ka'i bdag po de'i tshe de'i dus na yongs
215a6(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs par ngos ma zin pa'i sras de dag yongs su rdzogs par ngos bzung ba'i slad du gsung ba rnam par bskul ba// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs khyed yongs su rdzogs par ngos ma zin pa
215a7(rnying rgyud): ye nas yongs su rdzogs par ngos gzung ba'i phyir ma bcos pa'i dam tshig nye bar long cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
215a8(rnying rgyud): nyid nye bar gzung ba'i slad du ma bcos pa'i dam tshig ces bgyi ba de ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar nye bar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
215b1(rnying rgyud): pad 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gang ma bcos pa'i dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ma nor ma bcos dam tshig ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid la// blo bzhag de la mi 'da' ba/ rgyal ba rnams kyi dam tshig
215b2(rnying rgyud): go ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams shin tu skrag cing dngangs nas yongs su ma rangs te/ e ma'o sgyu ma'i bdag po zhig gis bdag cag bslus so// bdag cag so
215b3(rnying rgyud): so'i mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams bkag nas stong pa chen po la gtad pa 'di ni bdag cag so so rang rang gi dam tshig dang bral lo zhes zer te ngus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
215b4(rnying rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// kye mi'i thod pa can la sogs pa'i tshe dgas rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la kun gyis phul cig/ gang ma bcos
215b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig de la ni gang yang 'gag pa med pas yod sa su mi 'gog par snang ngo // de skad ces bka' stsa la pa las/ yongs su gzung ba'i sras rnams mgu zhing
215b6(rnying rgyud): rangs par gyur te mdangs phyung nas kun gyis rnam par 'dun te so so dga' ba'i dam tshig phul ba// nag po'i ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen
215b7(rnying rgyud): po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi dka' thub chen po yis// rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te/ gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa ni// bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig go
215b8(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol to// de nas 'dod chags can rnams kyi bdag po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dbang phyug chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ma dang bu mo sring / 
216a1(rnying rgyud): mo dang / rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bud med la// 'dod pa pas ni chags spyod pa// bdag cag rnams kyi tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams kyis 'di
216a2(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol pa// 'jigs byed chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can thams cad kyi// srog ni shin tu phrogs nas kyang // sha dang khrag la longs
216a3(rnying rgyud): spyod pa// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dzags byed chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di
216a4(rnying rgyud): lta ste/ nor gyi bdag po thams cad la// gser la sogs pa blangs nas ni// rang gi 'dod par longs spyod pa// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas
216a5(rnying rgyud): rtog pa can rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yid bzhin rtog pa'i rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'ja lta ste// gang gi mgo thod bcad nas ni// dge mtshan rtags de
216a6(rnying rgyud): su 'chang ba// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rigs ngan sme sha can rnams kyis tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// mang
216a7(rnying rgyud): thang rdzogs pa'i rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ba lang khyi sha rta sha dang // mi sha glang chen sha la sogs// zos na yon tan thams cad 'grub// bdag cag rnams kyi dang/ 
216a8(rnying rgyud): tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas srin mo khrag 'phrog ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// khrag mthung rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// srog chags dag ni
216b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag/ 'thungs na gzi bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas 'phra men ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces
216b2(rnying rgyud): tota cho 'phrul chen po'i mnga' bdag bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ thod rus rkang dang 'bru mar khrag/ chang dang a mri tar sbyar ba// rdzu 'phrul grub pa'i dam rdzas te// bdag cag rnams
216b3(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rigs ngan skyugs can rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gtum rnga ma chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// sha chen gshang
216b4(rnying rgyud): gci khu ba khrag/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i dam rdzas te// nang rna/ mas ma lus 'joms par byed// bdag cag rnams kyi dadam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas bud med rnams/ 
216b5(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sgeg po chen po ba dag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// bro gar glu tshig snyan ngags dang // 'jo tshul bstabs kyis yid
216b6(rnying rgyud): phrogs te// bsten pa thabs kyi 'khrig spyod pa// 'di dag dga' ba'i dam tshig ste// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas sho bar ba'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces/ 
216b7(rnying rgyud): gsol to// ngag gi dbang phyug bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// gzhan gyis dpag par dka' ba'i phyir// ngag gi sprul pa 'tsham smra ba// slu ba chen po'i mchog yin te// bdag
216b8(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// skyes bu yang dag chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ 
217a1(rnying rgyud): yang dag ngang du kun rig na// che chung las gnyis gang byas kyang // gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas gsang
217a2(rnying rgyud): tshig bsten pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gshang gci khrag dang sol khu gos// brgya 'am stong du gon nas ni// ling ka
217a3(rnying rgyud): bcad nas sangs rgyas 'jig/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i dam tshig go zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'gog pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa// gang
217a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir 'dus pa'i skal ldan kun// so so'i mos pa tha dad pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ni// yongs su rdzogs paradablang bar bya'o// gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms byed cing // mtshams
217a5(rnying rgyud): med lnga po spyod bzhin du// bdag nyid chen por dmigs pa de// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i snod du gsungs// ma dang bu me sring mo dang // rgyu ba'i bud med thams cad la// 'dod pa
217a6(rnying rgyud): bas ni chags spyad na// de dag 'grub pa'i snod du gsungs// gsod la dga' ba gang dag gi/ srog gi dbang po rgyun bcad nas// sha rus za zhing khrag 'thung ba// yang dag dam tshig chen po yin// 
217a7(rnying rgyud): nor gyi bdag po'i gter khungs nas// gser la sogs pa ma byin par// blangs nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa// 'di ni yang dag dam tshig yin// rnal 'byor rig pa'i blo can gyis// gang gis
217a8(rnying rgyud): mgo thod bcad nas ni// dur khrod snod la chos shes pa// yang dag lta ba'i dam tshig ste// 'dod pa'i dam tshig dam pa'o// ba lang khyi sha rta sha dang // sha chen glang po mchog yin te// rnal
217b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor chen po'i zas yin pas// gzhan ni bza' bar mi bya'o// dmar chen khrag gi rgya mtsho la// gang zhig 'thung bar byed pa de// khrag 'thung kun gyi dam tshig ste// zad par 'thung na gzi byin che// 
217b2(rnying rgyud): bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas// bud med thams cad bsten nas ni// 'dod pas log par spyod 'gyur ba// chos nyid dam tshig chen po yin// gang nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir// med
217b3(rnying rgyud): les yod smra yod las med// yul la 'thun 'jug brdzun smra ba// sangs rgyas bka' yi dam tshig yin// gang dag thog ma med pa nas// gang 'khyams rang gis nyes pa'o zhes// spro brgyad/ 
217b4(rnying rgyud): ngag ni brdzun smra ba// sangs rgyas gsung gi dam tshig yin// bye brag thams cad gcig pas na// las kyi dbang du da mi 'gyur ba// ma nor ma bcos dam tshig ste// rnam smin
217b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dam tshig yin// mi g.yo mi 'gyur mi skyod pa// migs pas yod med mi dmigs kyang // stor ba med du gang yin pa// mi g.yo'i dam tshig chen po'o// de nyid chen
217b6(rnying rgyud): por kun gcig pas// blang dang dor ba yong med de// gnyis su snang ba'i chos rnams kun// de nyid chen por yongs kyis gcig/ dkar po nag po gang 'di la// rgyu dang 'bras bu so so
217b7(rnying rgyud): yang nata na mkha' bzhin te med pas na// mnyam pa'i dam tshig chen po yin// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rgyal po las bye brag rnam pa yongs kyis med// rang gis snyed la gzhan gyis min// 
217b8(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung chen po'i dam tshig yin// gshang gci zag pa'i gos gyon te// ling ga skye ba rgyun bcad na// skye ba rnam grangs brgya snyed du/ bzlas na de nyid der sbyar na// sangs rgyas gzug
218a1(rnying rgyud): sku ji snyed pa// chos sku nyid du 'jig 'gyur na// rdo rje sngags kyi dam tshig yin// 'dod pas spyod pa'i longs spyod lnga// 'dod pa bas ni chags spyang na// chos nyid rgyan gyi dam
218a2(rnying rgyud): tshig ste// bde ba chen po nyid kyi dam zhes bka' stsal pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams rab tu mgu zhing rangs nas kun gyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa// e ma'o yid bzhin mjed
218a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa rang so// bdag cag rnams kyi gtso bo lags so// bdag cag rnams kyi rgyal po lags so// bdag cag ma bcos pa'i dam tshig tu gzung du
218a4(rnying rgyud): gsol zhes gsol pa las// lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ a ho/ yin no// legs so// gtad do// dam tshig dam pa de nye bar zung
218a5(rnying rgyud): shig/  tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes gang de nyid las mi 'ad bar gzung ngo // lang ka'i bdag po de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ bco
218a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag rnams kyi sgron ma lags na// bdag cag rnams rang rang gi dam tshig 'di la gnas na rigs ni gang 'dzin par 'gyur// go 'phang ni
218a7(rnying rgyud): gang du thob par 'gyur ba lags// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa las// lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// 'dus tshogs rang
218a8(rnying rgyud): rang gi dam tshig la gnas na ji ltar 'gyur ba dag bshad kyis nyon cig/ e ma'o thod pa can gyi tshogs// khyed kyis smras pa tshig 'di rnams// mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te/ 
218b1(rnying rgyud): nam yang grol bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag yang dag ces smras pa// yang dag nyid kyang mdud pa ste// mdud pa dgrol bar ma byas na// thar ram byed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshams med la sogs
218b2(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang // gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yis// rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur te// 'di ni bdud kyi las zhes bshad// chags pa'i las sam sbyor ba dag/ chags pa'i dbang gis der rmongs
218b3(rnying rgyud): tetata de dag de yi grong khyer du// gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin// gang du sdang bas gsod pa'i las// gang gi lus la srog phral nas// shan pa gsod pa'i rigs dag tu// ltung 'gyur
218b4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin// rgyal ba rnams ni rnam dag pas// gang che bder gshegs rgyal ba'i zhal// smad pa'i rdzas da ni sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bstabs pa gang byas pa// de tshe
218b5(rnying rgyud): las ni rnam smin gyis// thar med nad kyis gzung nas ni// ngan skyugs 'dam du bying bar 'gyur// sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas// rku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste// gang gis
218b6(rnying rgyud): zos pa'i lus rnams la// dri yis 'tsho ba kun 'dus nas// mdangs dang bcud rnams 'phrog par byed// des ni gzi mdangs yal byed 'gyur// de nyid rin chen yod bzhin du// gzhan gyi rin chen
218b7(rnying rgyud): spyod len pa// log pas log par 'tsho ba'i chos// 'di dag mdud pa dam po yin// dkar nag las la khyad med zhes// thams cad khra bor spyod pa ni// rigs med rigs chad log pa'i rigs// / 
218b8(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu log pa'i khams su 'gyur// bder gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la// yan lag tshig tu ma dag na// nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni// gang gi dus rnams thams cad du// dbang po
219a1(rnying rgyud): yan lag ma tshang zhing // dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur// bder gshegs rgyal bsgom zlos pa// cha 'thun bcos pa'i cho 'phrul ltar// gang gis der brtags der red
219a2(rnying rgyud): nas dad las kyi srin po rig 'dzin yin// rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun// gang gis de dang der brtags na// bram ze mi sdug lugs rig 'dzin// chu srin nya sogs yan lag 'byung // ting 'dzin
219a3(rnying rgyud): rtog pa thams cad kun// gang gis de dang der rtags na// ci yang rtog cing chags pa yi// 'dzin pa'i phur pa chen por 'gyur// aHdang hUM la sogs pa yi// rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun// 
219a4(rnying rgyud): de dag so sor der brtags na// tsan dan sbrul gdug la so// dgas pa// ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gags chen yin// khwa dag la sogs pa'i rdzas chen lnga// dngos po kho nar der brtags
219a5(rnying rgyud): na// 'byung po khrag gi dri snom pa'i// lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yin// ma mo rngam pa'i cha lugs su// gang gi rtog pa der bzung na// srin mo ma sdug sha za mor// lang ka'i
219a6(rnying rgyud): yul du de dag 'khor/ mtshan ma'i mgo brnyan bla dgas can// de 'drar gang gis nges brtag na// sho gam gnas kyi gcan chen rigs// 'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur// las kyi
219a7(rnying rgyud): dbang btsan bran mo'i tshogs// de 'dra nyid du nges brtags na// gnod sbyin nag mo'i tshigs su 'gyur// gzhan gyi tshe la 'tsha ba yin// des na mdud pa dam po 'di// bskur du lci ba'i gdos
219a8(rnying rgyud): yin te// log par lta bas mig long bas// sems kyi nor bu rin chen de// rtag chad khams su stor bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa las// 'dus pa'i tsho gas de dag rtog pa'i nad kyi zin
219b1(rnying rgyud): cing rang rang gi dam tshig las log par rig nas// e ma'o sgyu ma'i bdag pos ni bdag cag bslus so zhes rma ga chad nas ngus so// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye
219b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag rang rang gi rgyud la rnam par ltos shig ces bka' stsal pa las// 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag gis las kyi rgyud bya ba ji lta bu yin pa bltas na thams cad me long nang
219b3(rnying rgyud): gi gzugs brnyan bzhin snang bar gyur te// lang ka'i bdag po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni log pa'i dka'
219b4(rnying rgyud): thub tu gyur par nges na 'di dag nyid yang dag pa'i dka' thub tu mdzad par gsol// ji ltar rang rang gi dam chi gi rnams ma bkag par spyod bzhin du chos nyid kyi dka'
219b5(rnying rgyud): thub tu mdzad du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na// bdag cag ni rang rang gi dka' thub la chags shing zhen pa lag sa so// chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu da cir yang 'gyur
219b6(rnying rgyud): ba lags so// theg pa chen po'i sgo ni bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu lags so// de bzhin du na mkha' lta bu dang // sa chen po lta bu dang // rlung chen po lta bu lags so// sangs rgyas bcom
219b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ni thabs rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag lags pas so so mos pa ji lta ba bzhin bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las// lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des dgyes pa chen po'i
219b8(rnying rgyud): bzhad pa mdzad nas kye rigs kyi bu dag theg pa chen po'i don de ltar zhu ba ni legs na// 'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang the tsom skye ba yin na// khyed rnams
220a1(rnying rgyud): lta ci smos// de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom skye bar bgyid pa ni nges pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gang sangs rgya
220a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nges pa can lags na nges pa ma mchis pa'i chos 'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs
220a3(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad nges pa med par nga smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thar zug tu red pa'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// de bas na khyed rnams kyi rang rang gi dam tshig la yang nges pa med de// skye
220a4(rnying rgyud): ba 'di las gzhan dpag tu med pa blangs pa dang len pa'i skabs su so so'i skye ba tha dad pa de bzhin du mos pa dang // las dang / skal ba dang / gnas dang / sde dang / sha
220a5(rnying rgyud): tshugs dang / rigs dang / kha dog dang / 'tsho ba dang / lta ba dang / spyod pa tha dad na/ nga khyed kyis nges par gang lan zung // de'i phyir chos thams cad nges pa med par nga smra'o// / 
220a6(rnying rgyud): / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ 'o na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig rnams nges par bzung na ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa
220a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'di lta ste/ mtshams med lnga yi dam tshig ni// dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje lnga// bar mtshams med par rgyun mi gcad// 'di ni mtshams
220a8(rnying rgyud): med dam tshig yin// chags pa chen po'i dam tshig ni// 'khor ba dang ni chos nyid las// shes rab snying rje mi gtong ba// 'di ni chags pa'i dam tshig yin// ma dang bu mo sring mo ni// chos nyid
220b1(rnying rgyud): dang ni ye shes lnga// rang las byung ba'i shes rab ni// de bzhin nyid kyi gzungs su bshad// gang la skye ba med bstan na// srog gi dbang po mi len pa'i// skye ba'i rgyun mi chad pa dang // thams cad stong pa
220b2(rnying rgyud): bcom pa ni// srog bcad pa zhes de la bya// dngos po med las dngos por ston// dngos por snang la med smra ba// rgyal ba kun gyi bka' yin te// slu ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// gzhan gyi
220b3(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu la// rjes su mos pa'i 'od zer gyis// blangs nas byang chub 'jog pa dang // de nyid lcags kyus len pa ni// ma byin len pa'i dam tshig yin// de nyid chen po de 'dod pas// 
220b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar zhen las log spyod pa// 'dod pas log par spyod pa ste// sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam ni dag ting 'dzin shes rab dang // sems nyid snying rje chen po
220b5(rnying rgyud): lda/ ka chen// gang gci khu ba khrag/ rnam pa lnga po sbyar ba 'di// chos rnams kun gyi yo byad yin// yo byad 'di dang ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// log
220b6(rnying rgyud): par 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang // lta dang nyon mongs las nyon mongs// 'dod pa bdun lnga nyid sbyar te// de la'ang de skad bsgrags pa ste// 'khor ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// log par spyod pa'i
220b7(rnying rgyud): lta ba lnga// sme sha lA zhes grags pa ste// des na lta ba mi gtsang bas// yang dag lta las ltos na skye// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas// 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag
220b8(rnying rgyud): gis skye ba med pa'i don mthong bas shin tu yang ngo mtshar bar gyur te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na bdag cag gi dam tshig 'di rnams theg pa chen por ma gsol tam/ 
221a1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tshogs so so'i dam tshig rnams theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par ni ma bkag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma bkag
221a2(rnying rgyud): pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar nam pa'i rang bzhin du// snang sring ma bkag snang ba bzhin// theg pa chen po'i na mkha' 'dir// lte spyod thams
221a3(rnying rgyud): cad ma bkag ste// de'i phyir thams cad nam khar snang zhes gsungs pas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad ngam zhing ngo mtshar du gyur te dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen
221a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis kyidag thos nas ngu// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yun gyi don srid chen po 'di lta bu bdag cag la sngar ma bstan
221a5(rnying rgyud): bathugs rje chung zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tshigs rang gin mkha' de/ rang rang gi mun pa glo bur rabs bsgribs
221a6(rnying rgyud): par zad kyi/ rang rang gi rnamapa' nyid du snang ba la gang gis gang la bstan cing dgos shes smras pas/ gang gis mi rig pa gang yin pa de nyid rig par 'gyur te/ brag pa ni bskums/ 
221a7(rnying rgyud): yan lags la brdabs nas lus gang ni khyer phul te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spyong zhing rna bas chos nyan pas shes bya'i sgrib pa spyod ste/ rigs 'dzin lus kyi seng ge dang / rta dang glang
221a8(rnying rgyud): la tshogs pa'i nabs kyi gdam gror byab yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mang chen po 'is rmongs pa'i sil baspyod 'thun dgrol ba'i le'u / 
221b1(rnying rgyud): sum bcu drug pa'o// / bam po drug par drug pa'o// de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongs su dri 'dris pa/ 
221b2(rnying rgyud): kye gsang ba ba'i badrug po gang gis gang la brgyud de grags pa'i gsang bdam pa de sngon du byung ba spyad pa spyod pa grags pa'i gtam rgyud ji skad brjod pa rnam par brjod pa lags nes smras pa/ 
221b3(rnying rgyud): las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ki'i bdag po sngon du byung ba'i gtam rgyud gsang ba dam pa spyod pa spyod par grags pa ni 'dra lta ste// gang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
221b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dam pa gang gis spyad pas legs pa dang / nyes pa'i spyod pa ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi// de skad ces
221b5(rnying rgyud): gsol ba dang / lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngag sa dam pa gang gis spyad pa spyod pa ni rab tu dka' bar shes
221b6(rnying rgyud): par bgyi shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba dam pa ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste/ ji ltar ma ni rgyun tu bcangs shing spyad legs na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun du spyad pa 'dod pa 'byung ngo // me
221b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du spyad nyes na ma'i phung po chen por gyur te/ gang spyod par byed pa de yang bsregs/ khyim nas khyim yang bsregs/ rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang chog par
221b8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/ chu gang gi thabs kyis zin na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung ngo // gang chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la mi mkhas pa ni gang spyod
222a1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa de nyid g.yang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gsang ba dam pa 'di ni gdug pa'i gcan gzan dang 'dra ste/ gang gdug pa'i gcan gzan ni gzhan gyi srog gcod
222a2(rnying rgyud): par byed cing gzhan dag 'joms par byed na yang / gang thabs la mkhas pa de ji lta ba bzhin dbang du 'du'o// gang thabs kyis ma zin na ni rang gi srog la 'bab par byed do// gzhan yang
222a3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/ gang ji ltar thabs kyis zin na rin po che de la dga' bder spyad du yod la/ gang gi thabs kyis ma zin na tshe dang
222a4(rnying rgyud): bral bar byed do// gzhan yang ldum bu lang tang tshe dang 'dra/ da ste/ gang gis thabs kyis zin na tshad nad drag po yang gcod par byed la// gang thabs kyis ma zin na srog dang
222a5(rnying rgyud): 'bral bar yang byed de/ de ltar na gang thabs kyis zin pa ni dug 'gyur rtsi dang / gser 'gyur rtsi dang / mun 'gyurar gyi sgron ma bzhin du chung ngus chen po 'joms par nus
222a6(rnying rgyud): te/ gang phyin ci ma logs par nges pa nyid kyis thams cad de kho na nyid du 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de lta bas na gsang ba dam pa 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon du byung bar
222a7(rnying rgyud): spyad par spyod pa dag gsang ba dam pa ngos ma zin pas log pa'i lam du byung ba yang yod do// gang thabs la mkhas pas ngos zin pa ma nor ba'i lam du byung ba yang yod pas 'dus
222a8(rnying rgyud): po chen po tshogs gang gsang ba dam pa ngos zin pa'i thabs kyi sprin chen pos spyad pa spyod pa la mkhas par bgyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis
222b1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang du gsang sngags log pa'i lam pa ni gang lags// gang ma nor ba'i lam pa ni gang lags/ bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol
222b2(rnying rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste// brgyud de grags pas gang
222b3(rnying rgyud): spyod pa/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// ji lta de ltar gtan la dbab// 'di ni yang dag gsang ba'i lam// gang du log pa'i chos rnams dang / gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po gnyis
222b4(rnying rgyud): btags pa ming gi sgra gcig phyir// nges pa'i rtags de zin par bya// theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags 'di// 'thun 'jug thabs kyi sgrar bstan pas// phyi rol gzhan du
222b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur srid phyir// tshig dang ngag la don mi bzhag/ dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di/ dpe'am tshad ma gtan tshigs sam// / rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis// 
222b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// dgongs don gsang ba'i snying po la// gang gi blo ni ma 'byor par// su zhig smra bar brtson pa de// ma smras na ni mi 'tsho 'am ci// de bzhin spyod dang ldan pa
222b7(rnying rgyud): dang da grub dang rtog dpyod byed pa rnams// don la nges blo ma rnyed par// ma spyad na ni ci zhig nyes// ci phyir gsang sngags rgya mtsho 'di// dper na gang gi sbrid bsangs bzhin// dam pa'i
222b8(rnying rgyud): tshig re re la'ang // don ni tha dad du mar 'byung // des na gsang sngags dam nga'i don// ma rtogs bzhin du gang sgre ba// gang gis mtshams med lnga byas pas// log sgra'i sdig de de bas
223a1(rnying rgyud): lcid da gsang ba nyid la gol ba yi// gsang bar smra ba'i log sred can// gsang sngags chogs zin gyur na// gang gis 'tsho ba srog bcad kyang // de ni nyes pas mi
223a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhes// log par kha lo sgyur ba 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bram ze 'tshe ba'i log sred can// log sgra rgyu spyod dbang sgyur ba'o// gang 'dir log par
223a3(rnying rgyud): spyod rgyas pas// kun kyang log pa nyid la 'jug/ de la gsang bar sgra mtshon nas// gsang sngags de la mngon spyod 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du
223a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan 'byung log sred can// de min 'dra gzhan spyod pa'o// / gang du 'di ltar log pa'i chos// gsang sngags de dam pa'i tshig dang sgra// gcig la mi gcig so so la// 
223a5(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa'i mun par gang spyod pa// sngags pa bdud kyi la sa byed de// shi nas dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ ci phyi ra lta bas ma zin phyir// bdud dang srin po'i spyod pa la/ 
223a6(rnying rgyud): dga' mgur spyod cing 'dod dgur 'jom// de la bag chags zhen pa'i mthus// dmyal bar 'bar ba brgyad kyi yang // rdo rje dmyal ba chen por ltung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i
223a7(rnying rgyud): dus na ston byung ba// log pa'i stobs ldan ya mtshan can// log zhen sdug bsngal spyi gtsug pa'o// e ma'i 'gro ba rnam mi grol// ci phyir 'ong ba'i dus rnams su// g.yo can bcos pa'i
223a8(rnying rgyud): gsang tshig gis// dri med gsang ba'i bstan pa rnams// dkrugs 'gyur bka'i bslad gzung bor nas// don med log chos rgyas par 'gyur// gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te// rtsa ba nyid la/ 
223b1(rnying rgyud): gyur par zad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// 'di par ma gyur bslad pa can// de rgyud ngan pas de nyid bslad// nga yi yid bzhin nor bu 'di// cir yang ston la dpag pa'i
223b2(rnying rgyud): phyir ta ma 'ongs dus na log spyod kyis// log brtags log sde mang po 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ lam log lam stor la mnyes pa/ log zhen log sde
223b3(rnying rgyud): drug brgyud pa'o// gang la log zhen log dbang gis// log blos log mthong gtsor bzung nas// lta sgo kun tu mi 'jug cing // rmongs pa'i lta bas bstan par gnas// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 
223b4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// log lta gcig tu zhen sem/ sa pa// char ka nag po kun rmongs pa'o// gang 'dir bcings pa lngas bcings nas// rang gi che ba'i thabs bzung
223b5(rnying rgyud): sted/ rtog dpyod tsam yang mi 'jug pa// glang chen mos pa rmongs 'dra 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i du san sngon byung ba// bdag nyid gcig pur chos smra ba// log
223b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs gcig pur spyod pa'o// gang dung mus long lam zhugs pa// yid kyis gom pa'i tshad dpag nas// nyam nga'i lam du rgyug pa ltar// tshong dpag tsam la gtsor 'dzin 'byung // de yang
223b7(rnying rgyud): ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du mun pas zin pa yi// brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin lnga sde pa'o// lung mod rnal 'byor sgom pa dang / chos med chos su smra ba dang // sdig
223b8(rnying rgyud): can smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la// dpa' brtul spyod pa cher spyod 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang gi chad mas ma gzhal ba'i// mu tshor sna bsde bzhi
224a1(rnying rgyud): don med 'dug la brtson pa dang // lugs ma la sogs gzugs brnyan dag/ dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa yi// gang du rags pa'i ri bo 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dra/ 
224a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du rgyu ba kun bkag pa// mnyam par 'jug pa bdun sde pa'o// sbas pa'i don rnams sgrar bsgyur nas// dpyod khongs tsam du byed pa rnams// steng du mi 'bab gol
224a3(rnying rgyud): sar 'gro// sku gsung thugs kyi slu byed yin// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na// de skad gsang ba mchog des bshad// gzhan yang thabs ldan 'di lta ste// de nas 'khor der 'dus gyur pa'i// 
224a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor theg pa mchog spyod po'i// tshangs pa'i 'od ces/ bya ba la// gang der mos pa chung spyod pa'i// rnal 'byo// grags ldan zhes bya bas// 'di skad gal du dri ba dris// dam
224a5(rnying rgyud): par spyod pa tshangs pa'i 'od// gang 'dir dam pa spyod don/ sa// shin tu dman pa'i las spyod pa// de yi sman paHdang phyir// mun pa snang bar mi 'gyur zhing // dman pa dam
224a6(rnying rgyud): par ga la 'gyur// dper na mtho sar bgrod 'dod pa// gzhol phyogs lam du 'bab pa bzhi no// go 'phang chen po mthong 'dod pa// ngan 'gro ya nga'i rgyud du bzhugs// gang zhig
224a7(rnying rgyud): btung ba'i chu 'dod pa// mig rgyu bsnyags pas tshim med ltar// dman pa dam par smin 'dod pa// mnyam la dman spyod 'gyur ma yin// sbrul 'bras khyung gis brnas 'gyur yang // phyin
224a8(rnying rgyud): ci log 'gyur mi srid pas// de nyid kho nar snang ba bzhin// dman pa dam par 'gyur mi srid// gang gi gsang ba las log pa'o// gang 'dir log spyod dman pa dag/ thams cad rang bzhi/ 
224b1(rnying rgyud): med stong pas// nyon spongs byang chub stong mnyam zer// 'tsho ba'i sman dang 'chi ba'i dug/ 'byung bas bskyed par rgyu gcig kyang // 'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa'i mthu// de nyid mi mthun so sor
224b2(rnying rgyud): snang ta des na gang 'dir la la zhig/ 'byung bas bskyod pas gcig mnyam zhes// dus kyang za zhig btung nga mi ci// de bzhin dam pa dam pa'i las// rang bzhin med par don gcig
224b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // mnyam zhes dam pa nyid bzhag cing // dman pa tshod du spyod dam ci// des na dam pa dman pa dang // gtsang dang mi gtsang che chung gnyis// bzang ngan bde sdug la sogs dang // bsti gnas
224b4(rnying rgyud): spyad byar snyom med pa// mnyam sbyor rtags spyod yin zhe na// dug dang kha zas bde sdug rnams// mi mnyam mnyam par ga la snyoms// ma bcos mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// 
224b5(rnying rgyud): glo bur las kyis mi mnyam ste// na mkha' dri med ye nas gsal// dag par bya phyir 'khru 'dod 'dra'o// gang du nad rnams 'joms pa'i sman// nad med rnams kyi dug
224b6(rnying rgyud): du 'gyur// lta log 'jig rten drang ba'i thabs// rnal mar spyad na nyes par nges/ 'thun 'jug spyod pa drang ba'i thabs// gang gi dbang du spyod byed pa// gang stobs rig dang ldan pa yis// 
224b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'thun bcos nas 'thun 'gyur bzhin// tshig 'thun don ldan dam pa yis// ji ltar rigs pa de ltar nges// de ltar zhum pas khe bkam gyi// grags pa 'dod phyir rjeng med par// 
224b8(rnying rgyud): g.yul zhugs stobs rig 'gran bzlas na// gzhan dbang de nyid rlag par 'gyur// de bzhin dam par bcos pa yis// khe dang grags pa rlom sems phyir// leg sred drang ba'i 'thun
225a1(rnying rgyud): spyod la// yang dag dam par nges bzung nas// tshig gi lam nyid skur spyad na// bdag phung gzhan brlag dman par nges// thams cad gang gi theg tshad dang // go dang rtogs
225a2(rnying rgyud): dang nus tshad dang // gang du 'dul tshad ma gtogs pa// chad las 'das na yul med de// 'das na 'das pa nyid du 'gyur// gang yang tshad las 'das pa ni// zas kyang dug du 'gyur bzhin
225a3(rnying rgyud): dun da dug chen za ba'i nyen pa de// dam pas kyang ni mi rigs so// gang dag gang gis bcings pa las// de nyid ma grol ma thar bar// thams cad thams cad bsgral ba yi// slu ba chen po
225a4(rnying rgyud): de ci zhig/ de nyid ma rig ma grol zhing // de yi sems dgam byung na// sangs rgyas sa la des bzhag kyang // de nyid ma thong ba dmyal ba'i gnas// de rig de yi don ldan na// 
225a5(rnying rgyud): dmyal chen de dag zhing khams dag/ gsang ba'i snying po kun khyab kyang // de rig de dang ma ldan na// long ba'i ma/ dun du gzugs bstan ltar// gti mug 'khor ba'i
225a6(rnying rgyud): mun pa yin// de skad gal du dris pa las// tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba yi// rnal 'byor dam pa theg chen pos// rnal 'byor mos pa chung spyod pa// grags pa'i tshul ldan bya ba la// dam
225a7(rnying rgyud): par nges pa'i tshig smras pa// gang 'dir mos pa chung 'dzin gyi// grags pa'i tshul 'dzin bya ba khyod// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas nyid 'di ma gtogs pa// gang gi
225a8(rnying rgyud): spyod yul ma yin pas// tshul 'dra tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// gang 'dir dang mos 'dod nus no// de nyid de la der bltas na// de la de sbyor de nyid de// de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin// gang
225b1(rnying rgyud): 'dir theg pa mang bshad pa// tha dad yod pa ma yin te// mos pa tha dad drang ba'i phyir// thabs kyi sgo ni mang por bshad// de kun mos pa ma bkag pa'i// dran pa'i thabs du sbyar bas na// 
225b2(rnying rgyud): kun la nges pa'i blo mi bzhag/ gang du nges pa gcig nyid la'o// kun shong kun 'jug 'di bde bas// theg pa chen po brjod pa yin// theg pa che dang thabs mang bas// thams cad gang
225b3(rnying rgyud): yang 'gog pa med// gang mi 'gog par 'jug lam bde// bde ba nyid la spyad par sla// thabs dang theg pa'i bye brag rnams// so so mi mthun tha dad kyang // thabs kyi nges pa spyod pas na// 
225b4(rnying rgyud): nges pa nyid na khyad par med// dam tshig bsgrub pa spyod pa dang // lta ba sna tshogs tha dad kun// dud 'gro yid/ gas mi ma yin// ngan skyugs ched du byed la sogs// 
225b5(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log tu bltas pa rnams// dam pa'i don la gzu dpa'i phyir// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad kyang // yid nyid rdo rjer gcig dgongs nas// sna tshogs kun dang 'thun
225b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug phyir// sbyar nas bsten bring drang ba dang // khrid pa'i thabs su sbyar bar zad// 'jig rten kun gyi dman pa rnams// sna tshogs dam par drang ba'i phyir// dman pa'i lha
225b7(rnying rgyud): spyod mtha' yas pas// yongs su rdzogs par byed par zad// sbrul sgong khyung du mi 'gyur yang // 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman bzhin du// dman pa kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ma
225b8(rnying rgyud): bcos shes na dman par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyis dbyings nyid la// ngan 'gro go 'phang mthon dman med// nyon mongs byang chub tha dad kyang // stong pa nyid la de gnyis med// 
226a1(rnying rgyud): dug dang sman gnyis so so yang // 'byung ba dag la de gnyis med// ma 'dres sna tshogs tha dad kyang // kun gyi rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs// gang 'dir dam par
226a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur nges na// dman pa'i las rnams ched du spyad// de nyid ma mthong gang dag gis// tshig brdal lam gyi rjes 'brangs pas// yang dag lam las gol ba yi// log pa'i lam pa sha
226a3(rnying rgyud): dag 'byung // lang ka'i bdag po de skad du// tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba des// grags pa'i tshul dang ldan pa yi// dri ba chung ngu the tshom bcad// ces gsang ba'i bdag po des lang ka'i mnga'
226a4(rnying rgyud): bdag la smras pas// gang du mos pa chung ngu'i sems can rnams theg pa chen po nyid du nges par grol bar gyur te// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen
226a5(rnying rgyud): po las gang gi dri ba the tsom gcad pa'i le'u ste sum pa/ cu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'
226a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lang ka' bdag po khe bo dran pa thog ma'i tshe// kho bo'i ston pa gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor dam pa de'i nang du gsang
226a7(rnying rgyud): ba brgyud pa'i grags pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ nga yi dgongs pa skabs gcig na// gsang ba'i bdag po don 'di dag/ ma nor ba nyid nub par gyur// 
226a8(rnying rgyud): tshul lam bcos tsam gang dag le// phal cher don du spyod mod kyi// don du nges pa ngas ma mthong // kun kyang log pa'i lam la spyod// gang du log pa ji gang na// 'di la mi gnas 'di
226b1(rnying rgyud): nyams dang // 'di la log dang log tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir ma nges// g.yo sgyus bden 'drar bcos log gam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bskal pa kun
226b2(rnying rgyud): bkod bya ba la// sangs rgyas mngon 'byung rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu// byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang ldan de// mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshul bcos log pa'i sngags/ 
226b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pas// lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa de// don las gol cing 'khor bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul 'byung der me spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i snying po
226b4(rnying rgyud): 'did/ rnal 'byor dbang sgyur tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas skabs dag du// mi shes ngan rtog can rnam/ nas kyis// log brtags don bslang gzhung bor te// nor
226b5(rnying rgyud): pas bdag nyid sum 'byin cing // 'di yin gzhan rtogs mas na zhes// bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bskal pa de yi dus nyid la// rnal 'byor pas
226b6(rnying rgyud): byin bya ba zhig/ don la blo shed ma bya zhing // gos kyi thos la mi mkhas pas// blo gros nges pa'i gzhung bor nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos spyod cing // nges pa'i gros ldan gzhan dag lo// de ltar
226b7(rnying rgyud): ma nges blo gros ni// bdag gis blo gros 'di yin zhes// mngon pa'i nga rgyal cher spyod pa// 'di ni sring log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gnod 'dul 'di lta ste// 
226b8(rnying rgyud): sngar drung chud kyi rjes gnas pas// rdeng med bzhin du dben pasgrubs nas/ tshig ginyir dregs pa'i dbang nges ni// mi shes bzhin du ris spyong pa// tshul 'chos sems kyi sa mu na// hU~M/ 
227a1(rnying rgyud): thabs blun po'i sdig can yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// kun bkod grags pa de nyid la// tshul brtags 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dri med
227a2(rnying rgyud): spyod ces bya ba zhig/ sngar byung mkhas pa rjes su gnang // khri phrag bcu yi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjes su byung ba yi// don med rnal 'byor de nyid la// tshig gi khur chen ljid phab nas// 
227a3(rnying rgyud): rigs rgyud 'dzin par dpon bstabs te// che bas che ba'i drags pa skyed// mi shes bzhin du tshul 'chos te// 'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas// 'khor bcas dregs pa'i ru drar lhung // de
227a4(rnying rgyud): 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gnod 'dul ga/ sang ba'i bdag/ mdza' 'drin bsdang ster zhing rnams/ dang // rnyed dang bkur stis 'tshe ba'i 'khor// gzhan dngang
227a5(rnying rgyud): nyid du 'gyur dogs nas// ris dang tshem sde so sor gcod// 'di dag bdag gis gdul bya yi// 'byor pas 'gyu ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag gang 'dir ma 'du zhes// 
227a6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed nor// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du grags pa de nyid la// na zhin zhes bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas// shin
227a7(rnying rgyud): tu gsang sngags cher spyod ces// dgon pa'i rgyun tu dben gnas te// gang gi ljongs chen de dag ni// gnas pas gnas pa de dag kun// kha gsag thabs rgyung zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde bar
227a8(rnying rgyud): gyur pa yi// rnal 'byor mig ldan don mthong zhing // gang de tshad du gnyer 'ongs nas// don dam nges lam de kho na// rgyas par bstan du brtsams pa las// dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin
227b1(rnying rgyud): pas tad nyon mongs log pa'i sgo ba byas// 'di khams bdag gi zhing yin gyi// kho na ngo bo nyid deng shig/ tshan dang gzhan gyi ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du ltung // de 'dra'i tshul
227b2(rnying rgyud): byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gdul dka'i 'dul ba yi// rnal 'byor dam par bsngos rgyu la// bdag gir 'dod spyod gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar/ 
227b3(rnying rgyud): logs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags pa kun bkon de nyid la 'der shes zhes ni bya ba yi// rnal 'byor zhen chags 'khor dang bcas// 
227b4(rnying rgyud): sngags chog sgra yi rjes spyod las// de yi 'khor der 'du sa nas gyur pa yi// bud med bzang rgyan bya ba zhig/ 'tsho ba 'dzin par sbyar ba las// sar snas gsog
227b5(rnying rgyud): 'jog byas pa yis// yi dgas khyi'i lus blangs te// dman pa'i lus su gtan du 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyad// gzhan yang gsang bdag gnod
227b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul la// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log lta spyi ba rtol gtum khro che// sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang // bdag 'di nges pa kho na zhes// bab tshol bka' rkun slu byed
227b7(rnying rgyud): bslang// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// chos skyong ba yi rnal 'byor pa// pra ma ta zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang lam la ma mthong bar// bdag ni lam mkhan kho na
227b8(rnying rgyud): zhes te/  kun la rgya cher grags pa las// rgyal ba'i bka'i rkun 'gro gong rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i sman pa yis// ngan 'gror bying gyur gnas de nas// thar nas log pa'i 'jig
228a1(rnying rgyud): rten pa// bdag 'dzin spyod pa'i gnas su ltung // de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'dul ba po// tha tshig nyams shing don la rmugs// grags
228a2(rnying rgyud): pas de la khas 'tshe phyir// rgyal po'i rgyal so thob 'dod pa// khrel med spyi brtol mun sprul 'tshal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du grags pa de nyid la// 
228a3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// ben pa ya bya ba zhig/ brgya yi sde dang bcas pa byung // rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don dang ldan par tshul chos
228a4(rnying rgyud): phyirate/ rgyal po'i rgyal thabs che blangs pas// ri bos srog/ chags mnan pa pa ni// nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa// gti mug phag gi
228a5(rnying rgyud): lus su ltung // de 'dra'i tshul 'byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// mnyam pa'i don nyid mchub par// mnyam zhes tshig gi lam 'byin zhing // 
228a6(rnying rgyud): chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'tshal pa// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid la// bde sbyin zhes
228a7(rnying rgyud): ni bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor stong gi 'khor dang bcas// gsang ba dam par nges so zhes// sten khrid chags sdang gnyis la 'tshal// de nyid yongs su smin pa yis// rak+Sha srin po'i khams su
228a8(rnying rgyud): ltung / de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste// rnal 'byor gang dag blo chung rnams// rnal 'byor gang dag don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag
228b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// spa zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid la// lha sbyin de zhes bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor las
228b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dang po'i tshe// rnal 'byor nges don mang po gzhan// nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na// lha sbyin 'khor bcas de las byol// nor pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes// rang gi gnas
228b3(rnying rgyud): der ngan du brjod// de yis bskal pa dpag med du// yang dag don gol log par 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// rnal 'byor
228b4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi rnal 'byor la// rnon po gdug pa'i dug mnga'// gtong // tha tshigs brtsan po rdzong lta bu// 'joms de byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe
228b5(rnying rgyud): nad/ rnal 'byor blo gros bya ba zhig/ mi 'jigs zhes bya ba yi rnal 'byor pa// don med bcos par spyod pa de / blo gros dam pa 'dus par gyur// bzod ldan de la
228b6(rnying rgyud): ngan sems kyis// skur btab kha na ma tho brjod// des ni mi 'jigs mnar med ltung // de 'dra'i tshul byung dor ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'jig nyon cig/ lta ba'i dmigs bu
228b7(rnying rgyud): dang bral nas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal// spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rnal 'byor long po'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po rab tu gsal 'dzin pa// rnal 'byor
228b8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rjes zhugs te// shes rab lta ba mig med par// rnal 'byor mong tsam tshul bzung nas// sgra thos rjes su tshul spyad pas// gti mug mun pa'i khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul/ 
229a1(rnying rgyud): / byung der ma spyod// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ thams cad 'khor ba'i lam par ltung // des na gsang ba'i snying po 'di// gol sa che bar rgyal bas bshad// des na
229a2(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa dang // blo gros dam pa shin tu gces// thabs mkhas blo gros ldan pa yi// nges par legs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// rtsal chen rnams kyi bcad rgyud 'di
229a3(rnying rgyud): skyes bu dam pa'i spyod yul te// yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang bde thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// shin tu gsang ba'i snying po
229a4(rnying rgyud): 'di dang ma byung ba yi sngon dus na// lha gnas gsum du da grags pa las// lha yi bu ni 'od ldan te// mi rtag 'chi de ba'i dus bab nas// sngon byung snga ltas byung ba na// mi bde bar
229a5(rnying rgyud): ni 'du shes gyur// ma 'ongs 'du shes bzhag pa las// mi gtsang zas kyis 'tsho ba yi// srog chags blun pa'i lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // 
229a6(rnying rgyud): shin tu skrag pa'i 'du shes kyis// skyabs kyi yul ni yid la byas// gang der gang dran ma byung bar// theg chen gsang ba'i snying po'i mtshan// mig gi lam du grags pa bzhin// thos pa
229a7(rnying rgyud): yid la byis pa yis// ngan 'gror 'gro las slar log ste// bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khod// de 'dra'i tshul byung de bzhin spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// theg chen gas
