229a8(rnying rgyud): bar rab nges na// rnam smin grag pos gar 'phangs kyang // ji ltar pho long brdabs pa bzhin// 'phen 'gro don gyis der mi gnas// ci phyir thams cad stong nyid pas// sdug bsngal gan
229b1(rnying rgyud): su bcas de yang // sems can bcas te stong pa'i phyir// reg 'gyur myong bar 'gyur ma yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// dmigs pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa// theg chen
229b2(rnying rgyud): zab mo'i tshig thos pas// shin tu skrag cing dngang 'gyur te// skur btab rgyab phyogs snying ral nas// ngu 'bod gnas ltung ma myong bar// bde 'gro thar pa'i gnas su thon// de 'dra'i tshul byung
229b3(rnying rgyud): shes par gyis// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang 'di la// gang dga' gang zhig 'dun skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i
229b4(rnying rgyud): dus na sngon byung ba// bram ze byams ldan zhes bya bas// ga/ sang chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di// mthong bas mos te/ kun la bltas// de yang rnyed par ma gyur te// gang gi phyogs
229b5(rnying rgyud): su gnas nas ni// shin tu ngus nas gdungs sngags sgra/ sa// e ma'o bdag ni las re pham// skyes nas rgas pa/ ra gyur par du// yang dag gsang ba'i don btsal na// gang
229b6(rnying rgyud): 'di ma mthong las re nga na// da yong ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// btsal bas rnyed par yong min te// bdag la ston pa gang su zhig/ sgra cher ngus te skyes pa las// nam mkha'i khams nas
229b7(rnying rgyud): sgra byung te// skal dang ldan pa'i rigs can khyod// 'di ltar nges pa'i blo brtan pas// khyod ni don gyis bgo bskal pa// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// khyod la byin gyis brlab pa
229b8(rnying rgyud): mdzad// de bas mos pa ma g.yel bar// don dang phrad pa'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// gdos pa'i lus ni gdod bor nas// snying po don la nges bltas na/ 
230a1(rnying rgyud): de ma thag tu mthong bar 'gyur// de skad lung bstan thos nas ni// dga' bas mos pa cher g.yos te// ji ltar bstan pa des bltas pas// rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sras su
230a2(rnying rgyud): gyur da/  de 'dra'i tshul byung mos par spyod// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste// mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs te// thams cad du yang de bzhin to// tog gi rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs
230a3(rnying rgyud): kyis nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba// lha bu khri tsho bcu dang bcas// snying po gsang bar rnal 'byor la// rin chen 'od ldan gtsug 'dzin du// shin tu
230a4(rnying rgyud): dang bas dger g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang // bcas nas dam pa'i drung du dong // dga' bas 'dun pa'i/ tshul bzung nas// snying po gsang ba'i don la zhugs// 
230a5(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste// lha gnas kun tu bskyod pa/ dang // 'byung chen lus las sprul pa dang // ri bo 'deg/ sa dang 'phang ba dang // yun gyi tshe la gnas pa thob// 
230a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rtog bzhin du// mthong ba dag gi chos nyid de// bskal par nub par ma gyur to// de 'dra'i tshul byung 'jug par gyis// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste// mthong
230a7(rnying rgyud): bas dad chos 'di yongs dag pa// ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyi// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na ston byung ba// / 
230a8(rnying rgyud): theg chen gsang bar rab nges pa// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi// rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sa nyid thob// de 'dra'i tshul byung mthong bar gyis// gzhan yang gsang chen 'dzin pa nyon// 
230b1(rnying rgyud): gang dag theg chen mngon spyod la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang bas// de ni de dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu dag la mthon dman med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rgyal po
230b2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug 'od ldan pa// rnal 'byor can gyi 'khor dang bcas// theg chen zab mo'i don la zhugs// gsang sngags gsang ba'i byin rlabs dag/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po rnams// thog ma
230b3(rnying rgyud): kun du grags par gyur// de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bram ze dge slong bya ba zhig/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// dam par nges pa'i bslab pa zhus// byis pa'i spyod yul
230b4(rnying rgyud): ma yin phyir// gsang chen gsang bar rab tu gsungs// bram ze ma log yo byad dag/ de la de bsngos dag par sbyar// skyes bu dam pa de yul du// yid kyis phyogs
230b5(rnying rgyud): der smon par brjod// 'di la mos pa'i byin rlabs kyis// snying por nges pa'i dam pa dang // rjes su yi rang dam pa gnyis// thob pa mnyam pa nyid du gyur// 'di ltar
230b6(rnying rgyud): tshegs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rigs chen 'dzin// de 'dra'i tshul byung mkhas par gyis// gzhan yang gsang 'dzin 'di lta ste// bsam yas bsam gyis khyab pa'i// / 
230b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas 'di gzigs 'di mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'khor ba'i bshes gnyen du// dam pa gsang ba'i bdag por gyur// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// 
230b8(rnying rgyud): gsal byin bya ba'i khyim bdag zhig/ theg chen gsang ba 'dir gnas pas// rang go gsang ba nyid mthong bas// gsang chen gsang ba'i nges rnyed de// kun gyi gsang ba nges par mthong
231a1(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste// de las de byung 'bum phrag yas// chos kyi rgyal por gyur nas ni// smra ba kun gyi seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun du grags par gyur// de 'dra'i tshul
231a2(rnying rgyud): byung bslab par gyis// gzhan yang gsang 'dzin gnod 'dul nyon// theg chen gsang ba'i tshig lam gcig/ khong du chud par gyur pa ni// skye bo nyan thos bsam yas dang // rgyal ba mtha'
231a3(rnying rgyud): yas sras bcas la// mchod yon tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// ci'i phyir theg chen 'di shes pas// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog 'di yin// nam mkha' kun khyab rgyal
231a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang // theg chen gsang ba'i snying po gnyis// so so ma yin tha/ mi dang // des na rgyal ba gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba/ thams cad mnyes pa yin// sku dang gsung thugs gcig
231a5(rnying rgyud): las med// 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par las// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// skal ldan yongs su dag pa'i rigs// 
231a6(rnying rgyud): dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// gang du mos pa so sor skyes// gcig la gcig 'dir tha tshig bcas// gcig gis dman pa'i theg pa la// spyad nas bya ba'i las chen byas// gcig ni theg
231a7(rnying rgyud): chen gsang ba'i don// rgya cher nges par chub pa las// theg chen zhon pa'i gsal ldan ni// rigs chen gcig gis mngon par chub// bya ba byed pa'i dge ldan ni// grangs med bskal pa
231a8(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis chub// des na theg chen gsang ba la// de 'dra'i tshul byung tshul bzhin spyod// gzhan yang gsang 'dzin bdag po nyon// gsang 'di rtag tu gang 'chang ba// mi skyod rgyal po la sog
231b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i/ me yon rtag pa'i ci 'dra // don gyi gzungs dang bcas pathog// de yang ji lta buzhe na// khyim bdag mes byin bya ba de// brgya mi 'khor dang bcas bzhig/ rtag par theg chen 'dir gnas pa/ 
231b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mi 'khrug rgyal po yi// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra ba// rigs chen 'dzin pa gcig gis thob// de 'dra'i tshul byung dag par spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste// sku dang gsung
231b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par bsgrub pa rnams// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// goms pas rjod dang smon pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing // yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de
231b4(rnying rgyud): yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba// drang srong rnal 'byor ka la ya nas// drang srong rnam pa mang sde la// // theg chen gsang ba'i bsngags pa brjod// don rnams
231b5(rnying rgyud): nges par bkod pa las// mang pos rigs chen 'dzin pa thob// gang der bsngags pa rjod byed pa// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// des na theg chen gsang ba 'di// kun
231b6(rnying rgyud): la bsngags pa brjod par gyis// des ni nga yi dgongs pa 'thob// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam yang // theg chen gsang ba'i snying po yin// rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas// skad cig thang cag
231b7(rnying rgyud): yud tsam la// gsang chen gsang bar nges bzhag na// rgyal ba kun kyang rigs 'dzin gyi// gsang chen gsang bar rab nges pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar na// gsang chen gsang ba'i snying
231b8(rnying rgyud): po gang // nges par legs pa'i bcad rgyud dang // log par nges pa'i bcad rgyud rnams// sngon byung ba rgyud pa grags pa yin// de skad gsang ba mchog nyid gsung // zhes gsang ba'i bdag
232a1(rnying rgyud): pos sngon byung ba'i gtam rgyud cing grags pa brjod pa'i bya ba byas pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa mngon du snang ba'i sems dpa' dman pa'i lus can rnams gang du
232a2(rnying rgyud): ma nges pa'i som nyid yongs su chad par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i mdo chen po las sngon du byung ba gtam rgyud yongs su brjod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / 
232a3(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang byung bya ba gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa brgyad
232a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon du byung ba'i/ tshig bcu gnyis pa'i dgu pa gang gis ched du mdzad pa na 'jung
232a5(rnying rgyud): zhes pa byung ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i chu la ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabs su
232a6(rnying rgyud): gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ji ltar mdzad de yongs su grags pa lags// smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin mdzad pa la bya'o// smras pa/ gsang
232a7(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po gang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin du mdzad pa de gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams
232a8(rnying rgyud): cad kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la ni sangs rgyas kyang med// sems can yang med// pho mo yang med/ rigs rgyud kyang med/ gzugs med/ bstan du med/ mtshon du med/ dpe yang med// 
232b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa yang med de/ dpag par rab tu dka' la gang gis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang ci yang med pa la sangs rgyas dang / sems can dang / pho mo dang / 
232b2(rnying rgyud): rigs rgyud dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / bstan pa sna tshogs dang / mtshon pa dang / dpe tha dad pa dang / mdzad pa sna tshogs dang / rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa mang po 'di
232b3(rnying rgyud): dag gang gi ched du mdzad pa snang ba lags zhes yongs su dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye lang ka'i bdag po yongs su dri ba chen po 'di ni legs so// rab tu leg so// 
232b4(rnying rgyud): gang ci yang med pa las cir yang snang ba'i don 'di ni de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ grong khyer chen po gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa tha dad par snang ba 'ba'
232b5(rnying rgyud): shig go// grong khyer gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste// phyed snang gi grong khyer dang / kun snang gi grong khyer dang / mi snang ba'i grong khyer ro// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer
232b6(rnying rgyud): gsum nyid chos nyid yin pas na de la ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / grong khyer gsum gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'dir gcig
232b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir te/ thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas su gyur pa kho na'o// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sgo gsum du snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo dang / rigs
232b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo dang / gsang ba'i sgo'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzungs kyi sgo yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang ba mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ de nyid kyi rkyen gyis ni gnas dang / de 'dzin gyi/ 
233a1(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis lhag mthong dang / de 'jug gi rkyen gyis las mtha'o// lang ka'i bdag po rig pa'i sgo la yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang bar mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ 
233a2(rnying rgyud): mi snang ba'i ched du zhi gnas dang / snang ba'i ched du lhag mthong dang / zhen pa'i ched du las mtha'o// lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba'i sgro la yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang bar
233a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ mi snang ba'i ched du zhi gnas dang / snang ba'i ched du lhag mthong dang / zhen pa'i ched du las mtha'o// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sangs rgyas gsum
233a4(rnying rgyud): snang ba mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ mi snang ba'i ched du 'dus ma bya/ sa kyi sangs rgyas dang / snang ba'i ched du 'dus byas kyi sangs rgyas dang / zhen pa'i ched du gzugs kyi sangs
233a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang gsum mo// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi rkyen gyis sems can gsum ste/ de nyid gol ba'i rkyen gyis gzugs med pa'i sems can dang / de 'dzin gol
233a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rkyen gyis gzugs kyi sems can dang / de 'jug zhen pa'i rkyen gyis 'dod pa'i sems can no// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyis rkyen gyis lus gsum bstan pa ni med pa
233a7(rnying rgyud): dang ta rags pa dang / pho mo dang / ma ning ngo // lang ka'i bdag po 'dod pa'i rkyen gyis gang gi yab yum dang / sras rgyud dang / 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa ltar snang ngo // de yang de bzhi
233a8(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i yum du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad de/ lhums su zhugs pa dang / de na yang de kho na
233b1(rnying rgyud): nyid gsang ba dam pa the tsom gcod pa dang / slar log pa dang / zhu ba dang / zhu bar ldog pa dang / gnang ba dang / bye ba dang / bye ba snyed du 'jug par mdzad do// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum
233b2(rnying rgyud): gyi ched du bstan pa gsum ste/ de nyid kyi rkyen gyis theg pa chen po dang / de 'dzin gyi rkyen gyis theg pa sna tshogs dang / de 'jug gi rkyen gyis theg pa chung ngu snang bar mdzad do// lang ka'i
233b3(rnying rgyud): bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du ting nge 'dzin gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ de nyid kyi ched du de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / de 'dzin gyi ched du kun du snang gi ting nge 'dzin dang / 
233b4(rnying rgyud): de 'jug gi ched du rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin to// lang ka'i ba dag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du mchod rten gsu ma snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ thugs kyis mchod rten dang
233b5(rnying rgyud): sku'i mchod rten dang / gsung gi mchod rten no// lang ka'i bad ga po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du dkyil 'khor gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 
233b6(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sngags gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags dang / rigs
233b7(rnying rgyud): sngags dang / gzungs sngags so// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gyi ched du 'bras bu dang / rkyen dang / rgyu'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag la sogs pa grong khyer gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa yongs su
233b8(rnying rgyud): snang bar mdzad de/ de dag ni thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste
234a1(rnying rgyud): sum bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ched du yang
234a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i gsang ba 'di yongs su gsung bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa ni// thams cad nyid las mi gzhan phyir// ci yang blang dor med pas na// rdo rje na mkha' gdon mi za// 
234a3(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po yang rang sangs rgyas kyi ched du snang ba rdo rje bstan pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// ngag gi rdo rje yi ge med// lus ni rdo rje snang ston pa// gang gi yid ni 'dir bcug ste/ gas
234a4(rnying rgyud): ba nyid du rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang gsang ba ma/ cho ga gi bdag po des nyan thos kyi ched du bslab pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung ba mdzad do// sgo gsum rdo rje bya ba bcu
234a5(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba yongs su dag pa'i mtha'// zhi ba phyogs yid 'dir bcug ste// dam pa nyid du rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des rnal 'byor sems dpa' ched du
234a6(rnying rgyud): lta ba rdo rje gsung ba 'di gsung bar mdzad do// thams cad rnam rig 'phrul snang ba// gzhan med de nyid dam par yod// rnam shes gang yin 'dir bcug ste// gsang ba dam par rab nges
234a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gang gi mtha' yongs su sel ba dag gi ched du na mkha' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// gang 'dir yod dang med pa yi// / 
234a8(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis nges par rab gsal te/ sems nyid gang yin 'dir bcug ste// dbu mar mi dmigs rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des tshangs pa la sogs pa/ 
234b1(rnying rgyud): gti mug can gyi ched du gti mug rdo rjer mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// 'jig rten kun gyi gti mug las// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'byung // gti mug rdo rje yid bcug nas// gsang chen
234b2(rnying rgyud): theg par rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gu lang la sogs pa gang 'dod chags can gyi ched du chags pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung ba mdzad do// 'jig rten g.yo
234b3(rnying rgyud): rdul po mo gang // ji snyed gu lang u ma nyid// chags pa rdo rje yid bcu gnyis// gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des bi sna la sogs pa gang zhe
234b4(rnying rgyud): sdang can gyi ched du gsod pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// ji snyed g.yo rdul sems can rnams// rdo rje mtshon chen gcig gis bsad // zhe sdang rdo rje yid bcug
234b5(rnying rgyud): nas// rdo rje theg par rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang phrag dog can gyi ched du 'khrug pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di
234b6(rnying rgyud): gsung bar mdzad do// sha za rtag tu gzhan 'dod spyod// kun sdom rdo rje go cha bgos// kun 'khrug rdo rje yid bcug nas// gsang chen snying por rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang
234b7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu dam pa des klu la sogs pa gang phra ma can gyi tshad du bla ma rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// rdo rje dam pa dbye ba'i mchog/ log lta yang dag lta dbye byas// phra ma rdo
234b8(rnying rgyud): rje yid bcug nas// rdo rje gsang bar rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des lha ma yin la sogs pa gang nga rgyal can gyi ched du gdul dka' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di
235a1(rnying rgyud): gsung bar mdzad do// rdo rje gdul dka' ma lus pa// gnon pa brtsegs pa'i ri bo che// nga rgyal rdo rje yid bcug nas// rdo rje theg pa rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang
235a2(rnying rgyud): skyes bu dam pa des srin po la sogs pa sha za rnams kyi ched du rngam pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// rdo rje zab ma lus pa// thams cad za bar byed pa nyid// rngam pa rdo rje yid bcug
235a3(rnying rgyud): nas ta/ theg pa chen por rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des mkha' 'gro la sogs pa gang 'phra men ma dag gi ched du rdo rje a mr-i ta mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad
235a4(rnying rgyud): dod/ rdo rje bshang gci a mr-i ta// btung ba ma nges pa yi thab das// 'phra men rdo rje yid bcug nas// rdo rje gsang b.rarab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa
235a5(rnying rgyud): des mtha' yas rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// mtha' yas 'jig rten rdul rnyed na// log rtog mi mthun rdul phran rnyed// gnyen po rtog 'dul de rnyed kyis// 
235a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje theg chen dbyings su sbyor// mtha' yas g.yo rdul sna tshogs pa// gang la mos pa de gsung bas// sems can rdo rje yid bcug nas// sems nyid theg can rab nges pa'o// lang
235a7(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po de dag ni gsung gi mdzad pa gang gi ched du mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gsung gi mdzad pa yongs su
235a8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi don du
235b1(rnying rgyud): thabs ji ltar yang mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang gi yul tha dad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ mdzad pa yang tha dad mtha' yas par snang ba ste/ yul la la ni dag par smin pa mdzad do// la la
235b2(rnying rgyud): ni ma dag pas smin par mdzad do// / la la ni dag pa spangs pas so// la la ni gdams ngag gis so// la la ni bla 'khyal gyis so// la la ni 'ja
235b3(rnying rgyud): pas so// la la ni rtsub pas so// la la ni gnyi gas so// la la ni 'jigs pas so// la la ni thar pas so// la la ni 'dam gyis so// la la ni 'khrugs pas so// la la ni 'thibs pas so// / 
235b4(rnying rgyud): la la ni 'thabs pas so// la la ni non pas so// la lad ni sregs pas so// la la ni bslangs pas so// la la nidam bslangs pas so// la la ni gnod pas so// la la ni
235b5(rnying rgyud): mi gnod pas so// la la ni 'tshe bas so// la la ni mi 'tshe khas so// la la ni smad paso// la la ni bstod pas so// la la ni 'gyod pas so// la la ni mi 'gyod pas so// la
235b6(rnying rgyud): la ni 'thing slad kyis so// la la ni kha gsag gis so// la la ni nan tur gyis so// la la ni bzhabs pas so// la la ni byin pas so// la la ni blangs pas so// la la ni ci yang cho ga shes pas
235b7(rnying rgyud): pas so// la la ni ming smos pas so// la la ni gzugs smos pas so// la la ni gzugs bstan pas so// la la ni smras pas so// la la ni spros pas so// la la ni rgyan gyis so// / 
235b8(rnying rgyud): tad la la ni smras so// la la ni dris so// la la ni ros so// la la ni reg gis so// la la ni chos kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// la la ni gzugs yid du mi 'ong bas so// de bzhin
236a1(rnying rgyud): dul la ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du mi 'ong bas yongs su smin par mdzad do// gang la la ni thub pas so// la la ni rgyun mi 'chad par smra bas so// la la ni skad cig
236a2(rnying rgyud): smra bas so// la la ni ci yang mi brjod pas so// la la dag ni dam pa mthong bas so// la la ni dam pa'i sgras so// la la ni bshes gnyen dam pa'i sgras so// la la ni mi rtog pas so// la la ni rtog pas so// / 
236a3(rnying rgyud): la la ni sdug bsngal bas so// la la ni bde bas so// la la ni bdag med pas so// la la ni bdag yod pas so// la la ni mngon spyod kyis so// la la ni zhi bas so// la la ni rgyas pas so// la la ni dbang
236a4(rnying rgyud): gis so// la la ni mthar phyin pas so// la la ni dug gsum sdu dag bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras smin par mdzad do// la la ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so// la la ni
236a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba mi slong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so// la la ni srid pa'i la ngas spyod spangs te dka' thub drag pos so// la la ni srid/ pa'i longs spyod blangs te 'jol nyag tu spyod pas so// la
236a6(rnying rgyud): la ni bkag pa'i thabs kyis so// la la ni gang la yang ma rig pa'i thabs kyis so// la la ni bya ba rdzogs pa'i thabs kyis so// la la ni sbyin pas so// la la ni snyan pas so// la la ni 'thun pas
236a7(rnying rgyud): so// tal la ni spyod pas so// la la ni nang yongs su gtong bas so// la la ni phyi yongs su gtong bas so// la la ni thams cad gtong bas so// la la ni thams cad chags pas yongs su smin par
236a8(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// la la ni rnam par g.yang bas so// la la ni nang du yang dag 'jog gis so// la la ni 'dod pa bkag pas so// la la ni 'dod pa spyod pas so// gang de ltar mos pa tha dad la
236b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / lta ba dang / thabs dang / 'dod pa dang / don tha dad par bstan par yongs su smin par mdzad do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni thabs kyis mdzad par rig
236b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thabs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas yang gsang
236b3(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi ched du sku'i mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa 'jig rten du bkod pas
236b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi gzugs su snang ba des thams cad smin par mdzad pa de kho na'o// de ltar na gang gi ched du mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i sgo dang / 
236b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza nga spyod kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i
236b6(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sprin phung la ni 'di 'am// gcig ces gang la yang gzung du med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ sems
236b7(rnying rgyud): can mos pa tha dad pas/ mtha' yas skye bo mgu dka' ba// rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu bas gang la'ang mos pa mtha' yas gsungs/ lang ka'i bdag po gang dam pa rnams de kho na nyid las ma
236b8(rnying rgyud): g.yos par sems can gyi khams 'du shes mtha' thug pa med pa dang / sgra dang / gzugs dang / spyod pa mtha' thug pa med pa rnams mi mkhyen pa dang / ma gsan pa dang / ma gzigs pa
237a1(rnying rgyud): dang / mi 'grel pa ni gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad nas thams cad du snying po byang chu'i du ma 'dres par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir gang gi snying po byang chu mi g.yo ba nan/ 
237a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa nyid dang / sems can gang til 'bru na gnas pa de la ring ba dang / nye ba dang / gcig dang / so so ma yin te/ de kho na nyid gcig pa'i phyir dbyings gcig tu gnyis su med par gnaso// / 
237a3(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gang gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdzad pa ched du mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sku'i mdzad pa yongs su rdzogaH
237a4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i
237a5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste/ byung tshul ba/ stan pa dgu pa'o// // de nas yang la/ nga ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a6(rnying rgyud): chen po des sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bcu pa'i lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung shes byung ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang
237a7(rnying rgyud): ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabs su lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta zhig du lung bstan te grags pa lags// gas
237a8(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang dri ba de ni legs so// shin tu legs so// rab tu legs so// de ni 'di ltar 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dbyings su bskal pa thog ma dang tha
237b1(rnying rgyud): ma med pa'i skabs la sangs rgyas thog ma dang tha ma med par gang gi sgron mar snang ba dag gi thabs gcig gi bya bas gang phyogs gcig du phan pa nyid du bya ba yongs su smin par byas te/ thabs/ 
237b2(rnying rgyud): dam pas gar phyogs med par phan pa nyid du yongs su smin par bya ba dag gang gi rjes su gang 'gro bar dam bcas pa nyid des byung zhing snang bar lung bstan pa de yongs su grags par 'gyur
237b3(rnying rgyud): gyi tad sgron ma gang gis nyid kyi yul snang ba las ma gtogs pa thams cad snang ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po lung bstan pa de yang ji lta ji ltar 'di lta ste/ bskal pa thog ma
237b4(rnying rgyud): med pa la// ji snyed gang 'byung brjod mi lang // skabs las ga/ cig byung 'dir brjod kyis// dam bcas go cha bgos khyod nyon// bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la// sangs rgyas bye
237b5(rnying rgyud): ba phrag brgya 'byung // kun gyi tha mar byung ba yi// bde gsheg/ sa mngon 'byung rgyal po des// 'khor gyi nang du lung // bstan pa// 'jig rten gcig gam gling gcig du// 
237b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa gcig gi gnas skabs la// yul gcig rdo rje gdan gcig du// mdzad pa mthar phyin sangs rgyas gnyis// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong // byung na mi srid chos dang
237b7(rnying rgyud): 'gal// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das 'og tu// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i snying po nyid// rgya cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes// sangs rgyas kun gyis lung chen ston// ji ltar 'di yang de bzhin te/ 
237b8(rnying rgyud): nga ni mi bzhugs 'das 'og tu// kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa nyid brgya mthar 'dul ba snang bar 'gyur// de skad dam pa de lung bstan// gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon// bskal pa mtha'
238a1(rnying rgyud): yas bya ba la// sangs rgyas sum khri lnga stong 'byung // kun gyi tha mar 'byung ba yi// sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas pa des// 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// khri phrag phyed dang bzhi 'byung
238a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tata sangs rgyas snga ma 'das rnams kyis// smin byas ma smin gang phyed du// dam pa byung bar lung bstan bzhin// 'dir yang yongs su gzung bar gyis// nga 'das na ni mi snang na// brgya phrag gcig/ 
238a3(rnying rgyud): na don snang 'gyur// drag shul can gyis byin lung bstan// bskul ba chen po gzhan yang nyon// bskal pa grags ldan bya ba la// sangs rgyas bzhi khri drug stong byung // kun gyi tha mar byung ba yi// 
238a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bshes gnyen des// 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// stong phrag bzhi bcu drug byung ba'i// dam pa de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// gang gi ched du lung
238a5(rnying rgyud): bstan bzhin// nga ni bde bar gshegs phyin// brgya phrag pa co lngar gyur pa na// 'bras bu chub par snang ba yi// rdzu la bral dri med dam pa nyid// mchog gi zhing khams dam
238a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'dir// snang ba thob pa'i skal ldan can// bram ze shes pa mo zhig la// gnod 'dul nyid gyis grags par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon// bskal pa bzang rgyan bya ba la// sangs
238a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas bye phrag brgyad bcu byung // de dag mtha' zad byung ba yi// sangs rgyas bzang rgyan dpal gyis kyang // 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// bye brag brgyad bcu byung ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa
238a8(rnying rgyud): lnga ma yis// theg pa 'byung bar lung bstan bzhin// nga yi snang ba 'di nub nas// brgya phrag phyed kyi dus dag la// 'di tshe gcig la 'grub pa yi// chos kyi me long dam pa zhig/ nga 'das gling
238b1(rnying rgyud): gi 'jig rten 'dir// 'byung ba'i dge slong skal ldan can// nyi ma'i snying po bya ba la// bstan pa'i char chen phab nas ni// kun tu 'thun par grags par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon// bskal
238b2(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya byung // de kun mthar zad byung ba yi// sangs rgyas dkon mchog dpal gyis kyang // 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// bye ba phrag brgya byung ba
238b3(rnying rgyud): yi ta de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis// nges pa dam par lung bstan bzhin// nga snang mi gnas de rjes la// lo ni brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis la// gsang 'dus theg chen snying po 'di// byang chub
238b4(rnying rgyud): snying po can zhes pa'i// sa la gsar gling bya ba na// rgyal po bde skyob skal yod la// las dang thugs rje 'thun pa yi// chos kyi mig cig 'bye 'gyur te// rigs ldan kun gyis thob
238b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// bskul ba chen po gzhan yang nyon// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la// sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu// 'byung ba'i// bzhi par 'byung ba'i sgron ma nyid// thub pa'i
238b6(rnying rgyud): dbang po de nyid kyis// 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// bye phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi yi// mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid kyis// gang gi phyogs dag smin byas nas// theg chen rdo rje snying po nyid// 
238b7(rnying rgyud): rgya cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes/ kun gyi lung chen bstan pa bzhin// nga ni 'di nas mi snang nas// lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis na// lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi// bstan pa'i snying po
238b8(rnying rgyud): dam pa zhig/ 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi// mi las skal ldan rigs can de// rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la// sngon du ltas snang gnang 'gyur ba// drag shul can zhes bya ba'i rtse// 
239a1(rnying rgyud): grogs kyi sems dpa' dman pa'i lus// lang ka'i bdag po la sogs la// lag na rdo rje snang bar 'gyur// dam pas de skad lung bstan snang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa
239a2(rnying rgyud): thog ma tha ma med pa'i bar// de lta de ltar grags pa yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces gsungs pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa'i dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams
239a3(rnying rgyud): nges par yid rangs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rjes su byung ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / 
239a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes bya ba'i gtam rgyud brjo da pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung
239a5(rnying rgyud): tshul bstan pa bcu pa'o// de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byangad/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des// sngon/ du byung ba'i tshig bcu gcig pa'i dri ba yongs su dri ba/ kye
239a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabs su las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa
239a7(rnying rgyud): de ji lta bu zhig du grags shing byung ba las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang gi dri ba da ni 'di lta ste/ gang zhig 'dogs pa'i yul rnams las/ gsum du nges par
239a8(rnying rgyud): snang ba ni// 'dod la zhen dang nges pa 'byung // gdul dka' drag po gdul bya gsum// gang gis 'deg pa'i rtsal gsum ni// 'khor lo rgyun dang don dam nges// cho 'phrul mngon par 'byung ba
239b1(rnying rgyud): gsum// rang bzhin ye nas snang ba yin// ji lta 'degs pa'i thabs rnams ni// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum nyid du// snang ba de nyid gang yin pa// rang bzhin shugs dang gnyen po'i thabs// las rgyud
239b2(rnying rgyud): gcod pa 'ba' shig go// 'khor lo rgyun du snang ba yang // ye nas sangs rgyas grags pa lngar// 'dus bya 'dul byed thams cad kun// lngar byung lngar gnang lngar 'dul sgrol// skyed dang 'tsho dang
239b3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas pa yi// mi rtog ngang gis kun 'byung ba// med la mi zad rnam pa gsum// gang gi dbyings dang mngon sum pa// bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni// thams cad du yang
239b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas med// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste// gang dag dbyi dngas su sangs rgyas pa// chen po lngar snang gang 'di dag/ 'byung ba rgyun gyi bcom ldan 'das// thugs rje rtag pa'i
239b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas te// rang bzhin kun la khyab par gnas// ji ltar/ 'dod dang 'dod par snang // snang srid ston pa'i sgron mar grags// 'byung ba rgyun gyi rtag pa ste// rang bzhin stong
239b6(rnying rgyud): pas mdzad par ston// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // mngon sum pa yi sangs rgyas ni// mkha' dbyings kun tu mu med dbyings// khams gsum dngos dang dngos med kun// phyogs mtshams
239b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi lus dang gnas// kun gyi go skabs stong yod gnas// 'gro dang mi 'gro'i rten sa ni// dngos po thams cad skye 'byung gnas// kun la dga' bar sbyor bar ni// skal pa'i 'khor lo
239b8(rnying rgyud): gcig du gnas// gnyen sdud gzhan skyed rang bzhin gsal// gyes 'dzin mi ldog rgyun mi 'chad// dgon gdung kun rlan rnam par g.yo// bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcig du gnas// kun
240a1(rnying rgyud): / smin mun sel kun ston slongs// gasregs gnyen kha dog gsal byung ba// bcud 'dzin yongs su rtas snang ba// bskal pa gcig gi 'khor lor gnas// mi gnas thogs med
240a2(rnying rgyud): shugs kyis 'byung // gzugs med gzugs kyi mthu bas drag/ yang g.yo khyab 'jug kun gyi rten// bskal pa 'khor lo gcig du gnas// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste// bdag nyid chen po'i
240a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ni// kun shong yal 'phyo kun tu bzang // kun theg lhun sdug ye shes gzugs// kun sdud mnyam sbyor ting nge 'dzin// sgrib sel lhag mthong shes rab 'bar// thogs med ma
240a4(rnying rgyud): rmongs shes bya rdzogs// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang ni// de nyid yin pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nam mkha' rnam pard snang ba mdzad// sa ni mi g.yo rdo rje 'dzin// me nyid rin chen
240a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar ldan// chu ni mnyen gsal snang mtha' yas// rlung ni kun 'byed gdon mi za// lang ka'i bdag po 'a/ lta ste// gang 'dir sangs rgyas med pa ni// thams cad
240a6(rnying rgyud): stong par ye sangs te// des khyab ma 'dres sangs rgyas nyid// ma bcos ye nas sangs rgyas pa// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni// 'khor lo rgyun gyi theg pa ste// 
240a7(rnying rgyud): ngang gis rgyun gyi 'khor lor 'byung // brtan g.yo kun la rang bzhin gnas// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // don dam nges pa'i theg pa ni// gsum du nges par snang ba ste// kun 'byung 'dren
240a8(rnying rgyud): dang dka' thub rig/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa'o// gang 'dir 'dren pa 'di lta ste// yul gsum nges par snang ba ni// tha ma 'bring dang rab tu snang // tha ma'i yul du gyur pa ni// shin tu ya
240b1(rnying rgyud): nga'i las spangs te// yid 'ong 'dul ba'i tshul bzung nas// rang gi rtsa ba der bskrun pa// so sor thar pa'i lam du snang // 'bring gi yul du gyur pa yin// 'di kun rten cing 'brel byung la// bdag med
240b2(rnying rgyud): chos gcig med mthong bas// brjod med sprul pa'i chos rnams ston// rang gi rtsal gyis par gnas pa'o// rab kyi yul du gyur pa ni// bdag med byams snyoms rtag las 'das// yul
240b3(rnying rgyud): med ma skyes phyogs dang bral// sa dang rnam thar bder bskrun pas// dngos med ngo bo nyid sku thob// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // dka' thub rig byed theg pa ni// 'di yi yul gyis
240b4(rnying rgyud): gsum nyid de// tha ma dag la snang ba ni// dka' thub sdom de dang brtul zhugs dang// mnyam nyid mi g.yo skye med la// bkur 'os 'dun pa'i tshul bzung nas// rigs kyi rdo rje
240b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gnas pa'o// 'bring la rnam par snang ba ni// bya ba dag pa'i las spyad de// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin maraldan na// mi g.yo'i sems dpa' mngon sum du// rigs
240b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi rdo rje 'chang gnas pa'o// rab la nges par snang ba ni// sems nyid yul la tsa la rdzogs te// yul nyid rig pas mngon mthong na// de nyid der ni mngon byas nas// rdo rje rigs 'chang gnas
240b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa yang // yul gyis rnam pa gsum snang ba// bskyed dang rdzogs dang yongs su rdzogs// tha ma bskyed pa gang snang ba// 
240b8(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las// bsten pa lnga yi sogs pa'i chos// rgyal ba lnga las rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor tshal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// 'bring la rdzogs par gang snang ba/ 
241a1(rnying rgyud): mnyam pas mnyam pa'i don mthong na// mnyam rdzogs yul shes dbyings ye shes// kun rig kun rdzogs kun tu snang // chos nyid mi 'gyur bdal ba'i sa// rab la yongs su
241a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa ni// ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don// tha snyad tsam du rtogs chud nas// brtsal med rdzogs bral bsam yul 'das// thams cad rdzogs pa'i sbyar chibs// lang ka'i bdag po
241a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang gang // cho 'phrul mngon byung theg pa yang // yul gyi rnam pa gsum snang ba// zhen dang rmongs dang 'khrug pa yi// las ngan 'du shes ngan pa rnams// rgyun gcad bsgyur
241a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'phrin las ni// srid gsum dra ba'i 'khor lo dag/ la/ sa kyi 'khor lo rgyun bcad phyir// dam pa'i 'khor da lo bskor byas nas// bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcod par
241a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ ci phyir sems can kha cig ni// chags pas zhen cing gdung bar 'gyur// gang tshe sems can kha cig ni// shin tu rmongs shing 'thibs par 'gyur// gang
241a6(rnying rgyud): gis sems can kha cig ni// shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur// 'di ltar dug gsum smin pa la// gang gis phan par mi 'gyur te// mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan nas kyang // 
241a7(rnying rgyud): las ngan las rgyud gcad pa'i phyir// rang bzhin cho 'phrul mngon 'byung ba// khros na za byed lnga khros pas// ma lus bsgral nas stongs mdzad phyir// na mkha' khro bo za byed che// tham
241a8(rnying rgyud): cad thim par stongs par mdzad// de bzhin nyid du bsgral ba'i mchog/ srid zhi 'tsho bral bskal pa yis// zhen pas chags pa'i las rgyud gcod// bzod ldan rmongs pa'i bskal/ 
241b1(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sems dang yid kyi las rgyud gcod// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pa yis// dngos po dngos po thams cad gcod // lhag mthong me yi bskal pa yis// nyon mongs dngos
241b2(rnying rgyud): po thams cad sreg/ zhi gnas chu yi bskal pa yis// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'khru// thogs med rlung gi bskal pa yis// shes bya thams cad kun tu spyod// shes rab na mkha'i
241b3(rnying rgyud): bskal pa yis// mtshan ma'i rgas rgud thams cad stongs// las ngan myur du rgyun bcad na// gnas ngan dag las myur du sgrol// thabs dang theg pa gang dag las// tha ma'i tha ma
241b4(rnying rgyud): yin par bshad// snyigs mar gyur pa'i skabs rnams dasu// 'dul ba rnams gnyis nub pas na// nyon mongs de rnams ni dngos por snang // 'das nas nub po zhes
241b5(rnying rgyud): ma nub de nyid ni// dus der shugs kyis 'dul ba yin// lang ka' bdag po de ltar na// 'di kun grasang bangam pa yi// dbyings las gar yang ma g.yos shing // 
241b6(rnying rgyud): stong pa kho na'i dbyings nyid las// stong pa'i chos rnams byung bar zad// stong nyid gsang bde kho na// thig chen gsang ba de nyid do// gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces brjod pas
241b7(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems pa rnams thams cad gsang ba dam pa nyid du nges pa'i som nyid med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus
241b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo chen po las cho 'phrul sngon byung gi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / theg pa chen po nges par byung ba'i tshul las las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang byung / 
242a1(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste/ byung tshul bstan pa bcu gcig pa'o// // bam po bdun par zug pa'o// / 
242a2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngos sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma dgongs pa rnam par 'gro ba na yang byung zhes snang ba'i dri ba yongs
242a3(rnying rgyud): su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang
242a4(rnying rgyud): byung zhes bkod pa de lta zhig tu bgros te grags pa lag sa smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang yongs su dri ba de ni 'di ltar zab pa// ches zab pa/ 'di ltar dka' ba// ches
242a5(rnying rgyud): dka' ba// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ brtag par/ rab tu dka' ba// dpag pa las 'das pa ste/ gang rgyu/ da yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang / gang sa la gnas/ 
242a6(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu bgro bar mi nus pa yin na bdag gis yongs su bgro bar lta ci smos te/ gang gi spyod yul yang ma yin no// de skad ces smras pas/ lang ka'i bdag po des
242a7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po gsang ba'i bdag po nyon mongs par snang ba'i 'gre ba rnams la phan pa dang / snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul/ 
242a8(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ gang du ma bkag pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa// thabs kyi theg pa chen po dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par 'gro
242b1(rnying rgyud): zhing smra ba'i seng ge khyod kyis phyin ci ma log par 'gro ba'i dus la bab po// skyes bu chen po shin tu rab tu dus la bab bo// nges par dam par 'gro ba'i dus la bab po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyes bu
242b2(rnying rgyud): chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gsang ba chen po'i bdag por dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te/ gang rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang / gang 'thoms pa
242b3(rnying rgyud): drang ba'i thabs sprin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag du drang ba'i slad du dgongs pa'i lus dgrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las// gsang ba pa'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so// bskul
242b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i go cha chen po khyod// kun la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir// ga/ dngal bskul bar khyod brtson na// 'gro ba gleng bslang la dgas so legs// 'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis// ngas
242b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don de kho na nyid// thos pa snang ba'i dus gcig na// thams cad na mkha' lta bu las// rang byung rang nyid du thos nas// gsang ba'i tshig ni 'di skad du// thos par gyur
242b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus gcig na// 'thun 'jug thabs kyi cha 'thun du// bstan nas drang ba'i thabs su thos// lung gi gtan tshigs 'di skad du// bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ldem dgongs
242b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// bstan nas bkri ba'i thabs su thos// 'dod rkyen tshig ni 'di skad du// rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na// 'dod chen pa la 'dod pa ni// thabs kyis drang ba
242b8(rnying rgyud): nyid du thos// gsang sngags rdo rje na mkha' che// tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas// brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te// bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'// dpe'am tshad ma'am gtam
243a1(rnying rgyud): tshigs sam// rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis// rtogs par nus pa ma yin te// dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra// 'on kyang bka' yi gnyer gtad cing // log zhen
243a2(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis drang ba dang // bskul ba khyod kyi dam tshig kyang // sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus// ma rtogs pa rnams tshig tsam gyis// mtshon nas rnam grol sa dag la// brgyud de drang ba'i thabs nyid du// 
243a3(rnying rgyud): ci rigs tsam du 'gro bar bya// rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa// mthong dang ma mthong rnam gnyis la// dman pa'i skabs na de mthong min// mthong ba dam pa'i skabs na'o// mthong ba mngon thos
243a4(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis la// mthar phyin dam pa mngon sum pa// blo gros rnal 'byor spyod yon can// thos pas mthong bar 'gyur phyir ro// stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang // chos sku snying por
243a5(rnying rgyud): gyur pas na// de yi 'gro ba mi smin phyir// gzugs su ba/ stan nas tshig lam brjod// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta/ ra gyi// dpag tu med pa'i dus rnams su// rgyal ba rnams
243a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dgongs pa gang // ji ltar rnam par bgros pa nyon// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// 'jug par 'dod na mdzod du 'jug par bya'o// rang bzhin ma bcos
243a7(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// ljon shing bskyed par bya'o// dam par 'jug par bya'o// sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o// khyad par du 'gro bar bya'o// yul la 'jug par bya'o// me long brtag par bya'o// 'thun par
243a8(rnying rgyud): 'jug par bya'o// nad gso bar bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos kyi rnam
243b1(rnying rgyud): grangs bcu po de dag las dang po dam pa rnams kyi mdzod du 'jug par bya na sgo gsum nas zhugs pas gang la mi zad pa'i mdzod du 'jug pa nyid do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgo
243b2(rnying rgyud): gsum gang lags// smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po sgo gsum 'di lta ste/ spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo dang / thabs kyi sbyor sgo dang / nges pa'i gsang sgo dang gsum mo// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
243b3(rnying rgyud): po sgo de dag gang gis 'byed pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po sgo de dag ni lde mig gsum gyis 'byed par rig par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byed pa dang / 'grol
243b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / 'byin pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di lta/ ste/ yan lag drug dang / mdo bzhi dang / rtsa ba gsu ma gyi lde mig gis// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i
243b5(rnying rgyud): mdzodadata nges par 'byed ces rgyal bas bshad// lang ka'i bdag po de la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo lde mig gsum gyis 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ yan lag drug dang / mdo
243b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang / rtsa ba gsum mo// de la yan lag drug gang zhe na/ rgyu'i yan lag dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag dang / 'bras bu'i yan lag dang / dngos bzhi'i yan lag dang / gzung ba'i yan
243b7(rnying rgyud): lag dang / mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go// de la rgyu'i yan lag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / smin pa'i yan lag go// lang ka'i bdag po de la 'byung ba'i yan lag
243b8(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ gang yongs su tshogs na brjod pa 'byung ba nyid la bya ste/ tshad ma dang blo gros dang / 'dzin pa dang / mchod rten dang / 'dus pa dang / nges pa'o// smin pa'i yan lag
244a1(rnying rgyud): ni gang dam par smin pa'i rgyu ste// gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag go// lang ka'i bdag po sbyor ba'i yan lag ni yul la sbyor ba ste// 
244a2(rnying rgyud): gang blo'i yul la sbyor ba dang / snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la blo'i yul la sbyor ba ni gang blo gros 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gleng slong ba la sbyor ba dang / blo gros rnyed pa'i
244a3(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba sa'i khyad par la sbyor ba dang / blo gros nges pa'i rtsa ba rnam par thar pa la sbyor ba dang / blo gros gzhag pa'i rtsa ba de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po snying rje'i yul la sbyor
244a4(rnying rgyud): ba yang 'di lta ste/ gang gi rgyu la sbyor ba dang / 'bras bu de la sbyor ba dang / de dag rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o// lang da ka'i bdag po de la 'bras bu'i yan lag ni gang dang // 
244a5(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i dgos ched dam pa 'byung ba ste/ thob pa da ma po de kho na nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de la dngos gzhi'i yan lag ni gang gi dgongs pa nges par
244a6(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa ste/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang la chos rnams kyi dngos gzhi gsum du bsdu ba ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi dang / rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi dang / thams
244a7(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dngos gzhi'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / dong ba dang / gzung ba dang / chub pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po rtsa
244a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i dngos gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gdags pa dang / spyod pa dang / skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su byang ba dang // sna tshogs dang / byed pa
244b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bya ba dang / rgyan no// lang ka'i bdag po thams cad kyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la snang ba 'di lta ste/ bsdu ba dang / 'jug pa dang / gang zag dang / chos so// / 
244b2(rnying rgyud): yongs su dag pa las snang ba ni 'di ltar 'dogs pa dang / rtsol ba dang / gnas dang / bde ba dang / thabs dang / shes pa dang / shes pa'i gnas dang / nan tan dang / nga rgyal
244b3(rnying rgyud): med pa dang / bag chags dang / mngon du bya ba dang // bsgom pa dang / snying po dang / rnam pa dang / dmigs pa dang / dpyod pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / brtsal ba dang // 
244b4(rnying rgyud): yon tan dang / brtan pa dang / bsdu ba dang / phyogs bsdu ra ba dang / rtogs pa dang / thob par bya ba dang / spyir phyin pa dang / yongs su bri ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag
244b5(rnying rgyud): ni dngos gzhi'i yan lag ces bya'o// lang ka'i bdagapo de la gzung ba'i yan lag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// blang ba dang / pham pa dang / ltung ba dang / rang bzhin
244b6(rnying rgyud): dang ta med pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'byung ba dang / yongs su gtang ba kho nar shes par bya ste/ lang ka'i bdag po de dag na gzung ba'i yan lag ces bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po dal/ 
244b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob dang / dam pa dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu dang / bsnyad pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / 'thun
244b8(rnying rgyud): pa dang / nyes dmigs dang / yon tan no// lang ka'i bdag po de la kun rdzob gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag dang / brtags pa dang / las su bstan pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la
245a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bral ba dang / brtan pa dang / rdzogs pa'o// dmigs pa ni thams cad du bstan pa'o// rnam pa ni thams cad du brtags pa ste/ bden pa dang / gzhag pa
245a2(rnying rgyud): dang tanyes pa dang / yon tan dang / tshul dang / 'jug pa dang / rigs pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam par spros pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la bden pa ni gang zhe na/ de kho na nyid gang yin pa'o// / 
245a3(rnying rgyud): gzhag pa ni gang zag dang / brtags pa dang / gcig pa dang / dbye ba dang / dri ba dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / gsang ba dang / bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa/ gzhag pa'o// / 
245a4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po nyes pa gang zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongasad pa'i rnam grangs so// yon tan gang zhe na/ yongs su byang ba'i rnam grangs so// lang ka'i bdag po tshul gang zhe
245a5(rnying rgyud): na/ don dang / thob pa dang / bshad pa dang / mtha' spong ba da nga / bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / dgongs pa'o// lang / ka'i bdag po 'jug pa gang zhe na/ dus dang / 'dus pa
245a6(rnying rgyud): dang ta rkyen rnams so// lang ka'i bdag po rigs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ltos pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / chos nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de la ltos pa gang zhe na/ gang
245a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa dag skye ba dang / tha snyad kyi phyir rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa'o// bya ba byed pa gang zhe na/ de la chos gang thob pa'i phyir ram/ grags pa 'am/ skyes nas las su bya ba'i phyir rgyu dang
245a8(rnying rgyud): rkyen du gyur pa'o// bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ de la gang go cha bgos pa ste/ gang smra ba dang / gang nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa rnams so// lang ka'i bdag po de
245b1(rnying rgyud): yang 'di ltar dag pa dang / ma dag pa gang dag pa ni dmigs pa dang / gnas pa dang / dpe dang / grags pa dang / nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la thams cad mi rtog pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
245b2(rnying rgyud): dang stong pa dang / bdag med pa ni dmigs pa'o// thams cad skad cig ma dang gzhan yod pa dang / las rnams mi rtag pa dang / las la gnas pa dang / de'i 'bras bu la gnas pa ni
245b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// thams cad la grags pa ni grags pa nye bar sbyor zhing dmigs pa nye bar sbyar ba ni dpe'o// de dag grags pa ni grags pa'o// gang gi tshad mas tshad ma nyid du snang ba ni nges
245b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o/ lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar byung ba dang // brtags dang / gcod pa dang / bral ba dang / snang / bas na tshad mar nges pa'o// de ni mngon sum dang / 
245b5(rnying rgyud): dpag pa dang / tshad mas dag pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po ma dag pa ni 'di ltar gzhan dang 'thun pa dang / mi 'thun pa dang / thams cad dang 'thun pa dang mi mthu/ 
245b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gzhan gyi dpe nye bar sbyar ba dang / ma grags pa dang / ma nges pa dag go// lang ka'i bdag po de la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid lnga pa ma yin pa'i tshad ma gzhan dang 'thun
245b7(rnying rgyud): par dmigs pa dang / 'dus byos kyi mtshan ma nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa ji lta ba la rtag pa dang / bdag la sogs pa gzhan du dmigs te phyin ci log bzhir lta bas 'dus ma
245b8(rnying rgyud): byas kyi mtshan nyid dang 'thun par dmigs pa 'di ni 'thun pa'o// chad ma gzhan dang mi 'thun pa dang / yul gyi mtshan nyid gzhan dang / mi 'thun pa 'di ni gzhan dang mi 'thun pa'o// 
246a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad yid kyi bya ba dag go zhes bya ba ni thams cad dang 'thun pa'o// mi mthun pa gang gcig gi mi mthun pas phan tshun mi mthun pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mi mthun pa'o// / 
246a2(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang 'thun pa dpe dang sbyar ba la mi mthun pa yod pas de ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma grags pa'o// mi mthun pa dpe dang sbyar ba la 'thun pa yod pas de ni ma nges
246a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o zhes bya ba ni de yang ma grags pa'o// gang ma grags pas gang gis brtags pa ma dag pa'o// gang rang bzhin gyis ma dag pa ni ma nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni bsgrub pa'o// / 
246a4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang du ma bcos pa de nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po gang du bsdus pa dang / rnam par spros pas ni thams cad kyang bsdus te/ gcig
246a5(rnying rgyud): la khyad par gyis phye te mthar phyin pa'o// lang ka'i bdag/ po dmigs pa ni 'dzin pa'o// rnam pa ni dbye ba'o// byang chub ni rang bzhin no// gang spangs pas gang thob pa
246a6(rnying rgyud): ni 'bras bu'o// gang chub cing gang la brjod pa ni snyad pa'o// gang gi phyogs dang mi mthun pa ni bar du gcod pa'o// gang gi phyogs la nan tan du byed pa ni 'thun pa'o// gang dang mi mthun
246a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang du rjen pa ni nyes dmigs so// gang du 'thun par dran pa ni yon tan no// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mtshan nyid kyis yan lag ste/ yan lag drug po de dag ni 'byed pa'i lde
246a8(rnying rgyud): mig ste/ gang spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des 'byed cing gang de nyid du dgongs pa nges par 'grel to// lang da rol mdo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgongs pa gzhan gyi
246b1(rnying rgyud): mdo dang / ldem po ngag gi mdo dang / 'thun 'jug sbyor ba'i mdo dang / don dam pa nges pa'i mdo'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la dgongs pa gzhan pa'i mdo 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin dang / dus dang / don
246b2(rnying rgyud): dang / yul la dgongs pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rang bzhin ni 'di ltar/ jig khyad par du snang ba la gang de ltar rtog pa zhen pa dag bsal ba'i phyir rang bzhin la dgongs te/ de
246b3(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa ni 'di nyid do// zhes gcig tu zhal gyis rtsal ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po dus ni 'di ltar sgyid lug pa gang dag mngon par spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi rgyu 'bras mi slu ba la
246b4(rnying rgyud): dgongs te/ gyen 'da' tsam 'dis myur ba nyid du 'gyur/ ro zhes ston pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po don ni 'di lta dar// gang gis gang la rlom sems pa/ de yi mun pa
246b5(rnying rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir// gang gis mthong lam ma thob par//  nyid mi mthong la dgongs te// 'di dag ni dpag tu/ med pa'i dam pas ma bsnyad par shes par mi nus so zhes
246b6(rnying rgyud): sgo'o// yang ka'i bdag po yul la dgongs pa ni 'di ltar gang phyogs gcig tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag blo skye ba'i phyir gang gi phyogs kun bkod de/ yongs su bsngags
246b7(rnying rgyud): pa brjod cing phyogs gcig gis mi chog pa la dgongs ste sngon du goms pa'i phyogs la smod pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la ldem po ngag gi mdo ni 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba dang / dbye ba
246b8(rnying rgyud): dang / zil gyis gnon pa dang / sla ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la sbyor ba ni gang 'di ltar gang skrag cing dang ngas pa dang / tshe chad par rtsol ba dang / gang mngon par zhen pa dag ci
247a1(rnying rgyud): yang mi 'jug pa de dag gang gri don la nges par gzhug pa'i phyir gang dang gang gi 'bras bu yod pa dang kun kyang rang bzhin med pa la dgongs te/ thams cad yod do// 
247a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid do zhes gang gi 'du shes gzhug pa'i phyir ro// lang ka'i bdag po dbye ba ni 'di ltar gang dang / gang la mos pa de ltar kun brtags pa dngos po med par
247a3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bshad pa dang / yongs su grub pa mi 'gyur ba phyin ci ma log par bshad pa gsum la dgongs te/ gsum bstan pa
247a4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po zil gyis gnon pa ni 'di ltar gang du na sum tshogs pa'i grags pa dag rdzogs longs spyod pa dag bstan pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir gnyen
247a5(rnying rgyud): por gyur pas 'dul bar dgongs te rgya chen po dag ston/ pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po smra ba ni 'di ltar gang 'a/ du shes log pa dag sbas pa'i thabs kyis nges par
247a6(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba'i phyir don mi 'gyur// ba la dgongs te rgyu gzhan du ston pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la 'thun 'jug sbyor ba'i lung 'di lta ste/ rang rkyen gnyer gyi lung dang / thabs 'dzud
247a7(rnying rgyud): bsre ba'i lung dang / cha 'thun sbyor ba'i lung dang / gdams ngag nan tan gyi lung ngo // lang ka'i po 'di la rang rkyen gnyer gyi lung ni 'di ltar gang la gang ltar rkyen du 'tsham pa de
247a8(rnying rgyud): la de ltar nyid ston pa'o// thabs 'jud bsre ba'i lung ni 'di ltar// gang bsdu ba'i thabs kyis gang gi cha dang 'dren mas de dag bsgyur ba'o// cha mthun sbyor ba ni 'di ltar gang gi cha bzhin
247b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pas 'di ltar spyod pa'o// gdams ngag nan tan gyi lung ni 'di ltar gang la gang ga ces smras byas ste 'jog pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la don dam nges pa'i lung ni 'di lta ste/ 
247b2(rnying rgyud): dgos pa dang / nges pa dang / ngo bo dang / gal po'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la dgos pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang byung ba dag gang gi phyir brtags te/ de ltar de'i phyir ngos zin pa'o// 
247b3(rnying rgyud): nges pa ni 'di ltar gang la gtan la phab pa de'i nges pa rnyed pa'o// rang gi ngo bo ni 'di ltar gang brtags pa brjod pa'i dngos gzhi'o// gal ba ni 'di ltar gang la gang gis gal du gtod pa nyid
247b4(rnying rgyud): dod/ lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nges pa dam pa'i lung ste/ mdo bzhi po de dag ni dgrol ba'i lde mig ste/ gang sbyo dad pas 'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des dgrol zhing gang
247b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid du gsal bar byed pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ blo'i rtsa ba dang / gros kyi rtsa ba dang / thabs kyi rtsa ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po
247b6(rnying rgyud): de la blo'i rtsa ba ni 'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i de bzhin nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog lha ne ba'o// lang ka'i bdag po gros kyi rtsa ba ni 'di ltar gang thams cad nas thams cad du ma 'dres
247b7(rnying rgyud): pa la ma rmongs pa nyid sa le pa'o// lang kwa'i bdag po thabs kyi rtsa ba ni 'di ltar gang yongs su rdzogs pa la rnam par dag pa nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba ste/ rtsa ba gsum
247b8(rnying rgyud): po 'di dag ni 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ste// gang spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des 'byed cing de nyid du gsal bar byed do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i ma
248a1(rnying rgyud): chen po las bkod pa rnam par 'grel pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248a2(rnying rgyud): des bsang ba pa'i bdag po la sgo gnyis kyi dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang sgo gnyis 'byed cing rnam par 'grel pa ji ltar 'byed pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag
248a3(rnying rgyud): po sgo gnyis ni 'di ltar 'di yang lde mig gsum gyis rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa ste/ thun mong gi yan lag dang mdo dang / rtsa ba'o// gang 'di ltar yan lag drug ni 'di lta ste/ bya
248a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i yan lag dang / thabs kyi yan lag dang / sbyor ba'i ya na lag dang / spyod pa'i yan lag dang / rigs pa'i yan lag dang / rdzogs pa'i yan lag go/ lang ka'i bdag po yan lag
248a5(rnying rgyud): drug po 'di dag kyang gcig tu yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag drug gis gsal bar 'grel pa ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgo'i
248a6(rnying rgyud): yan lag dang / dam pa'i yan lag dang / nges pa'i yan lag dang / bsam pa'i yan lag dang / dmigs pa'i yan lag dang / bzlas pa'i yan lag dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag dang
248a7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i yan lag dang / thob pa'i yan lag dang / gnas pa'i yan lag dang / sa'i yan lag dang / lta ba'i yan lag go/ lang ka'i bdag po drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i yan lag
248a8(rnying rgyud): dang / rtsa ba'i yan lag dang / 'brel pa'i yan lag dang / 'dren pa'i yan lag dang / nges pa'i yan lag dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag go/ lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni gang thams cad
248b1(rnying rgyud): nas thams cad du thun mong du shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yan lag ste/ gang sgo de dag de dag gis 'byed cing gsal bar 'grel par shes par bya'o// lang ka'i
248b2(rnying rgyud): bdag po de la mdo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba med pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / ji bzhin pa dang / brtsal ba med par lung ston pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhan gyi skye ba
248b3(rnying rgyud): med pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / ji bzhin po dang / brtsal ba med pa dang / ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de kho na nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dekho na nyid gang yin
248b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dam par nges pa dang / yongs su zin pa'o// lang dka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsu ba ste/ des sgo de dag gi lta ba nges par 'byin par shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas
248b5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsdu ba rnam par 'grel pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag
248b6(rnying rgyud): bos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa lang ka'i bdag po de dag las khyad par du nges pa'i gsang sgo lde mog gsum gyis 'byed pa yang 'di lta ste/ dam pa rnams kyi bsang ba'i
248b7(rnying rgyud): sgo ta yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yi// 'byed 'grol nges par 'byin pa yis// de nyid nges par mthong ba'o// 'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang // 'brel pa'i tshig dang nges pa dang // sbyor bas
248b8(rnying rgyud): yan lag rdzogs pa yin// brjod 'byung kun la nges par 'gro// rgyu gzhi gang byung chad phyir na// rgyu yi ngobo byin gyis rlabs// lung bstan nyid du nges par snang // rtsa ba'i yan lag gang
249a1(rnying rgyud): dag gis// mdun bsu gus dang dri ba dris// skabs las gleng du langs pa'o// 'brel pa yan lag rnam pa bzhi// brjod dang brjod bya 'brel dgongs las// tha ma gnyis
249a2(rnying rgyud): bzhir 'dren pa'o// 'dren pa gang 'dir rnam pa bcu// lta nyid de bzhin sgro 'byed dang // spyir sdud pa dang 'byor par 'dren// rang rkyen ldem dgongs gal po nyid// ma bcos de nyid mtshon
249a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpe// tshe rol sbrel zhi rnam pa bcu// me long bcu dang rnam sbyor bas// sgron mas mun pa'i rdzas tshol sbyar// nges pa bzhi bzhi bzhir sbyar bas// bcu gnyis yan lag bzhir kun snang // 
249a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba bzhi pa lnga gnyis bzhi// yan lag lngar snang de sbyar lnga// rtog 'jug drug bcu cig thabs dang // yan lag drug tu rdzogs pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gang 'dir
249a5(rnying rgyud): yan lag drug ni 'di lta ste// rgyu'i yan lag dang / rtsa ba'i/ yan lag dang / 'brel pa'i yan lag dang / 'dre/ na pa'i yan lag dang / nges pa'i yan lag dang // sbyor
249a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i yan lag go// lang ka'i bdag po de la rgyu'i yan lag ni gang 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa drug go// lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar 'di skad bdag
249a7(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa kho na nyid nges par snang ba'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya
249a8(rnying rgyud): ba tha snyad dang bral ba/ bla dgas thams cad las 'das pa/ na mkha' chen po kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum mi gnas mtshon du med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po des
249b1(rnying rgyud): yongs su khyab pa'i gnas rdzogs pa'i spyir chib ces bya ba nam pa'i dbyings bde ba chen po'i ngang / thams cad sangs rgyas pa mkhyen par dgod pa/ kun gzhi chos kyi pho brang ye 'byam
249b2(rnying rgyud): rmad du grags pa/ rgya phyogs su yongs su ma chad pa/ chos nyid kyi na mkha' brjod du med pa la ye shes kyi nyi ma dpag tu med par shar ba/ mtha' dang dbus med cing kun tu rgya
249b3(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa bdal khyab chen po zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na/ gang du yang mi gnas pa chen po/ gang la yang mi chags chags pa'i bdag nyid/ ci la yang mi mdzad mdzad pa thams
249b4(rnying rgyud): cad lhun gyis grub mi skye mi 'gag rnam grol rnam dag/ dngos por ma yin na mkha'i rang bzhin/ ma bco/ das ma byas ye nas ji bzhin/ 'khor ba mi spong ye nas/ 
249b5(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin/ 'khor ba mi spong ye bdal khyab pa/ dug gsu/ ma mi spong sman pa chen po// cir yang mi dmigasadamigs pa kun 'byung / tshig gi lam chad brjod pa
249b6(rnying rgyud): kun 'byung // gang dang ma 'dres gcig tu yongs su rdzogs pa/ kun nas kun tu ngang bzang po mi nub pa'i tog chen por ye shes brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba dang // / 
249b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra 'bral med par kun tu 'ub chub ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi tshig 'di skad 'thun 'jug thabs su thos pa'i dus
249b8(rnying rgyud): gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de blang dor mi mnga' byin gyis rlabs kyi dbang phyug/ 'dod pa kun 'byung mi
250a1(rnying rgyud): zad mdzod kyi bkod pa/ che ba kun spyom ngam par rol pa'i gzi brjid dang / rlabs su gcod pa'i spyod pa chen pos skrod pa de rmad du byung don 'di nyid gleng ba'i gnas tshogs
250a2(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs pa'i gzhi// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bde ba can zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang mtha' dang dpung
250a3(rnying rgyud): med cing rtse mo kun tu rgyu mnyam pa/ rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par brgyan pa// mu tig gi lcang lo dang / chun 'phyang dang / ljang ldis mdzes pa/ rtsibs kun tu nyi ma dang / zla ba rangs
250a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ma rangs pa 'phyo bas gsal btab cing 'phya bkod pa/ skar ma dang shing du skar ma dag gis gzer rasmras pa/ rin po che'i kab brgyad thub pa/ nyi ma dang zla bas brgyan
250a5(rnying rgyud): pa rin po che'i ka rgyan las rin po che'i gtsar dang 'od zer kun tu 'phro ba/ gdung chen po brgyad re'u re/ sa bres pa/ chos nyid kyi bla re la rdo rje'i shar bu byung ba// 
250a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi sprin phung gi gtabs pa/ byang chub kyi char mngon par 'bab pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sangs par gyur pa/ ye shes kyi myu gu mngon par skyed pa dang / chos nyid sgra mngon
250a7(rnying rgyud): par sgrogs pa las kun gzhi ya 'byam rmad du grags pa'i gleng slong ba// tshig gis brjod pa dang bral zhing bzhin dang me long gi tshul ltar snang ba/ gzhal yas khang rdo rje
250a8(rnying rgyud): mngon par dga' ga rdo rjes rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/ gser gyi sa gzhi bdal ga me long ngam/ chu shal lam/ chu dang ba'am/ gser shin du
250b1(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa ltar mnyam zhing snyoms la gsal zhing 'tsher ba las gzugs brnyan byung ba// nem pa/ 'phar ga 'jam pa/ dag pa/ dang ba/ ldem pa gnyen pa/ 'bar ba/ 'phro ga rtog
250b2(rnying rgyud): pa med pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rang bzhin gyis byung zhing zer kun du 'phro bas// phyi nang gi mun pa/ yongs su sel ga dbu rtse 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir 'bar ba/ rdo rjes kun tu smras pa/ 
250b3(rnying rgyud): sgo gsum kun tu gsal ba la ba ti 'od kyi mu khyud yongs su ma chad pa/ nyi zla'i ga bu sum brgyud zung sgril du 'bar ba/ them skas dang rta babs kyis brgyan pa/ bar khyams kyis mdzes
250b4(rnying rgyud): pa ha ra dang / har chen pos brgyan pa/ tA ra na yis bzung ba/ phreng bas mdzes pa/ dri ba dang dra ba byed pas brgyan pa/ zar tshags kyi klubs pa/ rdo rje rin po che 'bar
250b5(rnying rgyud): bas kun du mdangs phyung ba/ dril bu g.yer ka las theg pa chen po chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ chos kyi sku'i ga zugs brnyan 'byung ba/ gzhi yongs su mdzes pa'i rgyan rdo
250b6(rnying rgyud): rje mu khyud ma chad pas rdo rje 'greng bu dang dra bas brgyan pa/ ta la'i shing ljon pa skyes pa la gser gyi cong tsong bros pa/ rin po che'i phra mig gis smras pa/ bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa/ phyi dang
250b7(rnying rgyud): nang med kun yang nang du gyur pa na/ gar yang ma 'gags snang ba chen po/ ci yang ma gsungs rgya cher bshad pa/ gang la yang mi dgongs ting nge 'dzin chen po mnga' thang yongs
250b8(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po de rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po mi bskyod pa la/ 
251a1(rnying rgyud): / sogs pa rdo rje gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po btang snyoms chen po la sogs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas
251a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po sems/ 
251a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po rnam mi rig la sogs pa glang po'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas
251a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun kyang thabs sprin phung lta bu dang / shes rab nam mkha' lta bur 'brel pa she dag dang / gtso bo dang 'kho ra gyi tshul du rdzogs longs spyod par bzhugs so// rgya cher
251a5(rnying rgyud): brjod pa ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i tshig 'di skad du bkri ba'i/ thabs su thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ cho 'phrul chen po cir yang snang ba'i rgyal po rnams ni
251a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba rdzogs pa'i gnas bsod nams gter zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gnas ji bzhin pa mos pa can zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na/ 'khor ba 'dren pa'i sangs
251a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang / snang srid ston pa'i sgron ma/ gdul ba sol pa'i sems dpa'/ 'gro don mdzad pa'i 'phags pa/ thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sprul pa/ 'byung ba rgyun gyi bcom ldan 'das/ 
251a8(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rtag pa'i bdag nyid chen por sprul pa de 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba dag dang / ston pa dang nyan pa'i tshul du rnam par bshad pa chen por bzhugs te/ 
251b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad bden pa gnyis kyi tshul du snang bar ston 'dod pa rang rkyen gyi tshig 'di skad du ma bkag chos nyid du dgongs pa rang snang thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i/ 
251b2(rnying rgyud): sku bde ba chen po cho 'phrul yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnas/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i khyad par zab mo gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa yum gyis lhums pad+ma'i snying po rgyal
251b3(rnying rgyud): ba kun gyi skrun pa'i pho brang // gang gi den la gshegs pa'i shul/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can smin par byed pa'i gzhi/ chags pa'i rten 'byung ba'i gnas/ 'gro ba'i lam du
251b4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa de dang cha 'thun du bstan pa pad+mo can zhes bya bar dgrags pa'i zhing khams na/ thun mong ma gyur gas pa'i sku ste/ gsang ba'i 'khor brjod gyis mi lang ba
251b5(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ gsang ba'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje myur ba dang / rdo rje chen po mgyogs pa dang / rdo rje chen po rnon po dang / rdo rje chen po 'byung ba dang / rdo rje chen po 'byed pa
251b6(rnying rgyud): dang ta/ rdo rje chen po che ba dang / rdo rje chen po yangs pa dang / rdo rje chen po zab pa dang / rdo rje chen po brtan pa dang / rdo rje chen po sna tshogs la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i 'khor 'byung
251b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug dang bcas te/ gang the tshom gcod pa dang / chod pa dang / zhu bar ldog pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad re re la yang sku'i bye brag 'di ltar
251b8(rnying rgyud): snang zhing tha dad du snang ba yang med do// gcig dang tha dad pa'o ngo bo las kyang grol la// lhan ni lhang nge lham me lhag ger kun nas kun du snang ngo // de'i tshe de'i dus na mo chen po'i spyod
252a1(rnying rgyud): yul thabs kyi theg pa chen po gsang ba'i snying po 'di sku bzhi rnam par snang ba la thos pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don rgyal ba'i sras drag la de kho na nyid ltar 'gro ba 'di lta ste/ 
252a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so// / 
252a3(rnying rgyud): gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so// thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te/ 'jug pa'am/ ldog
252a4(rnying rgyud): pa'am/ rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so// lang ka'i bdag/ po gnyis ni gang byung brjod pa gnyis nyid do// lang // de'i bdag po de dag ni rgyu'i yan lag ces bya'o// sangs rgyu
252a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gleng gan phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // lang ka'i bdag po rtsa
252a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i yan lag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brjod pa 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gang gis gang gleng bslang ba gang yin pa la bya ste/ 'di ltar de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dbyings kyi ngang las mi
252a7(rnying rgyud): g.yo bar mnal bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma stong pa nyid kyis ngang las bskul ba chen po'i sgra 'di 'byung ngo // yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor
252a8(rnying rgyud): mthus// na mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong // mi gnas mi dmigs na mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes sgra byung ba las// 
252b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos thams cad byang chub snying po la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las nyi ma rdo rje byung ste/ dper na na mkha' dang ba las/ nyi ma'i snying po shar ba lta bu'o// 
252b2(rnying rgyud): de nas nyi ma'i snying po de las 'od zer bye ba mang po bkye bas dper na nyi ma stong las 'od zer bye ba bkye ba lta bu'o// 'od zer de dag las thugs rje byang chub sems kyi sprin mngon par
252b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrigs te/ rol pa'i char mngon par bab pas sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang / rol pa sna
252b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi gar dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang // kar go dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rkyen dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshos
252b5(rnying rgyud): kyi shes rab dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi ye shes dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi tshor ba dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po dang / 
252b6(rnying rgyud): rol pa sna tshogs kyi btsun mo stong pa chen po de bzhin nyid la rnam par 'jug par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa nyid kyi ngang de las chos nyid
252b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi sgra 'di byung ngo // tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha// longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod
252b8(rnying rgyud): bdag/ thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes sgra des bskul bas bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam par bzhengs te/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 
253a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'khyil ba dang / rnam par 'gying ba dang / rnam par brjid pa dang / gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang / rnam par bzhes pa sna tshogs pa dang / thugs rje'i 'phro 'du dang / 
253a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan gyi khyad par dang / 'od zer gyi 'bar 'phro la sogs pa sprul pa glog gi phreng bas na mkha' thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de// thams cad nas thams cad du mtshan ma dang / 
253a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa la gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi ngang gis yongs su khyab ste/ rang bzhin gsal ba nyid do// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
253a4(rnying rgyud): yum stong pa chen po de kho na nyid las bskul ba tha ma'i sgra 'dadi byung ngo // ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i// 'phags
253a5(rnying rgyud): rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas// bder gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// zhes pa skul bas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag
253a6(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
253a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngang las rnam par bskul ba chen po'i sgra byung ba de dag las 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te/ de dag thams cad 'grin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa de kho na
253a8(rnying rgyud): nyid las glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo// e ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog na mkha' lta bu las// khyab pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing // gzi brjid sprin phung rol pas bsgyings pa'i sku/ 
253b1(rnying rgyud): thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i cho 'phrul ston// e ma'o yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las// snyan pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing // yan lag rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa'i gsung // 
253b2(rnying rgyud): seng ge sgra yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston// e ma'o ye shes snying po nyi zla lta bu las// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing // thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs// rnam grol
253b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston// mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal dra bas bcings pa thabs kyis khrol// ma rig mun pas long ba don gyis phye// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
253b4(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i gru yis sgrol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thu dgas chen po// ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan / rnal 'byor theg chen rdo rje kun 'dus lung / 'dus pa'i
253b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol// a ho zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi
253b6(rnying rgyud): glu des gsol pa btab pas 'khor thams cad la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad pas// thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyi mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba 'od zer
253b7(rnying rgyud): 'byam klas pa kun nas kun tu khyab par mdzad do// 'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srin po lta bu'i gzugs sna tshogs 'byung ngo // de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bru
253b8(rnying rgyud): phrag dpag tu med 'khor so so'i zhab 'bring dang bcas pa zhing khams mtha' yas par khyab cing snang bar gyur to// de las rig pa'i nyi ma'i 'od na mkha'i khams khyab par byung bas mun
254a1(rnying rgyud): pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa thams cad yang dag par bsal lo// rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang / chos kyi char dang / chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang / chos kyi gar sna tshogs dang / 
254a2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung te/ 'byam klas pa'i na mkha' la phan tshun dang / yan man dang / snrel zhing la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long phyad par byung ngo // rmad du byung
254a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer 'bar 'phro 'khrug cing ling long phyed do// rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lha nga'o// rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang a he zhes
254a4(rnying rgyud): sgrags so// sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa yang gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu e ma'o rmad byung ro// la pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrogs// 'khor 'bum phrag
254a5(rnying rgyud): dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed// rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs// don gyi che ba phyung / ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ thams cad nye bar gnas so// zhi bar gnas so//
