279b8(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi rang bzhin dang // de la lta ba'i rang bzhin dang // de las mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin dang // de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin no// grogs po dag 'di la gsang sngags kyi rang
280a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin ni 'di lta ste// na mkha'i lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtog/ de bzhin sa yi rang bzhin pas// thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no// me yi
280a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin lta bu bas// dngos po thams cad med par byed// rlung gi rang bzhin lta bu bas// g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i rdul kun sel// chu'i rang bzhin kho na pas// gzhan med de bzhin
280a3(rnying rgyud): nyid du 'dus// sman gyi rang bzhin yin pas na// 'khor ba'i gtsang snying rnam pa 'byon// 'di ltar 'tshe rang bzhin pas// 'chi ba dag pa kun gyi gsos// gcod pa'i rang bzhin lta bu bas// sdug
280a4(rnying rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod// nyi ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// mun khang snang ston gsal ba nyid// ri rab ltabu'i rang bzhin pas// cis kyang bskyod cing g.yo' ba
280a5(rnying rgyud): med /  rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// mi g.yo ba las byin rlabs 'byung // de bzhin rtsi yi rang bzhin pas// dug la sman 'gyur ji bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha'
280a6(rnying rgyud): yas mchog/ rnam par rtog bral thams cad 'byung // ma bcos ma slad de bzhin pa'o// grogs po dag de dag ni gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// zhes thos pa rnam
280a7(rnying rgyud): par bgos pa'o// grogs po dag de la rang bzhin ni gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ ma nor mi 'gyur nges bcad de// ma chags mi rtog nyam ming // dper na na mkha'i rang bzhin las// / 
280a8(rnying rgyud): sprin dang na bun khug blangs dang // zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dag/ snang yang na mkha' bzhin du gnas de bzhin nyid kyi na mkha' las// mtshan ma rnam rtog ci byung yang // chos
280b1(rnying rgyud): nyid na mkha' bzhin gnas par// rnal 'byor can gyis blta bar bya// ji bzhin ma bcos de bzhin la// mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis// lta ba'i khyad par so sor blta// rnam par
280b2(rnying rgyud): rtog nyid// log sred can la log rtog nyid// phyogs 'dzin tsam la tha snyad rdzas// phyogs shes tsam la sgyu mar snang // de nyid der nges namakhar mthong // nu mkha' bzhin gnas nam pa
280b3(rnying rgyud): la tAn mkha' nyid du snang bar zab/ grogs po dag de dag ni lta ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes thos pi nges par bgros pa'o// grogs po dag de las mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin
280b4(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ chos nyid na mkha' lta bu 'dir// thams cad yongs kyis gcig pa la// bsrung dang de mi bsrung phyogs dang bral// bsrung ba'i tshad gzungs
280b5(rnying rgyud): ga la yod// na mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas// na mkha/ 'a lta bu'i dam tshig bsrung // gang 'dir bsrung mtsha/ mas med na bde// des ni thams cad bsrungs pa yin// / 
280b6(rnying rgyud): ci phyir thams cad thams cad kun// dam par nges pa yin pas na// tshad 'dzin tshad yod byed nyid nyams// gang la bsrung dang mi bsrung ba'i// rnam rtog de dag med kyang bla'i// de
280b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra bsrung ba'i mtshams 'dzin pa// sgyu ma yin pas dam pa min// de la bsrung zhes su zhig zer// bsrung dang mi bsrang tshig med de// chos nyid de la blang dor byed// dam par
280b8(rnying rgyud): gyur pa ga la yin// bsrung dang mi bsrung chos rnams ni// bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag/ de bzhin nyid kyi don dam la// ji bzhin pa yi blo bzhag ste// brjod pa med pa'i
281a1(rnying rgyud): // dam tshig gis// bsrung mtshams med pa'i ngang du bsdam// bsrung med na mkha'i dam tshig 'di// ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la// sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang
281a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten pa la chad mdo brtsan// byis pa rnams la tshul shes pa// nar son pA la sdom par grags// bla med mchog la dam par snang // gcig gi don las ma g.yos kyang // 
281a3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i ngo la so sor grags// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// gcig bsrungs pas na kun bsrungs pa'i// dam pa'i dam tshig chen po 'di// 
281a4(rnying rgyud): kun dang 'gal bar mi bya zhing // gang gi don du 'gyur/ par bya// grogs po dag de dag ni mi 'da' ba'i rang de bzhin du shes par bya'o// zhes thos pa yongs su 'gros
281a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o//  kye grogs po dag de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin ga nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi// mtha' gsum yongs su dag rdzogs na// dam pa'i
281a6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa yin pas na// dman min dam pa'i rigs shes bshad// rdo rje lus kyi spyod pa ni// phyin pa med las lus mi bcos// gcig pu nyid pas gcig tu gnas// glang po'i
281a7(rnying rgyud): lto stangs ji bzhin dang // de bzhin rnal mas gnas par bya// gang du gnas pas rtag par gnas// gnas pa de la chags mi bya// spyod lam rnam bzhir gar ldan pa// ma
281a8(rnying rgyud): bcos rnal mar gnas par bya// gang gis gdung ba mi nyen pa'i// gnod pa skyo pa dag tsam las// bzang dang rgyan phyin bcos mi bya// gang du ji ltar bdi ldan sbyar// rdo rje
281b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi spyod yul ni// bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchod rten dag gis las mi bya// glegs bam klag par mi bya zhing // gzugs brnyan brnam pa'i las mi bya// lag gi
281b2(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya mi bcing zhing // ngag gi bzlas pa de la skri/ rnal 'byor lus kyi phyag ma bya// rnyed dang bkur sti bAlta ma yin// kha phyir ma yin grags phyir min// ci phyir phyi rol gas
281b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / shin tu g.yeng ba yin pa'i phyir// de la nye ba ma yin pas// lus 'di rnal mas gnas par bya'o// rnal 'byor nges pa'i bsam gtan pos// rdo rje sngags kyi kha zas
281b4(rnying rgyud): ni/ lus zungs 'dzin pa'i rten tsam du// gar ldan 'byor ldan ma gtogs pa// zas phyir ched du sgrub mi bya// mchog dang nyam phyir ga la yin// ma bcos rnal
281b5(rnying rgyud): mdza bzhin bza'i// 'tsho ba'i ched du bcos ma bya// chag sa dang mchags spang blang med// blang bar bya ba ma yin zhing // blongs mos 'tsho bar yong mi bya// ci'i phyir de ni mi
281b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur phyir// 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa'o// mtshams med pa las mtshams gcod pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor can gyi las// shes bya nang gi chos nyid la// rnal 'byor don du 'jug
281b7(rnying rgyud): pa na ta/ phye'i 'du 'ji g.yeng ba yis// bar du gcod pa bsal ba'i phyir// phyi dang nang gi so mtsham su// 'gro 'ong 'phrul rnams gcod par bya// gang la gnas bzhi rten med pas// 
281b8(rnying rgyud): gnas bder lus bcos kha na med// zhen pas spyod lam bcos byed pa// des ni lus bcos bslad pa yin// bsam gtan lus dben btsos mi bya// de la de dben ma bcos pa// / 
282a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid ye nas dben pa'i gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gri yul// ri phug gzhan med bcos mi bya// de nyid dpag med ma bcos pa'i// 'di ni ye nas dmad 'byung gzhal// 
282a2(rnying rgyud): byed pa med par rang 'byung ba'o// rdo rje ngag gi spyod yul yang // dman pa'i ched du gnyen smra las// gzhan du kha gsag gzha min// brjod pa thams cad nges pa nyid// gsong por smra
282a3(rnying rgyud): zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin bya// thams cad kun tu smra ma yin// gang brjod don dang 'brel par bya// skabs dang dgos chem gtogs pa// rnam par 'chal par
282a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba min// kun la dpes mtshon thog tu dbab// thams cad chad pas tshad mar bya// ma bcos ngang gi rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje nga gi spyod par bshad// rdo rje yid kyi spyod yul
282a5(rnying rgyud): ni/ nyam bcos ma g.yos bsam dang bral// mi g.yeng ma rmugs gsal zhing gnas// 'dod la ma chags sgo skur bral// blang med dor med chags sdang medo// 'chab
282a6(rnying rgyud): bcom med de rnyed 'byor min// phyogs bral mu med yongs su dag/ go dgos lam nyid drang por song // dug 'gyur sman bsrel mtshon char ldan// rdo rje rdzong la zhen pa dang // yid
282a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin nor bu blo gros ldan// gang du mi 'gyur gang mi 'gyur// dbyings 'dir kun dang gcig pa dang // gang gi blo la mngon pa'i phyir// yongs su mdzes dang bag yod dang // de nyid
282a8(rnying rgyud): dbang las khrel yod dang // de la nga'am nga med pas// kun la yongs su ldan pa dang // thams cad de bas nges pa dang // gang 'di stong pas cir mi rtog/ de nyid zhi bas 'khrug med dang // gang nas// 
282b1(rnying rgyud): ci yang me 'byung bas// gzhan du tshol ba med pa dang // zang zing med pa tshul mi 'chos// gdung ba med pas 'dod pa med// ma chags 'byung bas chog par 'dzin// gang la mtshan mar mi 'dzin
282b2(rnying rgyud): pas ta gtsang sme med cing dus gsum med// de bzhin dam pa yod ma yin/ sems nyid na mkha'i snying po de// glo bur sprin gyis gtibs spungs pas// shes rab rlung gi ma gtor bar// 
282b3(rnying rgyud): gzha mkhan gyi spyod 'dra yis// sgrib bsal chos nyid gsal 'dod pas// ji ltar chus gsher byas pa dag/ nyi ma sprin ltar grib ma yis// shin tu bsgribs par gyur pa na// byis pa'i
282b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin mi shes pas// sprin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la // kha yis dbug kyis bus byas nas// sprin bsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'dra'o// grogs po dag de dag ni de
282b5(rnying rgyud): ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// zhes thos pa phyin ci ma log par// sangs rgyas kun gyis da// ngas pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rang bzhin
282b6(rnying rgyud): gyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la
282b7(rnying rgyud): dri ba yongs su nges pa// kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po ljon shing bskyed par bya'o// zhes dam bca' bar gsungs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi// de gang gi ljon shing lags
282b8(rnying rgyud): zhes dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye grogs po dag shing ni byang chub kyi ljon shing ste// bla na med pa'i 'bras bur smin pas gang mtha' dag gi gsos su 'gyur
283a1(rnying rgyud): // pa'i phyir ljon shing de bskyed par bya'o// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ de nyid rdo rje snying po las// gang gi zug rngu kun byang der// ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa la// gang gi dgongs pa
283a2(rnying rgyud): nges 'grel pa// sbyor ba'i skabs su bshad pa dag/ de nyid rnam par 'gro bar bya// de la dgongs 'grel sbyor skabs bcu// 'dun pa snyed dang rtsol ba sbyor/ bslab par 'jug dang 'du
283a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'gyur// sbyor nas ro tshor yul la 'jug/ rtogs chen rjeng 'gyur las su rung // rgyun dang brla pa'i sem skabs bcu// snying po de dag rgyun bcas phyir// rnal 'byor chen po'i
283a4(rnying rgyud): skabs bcu yis// rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i khyad par la// bcu drug rgyun gyis nges par rdzogs// de bzhin ye shes thams cad la// rnam pa bcu yi khyad par gyis// 
283a5(rnying rgyud): dang po nas bzung rdzogs par du// sbyar ba gang de sgrib/ pa nub par 'gyur// gang zag gis gang mthongader na// rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung // de nyid de nub
283a6(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na// g.yo dang smon dang ldang ba dang // sbyor ba 'jug dag mi 'gyur ba// rig dang gnas dang rdzogs pa'o// gang gi gzugs brnyan gang snang ba// dngos med rang snang 'thun pa'i dpe'a'o// 
283a7(rnying rgyud): phra mo tha mal chen po yi// skar ma zla ches gnyis pa dang // gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang // brgyad dang bcu drug lta bur snang // 'dun pa skye ba'i skabs dag la// g.yo ba lhag pa'i
283a8(rnying rgyud): sems 'byung te// mun pa'i sprin rum lta bu yi// gzer 'phro skar ma rab rib snang // rtsol ba sbyor ba'i skabs dag la// smon pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// shin tu skar ma phal pa
283b1(rnying rgyud): ngag ta gang la rab rib lta bu'o// bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// ldang ba byang chub sems 'byung ste// ji ltar me yi gzer chen dang // skar chen lta bu rab rib snang // 'du shes 'gyur ba'i
283b2(rnying rgyud): skabs dag la// sbyor ba lhag pa'i sems skye ste// ji ltar 'gal me 'khor lo dang // gcig pa'i zla ches lta bur snang // sbyor chen 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// 'jug pa lhag pa'i sems
283b3(rnying rgyud): skye ste te ji ltar sgron me lta bu dang // zla tshes gnyis pa lta bur snang // ro myong ba yi skabs ngag la// dga' ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// snod kyi sgron ma lta bu 'am// gsum pa lta bur
283b4(rnying rgyud): de snang ngo // yul la 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// mi 'a gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// thob dang bstan la/ nye ba yin// bzhi pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang // rtogs chen
283b5(rnying rgyud): dag gi skabs dag la// rig pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// rtags chen dang po nye bar brnyan// lnga pa lta bu'i ra nga bzhin snang // rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs dag la// gnas pa
283b6(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// shin tu brtan pa'i sgron ma dang // brgyad pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang // rtag thob nyid na 'grub ces bya// las su rung ba'i skabs dag la/ rdzogs pa lhag
283b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems 'byung ste// gnyen po med pa'i sgron ma dang // cha la rdzogs pa lta bur snang // brtan pas nges par grub pa yin// sems nyid ya nas sangs rgyas la// rtogs pas bsgrib
283b8(rnying rgyud): pas de ma shes// byang chub sems kyi ljon shing las// bla med 'bras bu smin pa yin// des na grogs po dam pa dag/ dam pa rnams kyis byang chub sems// kun tu rgyun dang
284a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pa ste// rgyun med chad pa dam pa min// rgyun nyid kyis na nges smin pa// gang du smin pa'i skyed shing de// byang chub dam pa ljon pa'i shing // 'bras bu dam pa smin pa'o// / 
284a2(rnying rgyud): grogs po dag de dag ni ljon shing dam pa bskyed pa'i dgongs pa nges par bgros pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dam
284a3(rnying rgyud): pa ljon shing bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis dri ba
284a4(rnying rgyud): yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa rnams kyis rjes su 'jug par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de dam pa rnams kyi rjes su dza ltar 'jug
284a5(rnying rgyud): par bgyi// de skad ces yongs su dris pa las// gsang ba/ pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye grogs po dag de ni 'di ltar dman pa rnams kyi rjes ni gang nges par
284a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i lam dam pa la bya'o// grogs po dag lam dam po gang zhe na/ de ltar de kho bos mthong thos pa'i skabs gcig na bshes gnyen dam pa nyid kyis nges par gsungs
284a7(rnying rgyud): pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku gnyen po med pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang ldan te/ rtag pa nyid dang / chad pa nyid dang / skye ba nyid dang / 'gag pa nyid dang / dmigs pa dang / 'dod chags
284a8(rnying rgyud): pa nyid dang / zhe sdang ba nyid dang / gti mug pa nyid dang / nga rgyal ba nyid dang / phrag dog pa nyid dang / 'dod pa lnga dang / srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas
284b1(rnying rgyud): log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / brnabs sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba nyid do// mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang / 
284b2(rnying rgyud): nye ba lnga dang / lci ba bzhi dang / log pa brgyad dang / sme sha dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / khrag dang / khu ba la sogs pa dag la nges par spyod pa ni dam pa rnams kyi lam dam
284b3(rnying rgyud): pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes nges pa dam par gsungs pa las/ kho bos de la 'di skad du/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smra rnams kyis// yang dag
284b4(rnying rgyud): tshad ma'i gsung dag las// phyin ci log kun 'byung tsa la/ dgas// de skad zhu ba 'dus pa las// bshes gnyen dadam pas bka' stsal pa// phyin ci log pa zhen pa rnam
284b5(rnying rgyud): thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang bas// nges pa'i don la gzud pa'i phyir// khrid pa'i thabs su bstan pa yin// log zhe na gang la ngos bstan yang // 'jug
284b6(rnying rgyud): par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur rnams// log spyod thabs kyis de drangs na// the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// slu ba'i thabs kyis gzung ba'i phyir// so so mos pa sna
284b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis// lta spyod rnams dang 'thun 'jug tu// sbyar nas bsten 'bring thabs su gsungs// dper na log spyod byis pa rnams// pha mas bsdigs brid thabs kyis ni// 
284b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i las la gzud pa ltar// brtse bas don la 'dren pa'o// de yang ji ltar la la zhig/ chu bo pha mthar 'gro 'dod pa// grub dag la brten pas 'gro// mthar son pa na 'bor ba
285a1(rnying rgyud): / bzhin// thabs sa ma theg pa'i bye brag rnams// bsnyen pas drang ba'i thabs yin yang // don gyi nges pa rnyed ma thag// chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin 'dor// des na de bzhin nyid/ 
285a2(rnying rgyud): shes na// thams cad thams cad gang yang rung // dam pa'i lam du nges pas na// lam gyi nang na nye lam yin// de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// kye grogs
285a3(rnying rgyud): po dag de bas na dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa 'dir zhugs na// thams cad nas thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shes pa dang / gsal ba dang / ma 'dres pa
285a4(rnying rgyud): dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te// 'khor ba yongs/ su shes par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par/ bya'o// mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su shes par 'dod
285a5(rnying rgyud): pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o// gzhan yang cho 'phru la chen po nyi shu thob par 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par bya'o// rtogs pa'i ri bo brgyad
285a6(rnying rgyud): bcu gzhil bar 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par bya'o// ltung ba'i sgo dgu chad par 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa
285a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i thams cad thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i// shes par 'dod pa gang dag gis dam pa'i lam 'di shes par bya// sems nyid dmo pa'i lam nyid de// ma
285a8(rnying rgyud): la bya lam rjes med bzhin// nyam nga log med dam pa'i lam// 'di ltar nges pa'i lam 'di yang // kun gyis shes par bya ba'i phyir// tshig gi lam gyis gnyer mtshon te// 
285b1(rnying rgyud): brjod med tshig gi yul bral ba// de yi rang bzhin de nyid na// rang bzhin ma bcos de bzhin nyid// de la ming med ming btags rgyus// mthong dang ma mthong tha dad 'gyur// de las spyod pa'i
285b2(rnying rgyud): gzhir gyur te// brjod pas de nyid mthong bya'i phyir// tshig gi lam ni rnam grangs las// tshig lam sgo mo dpag med 'gyur// de las dam pa'i rjes gcad pa// gang gi thug lnga byung ba'i// 
285b3(rnying rgyud): lung tad sgron mas nye bar gtar btsal ba// nye lam byang chub dam pa ni// gang byung rjes su de 'bangs na// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur// gang 'byung g.yo ba gang bkag pa// rgyun
285b4(rnying rgyud): gyi 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur// gang 'byung med pa'i blun po da pA// mur 'dzin mun pa'i lam du 'gyur// 'di zhes da gcig tu gang bzung ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin// 
285b5(rnying rgyud): snga phyi med ces mu bcad nas// de med chad pa'i mu can yin// ma bcos nyid la yud tsam zhig/ cir g.yo sa skye 'gag 'byung ba ste// de las gang 'byung gang 'phel
285b6(rnying rgyud): btad rnam grangs lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi// dam pa'i lam 'di rnyed ma yin// dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag/ grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshil// gang las byung ba de nyid kyis// 
285b7(rnying rgyud): btsal yang 'grib 'phel dag mi rnyed// de nyid ya nas de bzhin du// gang 'dir sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis// sha thang par ni lam tshol ba// don med bdud kyi las yin no// de la
285b8(rnying rgyud): tshig tu gang brjod pa// nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra// tshig tu sman dang spyad bshad kyang // nad pa'i tshogs la mi sman to// de nyid de bzhin ma gyur na// tshig lam de brjod de ma yin// / 
286a1(rnying rgyud): / gang 'dir gang spangs gang tshol pa// gzugs spangs nas ni grib tshol 'dra// sems nyid dam pa'i lam nyid pas// ma rig ye shes tha dad min// mi rtog pa ni lam 'dir cig/ 
286a2(rnying rgyud): sems nyid sna tshogs rab snang las// sna tshogs lam 'dir cig pa yin// dper na gser gyi rgyu gcig las// dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par// byas pas de dag ming re grags// / 
286a3(rnying rgyud): gang grags gser gyi ngo bor gcig/ de ltar sems kyis rang bzhin la// mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis// gang ltar bltas dgu de ltar snang // snang yang de las gzhan mi
286a4(rnying rgyud): dmigs// sgron ma 'bar ba'i rin chen ni// ji ltar ngan khung sbas gyur yang // de yi rang bzhin rang snang bas// / 'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin sems
286a5(rnying rgyud): nyid rin chen sgron// lus ngan 'dam du bying gyur yang // rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas// ma bcos rang bzhi na yongs kyis gsal// sems 'di na mkha' ji bzhin
286a6(rnying rgyud): te tatakun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung // byung tshor g.yo 'gog thams cad kyang // rang bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi// mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin// 'gyur
286a7(rnying rgyud): bas thams cad ngo bo snang // mi bcos g.yo ba med nyid las// sna tshogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing // cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med// ji bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin la// blo bzhag ma yang
286a8(rnying rgyud): kho nar zad// de ni tshegs med don po che// de nyid dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin// de yi don la ji snyed gnas// mthong bas de nyid der goms na// lam
286b1(rnying rgyud): rnyed lam mthong nyam drod ni// don gyis nges par 'byung ba yang // gang ma yin la zin 'byung ba// byang chub dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la// nges pa'i blo gros
286b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yin// chos kun 'di ltar yin pa la// de ltar ma mthong ngo mtshar che// de mthong de yang ngo mtshar che// a ma'o cig snyam du 'byung // de nyid ma mthong gang su dag/ rtsol grub
286b3(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i tshegs chen gyis// dam pa'i lam tshol lam re ring // de yi don 'byung de yod kyang // lam de rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi lam rnyed pa// dam pa nyid las
286b4(rnying rgyud): dam pa yin// de ni brten brnyan mtshungs ma yin// zhi lus mthar 'gog gnyis mtshungs min// slob pa da'i sa dang de mi mtshungs// rnal 'byor sems dpa' rtogs
286b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang // gang mtshungs de 'dra de mi mtshungs// des na rnams dag lam chen ni// sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na// dgongs pa kun las 'dus pa yi// gsad/ 
286b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i las 'di shes byas pas// btsal ba'i bya ba rgyu med de// lam 'di mthong ba de nyid kyis// dka ba rtsol ba gang med par// thams cad thams cad grub pa yin// sems kyi
286b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gar gnas pa// de ni dben pa dam pa ste// dgon pa chen po mchog nyid du// dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa gsungs// de nyid dpag med gzhal yas mchog/ rmad
286b8(rnying rgyud): 'byung nor bu yid bzhin khang // ma byas rang byung phyir nang med/ kun tu nang du gyur pa yin// gang 'dir gang 'dus tshogs ma yin// de la de nyid tshogs 'dus mchog/ chos
287a1(rnying rgyud): kun bsdus pas 'byung ba med// dpag med rgyal ba dgyes pa'i mchog/ gang 'dir 'dod spyod yo byad min// de nyid yo byad chen po ste// lhag pa'i yo byad 'di shes na// 
287a2(rnying rgyud): yo byad kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sgom par byed pa bsgom pa min// bsam bya dmigs su med pa ste// dam pa'i gsang lam 'di shes na// bsgom lam dam pa 'di nyid do// bsrung zhes
287a3(rnying rgyud): bsrung bar bya mi dmig// stong nyid med 'byung gsang lam 'di// dbus mthar tsha bas tshig shes na// bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o// tshig lam mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs/ 
287a4(rnying rgyud): gsang 'di thams cad gcig pa la// mnyam zhes lhag par dag la yod// dgongs pa kun nas 'dus dang mnyam/  / gang gzhan brtul zhugs spyod pa min// de la de
287a5(rnying rgyud): gzhol rol spyod pas// thams cad 'dir brtul 'dir zhug/ sa pas// brtul zhugs mchog tu kun 'dus gsung / sa// lam 'di dngos nyid sems kyi gsang // ye grub/ 
287a6(rnying rgyud): zin pas gsol thob med// dngos grub rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes// dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus gsungs// de ltar sems kyi gsang mthong na// sngon ma mthong ba'i lam mthong bas// / 
287a7(rnying rgyud): mthong ba ci yang med pa nyid// gang la snang ba lam mthong yin// grogs po dag de dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa zhes bya ba 'di skad thos pa yongs su bgros pa'o// / 
287a8(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rjes 'jug go le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa grogs
287b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongs su dri ba dris pa// kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dir rin po che 'bar ba'i sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs
287b2(rnying rgyud): pa ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi// de skad ces dri ba yongs su dris pa las// gsung ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye grogs po dag rin po che 'bar ba ni 'od kyi 'byung gnas lag/ 
287b3(rnying rgyud): te tata 'thor rlung tshogs kyis kyang mi sod pas mun pa sel bar byed pa kho na pas sgron me zhes bya'o// de ni 'di ltar mi shes pa sel ba'i shes pa nyid yin te// nyi ma'i snying po 'am
287b4(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i sgron ma la mun pa'i gzhi med pa bzhin shes pada'i rang bzhin la mi shes pa'i gzhi med do// de yang 'di ltar sgron ma dam pa nub par gyur pa na kun
287b5(rnying rgyud): gyi de nyid gcig kho na la khyad par gyi rnam pa 'byung b.ra'agyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ mun pa'i shes pa dang / ya mtshan gyi shes pa dang // byis pa rnams kyi shes
287b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang // phyogs su rigs pa'i shes pa dang / mtha' dbus 'byed pa'i shes pa dang / dam pa nyid kyi shes pa'o// kye grogs po dag gang mun pa'i shes pa ni gang 'di las
287b7(rnying rgyud): log par shes pa'o// log sed can gyi shes pa ni tha dang smra zhing gnyis su 'dod pa'o// byis pa rnams ni 'di lta ste// gang med par smra zhing thams cad yod par 'dod pa'o// / 
287b8(rnying rgyud): de yang 'di ltar rdul nas dpag tshad skad cig ma// bskal pa skar ma nyi zla dang // ri bo khor yug lus can lus// sems dang tshi la longs spyod tshad// dus gnas 'jig nub
288a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid las// tha dad bye brag thams cad du// bshig nas med smra yod ces 'dod// mos pa chung bas de las min// gang 'dir rnal 'byor phyogs rig pa// 
288a2(rnying rgyud): 'di kun gang 'dir kho na pas// dngos meng rnam shes nyid du snang // de nyid ma bcos de bzhin nyid// yod pas chos sku rtag par 'dod// nges par 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang
288a3(rnying rgyud): dag sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du// snang bas kun rdzob bya ba byed// nges par dbye ba med pa'o// la la de ltar de nges te// de las ma gtogs de 'ong min// de nyid des ni dngos med phyir// / 
288a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa nyid du med pa'o// la la gang ma zin pa'i phyir//  de snang ba ni gang na'ang rung // phra rab sa ni rnam kun khyen// slu 'drid pa ltar yod ma yin// dam pa nyid kyi
288a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa gang // chos nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la// de min lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir// ye nas sangs rgya sa zhes brjod pa// tha snyad tsam du brjod par zad// ya
288a6(rnying rgyud): nas brjod pa tshig gi lam// tha snyad gnyis dang bral ba la// sgo skar tshig gi skad mi gdags// brjod pa'i tha snyad tshig lam 'das// na mkha' 'di ni yod med ces// blun po rnams
288a7(rnying rgyud): ni rtsod par 'gyur// mkhas pa rnams ni da lta min// gang de rtsod la ngo mtshar che// de bzhin nyid 'di yod med ces// byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur// skyes bu gang dag de lta min// / 
288a8(rnying rgyud): rtsod pa shes rab 'chal bar zad// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad// ye 'am ngang gi sangs rgyas la// min las yin par 'gyur ma yin// ngo bo nyid kyi de nyid la// yin dang min
288b1(rnying rgyud): zhes ci byar yod// na mkha' 'di ni med do zhes// mi shes gang gis rtog par byed// gang shes ye nas yong mi rtog/ min par mi rtog tshig mi brjod// rgyu dang las dang rnams grangs la// mtshan
288b2(rnying rgyud): nyid nges pa ngo bo dang // 'bras bu dgongs ched re re 'byung // 'di ltar 'dir ni gang gi rgyu// rang 'byung de nyid rtog dpyod bcas// gang dag gang la skye mched pa// gnyis po 'di dag nyid kyi rgyu// 
288b3(rnying rgyud): gang las gang min ji snyed pa// khyad par byed brag tha dad pa// nges 'byed 'jug 'brel sbyor bcas pa// de 'dzin phyin ci ma log pa// mngon 'byin don 'dod 'brel pa'o// rnam grangs rnam ga
288b4(rnying rgyud): don bzhin no// kun la nges par byed pa yin// de nyid ma/ 'dres yongs rdzogs pa// dngos med mi rtog yod/ das su rdzogaso// so so tha dad bsam mi khyab// ma 'dres de ltar/ 
288b5(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin byed// gang 'dir phyin ci ma log par// yongs su chub pa phul nyid do// kun nas ma rmongs thams ca da gsal// gang lam 'gags thoms pa med// kun la
288b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug gang ma rig gcod// skye mched kun du gyur pa nyid// gang mched gang gi rlung zhugs pa// mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'o// gang la log pa de nyid dag/ de nyid phul du phyin
288b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// dmigs bu gsal ba'i sgron ma yis// de nyid de la blta bar bya// sgron ma'i snang ba mi shes pa// mthong bya kun la mun pas bsgribs// nams kyang snang bar mi 'gyur te// 
288b8(rnying rgyud): long po'i grong khyer chen por 'gro// sgron ma 'bar ba gang srel ba// kun la mun pas sangs gsal ba'i// ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid// sgron ma dmigs bus mthong bar 'gyur// 
289a1(rnying rgyud): / de ltar dam pa'i grogs po dag/ rin chen sgron ma 'bar ba'i me// mun snang dmigs bur ma bsrel bar// de nyid gser mthong ga la rigs// grogs po dag ni sgron ma dam
289a2(rnying rgyud): ba srel bar bya'o// zhes dgongs pa dam pa legs pa bgros pa shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor mig gi sgron ma bstan pa'i
289a3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste drug bcu pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag la sogs pa dman pa dam pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dri ba yongs su dris pa// kye gsang ba
289a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po khyad par du bla mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes dam pa ca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag
289a5(rnying rgyud): pos smras pa// kye grogs po dag khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba/ de ni legs so shin tu rab tu legs so// sa da ni 'di ltar sa mkhan dam pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyis
289a6(rnying rgyud): yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba'i sgron ma legs par dkod pa ni 'di lta ste/ sa dang sa'i khyad par na// gang 'dir yongs kyis med pa la// shes bya gcod pa'i khyad par gyis// rang rig mthon
289a7(rnying rgyud): dman rim par zad// dper na rgyal po'i skor mdzod nas// che chung thabs 'dod gang su dag/ dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis// spyod sgo 'jug pa'i las thabs las// mthon dman
289a8(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyis gang len pa// rgyal po gcig la spyod na yang // ran chen sna 'ga' khyad par dag/ thabs chen sgo dgu so sor spyod// rgyal por gyur na de nor kun// dbang skur byed pa'i bdag po
289b1(rnying rgyud): yin te mi gnas ma bcos de bzhin nyid// shes bya de las med pa la// gang 'di rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// so so'i 'jug sgo kun nas spyod// de yi de nyid de gcig la// rtsal 'phang mthon
289b2(rnying rgyud): dman khyad par gyis// sa'i go 'phang khyad par du// rig pa de ltar snang ba yin// gang 'dir thams cad gcig pa la// de mthong mi mthun de dbang gis/ dper na 'byung gnas spro mangs
289b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin// sa dang rnam thar so so'i sgo// gcig la sna tshogs de ltar snang // sa dang rnam thar gang dag la// 'jug pa la sogs sa sbyangs kyang // kun gyi rtsa ba 'dis bcad pas// gcig ste tha
289b4(rnying rgyud): dad yongs kyis med// de ni ri dang lhun po dang // kun tu rgyu/  dang gzhon nu ltar// mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni// don gyis de ltar yod pa yin// des na chos rnams
289b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// gnas pa'i sa nyid sems yin pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe'i mtshon te// kun gyis 'dir ga shes par bya// 'di ltar gang shes rnal 'byor pa// 
289b6(rnying rgyud): lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa yi// lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas// nyi lam bder rnyed grub pa'o// gang rnyed de rnyed der gnas pas// rnal 'byor spyod pas sa pa ste// so kun
289b7(rnying rgyud): gcig tu yongs rdzogs la// rig pa mchog 'bring tha ma'i phyir// gcig pa'ang khyad par bcur snang ba// gang gi ched du bgrang bar bya// 'di dag gnas 'dzin spyod pa'i sa// rnam pa
289b8(rnying rgyud): bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs// 'gyur dbang ma nges pa 'di la// bcos ma 'phra men spyod pa dang // tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang // legs par 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga// 'jug
290a1(rnying rgyud): / ldog ltung dang bcas pa yi// kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o// 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya// brten pas gzhi yis 'di la// dang po las
290a2(rnying rgyud): can rnal 'byor pa// bslab pa sbyor dang nges pa la// ngag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o// bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor pa// gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya// gal chen sbyong ba'i sa 'di la/ 
290a3(rnying rgyud): rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// gnas shing sbyor ba'i sa yin to// yang mi nga'i sa rnams kun// gcod spyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// legs nyes stobs tshan 'gyed pa'o// bslas
290a4(rnying rgyud): pa rgyur gyis 'di la// g.yo dang thab dang brtan pa'i drod// de nga bzhin rtags chen g.yo ba dang // thob pa nyid dang brta dran pa yi// rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po dag/ bslab pa'i mtha
290a5(rnying rgyud): bcu mthar phyin cing // ji ltar zla ba yar gsal bzhin// ba/ srab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te// don la mi skra ga ngo mtshar skye// spyod sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa'
290a6(rnying rgyud): des tatangan 'gror mi ldog dgon par 'jug/ bar chad dag kyang de la 'byung // gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang // spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang // mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor gas
290a7(rnying rgyud): gnas shing sbyong ba'i swa zhes bya// bsod nams gter gyis 'di la// spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa// mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas// rtsal chen blo yi bsti gnas sa// bslab pa'i
290a8(rnying rgyud): bcu spyir cheb po'o// brten pas khyad par 'gro 'di la// dbugs chen 'byor po'i rnal 'byor pa// rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs che// nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyor// yul la/ 
290b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug dang rig pa sbyor// bdud nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste// bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras mtha' bcu la// goms par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor// ngal bso ba las thams cad mthong // mi ldog
290b2(rnying rgyud): sa la goms byar med// 'di dag sbyor ba'i gzhi gcig kyang // so so'i thun mong ma yin pa'i// sgrib pa las zhes rtsi byed cing // ye shes ra ri 'char ba'o// des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig
290b3(rnying rgyud): la ta mi ldog la sogs rdzogs tshon rnams// gang der bden pa re re la// rtsal 'byung re re 'chang ba ste// tha ma rang 'byung nyid kyis rdzogs// mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang // mi ldog rnam
290b4(rnying rgyud): la rim pa bzhin// rmi lam dang ni sgra brnyan dang // mngon sum nges pa ci rigs pas// rnal 'byor rdo rje lung ston pa// rdo rje rdo rje rnal 'byor pa// zhes byar nyid dngas
290b5(rnying rgyud): khams dang // zhing khams kun tu sgrags byas nas// rnam 'byor dam par 'byin pa'o// dmigs pa'i 'bras bu skye 'di la// grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// 
290b6(rnying rgyud): nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum// rgyal ba'i thugs lam rgyal skyes shing // rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa// khyad por rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing // gang la ting
290b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'o// gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la/ rmad 'byung rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang // tshogs tshon 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs// gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste/ phyag rgya
290b8(rnying rgyud): chen po sgyu ma yin// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po// mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drugs// rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs spyod pa'o// brdal pa chos nyid sa 'di la// rol brgyan
291a1(rnying rgyud): kyi rnal 'byor dang // bde ba chen dang thig ler rdzogs// gsum nyid du ni snang ba la// yul don ye shes des sbyar ma/ shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs// sgyu ma'i sgyu ma yin
291a2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'o// rdzogs pa spyir 'chi bas 'di la// bcu pa tha ma dang po las// mthar rdzogs kun gyi rtog yin te// glong yang na mkha'i snying po la// sprin med nyid ma 'bum gyis brda la// ci snang
291a3(rnying rgyud): tso yang ma yin pa// mi skyo mi 'gag ngo bo la// ji ltar bltas dgu der snang ba// brdal khyab mi rgya rlabs kyis bcad // de yang dam pa'i khyad par gyis// bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang / 
291a4(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub dang glong yangs chub// gsum rdzogs ra dang 'byung brdal ba'o// 'di dag rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa// khyad par gang la khyad par snang // gang khyad mod la
291a5(rnying rgyud): de khyad med// brtsal 'phang mthon dman rnal 'byor/ pas// mthon dman go 'phang sa bgrod bya// gang 'dir dri ba'i mchog snang ba// dam par gyur pa'i lang ka'i bdag/ 
291a6(rnying rgyud): gang 'dir rnal 'byor kun sbyor ba// nges pa'i sa bcu rtsa ba 'dir// gang gi rtsa ba yan lag las// bcu gnyis bdun gnyis rdzogs pa'o// des na sa'i khyad par las// rgya che ba dang grangs
291a7(rnying rgyud): mang yang // rnal 'byor sa 'dir sbyar bar bya'o// sa dang sa yi 'byung gnas pa// kun bzhi kun gyis chen te// gang gi sa chen 'di non na// sa rnams skad cig tsam bgod pa'o// grogs po/ 
291a8(rnying rgyud): dag de dag ni khyad par bla mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa yongs su bgrod par shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal
291b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor sa'i sgron ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris
291b2(rnying rgyud): patata kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po yul la 'jug par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi// de skad ces yongs su dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag
291b3(rnying rgyud): pos yongs su smras pa// kye grogs po dag yul ni 'od ltar gang gro zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis gang du dgongs pa'i yul de kho na nyid dang // gang la 'byung ba'i yul
291b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i 'khor ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o// de ni dper na btso blog mkhan dag gis// ras spyad das gang du bya ba 'dzin pa ltar// gang 'dir las kyi dang
291b5(rnying rgyud): po las// gang de sbyar ba rab tu gces// de skad ces smras/ pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so// gsang
291b6(rnying rgyud): pa pa'i bdag po gang bcwa cad nas thams cad du ya nas sangs rgyas pas na da gdod sangs rgyas par byar med phun chad dgongs pa'i yul la sbyor ba dang snying rje'i yul du gyur pa gang
291b7(rnying rgyud): yang med lags na// 'dir snying rje'i yul du gyur pa gang lags// su zhig snying rje'i yul du gyur// de skad ces smras pa dang // gsang po pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye lang ka
291b8(rnying rgyud): bdag po de de ltar kun kyang ye shes phan chad de kho na nyid pas snying rje'i yul dang dgongs pa'i yul gang yang med na yang gang ji ltar yang chos nyid las mi
292a1(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba'i tshul gyis gang dang yang 'gal zhing 'gal bar mi bya'o// rang gi don nyid byed pa ni dam tshig chen po yin la ye nas sangs rgyas pas don byar med pa ni/ 
292a2(rnying rgyud): snying rje chen po yin no// dgongs pa dam pa la 'jug mi dgos shes pa ni dgongs pa dam pa'i yul de kho na nyid la zhugs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ 
292a3(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dam par gang bzhugs pa// zab pa bus kyang ches zab pas// de nyid gting nas thag gcad phyir// gsang ba'i yul bzhi skye bo dang // lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnal lo// 
292a4(rnying rgyud): de yang yongs su rdzogs pa gang // bya bas bya ba med na yang // de yi rang bzhin phan gzhan pa// yin pas ga dang 'dir phan par bya// gang gi don dang 'gal 'gyur
292a5(rnying rgyud): btata de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ rus sgrol mgo la 'ongs pa ltar// ma mtha' med pas bshug par bya// ci phyir kun du rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor dam pa nyi/ 
292a6(rnying rgyud): las min// gal te gang gi dbang gis na// dam pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur te// de dang mi mthun nyen chen 'byung // gal te de la de 'byung na// mgon btsun de la de las med// de gang
292a7(rnying rgyud): ma zin 'ban thag chad// gang gi don du gang 'gyur na// phra mo'i phra mo pra yan chad// thams cad thams cad ji ltar bar// nan tan gyis ni dga' nas bya// slongs mo pa dang slongs la
292a8(rnying rgyud): dga'// slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyod rnams// ste dang chan dang grar byas te// snying rje khung pa'i zhing du bya// sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang // bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag/ btags sam phye/ 
292b1(rnying rgyud): mar byas nas kyang // klung ngam chu gang mtshatshan du// dor te chags med sbyin par bya// gang gi rten du khas blangs te// nad gsor gang slob spyod skom sra/ btsugs te bsti gnas mchod bya zhing / 
292b2(rnying rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchog sbyin bya// gang la dam pa'i lung byung ba// gsung gi mchod rten kun te// brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsta gnas kyis// rgya che yangs pa'i lam rnams bya// gang gi
292b3(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'phel 'gyur ba// 'di ltar nges pa'i dam pa dag/ smra 'am sbyin nam bstan nam khrid// de ye shes tshad med 'gyur// goms dang goms par byed pa yi// gang de dag par bya ba'i
292b4(rnying rgyud): phyir ta bsam yul bya ba mang po la// de nyid yul gyi rgyalarnams sbyang // dam pa'i 'khor lo rab bskor te// rgyud sbyang lhag pa'i shes rab blta// sho gam spangs dang sha
292b5(rnying rgyud): gam lam// mi bde'i gdon pa kun bsal te// tshad me da snying rje'i 'khor lo skor// sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mau gcad// chu 'ams 'aman mkha' 'am// me'am de
292b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin rlung rnams la// sku gdung spel mchog ring bsrel rnams// brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya// mtshams med bzlog par byed pa yi// lus sems rgyud la rdul blags te// 'a
292b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sprin tshogs pho brang du// rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags// rgyal mnyes las kyi shing bsregs pa// thabs chen sbyor ba'i lam chen las// rnam bzhi me'i las mchog
292b8(rnying rgyud): bya tades ni mtshams med bzlog pa yin// snying rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dag/ gang ltar goms ltar nan tan bya// de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dag/ don du mi 'gyur kun spang te// 
293a1(rnying rgyud): // nan tan tshogs kyis dpung chen bskyed// 'di ltar las kyi ltang sogs pa// gzhan du spyod pa ma yin te// rtse cig don ldan rnal 'byor pa// rgyud skyong don ldan phyir dang // gal
293a2(rnying rgyud): te rtsal gzhan ma ldan na// dge bsags stang chen kun bsdongs te// gang 'dir bsags pa'i don bsgrangs shing // gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs na// nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar
293a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin shugs kyis 'byung bar gcas// de phyir chung ngu yan chad kyang // dam pa'i don du 'gyur bar bya// gang 'dir zin dang ma zin pa'o// dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs kun// 
293a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid du blo bzhag na// snying rje chen po de nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na// yul gang med pa'i tshul gyi sa ni// 'jug pa med las gang 'jug pa// yul la
293a5(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa dam pa'o// des skad ces smras pa las// lang ka'i ba/ dag po la sogs pa// dman pa'i lus kyi sems da pa' rnams gang gi rgyun du yul la 'jug pa'i sems
293a6(rnying rgyud): pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las yul dam pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang lang kin
293a7(rnying rgyud): bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i sems pa de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la mtshon pa'i dri ba yongs su dris pa kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po me long brtag par bya'o zhes dam
293a8(rnying rgyud): bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi// de skad ces dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye grogs po dag gang la gang gis mtshon pas shes
293b1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i me long ni 'di ltar snang dang brtags dang 'byung ba dang // mi chags 'byung snang dag pa dang // gnas 'byung 'thun pa rnam pa bcu// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla dang // rmi lam sgra
293b2(rnying rgyud): brnyan mig yor dang // mgal ma dri za'i grong khyer dang // sprul pa gzugs brnyan me long bcu// 'thun pa'i dmigs bcu mtshon par gzhag/ dngos po med kyang dngos por snang // 
293b3(rnying rgyud): dngos por snang du btub pa'i dpel// ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang ba zhin ni// skyes bu gang gi rtsol ba dang // sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las// dbang po yang 'phrog cir snang yang // de la 'gror// 
293b4(rnying rgyud): dngos po med// 'di ltar gsang ba'i rang bzhin yang // ming rgyu 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// ji ltar snang 'gyu// nga rang bzhin med// gang 'dir smig rgyu'i rang bzhin
293b5(rnying rgyud): ni// ta'ajigs 'byung g.yo' ba'i dus dag la// de dang de'i rang bzhin las// byis pa gdungs pa'i 'du shes kyi sa// chu'i 'du shes nyer bzhag kyang // tshim pa'i rgyu der
293b6(rnying rgyud): ga la 'gyur// de bzhin de yi khyad par yang // kun nas rang bzhin stong pa la// tha snyad mtshan ma ming du btags// de nyid stong pas de mi dmigs// gang 'dir chu yi zla ba ni// sgrib med
293b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' la zla shar ba// gzugs brnyan dang ba'i chu na snang // de la brtags pa'i dngos po med// de bzhin gang yang bkod med par// de nyid mkha' las gang gsal ba// gang 'dir
293b8(rnying rgyud): snang ba de nyid de// de nyid dngos med 'dzin rtog bral// ji ltar mi lam rang bzhin ni// gang zhig gnyis kyis non pa na// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // lo la sogs pa ji snyed du// 
294a1(rnying rgyud): / bde sdug sna tshogs myong bar snang // de sangs ci yang mi dmigs ltar// stong nyid cir yang med pa la// stong pa'i khyad par cir spyad kyang // spyod lam ma chags ji bzhin pas// brtag
294a2(rnying rgyud): na dmigs pa kun dang bral// sgra brnyan 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni// rang gi gnas la sgras rkyen pas// de bzhin de ltar sgra brnyan 'byung // de nyid ci yang med 'byung yin// gsang sngags
294a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i byin rlabs dag/ gang gi ched du med 'byung ba// ci yang med la ci yang 'byung // med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang // gang 'dir mig yor rang bzhin no// mig nad can
294a4(rnying rgyud): la rdzas snang ba// 'khrul pa'i ngo la snang bar zad// ji ltar snang ba gang yang med// spros bral rang bzhin stong nyi nga las// chu 'phrul rnam pa ci snang ba// cho 'phrul nyid du snang
294a5(rnying rgyud): bar zad// snang ba de dag gang yang med// chu dang nam kha/ 'a dang ba las// chu bur sprin tshogs tha dad 'byung // rang 'byung rang zhi'i rang bzhin pas// chu nyid na mkha' nyid
294a6(rnying rgyud): du dag/ snang dang mi smad ji snyed pa// thams cad thams cad de nyid las// rang 'byung rang zhi ji bzhin par// dag pa nyid du nges pa'o// dri za'i gnas de nges med pa// de'i gzugs ni gar
294a7(rnying rgyud): byung bar// grong khyer de yang de bzhin 'byung // 'byung ba nyid na der mi brtag/ ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid// gnas pa gnas pa gar gnas par// de nyid gzhal med khang chen snang // / 
294a8(rnying rgyud): snang ba de ltar gnas ma yin// ji ltar sprul pa'i rang bzhin no// med 'byung gcig las du mar 'byung // gang 'byung 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang // snang ba'i 'byung rgyun 'chang
294b1(rnying rgyud): ma yin// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las// ji lta ba ltar de 'byung ba// gang 'dir 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad// de la zad med 'phel ba med// gang 'dir gzugs brnyan gang snang ba/ 
294b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang bzhin 'byung dang ba las// brten nas de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'byung // de nyid de nyid tha dad min// gang 'dir rgyu 'bras so so bas// rgyu nyid 'bras bu de nyid rgyu/ de bas
294b3(rnying rgyud): de la de gnyis med// de bzhin nyid do de kho na'o// des ni ji snyed pa yi chos// ji bzhin nyid du gcig pas na// gang ltar ci snang tse byung yang // mi g.yo'i ba las 'byung snang med// zab mo
294b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dam pa 'di// mkha' la rtog 'dra gting dang / ga dka'o// rnal 'byor mi ldan gang rtog pa// brtag das pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma'i snying po ni// 
294b5(rnying rgyud): mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na// snying po de gang mi rtogs kyi// 'od 'bar zil gyis mig rdzil 'gyur// de bzhin byis pa blo zhan pas// snying po don la cir brtags
294b6(rnying rgyud): kyang nya gsang ba'i snying po mi mthong gis// blo rgan byis pag chad rgyal// des na gsang ba dam pa 'di/ mtshon pas shes par mi nus kyang // gang la rmongs pa'i tshogs mtshon phyir// rnal
294b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor can la phyogs tsam mo// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// bsam dang bral bas de bzhin bzhag/ mi brtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang // byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan// / 
294b8(rnying rgyud): brjod pas mtshon pa las 'das pas// 'di zhes bstan dug la yod// med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi rnyed// mi dmigs chos la tshig lam med// chos kun namakha' lta bus/ 
295a1(rnying rgyud): na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha'i dbus mtha' mi dmigs bzhin// chos kun mtha' dbus mu dang bral// nam mkha' gang ming brjod byed la// brjod pa de
295a2(rnying rgyud): nyid dngos po ste// de yi tha snyad ming brjod kyang // na mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur// 'di la mi rtogs gang brjod pa// brjod pa de nyid rnam rtog ste// rnam rtog rnam rtog ci brjod kyang
295a3(rnying rgyud): de la gnyis med 'gag mi 'gyur// gang 'dir gnyis su 'dod pa dang // dpung mthar 'byed pa thams cad gol// mnyam zhes bya ba'i tha snyad kyang // gnyis dang dpung mthar rnam
295a4(rnying rgyud): 'byed las// kye ma 'di gcig chos kyi spun// thams cad de/ las med bzhin du// gnyis 'di phan chad rnam rtog yin// kun kyang nges pa 'di ltar zhog/ grogs
295a5(rnying rgyud): po dag de dag ni me long brtag par bya'o zhes dgongs pa dam pa nges par bgros pa shes par bya'o// de ska da smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman
295a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yang dag par nges par 'jog par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las// nye bar mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
295a7(rnying rgyud): ste drug bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gang du 'dir mdo bcu bkod
295a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgu pa dri ba yongs su dris pa// kye gsanga' ba'i bdag po che 'thun par sbyar bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ de skad ces dris pa las/ 
295b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya ste// mun pa chen po mun 'khrigs pa'i// byis pa'i khams kyi grong khyer du// rtag pa rgyun
295b2(rnying rgyud): gyi 'khor mor 'dir// nges par 'jug pa'i bya ba dag/ dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus pas// gang gi spyod yul gang gyur pa// ji ltar gsungs pa ji snyed pa// 'dir ni gsum du shes par
295b3(rnying rgyud): bya ta cha 'thun 'thun 'jug thabs 'dzud pa// sbyor dang spyod pa bsre ba yis// thams cad thams cad ci rigs par// dam pa'i don du nges par sbyor// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste// cha
295b4(rnying rgyud): 'thun sbyor ba gang 'jug pa// gang zhig gang du dor nges la// de dag nyid dang 'thun par spyad// yongs kyis de dang 'thun bstan no// de nyid de la 'gyur bar bya// de dag
295b5(rnying rgyud): dam par bya ba'i phyir// de dag 'thun pas gang sbyar bas// yi/ da kun drangs te bcug cing bya// gang gi yid 'phrog/ 'dren 'jug pa// ji ltar yid 'ong de kho na// nan tan
295b6(rnying rgyud): gyis ni de nyid do// dper na mun pa'i khams dgon// gang gis gang dag gang gyur pa// de yi yid la de zhugs te// de dang de cig mi gzhan pas// de nas de yi de rig nas// de yi dbang sgyur
295b7(rnying rgyud): thabs thob ste// de nyid sbyar ba'i tshig lam 'byung // de 'das dam pa kho na yi// yid la zhugs pas e ma'o 'khrul// 'dir nyes 'dir log ltangs sogs bsngo// de nang 'di ni kha
295b8(rnying rgyud): nar byas// gang 'dir dam par 'jug 'di la// dam pa kho nar 'jug par 'os// de nas de yi de nyid de// 'on pas gang gi de nyid kyang // 'on cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug/ lang
296a1(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po ji ltar na de yang ji lta bu zhe na// kho bos mthong thos skad cig na// bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des// 'dus pa phal mo che dag la// lam 'di rgya cher
296a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i tshe// 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa yi// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// bu mo drug gi 'khor 'dus pas// dga' bas klu bro gar gyis bstan// dgyes pa chen po'i gnyis pas
296a3(rnying rgyud): bstabs// de tshe dam pa'i yul min yang // dam pa gsang ba mchog nyid kyis// de nyid spyod 'thun grol ba yis// yul gyi dam pa nyid du dgongs// gang des sras kyi tshogs 'dus
296a4(rnying rgyud): la tad kye ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// nga yi gdung rgyud rigs byung gang // lha yi rol mo glu bro gar// sta na dang 'je sgeg mdzes pa'i stabs// gang gi yid 'phrog
296a5(rnying rgyud): 'jug 'dren thabs// glu yi yan lag sum brgya dang // / stabs dang gar thabs mi zad pas// kun sdud kun mnyes cha 'thun sbyor// dam pa de yis de gsungs pa// 
296a6(rnying rgyud): de nas sras kyi de kho na// blo gros thabs ldan nyid kyis 'dir// gang dag gang 'dul rig nas ni// 'jig rten drug dang 'thun sbyor phyir// gang gi gnas nas 'thun g.yos te// gar
296a7(rnying rgyud): mchog glog ltar 'gyur ba yi// dpal ldan lag pa bye ba yis// na mkha'i khams 'di yongs bkang nas// gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed cing // glu yis yan lag sum brgya
296a8(rnying rgyud): smata srid gsum 'brug sgras gang bltar// mtha' thug med pa'i 'jig rten drug/ gang bas yid 'phrog 'dren par byed// theg chen rmad 'byung gsang ba'i tshig/ tshig
296b1(rnying rgyud): gcig bsgyur bas tshig mtha' yas// tshig lam rab tu bral ba'i don// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ston// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rmad 'byung rol pa'i don 'byung ngo // cha
296b2(rnying rgyud): 'thun sbyor ba'i khyad par las// 'jig rten drug tu rol pa 'byung // 'khor ba'i lam rgyud gcad pa'i phyir// 'jig rten drug gi snying po la// thugs rje thabs kyi 'od 'phros pas// 
296b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud drug dngos po thams cad bsregs// spyod lam ma chags ye shes kyis// cha 'thun thabs su sbyar ba'i phyir// 'jig rten byis pa'i spyod pa bzhin// 'jig rten bu mo drug dang / 
296b4(rnying rgyud): rol tata stabs drug bskyod pas 'gro drug bsgrol// glu drug blangs pas yul drug drangs// tshig drug sgrags pa sa don drug rdzogs// le lo g.yeng ba'i sa bzhi la// brtson
296b5(rnying rgyud): 'grus myur ba cang shes stabs// tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ kyi bstan pa'i glu// don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i tshigang / rgyal ri de'i sa gzhi la// dpa' bo tsha ma nga ma gyad kyi
296b6(rnying rgyud): stabs// sil snyan 'bum gyis snyan pa'i glu// zhi gnas mi rtog na mkha'i tshig/ kun nas 'dus pa'i sa bzhi la// khyu mchog lta yis rol pa'i stabs// glu gar yid 'phrog snyan pa'i
296b7(rnying rgyud): gluta/ 'dzin pa'i rtod phur 'byin pa'i tshig/ gti mug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// sang ge rngam pa'i rol pa'i stabs// ka la bing ka'i dbyangs snyan glu/ yi nas don gyis gsol ba'i
296b8(rnying rgyud): tshig/ chag pa 'dus pa'i sa bzhi la// rdo rje khyung chen ldings pa'i stabs// 'brug chen 'dir bas snyan pa'i glu/ yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba'i tshig/ zhe sdang 'dus pa'i sa bzhi la
297a1(rnying rgyud): khro bo ma rungs khro ba'i stabs// srin mo ma rangs gros pa'i glu/ rdo rje bu yug skar mda'i tshig/ rmad 'byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i me 'byung bas// 
297a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum 'khor ba'i bud shing bsregs// srid gsum 'khor po'i khrag mtsho skams// nga rgyal ri bo rmang nas bshig/ zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me dpal bsad// gti mug mun
297a3(rnying rgyud): pa gtan nas bcom// 'khor ba 'dus pa'i 'dam rdzabaskams// lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni// gang gi cha dang 'thun sbyar bas// dam pa'i don la sbyar ba yis// byis pa 'drid pa'i
297a4(rnying rgyud): rol pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i brtul zhugs ni// 'jig rten log/  sreng ji lta bar// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i khyad par spyod/ 
297a5(rnying rgyud): wAwa dang cang shes kyi ling dang // shin tu glang chen myos 'dra ba// dpa' brtul za byed gtum rngam 'khrug/ ma kha' lding khyung chen gang mi lta// gtumathung sdong chen
297a6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs 'dril ba// gang thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gsor// mun ltar lkug pa'o blo tshul ldan// lhun po mi 'gyur brtan pa che// mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral// gnam lcags
297a7(rnying rgyud): lce'i drag shul can// grags shul chen po brtul zhugs bdag/ khu 'phrig lta bu zan can blo// nges pa'i nga rgyal glang chen brtun// zla med seng ge gcig brjod pa// reg 'jam bya
297a8(rnying rgyud): ltar chags 'grogs pa// sgyu ma sgyu ma'i tshul 'drid pa// gang la rtogs med kun spyod nyid// thogs med myur spyod za byed la/ yud ltar myur 'gyogs glog ltar 'gyur// gang gi
297b1(rnying rgyud): gang bsrung na mkha' lding // sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyong // rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni// bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan// gang 'dir nyams su len byed pa// rnal 'byor/ 
297b2(rnying rgyud): gsung ba'i thabs mchog ste// gang la 'jud pa bsre ba yi// tshul khrims thams cad gcig spyod pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // 'thun pas 'jug par spyod pa ni// / 
297b3(rnying rgyud): nyid de ltar de bzhin te// gang dang 'dra tshul gang yin pa'o// 'dod chags po mor gyur pa la// pho mor snang ba gang yin la// pho mo med las pho mo snang ba 'thun 'jug spyod// 'dod
297b4(rnying rgyud): la chags pas khro 'gyur la// khro bar 'dod las khro ba dar snang ba gang yin la// khro bar snang ba 'thun 'jug spyod// 'dod la chags pas mun snang la// mun par 'dod
297b5(rnying rgyud): las mun par gyur pa gang yin la// mun pa med las mun par snang ba 'thun 'jug spyod// ji ltar gang lta ra de bzhin du// de la sogs pa mtha' yas par// 
297b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad thams cad der snang ba// 'thun 'jug spyod pas don byed yin// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'thun par 'jug par bya'o zhes de skad ces smras pas// lang ka'i bdag
297b7(rnying rgyud): po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtha' thug pa med pa'i lta spyod la yongs su rtog pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
297b8(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma rol pas rnam par grol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dri ba yongs su dris pa/ 
298a1(rnying rgyud): kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nad gso' bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi// de skad ces yongs su dris pa las// gsang ba pa'i
298a2(rnying rgyud): bdag pos smras pa// lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa gso bar bya'o// nad kyi gzhi rtsal mkhas par bya'o// nang sbyang ba'i thabs la brtson par bya'o// sman pa dam
298a3(rnying rgyud): pa rnams bsten par bya'o// gnyen po dam pa'i sman bsal zhing sbal bar bya'o// sman sbyar ba la mkhas par bya'o// sman gyi lam bsang bar bya'o// nad pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral bar bya'o// / 
298a4(rnying rgyud): nad kyi rgyun gcad par bya'o// nad kyi gnyen por 'gyur/  par bya'o// lang ki'i bdag po de la grong khyer gsum dani mi snang ba'i grong khyer dang // kun snang ba'i grong khyer dang // 
298a5(rnying rgyud): phyed snang ba'i grong khyer ro// nad kyi gzhi rtsa ni mun pa che na po las byung ba'i zug rngu'o// nad sbyang ba'i thabs ni sman dang sman par sbyor ba'o// sman dam pa ni bshes
298a6(rnying rgyud): gnyen dam pa'o// gnyen po dam pa'i sman ni zhi gnas nas lhag mthong ngo // sman sbyar ba ni de dag nyid du sbyor ba'o// sman gyi lam bsrang ba ni de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba'o// / 
298a7(rnying rgyud): nad pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral ba ni 'khor ba la mi skye ba'o// nad kyi rgyun gcad par bya ba ni// thams cad de nyid du nges pa'o// nad kyi gnyen por gyur pa ni 'khor ba yongs su sgrol
298a8(rnying rgyud): ba'o/ ta lang ka'i bdag po de yang gang // kho bos mthong thos skabs cig na// kun gyi bshes gnyen dam pa ngas// dur khrod bdag po btul ba'i tshe// 'jig rten gtso'
298b1(rnying rgyud): kun 'dus nas// sras kyi tshogs su bkod pa'i// 'dus pa phal po che dag las// 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa yi// zhar las gyur pa'i ldog sde pa// sman gyi brtul zhugs cher spyod pa// drang
298b2(rnying rgyud): sreng nag po ka la yis// gang der 'dun nas don gsol pa// che mchog sman gyi rgyal po khyod// dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin// nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pas// zug rngu'i
298b3(rnying rgyud): nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las// che mchog sman gyi rgyal po des// drang srong de la rjes dgongs nas// sngon 'dus gsungs pa gang gsungs pa// khams gsum za ma
298b4(rnying rgyud): tog nang du// srid gsum sems can dug chen rnams// // dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas// rang 'byung / dud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// de skad nges par gsungs pa
298b5(rnying rgyud): las / nag po ka las don gsol pa// rang bzhin snang ba'i lus 'di las// yo byad chen po lnga byung ba// du/ ga lta sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// dang srong rnams kyi sman gyi mchog
298b6(rnying rgyud): de skad nges par 'dun pa las// sman pa dam pas 'di skad gsungs// rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa ste// rtsa brgyad steng las sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga dam tshigo lnga'i dngos// ye shes lnga
298b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol phyir// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi mchog/ de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas ka la nag pos yang
298b8(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// rang las byung bas gzhan du min// dngos snyigs kho nar zad pas dag/ rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong // nyis sbyar lnga dag rdzogs par 'gyur// de skad zhub 'dun pa las// 
299a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i sras// blo gros thabs ldan khyod nyid kyis// zhen pa 'grol ba'i thabs 'di smras// zag pa phyi ma rdzas lnga po// 'byung ba dang ni zas khams kyi// rgyun
299a2(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyu las byung bas na// rang las ma byung gzhan 'byung yin// grogs po dam pas de smras pas// ka la nag pos yang smras pa// ji ltar gral te de ltar na// 'gal ba nyid du yin zin na// rang
299a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung rang 'byung zhes bya ba'i// chos de gang nas rnyed par 'gyur// de skad dri ba dris pa las// dam pa nyid kyis des blan pa// rgyu dang rkyen las ma brten par// gang zhig 'byung ba'i chos
299a4(rnying rgyud): yod na// gzhan las ma byung byed med pas// chos de rang 'byung nyid du 'dod// de skad smras pas de lan du// ka la nag pos 'di skad du// spangs pas spongs par mi
299a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// bdag las rgyun du 'byung ba'i chos// gzhan las ma byung rgyu 'bras med// chos de gang yin rang 'byung yin// de la de yis 'di skad du// mi spang dang du
299a6(rnying rgyud): blang ba'i chos// dus dang rnam pa thams cad du// 'du 'bral med pa'i gnas 'os na// 'byung rgyun 'gag na de rgyun 'gag/ de la 'di ltar 'di skad du// nag po ka las slar dran pa/ 
299a7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi yin pas rang gnyer gyi// las rnams so sor byed par nus// 'jig rten dag na phan 'dogs pa// gang nus de la rtsi zhes grags// de la 'dir ni 'di skad du// gogs
299a8(rnying rgyud): mchog dam pas de lon pa// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa las// bdud rtsi'i las ni gnyis yod de// nad gso shi ba slong byed na// de gnyis mthu dang yong mi ldan// de smras lon du 'di
299b1(rnying rgyud): skad du// ka la nag pos de dran pa// sngon gyi rgyal bgrangs med kyis/ brtul zhugs 'di ldag tsor spyang na// dam tshig dam par bzung bas na// sngon gyi dmatshig yin par grags// de la
299b2(rnying rgyud): dam pas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas dam tshig yin nges na// dang po nas bzung rdzogs par du// de dang mi 'bral ldan dgos na/ zag rgyun chad na 'bral 'gyur 'gal// de la ka las
299b3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du // bdag de rtag par 'gyur ba yis// zag pa de yang rtag pa ste// kun nas kun du mi 'bral zhing // zad nas bral ba ga la yod// de la dam pas 'di skad du// phyi dang nang
299b4(rnying rgyud): gi zag pa rnams// thams cad thams cad kun zad pas// / sa dang rnam thar las rnams la// ci smos kun/  snang zag lam zad // de la ka las 'di skad du// ji ltar
299b5(rnying rgyud): gal te de ltar na// 'gal ba nyid du yin zin na// thams cad mnyam par 'ches pa rnams// mnyam pra da du mi 'gal lam// de la dam pas 'di skad du// kun
299b6(rnying rgyud): du ma 'dres mi shes par// bzang po'i tshig la blo gtod cing // kun tu bzang por khas 'ches pa// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// yongs su rdzogs par kun mnyam yang // 
299b7(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres par yang kun du snang // yongs rdzogs don du ma mthong bar// rdzogs spyod log pa'i lam pa yin// gsang chen theg pa'i tshig dang sgra// gcig la ma gcig so sor/ 
299b8(rnying rgyud): snang te ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par phye// gang nyid nges par grol bar snang // nges par zag 'byung rtsar 'dod na// de dag de bzhin ma bcos par// ye nas stong nyid rtog med pa// 
300a1(rnying rgyud): yin par nges pa de kho na'o// de dag ci phyir rtsi zhe na// rnal 'byor nad ni rnam rtog ste// rtag par 'khor ba'i gting mthar 'chi// rtog pa'i rtsa ba phyi nang gi/ kun nas zag pa
300a2(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga yin// de kun de bzhin nyid stong du// rtog bral mu mtha' med 'byung bas// nad gso' shi ba slong ba'o// dam pa mchog des de blun pas// mtshan mas zhen nas de 'grol
300a3(rnying rgyud): te tatade nyid der nges rnyed gzhan min// de nyid che mchog sman par 'gyur// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nad gso bar bya'o zhes nges par thos pa rnam par bgros pa ste 'di ltar nges/ 
300a4(rnying rgyud): par shes par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ce/ sa smras pas// lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtshan ma'i rtog pa las yongs su
300a5(rnying rgyud): grol bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // bam po bcu
300a6(rnying rgyud): pa ste tha mar zug pa// de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa// kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 
300a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi rgya cher bgos pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ji skad du brjod par bgyi// mdo ni gang du 'dus pa lags// de skad ces gsol pa las// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye
300a8(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po kho bos ji lta ba bzhin 'gros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ni brjod pa'i rnam grangs brgyad brjod par bya'o// mdo ni bcur 'dus par shes par bya'o// lang ka'i
300b1(rnying rgyud): bdag po de la rnam grangs brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po zhes kyang bya'o// snying po zhes kyang bya'o// rdo rje dgongs pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o// rnal 'byor/ 
300b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i lung zhes kyang bya'o// kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes kyang bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes kyang bya'o// theg/ 
300b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po byung tshul bstan pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lang ka'i bdag po gang la dgongs pa de nyid las mi 'da' ba dang / gang gi spyod yul ma yin zhing med pa las tham
300b4(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung ba dang // gang gi ye shes yongs su bkod pa da dang // 'di ltar gang nges pa rnal 'byor du lung ston pa dang // 'dir kun rngub pa dang dam pa rnams kyis mngon par
300b5(rnying rgyud): chud pa dang // gang la ma 'dres par bkod pa dang // gnas skabs bcu gnyis su nges par byung zhing 'byung ba'i phyi/ ra ro// lang ka'i bdag po mdo bcur 'dus pa gang zhe na/ 
300b6(rnying rgyud): gang mtha' bcu kho nar 'dus pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar gzhi gzung bar bya'o// rgyud dgrol bar bya'o// sgo dbye bar bya'o// mthar phyin par bya'o// 'du bar bya'o// la dor bar bya'o// sa gcad
300b7(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// nyams rnyed par bya'o// chags chung bar bya'o// mdo gcig tu bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la chos thams cad kyi gzhi ni dam tshig yin par shes par bya'o// dam tshig gnas
300b8(rnying rgyud): ni 'od lta ste// bsrung bya bsrung du med pa ni// chos nyid dam tshig dam pa yin// kun kyang dam pa nyid yin pas// gang la'ang 'gal bar mi bya'o// su la dam pa 'di gnas pa// rig 'dzin
301a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i sa pa yin// bsrung bar bya ba'i yul rnams la// sgyu gsog g.yo med dam pa nyid// zab sangs rgya che dam pa 'dir// 'di skad grags pa'i tshul khrims dang // rtog
301a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i bya ba ji snyed par// kun 'dir dam bsrungs rnam par dag/ dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// kun gyi thun mong ma yin phyir// mos pa chu ngu thams cad la// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag
301a3(rnying rgyud): gzung bar bya'o// theg chen yongs su gsang ba dag/ snod ma yin par gyur pa la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// sba ba'i thabs su bsrung bar bya'o// bstan pa'i gnas min snod gang dag/ 
301a4(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor/ dam pa yis// brtags nas gsang bar bya phyir bshad// gsang tshon yid bzhin nor bu 'di// skyon yod nyes
301a5(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin te// blo chung rnams la phan don du// thugs rjes thabs kyis shin tu gsang // 'jig rten pa dang thegadam dang // log sred log la phyogs la zhon// dad med
301a6(rnying rgyud): blo zhan g.yong rmugs shing // gang la mi brtson mun par mtshungs// 'di log dam nyams 'di las log/ byang chub thag ma gting nas chang // sems kyi mu gu rtsa tshig pa// ngan 'gro'i
301a7(rnying rgyud): dam du kha smra ba yin// gsang ba'i don rnams sgrar smra yang // gab pa'i gsang ba 'di mi shes// g.yon can shes rlom grogs rnams la// gsang bar 'os pa lhag par smra// yan lag
301a8(rnying rgyud): rnam bzhi de nyid la// sgra thos don med nyams mi le ni// gang gis gang gtad mi thub pa// bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yi// lha dang dam tshig spyod pa yi// dam pa'i mdzod gsum skar
301b1(rnying rgyud): sgra yang // zhen pa'i mtha' med gnas ma gyur// g.yo sgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs// bya med chos la nges 'dzin cing // de la de nyid de med par// rnal 'byor can la dman zer pa// dam pa pam/ 
301b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho// tshul rtog chod len khyad tshig 'dren// khags gi lce gnyis sbyar byed cing // gang la smod rmongs dam can te// tshe gcig dregs pa'i ched phyir rung // rku g.yo sgra ldan
301b3(rnying rgyud): slu 'drid pa// zang zing phyir 'breng tshig la dga'// rlom sems brjod 'dod tshul chos pa// log smra dug can tha mar ltung // 'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la// gsang chen gsang ba de
301b4(rnying rgyud): kho na/ zab cing gting dpag dka' bas na// bstan kyang pha ma ltung gnas su 'gyur// de bas bstan par bya ba mim// gal te bstan par gyur na ni// ston smra nyan byed de dag
301b5(rnying rgyud): gang te mthong yun phung phyed gnyis sreg 'gyur// rnal 'a khyor mkhas gsal don ldan la// rnal 'byor mi she sa gang dag gis// dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog graM/ 
301b6(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i rnam grangs ci bskyed pa// de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par// 'bras bu mi bzang myong bar 'gyur// gal te bde bar rjes len pa// de snyed bskal par gzod 'jug
301b7(rnying rgyud): dgos// mkha' gsal don ldon gyis kyang ni// gong ma bzhin du des bsams na// de yang gnas ngan len pa ste// mkhas pas de la skyob mi nus// rnal 'byor tshul byung dam pa la// 
301b8(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i tshig de dkrugs shing // sgro skur klu glang ngan brjod na// dmyal ba'i rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang // ji lta ba nyid de ltar 'gyur// skal pa das
302a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rtsa nyams skyon can rang bzhin ni// ngan rgyu khro gtum ldan pa dang // mi zad 'phra med las spyod byed// gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can// byis pa'i rang
302a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin blo zhan pas// shin tu dman pa'i lta ba yis// tshul 'chos pa la ltos par byed// gang dag dam pa'i dam par ldan// byams tshul rtag tu bzod gnas pa// tshul shis don rnams
302a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin slong // de la gang dag 'dun pa med// dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du// byang chub snying po thob pa yi// sangs rgyas nam yang mi 'byung ngo // 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong
302a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor pa// lam ston skyon sel ma/ khas pa la// gang dag kha cig dregs dbang gis// de spong thabs kyis de dmar byed// de ni 'khor ba'i gting
302a5(rnying rgyud): rdo ste ta na mas kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung // mi shes rno ngas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yang dag dam par nges 'gro ba'i// rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing // zang zing 'dod
302a6(rnying rgyud): par gang lta ba'i// rjes su 'gro zhing der 'dun byed// de ni log pa'i lam pa yin// rnal 'byor lta dang byang chub khe// 'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung // zang zing 'dod dang g.yo sprul
302a7(rnying rgyud): khe ta chung ngu'ang ci sgrub srog dang sngo// rnal 'byor dam pa'i rang bzhin can// bum snod nang gi sgron ma ltar// rig pa mdzod kyi don ldan yang // srog chags kun po'i sder mo ltar// khang
302a8(rnying rgyud): nas gang sbas don ston la// gang 'dir blun pos cir mi mthong // dper na 'di 'dra tshul gcig ste// gang gi lus la gter 'chang mi// blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnyis// gnas
302b1(rnying rgyud): gcig gnyis mtshungs khyad med 'dra// gsang 'di sngags brjod byed cing // gsang ba don du gnyer ba med// ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing // ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med// yang
302b2(rnying rgyud): dag bsngags pa brjod byed cing // yang dag don du gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngags pa brjod byed cing // dam tshig don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag/ nor bu rin
302b3(rnying rgyud): chen 'di 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes// de yi yon tan rgya cher rjod// de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis// de ltar 'dod pa 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag cung zad yod dam zhes
302b4(rnying rgyud): dris kyang med pas slar smras pa// gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi// yon tan chung zad smos par zad// de nyid bad dag la med ces smra// de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas// / 
302b5(rnying rgyud): bslab par bya ba'i chos bral bas// dam pa'i bsngags pa brjod byed kyang // de dag la ni dam pa med// de la sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams// dam pa nyid dang phrad par
302b6(rnying rgyud): dka'// rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can// gsang ba 'jigs pa'i sgrar bltas nas// de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar// 'chad cings
302b7(rnying rgyud): cing gang byed pa// skyes bu de ni dam pa'i sras// dper na gang de gang dag gis// gang gi rgyal khrims 'das 'gyur na// rang dga' mi gtong lugs dang sbyor// bka' yi yo songs dka' ba
302b8(rnying rgyud): de dang rgyal ba'i thugs mnyes dam pa zhes// kun la snang ba grags par 'gyur// ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na// ldum pas dug de shes ma thag/ rtsod nas phyung ste med par byed// 
303a1(rnying rgyud): phyir ldum zes de dag la// dug 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir ro// gang dag nyams 'gyur dug can de// rtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor pas// gnas sam lo yis shugs te spang // 
303a2(rnying rgyud): gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa// de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin// don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// tha tshigs zab mor bcas rnams la// bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin// rtsa ba
303a3(rnying rgyud): yan lag bcas rnams la// gal te mtshor zhig 'gyur yang // rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams// ji ltar glang po e na ya/ shi nas ror ni gyur mod kyang // 'gi wang rtsis ni don byed ltar// 
303a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor nyams te ror gyur kyang // gzhan gyi dam par de 'gyur zhing // de yi don byed nus pa yin// de lta mod kyang 'di kun rnams// rmi lam du yang mthong ma bya// 
303a5(rnying rgyud): ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig/ rus pas 'o ma kun srul bzhin// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun ma rungs 'gyur// 'khor ba'i g.yul
303a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal byed pa yi// log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun// don dam nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya// gal te ma spangs log spyod na// 'khor ba'i
303a7(rnying rgyud): g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te// bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur// kun kyang dge spyang don chung zhes// yang dge don la yid 'byung zhing // log pa'i chos lo gzhol bar 'gyur/ 
303a8(rnying rgyud): kun gyis log pa'i las spyad pas// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung // des na sgo sgor gnyis byas pas// ka yaM chad pa gang yin pa// ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis// nam
303b1(rnying rgyud): yang gnod pa yongs mi mdzad// de yi 'khor na gnas pa yi// de dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams// rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi// skyon mthong tsam na chad pas gcod// thams
303b2(rnying rgyud): cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung // sgrub pa'i gnod mchog gcig yod de// 'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'o// rgyud ldan don ldan ngang tshul bzang // ci la'ang chags med
303b3(rnying rgyud): stong ldan sems// shes rab rnam grol lde mig gi/ gti mug tha ma ra blo phyo nas// chos kyi rgyal po'i mig ldan pas// mtha' dang dpung bral dam pa'i yul// ma nor lam du 'jug she
303b4(rnying rgyud): pas te sdong chen sdong por rab tu dul// tha tshigs lung las 'byung ba bzhin// drang srong dka' thub dam pa dade// dam pa'i dam pa nyid yin pas// de la gsang sgo
303b5(rnying rgyud): bar bya// ji ltar dka' thub thub pa ltar// de ltar yid bzhi na nor bu ste// yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung // rigs 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo// de bzhin dka' thub dam pa
303b6(rnying rgyud): 'di/ gnas pas rten pa'i gzhi yin te// dka' thub kun gyi srog kyang yin// dam pa kun gyi nor mchog go// dam pa 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam pa'i bgrod pa'i lam mi
303b7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ dam pa chu bo sgrol ba'i gru// de bzhin dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te// dam tshig long ba'i dmigs bu yin// gzhan sde 'joms pa'i dmag
303b8(rnying rgyud): dpung yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed// des na dam pa'i gtan tshigs yin// ci nas gang gi sgo gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas// gang 'dir dbang pon/ 
303'a1(rnying rgyud): / sun mi 'byung // sgo gsum mi gnod dang bcas zung // yongs su ma nyams mdo bzhi'o// mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas// mdo dran pa la bgrang zhing bsngo// 'dul ba'i rgyun
303'a2(rnying rgyud): ldan tha tshigs can// mos pa chung ba'i bu rnams kyis// phra mo'i phra mo pra yan cad// nan tan gyis ni bsrung bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// gsung dang spyod dang yid 'ong dang // mi mdor
303'a3(rnying rgyud): shes bya grub pa dang // med dang phyal pa gcig po dang // lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa bcu// lta ba 'di las 'bum phrag 'byung // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// spyad par bya yi nor mchog
303'a4(rnying rgyud): yin/ tata rnal 'byor dam pa'i rigs rgyud las// nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu// zab mor rdzogs mchog bad ba yi// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bston// 'di yi sngon 'gro
303'a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ste// zab mo la sogs kun sngon du// rdo rje tha chi// gas dag po yi// gcan 'phreng lam rnams bsrung ba/ 'i phyir// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams// nges pa'i don
303'a6(rnying rgyud): gyis brtsan reg na// de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin// de ltar dam pa'i sdom pa la// gnas nas dus kyi skabs dag du// bsring bya thub par bya ba ni// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig dag/ 
303'a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs nas// kun dang 'thun phyer de ltar spyad// mi shigs pa na song ge ste// gcan zan rgyal po yin pas so// za ma tog ni
303'a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i mdzod// dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs// rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/ bregs te 'byung rgyun gcad ma yin// gangs kyi zhun chu phal pa yang // mkhas pas btung bar mi
303'b1(rnying rgyud): bya'o nya pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha mi dbye// zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya// ma brtags bug rdol can snod du// bdud rtsi sman blugs zag par 'gyur// don med bcos ma'i tshul rtags can// bsrel zhing spyad par
303'b2(rnying rgyud): bya ba min// shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag/ mad ma khung rdzab du bsdub mi bya// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ gser snod ma yin glugs mi bya// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par
303'b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba yong ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba// de dag gcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi du ra mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no// stag ser rol pas las byas
303'b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ta las kyi rjes la bzlas mi bya// rdo rje drag chen gtu/ mas pa'i gzhi// gzhig par bya ba ga la yin// rdo rje dba'i reg de// bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min// bud shing sreg
303'b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgron ma de// mthor rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya// rdo rje tsha ga gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol kar gcad par bya ba min// rgyal po bka' rtags phyag brgyad dag/ rnam gzhar dbyi ba
303'b6(rnying rgyud): mi bya'o// rdo rje pha lam gautams pa'i mkhar// rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o// gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de// rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya// rnal 'byor thabs kyis khyad par can// 
303'b7(rnying rgyud): rtsal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste// skal ldan dag ni nor mchog yin// rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni// rdo rje las kyi bsam gtan dag/ rdo rje go phur tro ma chen gyis// srog la bar chad
303'b8(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i sgra// nyon mongs thibs po de gzhom bya// snyoms las le lo'i gzhir gyur pa// thugs thub ra gcod nga rgyal ri// dregs byed dbang po nyams pa'i bcud// dpa' byed rkyen yang
304a1(rnying rgyud): bsdam par bya// theg chen gsang sngags ma gtogs pa// mtshan ma gang dag byil pa'i tshig/ zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing // thams cad de nyid kho nar bya// ji ltar gsad pa'i mi
304a2(rnying rgyud): gang dag/ gshed ma mis ni bsod pa'i tshe// thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa ltar// le lo dgra bcom brtson par 'bad// rnal 'byor bsgribs pa'i gags bsal ba// bka' thub sdom pa'i mdung
304a3(rnying rgyud): pa can// 'dod spyod zhen dang mi 'thun dang // gcig la gang 'dir mi gcig pa// phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can// 'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dag/ dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can// / 
304a4(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa yongs kyis spang bar bya// de ni rnal 'byor bgegs yin te// rnal 'byor bar du gcod par byed// rnal 'a byor nges pas zhugs pa la// rgyun gyi bar du gcod pa'i
304a5(rnying rgyud): bdud// rnam rtog 'phrig pa chen po dang // gang la btang snyo/ mas le lo dang // longs spyod du 'jig yeng ba dang / tshe/ ga rtsub mtshon cha rnon po dang // khro gtum dang thung shin tu
304a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrag/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bdud lnga yin// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog/ rnal 'byor nor la 'phro ba'i dag/ thabs la
304a7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas dul bar bya// gang gi rnal 'byor rang bzhin bcos// drang srong nyid las nyams 'gyur te// kha na ma tho grags pa yi// de dag bcas dgar 'gyur ba'i sgra// lta dman spyod rtsing
304a8(rnying rgyud): 'chol ba yis// lugs bor 'di las log par spyod// bka' log 'dra men las spyod pas// don du mi 'gyur 'chal pa'i dgra/ 'da' ka rdo rje dka' thub dam// klong du ma gyur phyal/
