304b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa rul pa'i ljon shing bzhin// 'chad pas drug por 'byung ba'i dgra/ rnal ma nyid la sbyor ba de// gang la nges pa'i tshig med na// don rnams grub pa ma yin te// 'bras bur mi 'gyur gol
304b2(rnying rgyud): paba'i dgra/ rnal 'byor rnal 'byor spyod pa la// dam pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra/ thabs la mkhas pa'i blo gros kyis// skyon gyi dag bzhi bzlog par bya// srid gsum snang ba'i zhing
304b3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag/ rnam dag zhing du nges pa ste// sa rnams gcig car sbyangs pas na// zhing rnams dam pa'i mchog yin no// 'dod spyod mchod pa'i tshogs 'di dag/ yo byad chen po'i
304b4(rnying rgyud): mchog yin te// dgongs pa dam pa kun mnyes pa'i// rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// 'khor ba dur khrod ga/  nas 'di dag/ bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te// ma nor
304b5(rnying rgyud): ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// rtsol mang lhun gyis grub pa'i sa'o// kun gyi rtsa ba dug chen lnga// ye shes chen po lnga nyid de// kun shes rang rig rang 'byung bas// rnal
304b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor rang rig mig ldan pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni// dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog yin te// dam pa'i gdams pa'i tshig 'di la// gang dag nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin// / 
304b7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar sa gzhi gshin pa la// brten nas sa bon btab pa las// dam pa kho na 'jug par 'os// 'un pas gang gi de nyid kyang // 'un cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug/ lang ka'i bdag
304b8(rnying rgyud): ji ltar na// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ kho bo mthong thos skabs gcig na// bdag gis bshes gnyen dam pa des// 'dus pa phal po che dag la// lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe// 
305a1(rnying rgyud): // 'khor 'dir 'dus par gyur pa yi// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// bu mo drug gi 'khor 'dus pas// 'bras drug smin par gyur pa yis// gang dag 'tsho ba'i srog 'dzin ltar// 
305a2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur pas// dam tshig 'di la gnas pa ni// bla med byang chub rnam smin pas// dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o// gal te nyams par gyur pa na// chad pa'i skye
305a3(rnying rgyud): gnas dmyal chen brgyad// mi bzang sdug bsngal drag po yis// 'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du 'khor// lang ka'i bdag po gang 'di las// nyams par gyur pa gang zhe na// kun tu nyams
305a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin bzlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// rtag par rgyu ngan gyi khor mor byung // gang de skad par bya ba'i thabs// rnam
305a5(rnying rgyud): ba lngar ni bshad par bya// las dang rdzas dang 'dun pa/ dang // ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do// las ni rnam lA/ sa bskongs 'gyur te// dang po 'bum khri gsum pa ste// 
305a6(rnying rgyud): rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo// yan lag nyams par gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// bzlas nyams brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// 
305a7(rnying rgyud): bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis bskongs// rdzas ni rin chen sna lnga yis// rigs kyi dam tshig gang nyams las// bla ma rigs lnga gang dag la// tha tshigs gang rlag nor des bla// 
305a8(rnying rgyud): 'dun pa dad pa dang ba yis// gdung ba'i shugs kyi nga ro yis// rtag par rmag chad pa ni// dmyal chen gnas na sbyong bzhin du// gnyen po mchog tu de 'gyur te// de ni skong ba
305b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs chen yang // 'jig rten sreg la me dgos kyang // bag chags sreg la me mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas// sgrib pa'i bud shing thams cad
305b2(rnying rgyud): bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma 'bud la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul kun rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru ba la
305b3(rnying rgyud): chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes chu byung bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad dag/ stong nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing // de bzhin nyid kyi na mkha' nas// 
305b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar 'phro ma'i bskal par tshig/ de ni snyoms pa dam pa'i mchog/ de nyid de'i thabs mchog kyang // rnal 'byor dam pa gang zhig dag/ nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la// 
305b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin de nyid ma g.yos kyang // mgon skyabs de las/ gzhan med de// nyams dang ma nyams tha snyad med// bskang ngam ma bskang tshig lam bral// lang ka'i bdag po
305b6(rnying rgyud): de dag ni gzhi yongs su bzung ba rnam par dgos par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams dman pa dam pa rnams kyi nor la
305b7(rnying rgyud): yongs su spyod par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste drug bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang gsang
305b8(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa// kye grogs po dam pa dag rgyud yongs su grol ba ni dam pa la rag las pa ste// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla med snying po rmin pa'i rkyen// blo gros chen po dri
306a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i yul// lam stor sa mkhan pa shes gnyen mgon// mun sel sgron ma'i rin po che// mthong mig dbang po yid rnams shes// chu bo rab med sgrol ba'i glu// 'jigs pa'i
306a2(rnying rgyud): rdzong chen rten pa'i mkhar// 'khor ba'i gcong 'byin sman pa'i mchog/ mtsho gling rin chen len byed pa'i// ded dpon dam pa'i bla ma de// mngon du nges par shes par bya// snga mdzod gter
306a3(rnying rgyud): khyim khang chen dang // rnam 'brel lde mig bcu gnyis dang // nges mdo dam pa de nyid bcu// mtha' bcu yan lag mdo rtsa ba// gang 'dir skabs bcu rdzogs ldan nam// skyon gyi mtha' rnams
306a4(rnying rgyud): zad 'gyur zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// da dam pa'i tshad la bab ma bab// de la bshes gnye na mgon bltas na// mthar chub yongs su rdzogs she 'am// 
306a5(rnying rgyud): gang rig de yul ma yin par// thabs dang yan lag bcas pa yis// gzhan gyi yul nas rtag par bya// / brtags pas bsngo ba kun ldan na// gzhan gyi yul la
306a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro mi bya// dam pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs na// dman pa'i yo byad med la min// nges par kun tu bzang nyid na// gang gi lta yul ngan la min// sgron mo 'tshu ba rlung bskyod la min// 'dod/ 
306a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal tshig 'chal dman la min// bla na rmags rmongs la ga la srid// 'jig rten pa'i skyon de bzhin du// dam pa de dag ji ltar yang // sa mkhan lam la mkhas nges na// ji ltar
306a8(rnying rgyud): bzod par bya dka' yang // thad zad bzod par bya// dam pa 'di ni sa mkhan te// 'di ni bdag gi mgon yin pas// 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad kun// nges par thams cad sgyu ma yin/ 
306b1(rnying rgyud): gang 'dir gyi na tsam 'di dag/ dam par gang la mgog ma yin// skad cig tsam gyi mthong 'di la// de lta zhig na 'di lta la// de srid tsam du bzod par zad// ci gar gar cig 'byung 'joms
306b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs// log pas gyin 'da' gyin 'da' 'di// dam pa'i don du mi sbyor ram// snyam du btags te dam par bya// yun gyi don srid chen po la// dmigs nas blo gros phyir bskyed de// bde
306b3(rnying rgyud): mchog bde ba'i dam pa dang // skad cig tsam gyi tha snyad 'dis// btang snyoms bya ba ga la srid// gang 'dir mgon med bdag 'khyams na// gang gis phyogs 'di dag la ni// phan 'byung rigs
306b4(rnying rgyud): can sug na// dam pa ma gtogs gcig 'ga' med// 'di na phan dang mgon mang zhing // dman par 'bre dal pa gang yod kyang // log par bsgrub pa'i blo gros mkhan// 
306b5(rnying rgyud): g.yangs sar mchod pa'i snga bgos mkhan// don la 'gog snyam yod min te// bshes gnyen skyabs ma dang ci slad du// / kun kyang smang rigs grong khyer 'gro// byams/ 
306b6(rnying rgyud): blo'i yul du ga la rung // gang 'dir mun par 'khyams pa la// bde mchog snang ba'i lam ston pa// skyabs chen dam pa gang de lags// gzhan gyis sgrub par nus ma yin// des na dam
306b7(rnying rgyud): pa gang dag la// bstan pas shin tu bstan par bya// gang 'dir snang ba'i tshul 'byung na// dam pa nyid du 'dun par gsol// dam par snang ba thob phan chad// dam pa de las 'gal
306b8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur las// rdul gyi cha yang mi bya'o// rgya mi cag cing lung mi bor// 'dun pa nas bzung las rung ba'i// bar du de la ltos dgos so// gang 'dir ngo gang ma zin pas// btang snyoms/ 
307a1(rnying rgyud): / tsam du tshul bsad na// de la dam pa'i don med de// de rkyen de dang mi ldan pas// bslab pa'i yul bzlas the tsom zos// le los yul la mi brtson zhing // phyal bas de la
307a2(rnying rgyud): ma gus pas// shes bya mun pa'i tshogs kyi bsgribs// gang gis nam mthong thibs kyis 'gag/ gang la byis pa shed mi 'bye// mdud pa'i bcing ba de las byung // shes rgyud grol
307a3(rnying rgyud): bar ga la srid// dam pa'i yo byad lnga dbul ba'i// phongs pa de yis gzhan bsgral na// de yang dbul po nyid du 'gyur// 'tsho ba dam pa dang bral bas// longs spyod chen pos phongs pa yi/ 
307a4(rnying rgyud): mu ge'i dgon pa nyid du ltung // de lta'i gang zag dman pa de// dam par gzung bar gyur phan chad// dam par de sa dang ma nges kyang // bka' cag lugs bor ga la srid// 
307a5(rnying rgyud): gal te de yi rgya nyams ni// dmyal ba rdo rje de 'gro ste// mi/ bzang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// dmyal bsrungs/  khyi ni lu de zhes// grags pa seng ge gzugs 'dra na// 
307a6(rnying rgyud): mche ba gza' rings dpal rno bas// 'bad cing mtshon cha'i lom du bdas// spu gri rno dpal ral gri nags// nang du ga cha rgyu gas skyabs med// khro chu khal ma thal skyo yi// chu bo rab med
307a7(rnying rgyud): nang du 'bying // rtse gsum mdung dang mda' bo che// khab 'ang dpal rno gzangs rings dang // chu gi ral gi rnos gang ba'i// mun dong ma 'bar nang du ltung // sdug bsngal rgyud pa de dag las// 
307a8(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// slob mar gyur na sems ldan pas// dam pa de la nyes byed gang // sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas// de dag rtag tu spyo'u tshugs 'gro// dam pa kun
307b1(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// dam pa nyid las gang 'das pa// rnal 'byor dam pa dbang gyur pa// thams cad 'khrugs nas khrag chen 'thung // dam pa'i yi ge 'bru bkod pa// dbugs chen nang / 
307b2(rnying rgyud): du shar nas kyang // lcags kyi sdigs pa mgo dgu pa// rag sha yag shar gyur pa das// bsad nas dmyal ba chen por rgyud// rnam par 'tshe dang nor phrogs dang // bgegs dang sdig pa'i
307b3(rnying rgyud): dug dpal gyis// nyams pa de la 'che bar byed// sdig can yin te 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa// 'jigs pa brgyad rnams de la 'byung / sho gam can chen la
307b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// gnod sbyin gyis bsad mi sder 'gro/ ci phyi dar lha srin sde brgyad las// gtum po gtum po dam can kun// chos srung ka yi las mkhan yin// bka'
307b5(rnying rgyud): yi las la dus mi 'dor// des na chos la spyod pa yi// dam par 'jug pa'i bu rnams kyis// nam yang zha bas la mi smod cing // bka' zur gcag par mi bya'o// / 
307b6(rnying rgyud): gang gis rtse gcig chos bsrungs na// chos la bsrung ba'i bsrungs ma rnams// gtum po mthu chen rnams kyis kyang // bu bzhin rtag tu bsrung bar byed// chos bsrung ba yang gang zhe na/ 
307b7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun la rmongs shing // nges par shes pa gang yin pa// chos bsrung ba la mkhas par 'gyur// gang zhig kun la mi mkhas shing // rmongs pa'i lta ba brtan pa can// bsgyur
307b8(rnying rgyud): bas cis kyang mi 'gyur te// nams kyang chos ni srung mi 'gyur// gal te dus ni thams cad du// dam pa de dang de gcig na// rgyud nan skyongs snyom las kyis// de dang 'gal na
308a1(rnying rgyud): ltung grib rgyu// des na dam pa'i lung mi gcag/ tshad mar nges pa dam pa'i lung // thams cad ldem dgongs can yin te// yul dang mtsham par sbyor ba yin// de yang ji lta
308a2(rnying rgyud): bu zhe na/ ji ltar log srid can dag gis// su dag 'jig rten 'dren gang lags// kye ma 'jig rten dga' byed khyod// thams cad dga' bar ston shes na// bdag ltar dga' ba'i don
308a3(rnying rgyud): bstan nas// 'bras bu gdon mi za shes na// thams cad mkhyen ces de la bya// de ltar mos pa gang bstan pa// pha ma bram ze rgyal po rnams// bsad brlag yongs su bcom byas na// 
308a4(rnying rgyud): de dag rtag tu bde ba'i mchog/ de bstan de yis de spyad nas// bde mchog bde dang ldan pa yin// de bzhin bag yi ldem dgongs la// mdo dang don gal cha yod pas// skyabs
308a5(rnying rgyud): chen dam par bzung ba de// tshad ma dam par yid ches na// de yi lugs kyang dam par bya// lang ka'i bdag po gang gi tshe// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des// kho bo
308a6(rnying rgyud): la ni 'di skad bsgo// sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// bskal pa 'bum gyis sangs rgyas pas// slob dpon mnyan par shes par bya// ci phyir bskal pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// slob sa
308a7(rnying rgyud): dag la brten nas byung // slob dpon dag la ma brten par// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ste// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong // byung na dam pa'i lugs dang 'gal/ 
308a8(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan pa'i dam pa la// dus gsum dus ni thams cad du// phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun byon na// sngags dang 'dun pas phyag
308b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// sems dpa' lnga dang mi dag dang // de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po log lta can dag gis// rig pa 'dzin pa kun 'dus nas// sprul pa'i me tog kun mthor zhing // bla
308b2(rnying rgyud): ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi pha lags so// bla ma pa shes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so// bla mig shes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag
308b3(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi mgon lags so// mi shes rmongs pa'i blo gros mkhan// lam stor rnams kyi mkhan lags// mun khung 'khyams pa'i sgron ma lags// gdung ba sel ba'i rin po che// nyi ma'i
308b4(rnying rgyud): zhal la phyag 'tshal 'dud// na mkha'i thugs la phyag 'tshad la 'dud// zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'di ltar dga' dang gus
308b5(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do// de'i phyir/ rgyal ba thams cad dang // sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// dam pa'i dam pa las byung ba// dper na ma yis
308b6(rnying rgyud): bu bskyed ltar// de bzhin dam pa shes par gyis// dam pa de yi rang bzhin yang // yid rten sems dang dul ba dang // tshad med yangs pa'i blo gros dang // rkyen thub bzod ldan kun tu drang // gso / 
308b7(rnying rgyud): por spyod la gya gyu med// sems can nyan can thams cad la// thabs kyis mi 'jigs sna tshogs sbyin// dpa' bo mthur ldan brtson 'grus che// shes bya'i yul ni thams cad la// ji ltar
308b8(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung // srid par zhugs kyang zad mi shes// rtags shing yon tan phyi phyir 'byung // bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// legs dang
309a1(rnying rgyud): // nyes pa'i las rnams la// dga' dang mi dga'i rtog 'dzin med// ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ltar// gzi ldan brjid che yul mi 'jug/ 'du 'dzin dman pa'i las rnams spangs// 
309a2(rnying rgyud): 'phyo dang g.yang bral gang na rtag/ seng ge bu ltar cig pu gnas// dgon pa'i rgyud dang dben lam bsten// 'di dang gang ldan dam pa'i 'os// dam pa thams cad bkur gnas so// rang bzhin
309a3(rnying rgyud): de dang mi ldan yang // dam pa'i mdzod dang gnyer ldan na// dam par gzung zhing dam par bya// chos kun mi shes ma rtogs kyang // dam par gyur pa'i bla ma la// bkur gnas rim gro cher
309a4(rnying rgyud): byas pas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal 'gyur// ci phyir zhing rab gshin pa la// sa bon btab na rgyas 'phel bzhin / bsod nams dam pa'i zhing rab la// til 'bru mi gtor
309a5(rnying rgyud): 'phel mi 'gyur// 'khor ba'i mtha' las skyeb pa yi// bshes gnyen dam pa bzhi yod de// khungs dang lung dang dbang 'gyur dang // blo gros nges pa'i tshad ldan bzhi// 
309a6(rnying rgyud): de las gnyen po bzhi 'byung ste// sems bskyed stobs dang 'gyod stobs dang // las kyi stobs dang dmigs pa'i stobs// log pa'i stobs rnams 'joms par byed// chu bo bzhi las rgal
309a7(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// rgyud kun yongs su grol 'gyur te// dam pa'i dam pa de nyid 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas cang mi gsung // des na lang ka'i bdag po 'dir// blo ldan dga' dang gus pa
309a8(rnying rgyud): yin/ dam par gyur to 'tshal rnams la// 'dun sar lan gsum gus byas te// zhabs la spyi bos gtug par bya// dam pa'am yang na ma nges rnams// dam pa'i chos sogs 'dus
309b1(rnying rgyud): byas tata kha na ma tho gzhom bya'i phyir// 'jig rten srid zhu'i 'dun pa bya// lung 'byung ga la rmod 'phel gtam la// yang du 'dun pas 'dun thabs sbyar// srid zhu sgra yis mtshams bzung ste// 
309b2(rnying rgyud): gang de rnams ni ci bder gan// bde dang blang ba langs pa dang // don byed zhu sogs skabs rnams su// rgyud gnyen sri zhu gus ldan pas// gyong sems med so nan tan byas// kun nas
309b3(rnying rgyud): bzem mdog bag la gnas// gsong por smra zhing gya gyu med// ci phyir dam par gyur pa la// ma nges gya gyu'i las byas pas// dam par gyur pa kun bslus te// dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung
309b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// brtson dang 'grus ldan ngang tshul bzang // brda dgo cing gsang thub spyod pa dag/ ya bag bzhin bzang das mdzes thabs ldan// sgo gsum bzang spyod mtha'
309b5(rnying rgyud): gsum bsdams// dam pa nyid du 'thun bzhin spyod// ga sal la dag pas go rnams dbye// dam pa'i nang na brda ra 'dug tshe// kun gyi tshig lam la mi 'byung // gang dag
309b6(rnying rgyud): bzang dang ngan spyod la// mthing slang smod pa yong mi bya// bdag la bzang dang ngan brjod cing // kun mthong kun brjod spro skur dang // gang dag tshig lam 'dren 'dod na// tshig lam bcad na
309b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba thob// dam pa'i yul na gnas rnams su// khong khro tshig rtsub khyal mi smra// bag yangs tshul gyi bya ba min// tshul med tshul dang mi ldan pa'i// nyam nga med par smra mi bya// phong
309b8(rnying rgyud): dang lcogs dang gang mthong dang // stod 'byor rngom la sogs mi bye/ gzhan la khyad kyis gsang pa'i chog/ gang rim gcad par mi bya'o// dam pa'i gnas su gyur pa laM// rdo tshigs
310a1(rnying rgyud): dang 'thad pa'i yon// nor gyi dbyig dang na bza'i mchog/ rtsi mchog zas la sogs pa rnams// dbul dang gsol bas mnyes par bya// des ni nang dang dbul la sogs// 
310a2(rnying rgyud): bkres dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// nams kyang 'debs par mi 'gyur ro// zhu ba dbul ba nad pa dang // lung 'byung 'dun par 'dug pa dang // dam pa'i spyod pa ma gtogs pa// dam pa dag
310a3(rnying rgyud): dang gnas gcig tu// zha 'bring ma rtogs nams kyang min// 'di ltar ma byas nyes byas so// sku yi grib ma mi 'gong zhing // zhabs rjes brlam par mi bya'o// nam bza' chags gdan
310a4(rnying rgyud): rten la sogs// nams kyang 'goms par bya ba min// dam pa'i lung byung ming gis bsgrubs// ming lcogs ma yin ma lcogs na// sgyu sogs med pa gnas dor ro// 
310a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i dkor rnams srog bzhin bsrung // de yi nye gan sa dam pa bzhin// de yi 'khor g.yog nya du bzhin// rta ga tu mnyam pa'i sems kyis blta// khri ma la bstan
310a6(rnying rgyud): bde bla ma'i thabs// mi gus la sogs mi tshul rnams// dam pa'i thad du yong mi mdzes// byas na sri zhu dam tshig nyams// mgo la ze ldir gdugs thogs dang // lag rten lus brten de bzhin
310a7(rnying rgyud): stong nadagang 'dir ma rabs thor bu'i thabs// snang ba'i yul nas bya ma yin// rmang rigs rdol pa g.yung mo'i tshul// dam pa'i gzigs yul nams kyang min// khu lho bsnyon pa kun tu
310a8(rnying rgyud): rgyu'i ta spyod pa dam pa'i yul du min// snang ba'i lung la gang 'byung stong// ji ltar spyod byung spyod pa byung // 'jam dal thos 'phrigs dogs bzhin spyad// dam pa'i spyod pa'i snang yu/ 
310b1(rnying rgyud): nas tata brag med che ba'i thabs mi bya// bsgrubs nas mdzes pa'i tshul bzung ste// bag dang ldan pas gnas par bya// lus kyi ngo gang dag kun// mthong tshor yul nas yod mig/ snang / 
310b2(rnying rgyud): pa lus kyi bya byed rnams// blo gros ldan pas bya ba min// 'dus nas 'dug byed spyod rnams// dam pa'i 'dun sar rig ma yin// 'phyog yang brkam dang ma zhi ba'i// spyod tshul yul
310b3(rnying rgyud): nas mi bya'o// khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams// bsgribs sam phag gam basbyor bkab nas// thams cad bde srung 'jam byas te// dam pa de la ci mdzes bya// dam pa gdan bskyod
310b4(rnying rgyud): gang phyogs nas// bdag nas bsgrims te sr-i nu bya// dad bcug brdza sang gudan thabs sbyar// ma ldan nyid la sa ci bder sbyar// sngon rtsol lung 'byung sri zhu bsdu/ 
310b5(rnying rgyud): dri rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin no// blo ldan spyod lam bzhi spyod/ na// sri zhu gus pas de bzhin sbyar// gang ma gus dang / btang snyoms dag/ nem yang bya ba yong me yin// 
310b6(rnying rgyud): sri zhu bsti gnas rim gro rnams// bya ba'i mdun dang du zan du// sri zhu bcug ste ci sder 'gro/ bde shes la sogs sri zhus zhus// yang dag bka' thub mdun nyid du// gar spyod gar
310b7(rnying rgyud): skabs sri zhu dbul// mtshan nas nam yang mi brjod cing // dam pa bla ma po shes gnyen zhes// brjod pa'i tha mar zhus skye gzhug/ khyad par cir yang dbye bar bya// lung byung bka
310b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin nu zhim brjod/ thal byar gdung ba gzung bar bya// dam pa'i lung yul byung rjes 'bring// de kun mi nus che chen po yon// mdzes pa'i tshul brgya gus 'dun napa/ 
311a1(rnying rgyud): spobs pa nod pa gsum du zhus/ gyong khengs med pa'i gnyen lcug gis// zhabs 'bring dgos pa thams cad bya// dge slong sar pa'i spyod pa yis// bsregs pa la sogs
311a2(rnying rgyud): bya byed dang // brgyan dang mtshon thogs spang bar bya// blo gros gus pa de nyid kyang // nyid kyis nyid la dpyas bcug ste// gzhan gyis dpya ba'i gzhi rnams spang // kun tu mthun par bzang
311a3(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i// skyes bu gang yin de ltar bya// kun gyis mthun par ma sngags pa'i// tha shal gang yin de spyod spang // dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang // slob ma gzung dang chos smra ba
311a4(rnying rgyud): lung ma byung bar mi brtsam ste// dam pa'i yul nas de mi da rigs// gal te gzhan gyi don byas no// de yi yo byud mi sprad de// de kun dam pa dri la dbul// dam pas ci
311a5(rnying rgyud): blangs lhag ma blang // dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang // da ma pa'i mdun du mi rigs so// bkur sti si zhu la sogs min// gang yin dam pa de nyid mnga'// snying rjes
311a6(rnying rgyud): dam pas ci gnang ba// si zhu mdun bsu lag gnyis kyis// blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya// rmugs mad dran gsal rab bsgribs nas// rang gi spyod lam 'da' mi bya// blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma
311a7(rnying rgyud): des tate dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir// mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad brgyad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul// skyo dub med pa'i dam pa dang // gyong khengs med pa'i gnyen lcug dang // 
311a8(rnying rgyud): ser sna med pa'i zang zing dang // so mo nyi med pa'i sri zhu dong // g.yo rgyu med pa'i dran rkan dang // kha gsag med pa'i ngang rgyud dang // rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang // dri ma med pa'i lhag
311b1(rnying rgyud): sems brgyad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul// dam pas spro ba bslab pa'i mtha'// chub par rdzogs pas rgyud dgrol te// shes bya kun la thogs med 'gro// rang rgyud mdud pa dgrel pa
311b2(rnying rgyud): yi/ shes rab mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu// mthar chib rgyud dgrol yul spangs te// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad pa'i// nor mchog
311b3(rnying rgyud): dam pa de la dbul// rang gi lus kyang ci rigs par// rin thang gang yin nor gyis bla// de nas ji bzhin gar bde bar// rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs// sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams/ 
311b4(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro// sngon gyi dam pa bde gshegs rnams// ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas// kun spangs dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas// nyid
311b5(rnying rgyud): las dam pa mnyes pa 'gyus den de slod ma pa da gan du mang 'bral ba ma yi/ na te// ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin// blo gros dri/ sa na dam par 'gyur// ji ltar cang shes gyi ling dag/ sdom
311b6(rnying rgyud): byed sgrog gis bcings 'gyur ba// bkrol byas bde blag byung 'gyur na// ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar// sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di// mi shes bcings pas bcings 'gyur ba// 
311b7(rnying rgyud): / dam pas rnam grol sgo phye bas// shes rgyud kun 'grol thogs med 'gro// 'di ni mi shes rgyud 'gro ba'i// mdud pa'i bcing ba 'grol ba ste// rgyud rnams grol ba'i
311b8(rnying rgyud): bslab pa ru// goms par bya ba rab tu bces// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rgyud yongs su dgrol ba'i bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas
312a1(rnying rgyud): dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams slob dpon dam par bskrun par shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i
312a2(rnying rgyud): mdo chen po las bsnyen bkur dam pa mchog gi le'u drug cu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ 
312a3(rnying rgyud): kye grogs po dag bsgo dbye bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste// ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la// rig dang ma rig rnam pa yis// kun shes spyod dang kun tu rmongs// rnam pa gnyis su snang
312a4(rnying rgyud): ba la ta tha dad du ma mang por 'gyur// rmongs pa rnam pa ga de nyis snang ba// mi shes pa dang log par shes// mi / das phyal brgyang phan gnyis// log rtog mur thug mu stegs
312a5(rnying rgyud): patade yang zhen chags log srid can// 'jig rten 'a/ jig rten pa zhes bya// mu stegs log dang gzhan rkyen log/ zhar las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad// mi shes
312a6(rnying rgyud): 'di gnyis gzhir snang ba// dman rigs dang ni rigs ma nges// rigs chad 'du shes can 'di dag/ kun nas bkrigs pa'i mun pa yin// 'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang // gang la
312a7(rnying rgyud): g.yeng dang yang can// mos pa can zhes grags pa rnams// sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang // log par rtog 'di ya mtshan can// brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu gnyis// nyi shu 'am
312a8(rnying rgyud): sde bcu ste lnga gnyis dang // tha dad rnam pa du mar snang // yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las// 'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang // log par 'dzin dang lha khyad dang // rang gi
312b1(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin te// rigs mi mthun pa bde lngar grags// rang bzhin log pas log pa nyid// gzhan rkyen log pa phra med spyod// lung la brten dang rtags tsam 'dzin// bcos
312b2(rnying rgyud): mar spyod dang mu cor smra// lung gi phyogs tsam rten pa dang // phyogs log gol dang bslad pas 'tshal// phyogs ltos spyod pa rnam bzhir grags// bcos ma gzhan las gyur pa dang // 'di
312b3(rnying rgyud): las gyur pa gnyis kha na// gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad nor// longs spyod lnga ldan gzhan las gyur// dran pa rtag lto ltos 'dzin rgyu// med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes// kun
312b4(rnying rgyud): nas rnam par mi g.yeng ste// gong du shes pa yod smra'o// / de bzhin med par lta ba dang // 'di gang 'di las gyu da ra lta ba// gang du yod min med min lta// bdag shi 'di
312b5(rnying rgyud): tshe mya ngan 'das// gang 'dir phyogs tsam rten pa ni// gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid// phyogs log gol ba ra gang gyur pa// drug sde so so tha dad dang // spyir lta gang
312b6(rnying rgyud): rig skyon med pa'o// rgyur lta byams pas dag par lta// 'tsho ba bcos pas dag lta dang // rgyan la lham dang gos bcos pa// skra dpung bcas dang rgyan can dang // dka' thub rten pa
312b7(rnying rgyud): drug po'o// bskrad pas 'tshal pa gang 'di la// brten pas bdag lta rten rtog dang // rten chags byin chags bkra shing mtshan// skyabs log yongs su 'chal pa'o// phyogs ltos
312b8(rnying rgyud): gcod pa gang zhe na// phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa// gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa'o// gang 'dir phyi rol rnam pa gsum// bye brog pa dang tha snyad pa// rang snang gcig phyogs
313a1(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'o// yang dag phra dang zab pa dang // rgya che yangs pa de kho na// gsang sngags rig byed rig spyod dang // rigs sbyor dam par phyogs ltos gcod// gsang chen brtul zhugs
313a2(rnying rgyud): cher spyod dang // rgyal dpog pa dang rgyal thabs pa'o// zhar las byung ba gang 'di dag/ mtha' yas sde bcur rdzogs pa ste// gang mu zin pa de rtags 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye gnaso// 
313a3(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // zhal nas byung ba ji lta ba// 'jig rten sgron ma nub rjes na// gang dag mos pa tha dad pas// zhar las byung ba'ang de bzhin no// kun shes spyod pa'ang rnam
313a4(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis// rim gyis pa dang gcig pa'o// rim gyis 'ju dag pa rnam gsum du// phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang // ba sgrubs spyod mngon rtogs gsum nyid do// 'di yang khyad
313a5(rnying rgyud): par rnam gnyis gyis// gsum gsum gnyis su dam pa yis// gsung ba khyod ci mi shes sam// des na cha chu/ nga gnyis gsum drug/ sgrub pa zab pa phra ba gnyis// blo
313a6(rnying rgyud): che zab pa dman pa nyid// spyod pa rlabs chen cha shas can// rgya che ba dang mtshan mar spyod// de ni gsang chen gsang bar bshad// mngon rtogs rnam gnyis phyi nang 'jug/ mi mthun phyogs/ 
313a7(rnying rgyud): kyis gal bzung nas// cha gnyis so sor 'dod pa 'byung // phyi rol bye brag tha snyad gnyis// cha gnyis gcig las rtsod ma 'byung // nang 'jug sems snang dbus mtha' med// phyi nang snrel
313a8(rnying rgyud): zhir phyogs 'dzin cing // gang 'dir nges par gcod pa 'byung // mtha' dbus 'byed dang nges par 'jug/ gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung // rang dang lta ba'i phyogs 'dzin
313b1(rnying rgyud): cing rta brtsod pas the tshom 'byung ba dang // dbus mtha' 'byed dang nges par 'jug// gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung // gcig car 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bya dang bya thabs bya med
313b2(rnying rgyud): pa ta skyes dang ma skyes skye 'gag medab/ 'di kun ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skar bskum// yongs su rdzogs pa mkha' khyab gang la// 'ja' snang mkha' ltar
313b3(rnying rgyud): ma 'a'odres gcig/ rmong so rims gcig car 'jug spyod pa// 'dod pa'i yul la zhon spong dang // spyod sgyur shes rtogs spyod dbang byed// shes pa 'jig rten rtogs 'phags pa// spyod pa
313b4(rnying rgyud): blo ldan dbang sgyur thabs// gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir gags te// zhen chags log srong rig rgyud can// blo sa can gyi snod rnams la// bstan bya rnam pa bzhir gsum
313b5(rnying rgyud): pa ta 'dod rkye ni bkri dang brgyud pa'i tshig/ ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhi// snod kyi rkyen dang sbyar ba yin// 'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig la// 'dod pas mthong
313b6(rnying rgyud): ba tha dad pa'o// 'di ltar mthong sgo tha dad bzhin// rnam par snang 'byung bkod pa la// gang gis kun la zhugs bltas nas// gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o// ji ltar bung pa khung tshol
313b7(rnying rgyud): patakun du 'jug cing byung nas ni// rang gi gseng khung gang yin par// nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar// rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol ba// spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu/ 
313b8(rnying rgyud): lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsdur nas// don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o// de nyid don gyi rjes bcad phyir// sgo mo kun nas bsdur ba yi// bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te// 
314a1(rnying rgyud): goms par bya ba rabatu gces/ yang ka'i bdag po de dag ni// phyis 'byung bar snang ba'i sgo yongs su dbye ba yin te/ kun nas bsnur bar bslab pa'i mthar yongs su
314a2(rnying rgyud): bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams ches thams cad kyi sgo rang snang bar shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa
314a3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa'i lus kyi sems
314a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnams la smras pa// kye grogs po dag mthar phyin pa dar bya ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthar phyin par bya'o// bsam
314a5(rnying rgyud): du med pa ni sems kyi de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o// sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa/ 'i de kho na nyid mthar phyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
314a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas na sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas na bsam du med pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// / 
314a7(rnying rgyud): bsam du med pa la mkhas na// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/ de ni dgongs pa kun
314a8(rnying rgyud): nas 'dus pa nyid du shes par bya'o// grogs po dag de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'grel pa ste// 
314b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang // bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bya med pa'i rnal 'byor ro// grogs po dag bya ba'i rnal 'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
314b2(rnying rgyud): phyi'i rnal 'byor dang / nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ro// grogs po dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / de bzhin
314b3(rnying rgyud): du chu rdo rje dang /  dod bcur dang / nam mkha' rdo rje dang / gzugs rdo rje dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mtha
314b4(rnying rgyud): phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag nang gi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po da dang / de bzhin du rtog pa dang / dpyod pa la sogs pa gang
314b5(rnying rgyud): zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam/ pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// / grogs po dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta
314b6(rnying rgyud): ste/ thams cad dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / dman pa dang / dam pa dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / byas pa dang / ma byas pa dang / bcas pa dang // / 
314b7(rnying rgyud): ma bcas pa dang / spyi mthun dang / khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byor du shes par
314b8(rnying rgyud): bya'o bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rten pa dang / spyod pa dang / mig dang / khyad par dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / rtsal gyis gnon pa dang / kun nas rig pa'o// grogs po
315a1(rnying rgyud): / dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / bskyod pa dang / bsgyur ba dang / 
315a2(rnying rgyud): rtsal dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / sgo dang / shes pa dang / gnas dang / rig pa dang / lam dang / 'jug pa dang / ye shes dang / khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du
315a3(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa yin pa'o// gzhan yang mthong ba dang / ma yengs pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin
315a4(rnying rgyud): cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba byed pa de'i rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o// kye grogs po dag bya/ dpa med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang bslab pa/ 
315a5(rnying rgyud): dang ta sbyor ba dang / rtog pa dang / ltung ba dang / ma nor ba dang / nges pa dang / dgongs pa dang / ye shes dang / tshogs dang nga / bsgrub pa dang / dngos sgrub dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / chen
315a6(rnying rgyud): po dang / ye shes dang / byung tshul dang / che ba dang / rol pa dang / rngom pa dang / brjid pa dang / mthu dang / cho 'phrul dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag/ dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar
315a7(rnying rgyud): phyin cing phul du gyur par bya'o// de yang ji lta zhe na/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ ji ltar mthon ri rtse dag la// sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na/ mthon sar snang mthong kun gsal bas/ 
315a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun snang lam la mkhas// de bzhin shes rab mthon ri la// brtson pa dam pas kun bltas na// kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin// mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do// don la
315b1(rnying rgyud): mkhas par bya ba de// phul du byung ba'i bslab pa ste// dgongs pa dam pa de nyid la// mkhas par bya ba rab tu gces// grogs po dag de dag ni mthar phyin par bya ba rab tu shes par bya'o// de skad
315b2(rnying rgyud): ces smras pas// dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kun gyi phul du gyur par dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i
315b3(rnying rgyud): mdo chen po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag thams
315b4(rnying rgyud): cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/ bya ba dang / rang bzhin dang / bsgyur bas so// grogs po dag de la bya ba ni bsdu raba'i bya ba so// rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so// bsgyur bas
315b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang / dus dang / tshad dang / grags pa dang / gags dang / rtags dang / thob pa/ 'o// grogs po dag de la rgyu ni yo byad chen po lnga kho na'o// / 
315b6(rnying rgyud): dus ni mtha' bcu rdzogs pa dang / nye bar dris pa dang / rigs can 'du ba dang / gsal ba thob pa dang / las su rung ba dang / mtshan ma 'byung ba dang / mang po sngags pa dang / nyams rnyed pa
315b7(rnying rgyud): dang ta bya ba rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag tshad ni 'di lta ste/ ded dpon dang / lnga ltas dang / smin pa'o// grogs po dag ded dpon gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ goms pa dang / rig pa dang / 'du ba
315b8(rnying rgyud): dang thob pa dang / rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag lnga ltas ni 'di lta ste/ mthong ba dang / 'byor pa dang / nus pa dang / thos pa'o// grogs po dag smin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mngon spyod dang / 
316a1(rnying rgyud): mi basbyor ba'o// grogs po dag grags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chu bo bzhi'i rgyud du byung ba dang / gang dag las 'phags pa dang / gang dang ldan pa dang / gang la mkhas pa dang / 
316a2(rnying rgyud): gang thob pa nyid do// grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi thob pa dang / mi chags pa dang / mi gos pa dang / sreg pa'o// rtags gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grags pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / 
316a3(rnying rgyud): brtsan pa dang / 'byung ba'o// grogs po dag thob pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bskur pas thob pa dang / rtsal gyis thob pa'o// grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par rig par bya ste/ gang 'dir snying rje'i
316a4(rnying rgyud): yul rnams la// byin rlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung // 'dun pa 'i rnal 'byor pa dag la// glegs pam bcu gnyis sbyin dpar bya// gang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor la// nyi zla gnyis ni sbyin
316a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rin chen/ bdun nyid nges par 'thob// lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'a/ byor pas// g.yung drung brgyad dag thob pa yin// rtsal
316a6(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtsal bcu'i khyad par de nyid 'thob// kun gyi bla ma dam pas ni// rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob// dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di// ma thos gzu
316a7(rnying rgyud): lums rang bshad pas// rab 'byam bstan pa kun brtsal yang // dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba// mang pos dbang por dpon stabs te// 'khor lo
316a8(rnying rgyud): la sogs rin chen gyis// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar// de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te// tog stong 'bar ba la sogs pas// khyad par bla ma
316b1(rnying rgyud): dam par 'gro// 'di ni bla ma'i khyad par te/ rgyal sar nges par 'byung ba yi// rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i thabs// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// kye grogs po dag de dag ni thams cad
316b2(rnying rgyud): 'du bar bya ba yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / dman pa dam pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo
316b3(rnying rgyud): chen po las rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs
316b4(rnying rgyud): po dag la dor bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang go cha gon pa'i rjes dasu mi ldog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i rjes su ji snyed pa 'gro ba// nam mkha'i rjes su 'byung ba 'gro ba
316b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin sems nyid kyi rjes su sems las byung ba 'gro ba yin// / chos nyid kyi rjes su chos thams cad 'gro ba yin// de bzhin du dgongs pa dam pa'i rjes su gang gsung ba dang / 
316b6(rnying rgyud): gang mdzad pa thams cad 'gro bas na// dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du gang du spyod pa de ltar ro// kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/ mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam
316b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam// kun nas mi mnyam yongs su mnyam// gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyad par yang // gang dang don gyi mnyam par spyad// byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa'am/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste// / 
316b8(rnying rgyud): dper na na mkha' rgyal po 'am// ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra// de yang de yul che chung gis// khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin// rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis// dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams
317a1(rnying rgyud): / rnams la// che chung rim pa yod pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang // thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang // bab chod thang du 'jug pa ste/ dper na glang chen chur
317a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa// rab dang glang chen bab mi lta// de yang rtsal skyid dag zhan gyis// la ma du cing pa la tshumi gni phyogs so// de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa// 'bras bu don la bab gcod kyang // rtsal 'phang
317a3(rnying rgyud): mthon dman khyad par gyis// ji ltar nus tshad de spyod phyir// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang / sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang // spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // dus dang dngos grub
317a4(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur nas// tham das cad gcig las med na yang // grangs sam dbye ba grags phrag rnams snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni// khyad par
317a5(rnying rgyud): ci yang bstan pa yin// de yang rtsal gyi khyad par bgyi// dang po las kyi khyad par las// sogs pa'i rnal 'a// byor chung ngu rnams// rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni// rtsal chen
317a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul// spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa// sbrul bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang // brtsal ba'i yul ni chad ma yin// nor
317a7(rnying rgyud): bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa// rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas// rgyal po thabs kyis 'phong mtho ba'i// longs spyod che la dmigs bcos kyang // de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral zhing // skal/ 
317a8(rnying rgyud): ldan can gyi don 'di dag/ skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o// de phyir dgongs pa kun 'dus pa// gang 'dir rnal 'byor dman don du// gso dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag/ dman pa
317b1(rnying rgyud): dag dang mnyam par gsungs// gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di// rtog pa can dang 'thun par spyad// gso ba rtog pas zin pa'i nang // lta spyod nyams pa'i sman gyis gso// shi bslang ba yi
317b2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa 'di// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnams// rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas// gti mug pa ma tshe na ro blangs te// skye 'gag med par blang ba'i phyir// rol yid bzhin nor bu yi// 
317b3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste gnan par bya// ri yi gnyen por bdag gyur nas// ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas// ro yi gzi byin byung ba na// bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus bya// ro de 'gul
317b4(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa dang // gang gi 'gyur rtsis byug par bya// ro yi da yan lag kun bcings nas// bzlas pa drag po rgyun dmi gcad// gang der langs par gyur pa dang // cho 'phrul
317b5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs tshal ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas// ro la brdabs/ na gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis
317b6(rnying rgyud): bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur// lce bshad ral gri mtshon cha dang // ro yi mgo bo gcad pa des// ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// mgo thod go char bzung nas ni// lce'i ral gri mtshon thog
317b7(rnying rgyud): nas tata lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur// ro rangs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni// dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste// skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa yis// phyogs bzhir bltas te
317b8(rnying rgyud): dus gcig tu// mda' 'phangs sa la ma babs par// mtha' blangs skad cig 'jig rten bskor/ skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar// de ma thag tu gnas su slebs// yud ltar shin
318a1(rnying rgyud): / du myur ba 'thob// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// rol 'dod pa thams cad 'byung // rol ror bsgrubs ro grub na// ro yi dngos po mi snang bar// gang ltar 'grubs pa de snang phyir/ 
318a2(rnying rgyud): rol rnam rtog ga la yod// ro la ro yi rang bzhin dag/ med par shes pas thag chod bzhin// spyod pas de ltar mnyam spyod na// lta spyod mnyam zhes dam pas bshad// 'di ni shi bslong ba yi// 
318a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi dam pa'i spyod pa'o zhes// dgongs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus gsungs// grogs po dag de dag ni shi ba slong ba'i rtog pa yongs su spyod par shes par bya'o// grogs po dag de la sbyong ba'i
318a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ rtog pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba dang /  rgyung yong su myong 'o// de stog ci zug rngu sbyang ba ni gang rtog pa'i da das po sbyong ba'o// grogs po dag rgyud yongs su sbyang ba ni bkod
318a5(rnying rgyud): po'i bya bas sbyang ba dang // me'i bya bas sbyang ba'o// de la ba kod pa'i bya bas sbyangs pa gang zhe na/ brtsam pa las kyi dang po dang // dam pa'i don la 'jug pa na// thobs mchog
318a6(rnying rgyud): lngas ni spyad par bya// rdo rje dus tshigs bsnyen pa dang // gang 'dir nye bar bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen pos sbyor ba la// grangs dus mtshan mar bcas par bya// rnal 'byor bcad pa'i dka' sgro
318a7(rnying rgyud): 'dir ta to bsang go mi dbye skrag par 'gyur// ci phyir dang po yin pas na// byis pa blo shed ma bye ba// ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis// theg chen don las gol bar 'gyur// gnas 'dir
318a8(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/ 'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang // 'gyur dbang ma nges par bzhag ste// ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar// rdo rje thabs chen chom bu lnga// rdo rje 'dzin tshogs
318b1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug ldan// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// bri bya yang na bsam par 'am// brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis// mos pa la bskyed dran byas te// 
318b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin yul las phan nas ni// phyag bya la sogs mchod na ni// rdo rje dman dang rtsir sbyar ba// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs
318b3(rnying rgyud): te ta mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas// mnyes nas rgyud sbyangs 'dod par bya// snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag/ dbang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// 
318b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tha tshigs rnam lnga yis// bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par/ rtsal gyi rnam par byin nas kyang // rdodagal chen mna' bor ro// de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams// 
318b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi snang ba'i// rdo rje'i tshig gi sa nan chags bya// rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed do// 
318b6(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur/ shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul// thams cad rimi bzhin bstan par bya// drod can blo dkyil che rnams la// rnal 'byor nang par gsang sgo dbya/ 
318b7(rnying rgyud): rtsing po 'gros kyi dmu rgod la// gcan 'khrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung gi tshig can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur/ rtsal med mi nus gang dag la// phan pa
318b8(rnying rgyud): 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir gsal dang mi gsal dag/ 'od mi dbab cing lding mi dbab// rdo rje blo'i yul can la/ rtsal chen skyong zhes gdam par bya// rdo rje ru
319a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/ spyi 'am yang na re re'o// gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi
319a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs// ji ltar thabs kyi tsho gas sbyor ltar// gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo tshogs su bkod nas kyang // gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// 
319a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mas spras// rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la// mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// blo gar glu tshigs la sogs pas// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub
319a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang dus bzhi mnyam rig na// dus zhes bya bar ga la de rigs// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// de nyid ma danyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje lha mo dus kyi tshogs// 'das
319a5(rnying rgyud): dang da ltar byung ba dang // mi 'byung ma nges cha rnams la// dbang bsgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams// 'jigad/ nga skye dang smin pa dang // stongs par gyur pa de dag tu// rdo rje rnam
319a6(rnying rgyud): thar tshad med dang // sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dam pa'i dkyil// ji ltar rim par rdo rje yi// glu gar lo sogs yo byad kyi// mchod dang 'jug tshul ji lta
319a7(rnying rgyud): bar ta cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tshom bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir re re rer sbyar bya'o// 'das pa rnam thar chogs
319a8(rnying rgyud): bskrun te// da ltar 'byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang rnam thar bskrun// de ni mnyam pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor byang chub sems// rdzogs pa bcu drug
319b1(rnying rgyud): zla rgyas tshul// snying rje ye shes shar ba na// mkha' la nyi shar tshul bzhin du// dam pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yang dag nges pa'i sa pa yin// bcu gsum la la bgrod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi
319b2(rnying rgyud): rgyun tshogs sbyar// skar tshogs dbus na zla ba nya// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na// brdzes pa'i zla ba bcu
319b3(rnying rgyud): drug gis// nyi gsal 'od kyi phyag rgya la// mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bskrun// rdzogs pa nyid na mi dmigs pa// de bzhin nyid du spangs pas na// mnyam pas
319b4(rnying rgyud): stong par gyur pa la// thams cad chos skur rdzogs byang chu pa// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// rmad byung sems bskyed las chen spyad// phra mo drod du gyur pa na// dam/ 
319b5(rnying rgyud): pa spyad na nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyun gyi bar chad na// bas+t+ra na pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byung na bska nga so bya// mkha' la zla gsol grwa rgyas bzhin// sa la rnal
319b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor gra rgyas spyad// gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang // bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya// des ni nyin zla zhon 'gro ba'i// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pan cad// bde chen bcu gsus la 'grug
319b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rgyun tu bya ba ni//  'i ma sa sku gsung thugs su snang // sku dang gsung thugs bya rgya dag/ yi ge phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i ye shes rnams// rgyun gyi rgyun
319b8(rnying rgyud): du bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam dang nyi tshed la// yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la// mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di
320a1(rnying rgyud): / ni don dam nye ba'i lam// dam pa bskrun par 'gyur phyir ro// 'dir ni rgyun gyi rgyun tshogs des// dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings// thugs
320a2(rnying rgyud): kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di// rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pas ni// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas// 'khril mnyam
320a3(rnying rgyud): pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs bstan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// 'dod pa'i khams ltar mnyam par gsungs// gzhan
320a4(rnying rgyud): yang gang du gang 'brel pa'i// gsang chen dam pa'i dkyi del 'khor ni// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// pha na tshun dra bas 'brel pa la// stong nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin
320a5(rnying rgyud): las tata sprul pa bye ba ci yang ni// gnyis med dra ba'i chu/ la du 'brel// rnal 'byor chen po'i yul de nyid// rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo pa// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar
320a6(rnying rgyud): bya'oto/ gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni// blo gros chen po thabs ldan pas// mi skrag dga' ba'i ngo mtshar skye// gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor
320a7(rnying rgyud): bcas// lnga gnyis zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon nyid sgra brnyan dril bu dang // rtags
320a8(rnying rgyud): kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// tshogs shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// 
320b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dman pa'i lus khri la// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog lnga'i 'od 'bar ba// bcu gsum cha lugs bsregs pa rnams// rim gyis sam ni gcig car
320b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed// gang 'dir 'dod khams chags zhen pa'i// dbang po rim par sbyang bar bya// de min yab yum yong mi dmigs// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang // gnas 'gyur
320b3(rnying rgyud): ba'o rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal por bcas// brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khrul 'khyud sbyor// sa dang na mkha' spyan ngo// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// 
320b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi gnyis dag gis gnyer sbyor ba// bsam bya la sog/ das de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas par ni// rdo rje 'khri del 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod cher
320b5(rnying rgyud): sbyar bas// mnyes nas sbyar rim bzhin dbul// gsang kha'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rna mas bsgrub par bya// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba 'thun// thams
320b6(rnying rgyud): cod gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// 'dza' 'phro rkyen dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad
320b7(rnying rgyud): cig yud tsam thang cig gam// yud tsam nyan cig zla ra 'am// lo yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi// duso la bab pa'i dus chen dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i
320b8(rnying rgyud): yo byad rnams// dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis// gtsang ma kha zas la sogs dang // rnam rtog nad 'joms bdud rtsi rnams// rgyal ba'i tshogs dang 'byung po la// ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan
321a1(rnying rgyud): bya tata bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog tshul sbyar// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur// gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag
321a2(rnying rgyud): ste hataji bzhin 'dod ltar bde bar sbyar// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang // bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir// las 'di spyad par shin tu gces// 'di dag blo chung
321a3(rnying rgyud): gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya ba'i rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang // cis 'dul de ltar rtsal dang sbyar// des na las 'di khyad par yang // tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs
321a4(rnying rgyud): te tata bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bra sa bu mthar phyin pa'o// de skad sems dpa' rdo rje des// 'dus pa phal mo che la bshad// 'dus pa kun gyi don
321a5(rnying rgyud): mthong ba// rdo rje 'dzin de la gsol// sems dpa' chen po/ bdag cag gis// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// thabs nyid shes rab bkod pa dang // kun nas mnyam dang
321a6(rnying rgyud): drug cha// yi ge tshogs dang 'byung ba'i dbyings// gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du// snang bar nges par mthong lags so// de skad gsol pas des/ 
321a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// gang 'dir 'dus pa'i tshogs mang kun// ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin// ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na// dgongs pa dam pa lhun grub
321a8(rnying rgyud): pa ha ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid// de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas// sems can gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal// rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du// thams cad
321b1(rnying rgyud): yenas zhugs bkod rdzogs// de las khyad par skal ldan mi// spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brnyan te// ras 'jam khong snyoms bzang la sogs// kha dog lnga'am nyi shu lngas// ma mthong rmongs
321b2(rnying rgyud): bstan phyir mtshon// ma nyams mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur// bstan zhing nges 'jam khang bu la// kha dog 'bar bar gzugs mtshon te// phyag rgya ma nyams mdzes ldan na// mtshan ma'i
321b3(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul ston par nus// gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa// gang blugs rgyal ba'i sku byas te// phyag rgya ma nyams dang ldan na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// shel rdo dung la
321b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa la// 'bur las rgyal ba'i sku byas na// de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur// glags sha byang chub shing sogs la// mkhas
321b5(rnying rgyud): pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis// phyag rgya mnya mas kun rdzogs na// 'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'a gyur// sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas// kha dog mdzes dang
321b6(rnying rgyud): ldan byas la// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten yin te// mtshan mas mtshan ma grol rig pa// gang dag sa las rgyal ba'i dbyibs// kun tu lham par byas pa la/ tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes
321b7(rnying rgyud): bkod na// rnam grol rig pa'i rten du 'gyur// gang gi gzugs brnyan gang yin dang // de yi rang bzhin gcig pas na// 'di la khyad par cung zad med// 'di yis rnam grol rig par 'gyur/ 
321b8(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs pho brang gang yang rung // dkyil 'khor tshul du gang byed pa// yid 'ong mtshan ldan dben phyogs su// kun nas lham par mdzes byas la// srad bu brgyad dang ldan byas te/ 
322a1(rnying rgyud): bsdu ba'i bya bas mdzes byas pa// de nas srang bu gcig gis bskor// dkyil 'khor tshul du gyur pa dang // nang du ldum bu srang bu brgyad // le'u che ldan pa dgur 'gyur te// 
322a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' zang sum char byas pa la// kun gyi nang du srang bu gsum// phra mo dag gis mdzes par brgyan// dgu yi char ni bgos pa la// sgo dang sgo khyud sum cha bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas
322a3(rnying rgyud): la ta/ rin chen ka ba'i nang logs su// sangs rgyas pho brang dbu rtser bya// bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo// rim pa gsum gyis mdzes pa la// rta babs them skas kyis kyang brgyan// dbus kyi pho
322a4(rnying rgyud): brang le'u tshe 'am// 'khor lo dpal be'u pad+ma dang // rin chen zur brgyad la sogs pa// ji ltar rig pa de bzhin bri/ 8/ rgyan ni rin chen sna tshogs dang // pa ra tsa ra ka tA ra na// 
322a5(rnying rgyud): phreng ba dang ni dra bas brgyan// za rang tshags dang chun 'phyang / dang // dril bu g.yer ka the'u chung 'phyang // rol mo/ sgra sgrogs lha yi bu// mang pos phyi nang na mkha' las// 
322a6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul ba bri// theg chen gdung bzhis rab brgyan te// rin chen kha bang mchod rten dang // rgyal mtshan rin tshon 'od 'bar bas// gzhan yang mdzes par brgyan pa
322a7(rnying rgyud): ni da chos kyi pho brang ci 'dra bar// de 'dra de nyid mtshon par bri// gzhal yas khang du gang sbyar ba// kun gyis mdzes dang legs par brgyan// mchod pa bla na yod med kun// ji ltar
322a8(rnying rgyud): 'byor ltar nan tan dbul// rgyal srid longs spyod bcas pa dang // glu bro gar dang rol mor bcas// dug 'joms sman dang bdud rtsi rnams// rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho snyed la dbul// mnyam
322b1(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi mchog sbyar bas// rgyud byang thams cad mnyam par 'gyur// de skad smras pas 'dun pa kun// thams cad rgyud byang rnam grol rig/ grogs po dag de dag ni bkod pa'i bya bas yongs su/ 
322b2(rnying rgyud): sbyang bar shes par bya'o// grogs po dag 'di la me'i bya bas yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad mo'i rang bzhin du
322b3(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ste/ shin tu ngam nas ngo mtshar du stod pa// e ma'o sems dpa' sems dpa'
322b4(rnying rgyud): tshe nya che ba'i che ba byin rlabs che// ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che// rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che// thabs mtsho/ ga dpag gis mi lang ste// chos kun me dpung 'bar bar
322b5(rnying rgyud): snang ta/  de nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong // 'bar 'phrogs la bar gyur pa ni// mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs// bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par// dpa'
322b6(rnying rgyud): bi khyod kyis mdzad pa lags// 'bar ba chen po a la le// gzi brjid zer 'phro a la la// mtha' yas kun sdud a la la// thams cad sreg byed a la la// za byed chen po a la la// mtha'
322b7(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med a la la// thugs rje bde mchog a la la// dbang phyug 'jig byed a la la// gsang mchog rmad 'byung byin rlabs kyis// me'i rang bzhin chen po dag/ bdag cag rnams
322b8(rnying rgyud): la bshad du gsol// de skad 'dus pas gsol ba las// de nyid dgyes pas 'di skad du// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag/ nges par bshad kyis gus par
323a1(rnying rgyud): nyon ta khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis// rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas// rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsregs sbyangs// don grub las kyi mchog tu sbyangs// 
323a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa'i hom khung du// ji snyed pa'i yam shing la// de bzhin nyid kyi me byung bas// thams cad thams cad bsregs sbyangs thim// skye med rnam dag hom khung du// skye ba rnam bzhi'i
323a3(rnying rgyud): yams shing la// ma skyes spros bral me byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim// bsam du med pa'i hom khung du// bsam gyis mi khyab yams shing la// 'od
323a4(rnying rgyud): dpag med pa'i me byung bas// mtha' yas rdul snyed dbasregs sbyangs thim// chos nyid rnam dag hom khung da du// chos can sna tshogs yamos shing la// stong nyid ye shes
323a5(rnying rgyud): me 'bar bas// dngos po'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thi mo// sems nyid rnam dag hom khung du// sems can skye 'gro yams shing la// rang 'byung ye shes
323a6(rnying rgyud): me 'bar bas// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thi mo// kun gzhi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yams shing la// ye shes lnga yi me byung bas// gzung 'dzin rtog/ 
323a7(rnying rgyud): pa bsregs sbyangs thim// snang srid na mkha'i hom khong du// 'byung ba bzhi'i yams shing la// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i me byung bas// snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim// rnam bzhi
323a8(rnying rgyud): las kyi hom khung du// bzhi 'am bzhi yi yams shing la// rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i me byung bas// mchod sbyin dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim// 'di yang so so'i khyod par gyis// phyogs
323b1(rnying rgyud): dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas// gang ltar rigs pa de ltar sbyar// shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar// mthing ka nag po thal mdog sbyar// zlum po pad+ma le'u che ba zhi// 'khor lo gru bzhi zur
323b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad rgyas// zla gam gru chang gzhu dbyibs dbang // gru gsum b+ha ga'i mkha' mngon spyod// gsum rtseg mdangs dang ri mor mdzes// las kyi yams shing rdzas kyis brgyan// ye shes
323b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las rgyud ldan// bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar// dag pa yi mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro ga ra// mchod pa nges pa'i sbyor tshogs sbyar// rdo rje las kyi byin
323b4(rnying rgyud): rlabs sbyor// gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas// ba sha dar btab zhi ba'i lhar rgyud dang // rgyas dang dbang / dpas// lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang // de bzhin klu yi rgyud
323b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor bya// rigs kyi rigs rgyud lnga rnams ni// so sa rigs su bsher btab ste// gleng yangs 'khyil pa 'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis// sbrang dang / 
323b6(rnying rgyud): thob phyir bsreg byar 'os// dpag med rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// che ba bsngags pa'i yon tan dag/ rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang // mnyes par bya ba'i thabs chen brtsam// mnyes pa'i
323b7(rnying rgyud): las rnams rdzogs pa dang // gang yang ma byang don chen rnams// grub dang ma grub de rnams dag/ me la mkhas pas brtag par bya// me dgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis// 'bar tshul gnyis
323b8(rnying rgyud): dang dbyibs rnams drug/ de dag yongs su shes par bya// gal te mtshan la mi sdug na// yid du mi 'ong rtags yin pas// sreg sbyang chen pos rgyas par bya// de nas yid 'ong 'dod
324a1(rnying rgyud): // byung ba// me lo 'dod pa'i mtshan ma rnams// rnam gsum gang ltar 'grub pa blang // 'dus pa chen po gzhan yang gang // ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyang na// ro la sngags kyis btab
324a2(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// ro la byug cing bkru bar bya// bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis// ras la byug pas ro dkris par// ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par// sngags kyi sbyor
324a3(rnying rgyud): ba kun bkod nas// phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa gang // de yi mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams// gang du bkod pa de nyid du// snying po grangs kyang de ltar
324a4(rnying rgyud): bya ta snying po dag la so so yi// ma nor rtsa ba'i yig 'bru dag/ ras sam shing la bris te dgod// ro yi sbyor ba rdzog nges pa dang // ro yi phyi rgyab thams cad du// nyon mongs 'khor
324a5(rnying rgyud): ba kun bkod de// ras sam shing shun gang dag la// 'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod// nyon mongs lnga dang du/ ga gsum bcas// skye bzhi las lnga rgyu drug rnams// ming dang
324a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs su byas nas ni// gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya// sa bon 'du byed dngos po lnga// gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams// bda' yi tshul du dkod nas ni// ri rnams khyad par dgod
324a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// de nas ro yi phung po de// sten nas glegs ma stegs bu yi// steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya// thabs kyi cho ga bya ba yang // maN+Dal khor yug ran tsam la// brko dang kha khyer lugs
324a8(rnying rgyud): bzhin bya// phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag/ thig gis yul gcad so sor dbye// de yi steng du bsregs shing rtsig/ dbyibs ni rigs bzhir gtams pa la// grwa zur ka bas brtan par brten// 
324b1(rnying rgyud): sum rtsegs yang thog par khang bcas// tha ma yams shing brdzangs pas btams// bar khang dag gi glegs bam la// ro yi bzhin phyogs ro bzhir bstan// ro yi steng du yang thog tu// ras
324b2(rnying rgyud): la sogs la bris pa yis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsol bar dkod// ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la// rdo rje gzungs kyi rgyud thag bzhis// btags nas bla ma'i phyag du phul// shing gi
324b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba rdzogs pa dang // de yi phyi mtha' stegs bu la// rnam bzhi las kyi lha rnams dgod// stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje las kyi sgos btab pa// rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la// 'khor
324b4(rnying rgyud): bsreg par mnga' gsol te// mi g.yo me chen rtse gcig pa/ sa// me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya// rdo rje sngags kyi las/ sbyar la// rnam bzhi las kyi mnga' gsol te// las kyi phreng
324b5(rnying rgyud): ba rdzogs par bya// bla ma rdo rje dam pa zhig/ ro yi nyes pa'i ma tha' bzung nas// las kyi bsags pa bgreng zhing gshe gas// skabs sbyor rdo rje bla ma yis// bla med mchod pa rgyun
324b6(rnying rgyud): du bya ta/  blo gar glu tshig stabs chen gyis// mchod pa rol mo sna tshogs dbul// rdo rje las kyi smon lam gdab// mchod skabs las kyi 'jug tu bya// rdo rje las kyi lta 'dzin pas// dkar byang
324b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi ltang bzung ste// legs mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul// ro yi nyes mtha' gang 'dzin pas// mtshan ma nag po bud shing dag/ ye shes me yi klong du bsreg/ me sbyor
324b8(rnying rgyud): me la gnas pa'i lha// me yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// me yi lha mo gos dkar mo// rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing // thams cad kun gyi drod bdog
325a1(rnying rgyud): / yin ta srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches// dngos po srog pa'i 'phrin las ni// thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'// gang gi sgrib sreg de nyid mkhyen// ro yi rnam shes
325a2(rnying rgyud): byang ma byang // me la mkhas pas de bzhin rtag/ mi sdug tshul 'byung sreg sbyang bya// gal te legs na ma dbang bskur// thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
325a3(rnying rgyud): bye ta dam pa zhig na gdung brtags te// bla ma'i rten du dbul bar bya// 'di ni sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ de skad sems dpa' mchog nges smras// grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yongs su
325a4(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// rdo rje gsang ba chos kyi spun// me yi bya ba da las byung ba// gdung zhes grags pa'i sha ri ram// dang/ dag med ji srid dus dag nas// grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba
325a5(rnying rgyud): dag ta mya ngan 'das par gyur phyin// med pa las byung sku gdung ni// sku yi gdung dang ring srel zhes// 'gro ba'i bsod nams rten du grags// rgyal ba rnams ni dngos
325a6(rnying rgyud): med pas// sku gdung ring bsrel mi srid na// sems can rnams la phan don du// med las thugs rje'i cho 'phrul bzhag/ de bzhin gang du gang byung ba'i// gang 'dir snang ba sgron ma dag
325a7(rnying rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung yang // sha ri ram zhes grags par 'gyur// de yi las kyang de bzhin no// de la sogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams// / 
325a8(rnying rgyud): tshul 'thun gcig par gyur pa yi// sku gdung sa bon byin rlabs kyi// yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba// 'dzam gling sa khams khyab par snang // gdung las byung phyir sra khrigs zlum// tha
325b1(rnying rgyud): skad rdo rje rab tu grags// ljang bu zur gsum til lgang 'dra// gzhon che'i mar ram 'o mar snang // nar son smin rtags sra zhing mkhregs// tsa na ka'i 'bru bzhin du// kar la can dmar
325b2(rnying rgyud): dog gsal// zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog tu grags// de bzhin rigs 'dzin sems dpa' rnams// mi yi lus su sprul pa dang // gang zags pa chos
325b3(rnying rgyud): mig ldan// bsod nams dpal zhing dag pa dag/ sdong bu snying por sbyangs phyin// skal pa can la snang ba ni// la la dag la sha ri ram// la la dag la rang bsrel sku// skal ngan dag la
325b4(rnying rgyud): snang mi 'gyur// la la snang bar gyur na yang // sbyor ba dag/ da la yon tu rtog/ ma dag nub cig 'bros par 'gyur// yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba'i// 'byung ba'i ltas ni ston par
325b5(rnying rgyud): byedad/  yod par rtag pa ma yin la// med pa rlag parayong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor las dang 'byor pa rnam sa// dag dang ma dag tshul la sbyor// de yang bsod nams
325b6(rnying rgyud): dag pa yis// gang lam rgya cher mos pa dang // rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na// rdo rjes spel dang las 'thun na// rgyud rnams yongs su dag la 'ba'o// de yang khyad par rim pas
325b7(rnying rgyud): ni ta rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram// zhing khams kun tu khyab par ni// gar dang bzod ni bzlums pa bzhin// byas pa med las snang ba dag/ dkar 'tsher mdog gsal 'dzag 'dra/ 
325b8(rnying rgyud): pahatsan dam mdang su gsal ba yi// na mkha' gang bar char bzhin 'bab// rig 'dzin sems dpa' sprul pa'i gdung // dka' gsal 'ga' 'ga' tsam du 'byung // gang zag
326a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i rtags chen ni// mdog mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig/ la lar lnga 'am bcu 'byung zhing // yon tan de ni de ltar ro// de yang sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra// lcags kyi
326a2(rnying rgyud): gtun gyis yong mi chogs// 'di dag phebs pa'i yon tan yang // gang dang gang du babs pa yi// yul khams de dag thams cad du// nad dang mi ngas bgegs rnams zhi// gnod sbyin srin
326a3(rnying rgyud): po ma rungs pa// drag po gtum po'ang lha ner 'gyur// rgyal po 'khrugs dang khams 'khrugs dang // yul khams 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog 'phel smin cing // 
326a4(rnying rgyud): yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung // yul de dmangs dang rgyal po yi// sa bon thams cad bu phor 'gyur// bder bcas mtshan ldan rigs mthon ni// bu po kun kyang 'byung
326a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'di dag su la 'chang ba rnams// rig 'dzin sa dang skal ba mnyam// 'jig rten 'di yi bsod nam sa kyang // 'khor los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam// de'i dag
326a6(rnying rgyud): pa kun tu 'grub// tshe dang skongs dang las 'grub 'gyur// phyin cad bla med byang chub ni// sa la reg pa'i rtags chen yin// gzhan yang yon tan bsam mi khyab// de dag rang gi rang bzhin du// / 
326a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i yon tan de dag go// bsgrubs na yon tan bsam mi khyab// sems can rnam pa thams cad la// byang chub snying po nyid yod pas// me yi las kyi bya ba yis// lnga phung sbyangs na mang
326a8(rnying rgyud): mi sridad/ 'di dag bsgrub par bya ba yang // shel gyi za ma tog nang du// bsdus te phyag rgya'i rgyas btab nas// shel gyi ga pu'i nang du bca'// sgrub pas de la smon lam dang // sgrib sbyang
326b1(rnying rgyud): gsol 'phro 'du bya// 'phro 'du bya ba'i cho ga yang // na mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las// char gyi rgyun bzhin de la 'bab// rtse gcig bzlas pa gsung gi rgyun// ma hA sharari
326b2(rnying rgyud): ram gyi li hUM// grangs med par chad med par bzlas// mchog tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba dang // 'od kyi zer phreng nyi zer bzhin// zang zing brang breng snang bar 'gyur// za ma tog gi phyi rol na// gsal ba
326b3(rnying rgyud): de la 'byung bar 'gyur// 'gul zhing mang por 'phel ba dang // rgyal ba sems pa'i rig 'dzin gyis// gzugs brnyan shal dang de las ni// gsal bar bdag la ston par 'gyur// dang po snod de
326b4(rnying rgyud): khengs pa yin// gnyis pa phyed dam brgya rtsa brgyad// tha ma/ 'ang grangs 'gas 'phel bar 'gyur// de dag grub pa rta gas chen te// de tshe dngos grub blang bar bya// thob pa'i yon
326b5(rnying rgyud): tan bsam mi khyab// tshe 'dir rigs 'dzin sa la gnas// rgya la bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur// zhar las byung ba'i yon tan yang // 'gro ba kun gyi don spyod pa// sems dpa'
326b6(rnying rgyud): tshe ltar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun tu de la mchod dgos te// mchod na yon tan dam pa 'byung // mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yang // sgrib sbyangs bsod nams phung bskyed de// rang rgyud de dag par brtag byas
326b7(rnying rgyud): nas ni ta zla ba dus ni thams cad kyi// bcu drug cha la rdzogs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid gcig pu sems yul du// gyur par byas nas mchod pa ni// za ma tog dang bcas pa dag/ rgyal mtshan rtse mor
326b8(rnying rgyud): byas te// ji ltar 'dod par smon lam btab// des ni 'dod pa thams cad skongs// de ni rnal 'byor skal ldan gyis// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog tu// ming
327a1(rnying rgyud): gis med du mi rung ngo // ji ltar ro dag gser 'gyur dang // de bzhin me yis bsregs sbyangs bzhin// dngos por spyod pa ji snyed pa// de nyid dam pa la mi g.yo// de la sogs pa mthar
327a2(rnying rgyud): yas spyod// dngos po bzhi la gnas spyod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' chos nyid de// spyod pa rmad 'byung dam pa yi// ji ltar glang po che chur zhugs pa// thogs chags 'jigs pa yod med par// sa
327a3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod brong tshul gyis// mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar// rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa yang // brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa// rtsal chen sbyong ba'i brod tshul gyis// 
327a4(rnying rgyud): / thogs chagadas med par la dor ba'o// spyod pa gang bar bya ba'i thabs // goms pa klong du gyur pa gces// grogs po dag de dag ni
327a5(rnying rgyud): la dor bar shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor spyod 'jug gi le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun cu gcig pa'o// 
327a6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa dam pa rnams la smras pa// kye grogs po dag gis bcad par bya ba ni 'di lta ste// dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgongs
327a7(rnying rgyud): pa de kho na nyid gcig bslabs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bslabs pa'o// de kho na nyid gcig la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'o// de kho na nyid la goms na
327a8(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsgom pa'o// de kho na nyid las ma 'das na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dam pa bsrungs pa'o// de kho na nyid de la zhugs na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o/ 
327b1(rnying rgyud): de khon nyid de spyod na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yo byad la spyod pa'o// de kho na nyid mngon du byas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgya mtsho steng byas pa'o// de kho na nyid de ma nor bar bstan na chos kyi sgong pag tu med
327b2(rnying rgyud): pa bstan pa'o// de nyid de phyin ci ma log par thos na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi sgo thos pa'o// de kho na nyid de mngon du gyur na// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i
327b3(rnying rgyud): phyir zhe na// de dag thams cad kyi bcud du bya ba 'am snying por bya ba ni de kho na nyid de de las med pa'i phyir ro// grogs po dag de bas na 'di ltar// de bzhin nyid kyi don mthong na// mthong bas
327b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad sgyu ma yin// de nyid go 'phang mchog 'phags na// bla med mtho btsun mtha' dag brdzun// de bzhin nyi dad du nges phan chad// gang dman spa gong zhum pa med// de
327b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid du thig chong na// 'jig rten gnas kyang chos kyi sku// dam par nges kyang 'jig rten 'jug/ 'khor/ po'i mtha' la'ang skyo ba med// mu mtha' yas kyang gci
327b6(rnying rgyud): tu rdzogs// bdud kyi khams la nyam ming // mi bzad khams la bag ma tsha// 'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings la sbyor// gcig char nges pa'i don mthong na// rim gyis sbyor ba slu 'drid 'dra// de
327b7(rnying rgyud): la mos pa tsam gyis kyang // khams gsum zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// glong du gyur pa smos ci dgos// dper na sang phrug khyung slong dag/ mig ma bye zhing mar blangs kyang // kun skrag sgo nga 'am
327b8(rnying rgyud): 'khar 'gro ltar// de nyid nges par gang gyur pa// de dag 'jig rten gnas 'jug kyang // go 'phang dam pa de nyid du// nges pa ci la'ang bag mi tsha// rim gyis mtshan mar spyod pa dang // med dang
328a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs dang mi dmigs dang / bsgrub dang bgrod par byed pa yi/ bye blag med par rtog 'jug pa// blun po de dag stongs pa ste// dam par nges pa ga la yin// gas na gzan tha ma'i zla
328a2(rnying rgyud): gu 'dra// skrag cing dngang pa'i rang bzhin no// mtha' yas ji snyed chos kun ji ltar gnas pa bzhin// ma bcos phyin ci ma log pa// de bzhin nyid du thag chod pa'o// ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding
328a3(rnying rgyud): mdapa ga shog rtsal gyis nam 'phangs spyod// ri brag chu klung mtha' yas kyang // 'phur rlabs 'og tu kun chud ltar// rnal 'byor chos nyid mkha' 'gro ba// theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang // 
328a4(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin ma bcos don gyis na// go 'phang so rlabs kyis thag pa dad na// 'di ni re dang dogs pa yaM// the tsam gcod pa'i dnges pa ste// dam pa nyid la lta ba yi// go 'phang gcod pa des
328a5(rnying rgyud): par gces// grogs po dag de dag ni sa yongs su gcad par bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa dam pa rnams re dogs med par thag gcod pa'i
328a6(rnying rgyud): go 'phang thob par gyur te// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las the tsom yongs su gcod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// bdun bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang
328a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa dam pa rnams la smras pa// kye grogs po dag gang nyam rnyed par bya ba ni 'di lta ste// dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus la// 'jug pa'i gtsor ni bsam gtan te// 
328a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor los dbang sgyur ji bzhin du// chos kun dbang bsgyur bsam gtan yin// rnal 'byor bsam gtan chen po 'di// dug dang mun pa gser 'gyur bzhin// thams cad dbang sgyur bsam
328b1(rnying rgyud): gtan yin// des na dam pa'i bsam gtan bya// gal te bsam gtan 'di med na// rgya mtsho 'jing gi pha bong ltar// dpag tu med pa'i sgo gcad kyang // don med snying po skams pa yin// rnal 'byor
328b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i bsam gtan ni// ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la// ma bcos pa'i blo bzhag ste// ma yengs skye 'grag med pa'o// rnal 'byor dam pa ji bzhin pa// sems kyi chos nyid de nyid do// de bzhin nyid ces
328b3(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs pa// rtsa ba'i kun shes kun gzhi nyid// ci phyir ma byas ma bcos pa// rang 'byung de bzhin nyid ces bshad// thams cad kun tu snang ba ni// 'jug pa'i rnam shes yud tsam nyid// ci phyir
328b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu snang 'jug pas// phyi nang kun tu snang bar bshad// rgyu yi rnam par bkod pa ni// 'jug pa'i rnam shes sgro lnga nyi de// thams cad grang gi rgyur dkod pas// thams cad 'byung / 
328b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyu zhes bshad// gang gi dgongs pa dam pa ni// stong pa ma yin ther zug med// dbu mar mi dmigs kun rig gi sa la// yod min med min las kyang 'das// gang 'dir tshor
328b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma rabs dang // gang 'gog byis pa'i spyod yul dang // 'di gang nyams pa'i log sred can// yal pa phyal ba dmigs pa gcig/ gang 'dir lta bas mdongs pa dag/ bdag la brten nas mtha'
328b7(rnying rgyud): sgrub ste// med mos des 'gro med snyam nas// de ma thag tu ngan 'gror 'gro/ mos pa chung ngu thams cad ni// gang la bdag med brten bzhin mthong // gang dkag rtog yod dpyod med pa// bsam gtan dang
328b8(rnying rgyud): po kho na'o// kun stong phra ba'i stong pa las// gnas rtog med la dpyod pa gnyis// stong pa nyid la nges bzhag ste// dga' ba bskyod pa gsum pa'o// bdag gam gzhan gyis mthus bstan te// skyon med mi g.yo
329a1(rnying rgyud): gnas bani pa/ gang yod mthar yang 'gyur srid kyi// gang med gnas med mthar mi 'gyur// gang med mi mthong mi shes bzhin// btsal bas snyed par mi 'gyur yang // de nyid med par mi 'gyur/ 
329a2(rnying rgyud): bas te rgyu 'bras med kyang den med min// dper na lcags bsregs dpal med bzhin// chen po bzhi meng stongs 'gyur kyang // de dang na mkha' med min bzhin// de nyid mi rlag med min 'gyur// drug gi
329a3(rnying rgyud): spyod yul mtshan ma ste// mtshan ma dngos por snang bas na// ci dgar bzhag pas de bzlog med// de stong spang zhing bzlog tu med// thams cad sems kyi chos nyid du// tshig med lta bas thag chod na// ma
329a4(rnying rgyud): btsos ma yengs yongs thub snyoms// rtsol bsgrub re dogs dag la yod// mi mthun gnyen po bsgom mi dgos// skyon yo ngan spong len bying dgong rnams// gang 'dir dbyer med zung
329a5(rnying rgyud): 'brel na// zhi gnas lhag mthong sems las byung // zhig pas nam mkha' med mi 'gyur// 'khyams pas byang chub sems mi stor// spangs pas mi spongs mtha' yas chos// bkrus pa
329a6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gag stong nyid dbyings// gang stong yod pas chad rtag pas// thams cad rig pas stong ma yin// dngos po med pas rtag ma yin// ci yang med pas sbrang du med// bya ba thams cad yongs btang na// 
329a7(rnying rgyud): ye nas ma bcos der bzhag na// de med pas na de yang med// de ni dam pa'i nyams rnyed pa'o// 'dir ni theg chen dam pa yi// nad ni rim gyis 'thob ma yin// rim gyis pa yi dug dgod ni// gcig
