329a8(rnying rgyud): car 'char ba'i de kho na'o// des na gang dang gang dag gis// ji ltar go dang mos bzhin du// bstan pa gang dang gang dag la// so so yid brtan yul du bya// de bas bsgron ma dpag med kyis// 
329b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa ji snyed gsungs pa rnams// gcig tu chad dam nges med de// ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar nges// 'di la gang 'jug par gcod pa// le lo bya mang dgod pa dang // g.yeng dang rmugs dang
329b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa dang // gnyid dang re dogs the tsom dang // 'du 'phro spyod dang dga' ba'o// de yang rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// dug lnga lnga sogs kun 'byung nyid// rang 'byung rang bzhin de bzhin
329b3(rnying rgyud): nyid/ dam pa'i don la gang sgrib pa// mi g.yo gsal ba sdug bsngal dang // skye ba gsal ba 'byin pa dang // nges dang khyad snyems 'byung zhi nyid// bsam gtan chen por nges snang ba// 
329b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu mi nyams re ngogs med// dang pa mi skye mi g.yod dang ma chags mi 'chad len pa med// 'khrug pa med na ra dang bzhin nyid// rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul ni// dam
329b5(rnying rgyud): 'dun mthong dam par smra// sprul pa grangs mod 'gyed mthong dang // dam pas smras kun gsal mthong dang // du sa kun shes gsal mthong ba dang // rgyud drug lam nas
329b6(rnying rgyud): kun snang dang // de la gdung ba'i shugs 'byung dang // kun snang gsal bar mthong ba dang // ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang // mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang // dam pa'i phyag
329b7(rnying rgyud): rgya lung ston dang // kun gyi skad du chos smra dang // dngos po brtan g.yo bsti gnas mthong // thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang // de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang // las su
329b8(rnying rgyud): rung ba thogs med dang // dam pa'i don la sgo ba dang // 'jig rten gtso bos mchod pa dag/ rang bzhin shes na dam pa'i rtags// gang mi shes pa log pa'i bdud// sgo drug mtshan
330a1(rnying rgyud): ma ci skyes dang // rang 'byung rang zhi ci dgar bzhag/ ma skyes pas na bzlog du med// de yang de bzhin de nyid do// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// nyes dang legs pa gang la yang // 
330a2(rnying rgyud): dgal dang 'gyod pa'i rtog pa med// rang 'byung rang zhi de nyid do// 'dir ni dam pa gang nges pa// rnal 'byor mtshan ma'i lnga ltas yin// chu klung me gsor ga na bar// 'du 'phro 'byung rtsi nges pa
330a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dam par nges na dam par 'byung // dam par ma nges thams cad bdud// dam par nges na chung ngu rtsam// gang 'byung dam pa'i snga ltas// gang gi dam pa nyid thos na// mi skrag mi dbang dga'
330a4(rnying rgyud): ba ste ta gang zhig dam pa nyid lta ba// thams cad dam pa nyid da du mthong // dam pa'i klung du gang gyur pa// rnam grangs ma dang po dam par sdud// dam pa nges pa mthong ba na// tshig lam
330a5(rnying rgyud): rjes su de mi 'gro// de mthong thams cad dam par gsal// snang ba med pa'i dam pa ni// snang ba med pa mthong bar 'gyurar// de nyid kun gyi rgyu yin te// cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad
330a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // g.yo dang drod thob brtan pa dang // gsal dang rtags thob brtan pa dang // nyi zer rdul phran smig sgyu dang // mtsho rlabs rlung dang char gyi rgyan// sprin lding ta la gang 'phar 'gro// sa g.yo 'byung
330a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i skye mched snang // 'byung rgyun zug rngu la sogs pa// gang gis yongs su nang zhi ba// mun pa'i skye mched choms pa dang // lus kyi bzod pa thob pa dang // kun la bde rlag ji bzhin pa'o// gang
330a8(rnying rgyud): min gang du sbyar ba dang // gang med pa las gang 'byin pa'o// yid 'ong 'dod grub rdzas mchog rnyed// kun dga' kun 'dud kun yid dang // kun la dbang sgyur mchog 'grub ltas// yud las
330b1(rnying rgyud): sngon du 'byung bas ltas// sgron mor byung dang rtag par 'khru// rnam dag chu bor 'bogs dang rgyal// char rgyun bum chu 'byung ba dang // gseg dang g.yeng dang rnam par 'thor// 'di gang sbyong ba dag pa'i
330b2(rnying rgyud): ltas ta gang 'dir 'jigs dang bral ba yang // g.yul 'gyed zhi dang zung rngu byang // tha mar grol dang ga shed las thar// gdug pa'i tshogs bral dug nang zhi// bcing grol bcad ltos bzang po
330b3(rnying rgyud): yin te khyad par dam pa'i sngon 'byung ba// khri rkang shing dang ljon shing skas// 'dzag dang gyen du 'gro ba dang // ri rtse'i mchod rten na mkha'i skas// gang nas gong du 'phar ba'i ltas// gang la
330b4(rnying rgyud): gnas dang non pa yang // khri mthon la 'dug glang chen zhon/ da/ seng chen khyung lding mdab chags dang // mchod rten dartse dang ri bo'i sngo// na mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang // lus
330b5(rnying rgyud): la sprin byung nyi zla la// 'dug pa gang la gnas pa'i rtags// dam pa rigs kyi sngon byung ba// bka' rtags dang por da bang sgyur byed// 'jig rten skas la 'bebs pa dang // dbang
330b6(rnying rgyud): sdud g.yul rgyal rgyal bar 'gyur// mgo la me tog thong skyes pa'o// chos gang dbang sgyur sngon byung ba// glegs bam rnyed dang dri spyod dang // gzhan la ston dang gtan la 'bebs// me long bum
330b7(rnying rgyud): gang lta rtog 'thung // nor bu thu dang 'khor lo babs// nyin zla zin dang ri rab skor// gang la sgra brgyas stong gsum gang // dngos po'i mtha' dag yi ger mthong // klags pas ngo mtshar
330b8(rnying rgyud): kun skyed dang // mkha' las me tog char 'bab pa'o// dam pa mthong ba sngon byung ba// sngon ma mthong ba yul mthong dang // stong gsum mthong zhing gling rnams bgrod// ri rab rtser phyin
331a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad mthong // nam pa' mtha' yas mthong ba dang // rgya mcho ga ting du phyin pa dang // sgron me thogs dang snang srid dpyod// nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o// lung chen thob pa/ 
331a2(rnying rgyud): sngon byung ba// rol mo 'brug sgra seng ge dang // chos kyi 'gro ba thos pa dang // gzugs brnyan zhal 'dzum 'od 'byung dang // dam pa'i gsung thos sku mi mthong // lha mo glu dbyangs sgrogs
331a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang // grogs po dam pa zhes 'byung zhing // de nyid 'gro bar byed pa'o// rig 'dzin dam pa'i ltas shar na// byin rlabs mthu'i cho 'phrul yang // 
331a4(rnying rgyud): nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang // ri rab rgarkan nas gsor ba dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang // bsreg pa'i ba daskal pa gzhil ba las// sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams
331a5(rnying rgyud): cad kyang // khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus// 'dul ba 'i 'gro ba thams cad la// so so skad du chos 'thun pa rwa// 'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su// gang la de ltar ston
331a6(rnying rgyud): par nus// rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten khams kun g.yos nas kyang // thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'gyur te// dga' mgu rangs pa'i ro myong 'gyur// g.yeng ba'i
331a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge phreng ba las// rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra bsgrags pas// yid mthong rnam grangs chos rnams kun// sngags snang sngags su ma gyur med// rnal 'byor che chung rim pa dag/ rtsal gyi
331a8(rnying rgyud): khyad par dag las byung // rim gyis 'jug dang gcig char pa// dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang // thos dang mthong ba la sogs te// sems kyi yul dang na mkha'i dbyings// 
331b1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar klas par// rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/ yan lag yi ge so so yi// rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas// 'phro 'dra'i tshad dang phyag rgya'i khyon// chom bu'i grangs
331b2(rnying rgyud): kyang de bzhin no// 'di ni dang po'i 'jug rims te// mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o// yi ge ye shes las bskrun te// don byed pa'ang phyag rgyar 'byung // rgya mtsho ga non dang
331b3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i skas// rlung 'ching ba dang rgyun bzlog pa// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil pa dang // nyi zla zhon nas 'jig rten 'phang // sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs// stong gsum yungs 'brur
331b4(rnying rgyud): 'jug tshul dang // gzhig dang spar ba la sogs to// bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa// goms pas da las su rung ba yi// rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad // 
331b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa mthar phyin grub pa dang // bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang // bsam pa las su rung ba dang // do na mthong ba dang tshig grub pa// bya ba yongs su dag pa
331b6(rnying rgyud): dag te don gcig yul la so sor snang // des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang // de nyid gcig la bsgom mod kyi// rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par ni// bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs
331b7(rnying rgyud): te ta ta dang po sa la gnas pa yi// brtsal ba las ni rnal 'byor pa// 'dun pa'i sems pa'i rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po// shes rab rtsal gyi
331b8(rnying rgyud): 'phang dmas pas// ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste// de nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur bas// rang gi mos pa gang dmigs na// de yi sa bon gang yin pa// kha dog dbyibs kyi phye
332a1(rnying rgyud): nas ni// sna yi dbus la rgyu byas te// de yul du gyur tshad du// 'od zer 'bar 'phro gsal ba las// 'phro 'du gnas su bskyed par bya// rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i// sku
332a2(rnying rgyud): yi khyon yang de tsam mo// gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi// bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor pas// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// sa bon rang
332a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin yi ge la// 'od zer 'bar ba bcas pa de// dri 'byung sgo ni tshun chad du// 'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las// rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i// sku'i khyon yang
332a4(rnying rgyud): de tsam mo// gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor da lung gi bka' bsgo las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byo/ dar rnam gsum po// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar
332a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod// lha yi sa bon gang yin pa// rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te// 'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yis / thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du// 'phro 'du gsal
332a6(rnying rgyud): bar byas pa las// rang gi chag tshad bzhi 'gyur tsam// sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo// de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin// lha yi khyad par gang yin pa// yi ge'i rim pa
332a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin sbyar nas// 'phro 'du tshad kyang de bzhin te// rim pa ji bzhin sbyar nas kyang // 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang // sems kyi yul ni ji tsam du// sku yi khyon gyi
332a8(rnying rgyud): khyad par yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas// sku yi khyon gyis gang ba'o// ji ltar gser spangs 'tsher ba bzhin// sems nyid sbyangs pas de nyid gsal// 'phro
332b1(rnying rgyud): 'du sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di// rim gyis sbyong la gcig car drod // lang kwa'i bdag po 'dri lta ste// chos rgyun chen po 'di 'dzin 'di// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas bshad// 'di kun 'phro 'dul
332b2(rnying rgyud): rgyun zhes bya// nam pa'i don gyi glegs pab mo la// sna tshogs rig pa'i yi ge bris// 'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas// theg chen gsang sngags rgyun mi 'chang // chos so cog go rang bzhin na/ 
332b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pas// thams cad bdud rtsir rgyun mi 'chad// 'khor ba rgya mtsho yo byad rnams// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzangs mchod
332b4(rnying rgyud): sprin rgyun mi 'chad// kun gyi de bzhin nyid dbyings las// sem/ das can sangs rgyas snying por shar// 'gro gang bsam gyi/ das mi khyab pa// rang 'byung sangs rgyas rgyan mo 'chad// dngos po
332b5(rnying rgyud): brtan g.yo la sogs pa'i// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// kun kyang gsang sngags gsang ba'i tshig/ bzlas pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad// de dang de yi dbyings nyid la// gang dang
332b6(rnying rgyud): gi thabs sbyor ba// ya nas 'du 'bral med pas na// sbyor ba chen po rgyun mi 'chang // srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ stong pa'i mtshon cha'i rgyal po yis// dngos po med par bsad
332b7(rnying rgyud): pas na// ye sgrol chen po rgyun mi 'chad// snang srid dag pa'i gzhal yas su// kun gzhi dpal gyi maN DA la la// rnam shes thig chen srad bu brgyad// ye btab dkyil 'khor rgyun
332b8(rnying rgyud): mi 'chad// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas// gdung chen chos sku rgyun mi 'chad// 
333a1(rnying rgyud): na mkha' me chus rlung rnams// rmang bzhi ri rab rten du snang // bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams// de nyid pang rim khri'ang brten/ ri bo bum rten bum par bcas// 'di yang gdung
333a2(rnying rgyud): chen rgyun mi 'chang // 'dzugs pa'i yan lag gzhi rmang rten// 'khor lo tshogs chen khri 'phang brten// yan lag dang po bum rten bcas// lcang lo cod pan phreng bas klubs// de bzhin/ 
333a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis gzhi la// ji bzhin pa yi gzhal yas khang // ma nor ma bcos rmang chen brtan// byang chub sems kyis rtsig chen gtams// ye shes lnga'i skar mthong gisal// bsdu
333a4(rnying rgyud): batshad med rnam thar sgo// dran pa yang dag them skad brgyad// rdzu 'phrul rta babs dag gis brgyan// / mi 'jigs rig pa'i gdung chen la// yang dag
333a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi ka bas mdzes// rang 'byung ye shes dbu rtse' pags// bden gnyis 'khyams kyis nges par ma dzes// ye shes thugs rje yon tan las// byin rlabs
333a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// chos nyid rlabs kyi rla ri bres// sil snyan sgra sgrogs theg chen sngags// ji bzhin chos kyi pho brang 'dir// rgyal ba bzhugs pa 'di ltar rim// kun
333a7(rnying rgyud): bzangs sems kyi chos nyid las// kun gzhi ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chos// sems dpa' yud kyis nges thob pas// bstan pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chang // rdo rje na mkha'i skas bskyod nas// 
333a8(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// snang srid mtha' thug med la lta// des ni de yul yangs par 'gyur// rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams byas te// de la gnas pa'i sems
333b1(rnying rgyud): can la// rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te// thams cad dam pa'i rdo rjer byas// / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ling ka la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// myur mgyogs chu zla'i 'phen shugs kyi/ 
333b2(rnying rgyud): zhing khams kun tu bgrod par bya// na mkha' dbyings kyi ling ka la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shin tu nges par gyur pa dang // mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal// rnal 'byor/ 
333b3(rnying rgyud): sdig mdzub rtse mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bar// shin tu brtan par red pa dang // chu des sreg pa'i bskal gzhi la// rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor du// stong gsum 'jig rten
333b4(rnying rgyud): khor yug bcas// namakha'i dbyings su 'phangs nas ni// san das sar ni sbyar bar bya// rnal 'byor sdig pa'i 'dzub mo da la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las// zer las
333b5(rnying rgyud): nyi ma 'bum 'phros pas// phyi nang mun pa thams cad gsal// rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor las// chu zla'i nga kyil 'khor rab gsal bas// bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun
333b6(rnying rgyud): byung bas// sreg pa'i dmyal ba'i me chen bsad// gzhan yang lang ka'i bdag po ting 'dzin gyis mdo ni 'di kho nar 'dus par gsungs pas// 'di kho na ltar shes par bya'o// sems ni
333b7(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang // de ma thag par ma gyur kyang // de nyid gang rtags de ltar snang // gdos bcas yul na mi snang yang // yid gzugs mngon shes
333b8(rnying rgyud): kun mkhyen snang // gang brtags de ltar de ltas nas// mngon gsum gsal por rid par 'gyur// yod med legs nyes rang bzhin rnams// chu khams rtas pa lta bur zad// thams
334a1(rnying rgyud): cad 'di yis byed par 'gyur// des na ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso// dper na rgya mtsho nor len mi// sbrul dang chu srin snang ma las// sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug
334a2(rnying rgyud): bsngal kun// dka' bas nyams su blangs pas 'grub// de bzhin rnal 'byor rnal tshol ba// rnam rtog bying rmugs 'phyar ga yang dgra/ gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag/ 
334a3(rnying rgyud): nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed// 'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi// nyams su blang ba'i bslab pa ste// sems nyid goms par bya ba las// 'dris par byed pa rab tu gces
334a4(rnying rgyud): grogs po dag de dag ni nyams rnyed pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa dam pa rnams gang gi dgongs pa dam pa'i nyam drod rnyed par
334a5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i ma de chen po las rnal 'byor dbang bsgyur gyi le'u ste/ bdun bcu gsum pa'o// / 
334a6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyis sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces smos so// grogs po dag gang 'di la tshags chung bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di
334a7(rnying rgyud): lta ste/ ci la yang bya ba med pa nyid do// gang la bya ba med pa de gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyis yongs su
334a8(rnying rgyud): zin pa'i nad// gang la'ang gnod pa'i byed mi nus// de bzhin nyid kyis zin pa yi// dus gsum dug lngas gnod mi 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyis ma zin na// lam gyi
334b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs rnams kun spyad kyang // bde 'gro tsam du nges 'byung gis// go 'phang dam par ga la 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyis kun nas par// gang shes nyon mongs rnam par grol// 
334b2(rnying rgyud): gang de zin par ma shes na// dam pa'i lam rnams gol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid blo ldan pas// nyon mongs zin pas gang spyad kyang // rnam grol rang 'byung mya ngan
334b3(rnying rgyud): 'das// tshegs med gyin mda' don po che// gang 'di blo dang mi ldan pas// blo ldan tshul du gang byed pa// dam par grol bar mi 'gyur gyi// 'ching ba thar rom
334b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i dngos// thams cad stong par shes pa yi// // blo can mya ngan 'das pa ste// bya ba'i las la da sha thang ba'i// tshigs chen dka' ba las dang bral// 
334b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i blo gros thabs med de// skyes bu dam pa rnam sa dang ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dman pa'i lu sa// ston par byed pa'ang ltung bar 'gyur// 
334b6(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i blo gros thabs yod na// 'khor ba dman pa'i dngos po yang // skyes bu dam par grol 'gyur te// grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min// grol dang ma
334b7(rnying rgyud): grol la sogs pa// gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'// kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus la'ang min// de ni grol med grol ba'o// 'di ni gsang ba dam
334b8(rnying rgyud): pa ste/ tam rtogs blo chung kun la gsang // skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te// blo chung rnams la phan phyir ro// de phyir blo gros thabs ldan la// rtsol sgrub mo/ 
335a1(rnying rgyud): byad gcor ma gsungs// gal te byas na'ang 'gag pa med// ma byas na yang de ltar nges// de ltar blo gros thabs ldan na// mtshams med lnga yi
335a2(rnying rgyud): sems can kun// byang chub snying rje mtshon gyis bsad// dpag med dgar 'gyur ma bslad na// kun gyi don du gnyer ba ni// gang gi sems nyid dbyings nyid
335a3(rnying rgyud): kyi/ gang gis bskal pa dpag med du// srid gsum dkrugs pas de rig min// 'dir ni blo gros thabs ldan pas// bye med gyi 'dar rang rig pas// don chen
335a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor nyal me btsun// ma brtsal lhun gyis grub pa yin// ji ltar mdu pa dug dang rdzas// sman snang gser du gyur pa na// 'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis// 
335a5(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pa// sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi 'grub ste// su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mas// tshigs med gyi 'di tshul gyis ni// bsgyur bas sman sA
335a6(rnying rgyud): gsar 'gyur ltar// rnal 'byor chen po dron 'grub pa// de nyid blo gros thabs dag dang // gang dang mi ldan pa dag gis// dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub min te// sems kyi gsang 'di
335a7(rnying rgyud): sus mthong ba// blo gos thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa// de dag tshegs med gyi 'das 'grub// don rnams grub par gang byed pa// blo gros thabs kyis
335a8(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i phyir// don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi// bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces// grogs po dag de dag ni tshegs chung la don che ba nyid du zhes bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa
335b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa rnams blo dang ldan gros kyis chod de thabs kyis zin par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las don nges par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bdun bcu bzhi
335b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des// lung ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la shis tu rngom brjid tshul du bos te smras pa/ 
335b3(rnying rgyud): grogs po dag mdo gcig du bsdus pa ni gang zhe na 'di lta ste// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag par
335b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur par 'dus nas// da ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa gci dag tu 'dus par bshad pa// chos nyid rnam par dag pas na// 
335b5(rnying rgyud): chos kun rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs dam dbyig mchog rab nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa las de skad ces
335b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'o// de ltar na yang 'di lta ste// mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rje dri bzhin nyid las byung // chos nyid rdo rje dam tshig ni// grub na 'jig pa'i dus med do// grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par
335b7(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las de skad ces gsung so// grogs po dag yang 'di lta ste// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni// thams cad dam pa de nyid las// mi gzhan gzhan med yod ma yin// de las gang yang
335b8(rnying rgyud): 'da' mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdzogs longs spyod pa ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i tshig
336a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje go chad ma bcas pa// shin tu dam pa'i tha tshig 'di// gal te 'das na tshig par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sku ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so// 
336a2(rnying rgyud): yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa 'di// gsungs pas dam tshig mtha' yas kun// thams cad thams cad bsrungs pa ste// bsrung ba 'di ni rnyed par dka'o// 
336a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyun gyi 'byung ba ngo bo nyid dag pas// de skad ces gsung so// kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste// zhe sdang ngo bo tha dad pa// byang chub sems su mnyam pas na// de bzhin nyid las
336a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa yin// ma spangs ma dag rdo rje dam// bcom lda ngan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bo nyid dag pas// de skad ce das gsung so// grogs po dag 'di lta ste// 'dod dang chags pa'i/ 
336a5(rnying rgyud): yul nyid ni// rang bzhin gang yin de bzhin nyid// long / sa spyod myong tshor rnam par dag/ spyod la ma chags rdo rje dam// bcom ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas ngo bo nyid dag pas
336a6(rnying rgyud): de skad ces gsung so// yang 'di lta ste// thams cad de bzhin der mtshungs pas// khyad par bye brag dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje na mkha' 'od gsal bas// rmongs pa'i mun nag rnam dag gsal/ 
336a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsung so// yang 'di lta ste/ rnam dag thug mtha' mu med pas// yangs dog tshig gi mtha' dang bral// kun bzang yangs
336a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam du gcig/ bde chen klong yang rdo rje dam// bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pas de skad ces gsung so// yang 'di lta ste// de bzhin nyid las med pas na// yin dang ma yin gnyis
336b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das// bdag med rdo rje de bzhin nyid// nga med mi 'gyur rdo rje dam// bcom ldan 'das yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so// grogs po dag gzhan yang
336b2(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// yod mthong snang grags chos so cog/ tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang // rang bzhin ma bcos de bzhin nyid// ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag zhing // bcom ldan 'das dri med
336b3(rnying rgyud): sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang ba'i ye shes 'di// sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste// thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bas na// rang las byung ba'i
336b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog/ da sprin ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsung so// gzhan yang dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ni 'di lta ste// ye nas ma
336b5(rnying rgyud): bcos ji bzhin pa// chos so cog gi snying po ste// medapa las byung sna tshogs snang // snang med de bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i 'byung gnas
336b6(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// gzhan yang 'di lta ste// rang 'byung rig pa'i sems nyid kyis// ma bcos chos nyid dbyings kyi don// lhun grub thabs dang shes rab las// yang dag
336b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal// bcom ldan 'das sang+ge sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsung so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rtog ngo bo dag pas gsungs pa// 'jig rten
336b8(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bde dang mi bde rnam pa kun// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pas// tshor ba bde sdug gang yang med ces gsung so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rgyan ngo bo nyid
337a1(rnying rgyud): dag pas 'di skad du// de bzhin nyid du don bstan du// de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas// gang gis gang la gang zhig bstan// nyid la nyid glang kho nar zad ces gsung so// gzhan
337a2(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// dus gsum dus bzhir mi rigs te// ye shes rig pa'i khyad par las// skad gcig bskal
337a3(rnying rgyud): pa de skad cig ces gsung so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das rtag pa// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid du// ye nas mya ngan
337a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pas na// rang bzhin lhun grub tshogs gnyis rdzogs zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas da 'di skad du// chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni// ma skyes pa la
337a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// rigs mchog/ rdo rje skye gnas dam zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das yongasu dgengs pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad
337a6(rnying rgyud): du// de bzhin nyid du kun rig no// des khyab gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing // yon tan rin chen sprin bkod pa// dgod par bya ba ci yang med ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od
337a7(rnying rgyud): zer ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// ji bzhin de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de bzhin nyid dang thams cad kyang // gnyid med de bzhin nyid do zhes gsung so// yang
337a8(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ so sor snang ba ma yin te// ji bzhin de bzhin nyid nges na// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med ces
337b1(rnying rgyud): gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di bzhin du// de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni// dpag cing gzhal bar mtha' yas pas// dpag med rgyal po'i pho brang yin// de nas
337b2(rnying rgyud): kun bkod der gcig nas zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das sprin gyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// thams cad 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yang // tsa ri yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes te// gdos
337b3(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa'i chos med pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das yid 'ong dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i kha brgyad pa// 
337b4(rnying rgyud): ma rig ngo bo de bzhin pa// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// de nyid rig na bde chen gnas zhes gsung so// yang bcom lda na 'das me long 'od snang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// 
337b5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs ye shes lngar rtogs pa// ji bzhin de la gnyis ka bsgrib// rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med de// rtog pa de nyid yang dag lam zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das zla
337b6(rnying rgyud): 'od dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// theg pa dpag med bstan pa yang // ji ltar mos pa tha dad pa// khrid pa bya ba'i thabasu zad// rdo rje theg pa nyid las med ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan
337b7(rnying rgyud): 'das nyi ma'i snying po dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// gang gis de mthong mthong ma thag/ mi shes chod pa'i dra ba chod// khyung dang seng ge ji bzhin du// mngal ltar lus kyi mngal gyis
337b8(rnying rgyud): sgrib ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das spos kyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// dbang sgyur thabs kyi ye shes kyis// sgyu ma'i chos la dbang thob pas// mun la snang 'byung ji
338a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du// thams cad dbang sgyur rang rig yin zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das sngon spro ba'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma dang // 
338a2(rnying rgyud): log tog mtshan ma'i sgyu ma gnyis// rang bzhin de nyid dag pas na// gnyis su shes pa nyid tshogs rdzogs zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas
338a3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di rnams// de bzhin nyid du gcig pas na// gang gi de bzhin de shes pa// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa yin zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das 'od
338a4(rnying rgyud): zer dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas// dmas kyi dgod pa 'di// shes nas de la gang gnas pa// rang rig nyid la dbang thob pa'i// de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa
338a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das dka' thub rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// de nyid ji bzhin ma don gyur na// mang la mi zad 'byung ba yi// che ba'i yon tan
338a6(rnying rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad// cir snang kun 'byung rin chen gter zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor snying po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// ji bzhin bcos de nyid la// de bzhin pa yi blo
338a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// de bzhin de nyid ma yin pa'i// sgrub dang bsgrub pa ga la yod ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das nges par gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pa 'di skad du// mkha' la glo bur sprin
338a8(rnying rgyud): 'thibs ltar// de bzhin glo bur rtog pas bsgribs/ ma ba' dag nang du sprin sangs ltar// rnam rtog sangs pas ngang gis sangs shes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das nges par gsungs pa'i
338b1(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// ji snyed dag pa'i gsung brjod kyang / rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spros med gsung nyid kun gsal khyag/ ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad// ces gsung so// yang
338b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// thams cad yul la 'jug pa yi// thogs med ma chags de bzhin blos// ji snyed ji bzhin nyid du bsgyur// zad med gter ldan rin chen 'byung zhes
338b3(rnying rgyud): gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das me tog dbang po dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin nyid la bzhugs pas na// 'di zhes tshig tu ma gsungs kyang / khyab pas gcig pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 
338b4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa so sor mjal zhes gsung so// yang bcom lnga dan 'das grags pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas sems can la sogs pa// thams cad ma lus
338b5(rnying rgyud): lus pa med// rang rig ma rig rtog pa nyid// kun kyang rang byungaye shes nyid ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das smra la pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// yi ge phyag rgya
338b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyang // tshig las 'byung ba'i gzhi yin te// de nyid dag pas thams cad dag/ gsung la gsung nyid mi gnas pa'o zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs mi zad pa nyid dag pas
338b7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du// de bzhin nyid kyang rang bzhin du// lnga phung nyon mongs rnam par dag/ rnam rtog rdul bral skye bgag med// thams cad ngo bo nyid du bcom zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das sman
338b8(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// dpag med 'jig rten rdul rnyed na// 'gro ba rdul phran pas ma yas la// khyad par de bzhin nyid snang bas// til 'bru mar gyis khyab ltar gnas shes
339a1(rnying rgyud): gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od 'phro ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// rdul phran gcig tsam gang zag la// dgongs te mdun du gsung brjod pa// dpag med mtha'
339a2(rnying rgyud): yas rdul snyed tsam// da snyed kun du thos par grol zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// gsung gcig mi zad mtha' yas gsung // mtha'
339a3(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med kun tu khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje gsung // sna tshogs dngos med de bzhin nyid ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi gsu ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// gang yang
339a4(rnying rgyud): ma bcos de nyid la// phyogs dang lnga phyi dus med de// thams dad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de nyid rang rig rang nyid do zhe sa gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi rgyal po ngo bo/ 
339a5(rnying rgyud): nyid da pa 'di skad du// de nyid de snyed rang bzhid de// de snyed de nyid yin pa la/ byis pa rnams kyis gnyis su bzung // de la gnyis su dbyer byar med ces gsung so// yang bcom
339a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// stong nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin du// mi mthun pa dang gnyen pa gnyis// ye nas dbyer med gcig phran// gnod pas 'jigs/ 
339a7(rnying rgyud): pa ga la yod ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// mi 'gyur na mkha'i rang bzhin te// dag pa dag la dag pa nyid// rtog pa dag la
339a8(rnying rgyud): rtog par snang // cis 'dul der snang ci yang med ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das dga' mchog dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// rang bzhin rang gis ma bcos pa// yong gi 'od
339b1(rnying rgyud): gsal de bzhin nyid// kun gyi snying po de nyid pas// cis kyang ma bsgribs na mkha' che zhes gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// ji bzhin pa nyid sa
339b2(rnying rgyud): mchog te// de rig ye shes bla ma yis// ye nas de bzhin nyid la gnas// da gdod bgrod du ga la yod ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngo bo
339b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pas 'di skad du// stong pa nyid kyi snying po la/ sna tshogs snang ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ba// ji bzhin pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 
339b4(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i ngo bo nyi dad dag pa gsang bas 'di skad du// zad medo ye shes dang / das grub ni// de bzhin nyid du dngos grub pas// zad pa med cing
339b5(rnying rgyud): 'phel ba med// da gdod bsgrub tu ga la yod ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kun gyi ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// chos kun rang bzhin med pa
339b6(rnying rgyud): nyin// mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya// stong nyid rang bzhin rnam dag la// de nyid mi gnas byang chub sems// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba nyid dag pas 'di skad// 
339b7(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog chu bo'i rka mgo s+ho// stong nyid zhing du ma bsgyur na// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ga ying 'gyur ba// de mi shes la de ltar snang zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das me tog bkod
339b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i ma yin pas// kun bzang shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhes
340a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad snang ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas dang // sems can rnam pa thams cad dag/ 
340a2(rnying rgyud): dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa// de nyid las byung dngos med sku zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das yid dang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// rang 'byung ye shes rtsa ba ni// / 
340a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems nyid yin pas na// de yi rtsa ba snying rje ste// pha rol phyin par thabs kyis so zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das sang+ge 'bum gzugs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di
340a4(rnying rgyud): skad du// ji snyed ji bzhin nyid kyi don// yi ge ming tshe dgas sgra mtshon pa/ ming tshogs sprul ma brten par// nyam drod blo yis rig pa med ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 
340a5(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// chos kun chos kyi rang bzhin ni// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan pas// de nyid byang chub lam
340a6(rnying rgyud): nyid des// lam de lhug po bkod pa'i gnas// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// kye grogs po dag gzhan yang de dag la sogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma bya ba sa ya rnyed ngo bo
340a7(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pa dang // chos kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas// gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad du// la la ni 'di ltar// rtog med rang rig skad cig ma// sems
340a8(rnying rgyud): can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings// rig dang ma rig gnyis kho na// dag dang ma dag gnyis su snang zhes// gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid smra brjod med pa
340b1(rnying rgyud): las// de mtshon phyir na tha dad brjod// gang brjod pa nyid de bzhin nyid// de nyid spros med rdo rje don// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid cir yang mi snang na// glo
340b2(rnying rgyud): bur rnam rtog tha dad pa'i// rnam rtog de nyid snang bar zad// snang ba nyid na snang ba med ces gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// sangs rgyas kyis
340b3(rnying rgyud): kyang byar med na// gang gis bcos te su yis byas// byas pa po zhig ga la yod// ces gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni// de bzhin de
340b4(rnying rgyud): nyid yin pas na// de khyab gang gis chos rnams kun/ 8/ nga bzhin dag pas bsgribs pa med// ces gsang ba/ dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid mtshan nyid
340b5(rnying rgyud): med pa las// mtshan nyid sna tshogs par snang bas// kun 'byung dbyings kyi rang bzhin pas// med la zad mi she sa par mdzod ces gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni
340b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du/ sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang // sdom pa srung ba'i bya ba kun// spyad par bya ba ma yin yang / kun kyang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad/ 
340b7(rnying rgyud): de la phyogs dang dus med par// gang gis phyogs dang dus brtags pa'o// de nyid de la rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kyis ni de mi mkhyen// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di ska du
340b8(rnying rgyud): bas mo gyis mi khyab kun shes nas/ bas mo du med par de bzhag na/ dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung // rnam pa thams cad mabyon pa yin// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la lani
341a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du// bsam gyis mi khyab mi shes par// bsam med dang du gang 'jog pa// byis pa de ni blun pa ste// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// zhes kun nas brtse ba dam par
341a2(rnying rgyud): bsngagaso// la la ni 'di skad du// bsam med bsam gyis mi khyab chos// lhag par mthong nas zhi gnas pa// rnam rtog spong lan gang byed pa// de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas zhes bshes gnyen
341a3(rnying rgyud): dam pa nyid du gdam so// la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs so so kun rig kyang // kun grol rnam dag lam med na// dam pa nyid las shin tu gol// nam yang nges pa rnyed pa min zhes dka' dam pa
341a4(rnying rgyud): gdam so// la la ni 'di skad du// sna tshogs rim gyis 'jug pa dang // bsam spyod blo yi nang du 'gyur// bsam me/ dad yongasu rdzogs pa'i don// rim gyis pa yi dug chen yin/ 
341a5(rnying rgyud): zhes khyad par dam par gdam so// la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs so sor ma rig par// de bzhin nyid du nges ma rnyed// de nyid nges pa ma rnyed na// sna tshogs smra ba rung ma
341a6(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes na na tAn dam par gdam so// la la ni 'di skad du/ mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du// bsam yas bsam snang de bzhin no// gcig tu nges pa med pa'i gsung // ji ltar 'byung
341a7(rnying rgyud): ba de ltar yin// zhes dpag dka' ba dam par gsung so// la la ni 'di skad du/ kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bshad pas// 'di don gang rig thos pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'di las 'byung bas
341a8(rnying rgyud): na/ 'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog ces shes rab mchog dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// gsang ba'i nang na gsang chen 'di// nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong bar// 
341b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nyid dam pa rnams kyis bsngags// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du/ chos rnams kun gyis snying po 'di// gsar dang mkha'
341b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin mi 'gyur bas// mi nub ster bral med pa'i phyir// chos kyi dam pa don po mchog/ ces dam pa chen po bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// thog ma med nas bsags pa yi// rnam rtog
341b3(rnying rgyud): sprin phung dpag med pa// stong nyid gcig car rig pa yis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par sgrol// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngagaso// la la ni 'di skad du// ji snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// 
341b4(rnying rgyud): chos kun stong par rig nges na// sangs rgyas kun dang mnya ma sbyor bas// rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan yi// na// zhes rnal 'byor dam par gdam so// la la ni 'di
341b5(rnying rgyud): skad du/ 'khor ba ji srid yod par du// bstan pa'i snying po nyi ma shor// rang bzhin chos nyid 'khor lo 'di// mi nub rgyu ni mi 'chad par bskor zhes gsang ba dam pa'i theg par
341b6(rnying rgyud): bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// mi 'gyur mi 'jigs rdo rje don// sna tshogs kun 'byung rin po che// ma chags rnam dag pad+mo nyid// thams cad lhun grub mdzad pa che// ma nor ma bcos de
341b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid// ces yang nges pa dam pa bstan to// la la ni 'di skad du// stong nyid gzugs med chos kyi sku// smon med yid las 'das pa'i gsung // mtshan med rtog las 'das pa'i thugs/ 
341b8(rnying rgyud): rtog med re skong yon tan mdzod// thabs kyis gar thabs phrin las mdzad// ces cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung bar bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// mi rtog chos kyi me long gsal// gnyis su
342a1(rnying rgyud): // med pas thams cad mnyam// sna tshogs mtshan nyid ma 'dres mkhyen// nan tan chen po khyab grub mdzad// ye nyid kun gyi rang bzhin mu khyen// zhes ye shes rgyun du 'char bar
342a2(rnying rgyud): bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// snang stong go 'byed kun khyab mkha'// thag dbyings la ni kun gnas sa// zhi gnas rnam dag chu chen po// lhag mthong ye shes 'od 'bar ma/ shes bya thogs med 'thor
342a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rlung // zhes thams cad 'byung bar bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs// khyab gsal rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sgra// dang bas sim byed chos kyi dri// don
342a4(rnying rgyud): bcu nyamasu myong ba'i ro// bad mchog don la reg pa nyid ces yon tan dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// ci yang mi sems gti mug la// dngos po kun bcom zhe sdang nyid// 
342a5(rnying rgyud): ya 'byam nga rgyal bdag nyid che// bde chen rang bzhin rjes chag sa pa// gang du ma 'gyur gzhan phrag dog/ ces blang ngo // ra med par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// kun gyi rang
342a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gcig shes pas// de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus// kun la dbang sgyur thos pas na// ye dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o zhes dbang dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// thams cad kun
342a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus rig pa'i mdo// kun la khyab gnas brtag dka' ba/ zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// rdo rje kun bkod rnal 'byor lung zhes dka' dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid der ni
342a8(rnying rgyud): kun gcig pas// bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med// stong nyid rnam dag na mkha' lo// gtsang smer dbye ba rdul yang med// ces bdud rtsi dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// byang chub snying po
342b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa la// rnam rtog rdul gyis ga la 'a'o// de nyid chen por 'ung chung bas/ cis kyang mi bskyod nyam ming zhes re dogs med par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di// 
342b2(rnying rgyud): seng+ge'i khog pa rang zhig ltar// stong nyid rang nyid ma zhig na// gzhan gyis 'jig par ga lo 'gyur// zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// bde chen rnam dag rtog byed pas// 
342b3(rnying rgyud): legs nyes gnyi ga rnam par rtog/ bde chen nges pa'i rlung zhugs na// gang 'dir rnam par rtog pa med// ces yongs su rtog pa las 'das par bsngagaso// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid phyin ci ma
342b4(rnying rgyud): log par// bsrung bya mi rtog mi gnas pa/ le lo g.yeng ba'i da gra bsrung ste/ de bzhin de las 'da' mi bya zhes dmachi dgra dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// dpag tu med
342b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten du// sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ji snyed pa yi chos bstan pa// mtha' yas don ni gcig tu 'du sa// zhes par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid de las
342b6(rnying rgyud): ma nyams na// dran bsam sgyu ma med pa yi// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid// bslab pa rnams gsum yongasu rdzogs shes bslab pa dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// de nyid las mthA
342b7(rnying rgyud): zhi gnas dang // lhag pa'i doni mthong 'dres pa yi// sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa na/ 'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi lang // zhes bkri drang brgyud pa dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'od skad du// tshig
342b8(rnying rgyud): la dbang bas tshig bsgyur na// tshig mtha' yas pas bsdus na 'dus// tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur na// brjod pas de ni zad mi 'gyur// zhes gsung mi zad pa dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di
343a1(rnying rgyud): / skad du// smra brjod tshig la gang dag pas/ gang gis dgongs pa dpog mi nus/ tshig tshogs rgya mtsho thos pa min// tshig gcig go tha thos pa'i mchog ces thos pa rgya mtsho'i
343a2(rnying rgyud): dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// khyab dang mi gnas rnam mi rtog/ ma bral mi g.yo ma chags pa// de nyid las ni gzhan med de// pha rol phyin pa de kho na zhes mthar son pa dam par
343a3(rnying rgyud): bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// 'don brjod 'dri klog don byed pa// dmus long dmu rgod rgyug pa 'dra// dbyings kyis dbyings la bris pa'i don// gang rig 'don brjod 'di klog mchog
343a4(rnying rgyud): ces spyod pa dam par bsngags/ la la ni 'di skad du/ mtshan mar byas dang snang ba'i mchog/ mi 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi// mkha' dang 'ja' ltar rnam rig pa/ 
343a5(rnying rgyud): bsngo bo bla med byang chub nyid// ces bsngo ba dam par bya/ sngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// chos gang sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis dang mtha' ru gang lta ba// ma rig 'khrul
343a6(rnying rgyud): pas phyin ci log/ theg chen gsang sngags lam las log ces gdams ngag dam par gsung so// la la ni 'di skad du/ rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa// blo chung rmongs pas khrid pa'i
343a7(rnying rgyud): thab so// ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la/ rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyis med// ces nges par dam pa bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la// yid bzhin cir yang
343a8(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba yi/ cho 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams// ji ltar 'dul ba mthong thos snang // zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul/ 
343b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbyings na gnas pa yi// thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid// mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs// shes thams cad lhun gyis grub par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad
343b2(rnying rgyud): du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// de mthong ngo bo nyid mi dmigs// dran med bya dang byed med pa// gnas gsum mnyam nyid rjes su dran// zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngag so// la la ni
343b3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du// gnas gsum dmigs pa'i 'du shes med// ming med tshig gi lam dang bral// bla med 'dus ma byas pa yi// mchod pa yang dag mchog tu bshad// ces mchod pa dam par
343b4(rnying rgyud): bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// bskal pa bye ba dpagamed du// log cing zhen pa'i mun pa gsum// de nyid chu/ la bzhin skad cig ma// kun gsal gcig gis yongasu
343b5(rnying rgyud): sangs// shes gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// mun pas 'thibs pa de dag gis// mi g.yo mi rtog de nyid blta// de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs/ 
343b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyod sangs kun gyi mchog tu bshad ces tshangs pa dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// mi 'thun gnyen po mi dmigs pa// stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la// gnas pa gang yin de
343b7(rnying rgyud): dag gis// gnyen po bstan du ci yang med ces la gcad pa dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa// ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du// rang rig bla na med
343b8(rnying rgyud): pa yi/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o// zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// ci yang mi sems mi g.yo zhing // mi rtog rnam par mi g.yeng ba/ kun la khyab
344a1(rnying rgyud): bdal ba'i dbyings// kun shong bya med theg chen mchog ces theg pa chen po'i gsang ba dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// theg chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dbu mar mi
344a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs mtha' las 'das// gang 'dir dbu mar 'dod pa dag/ mtha' las 'das par ga la 'gyur zhes dbus mthar mi dmigs par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// chos kun mi mthong
344a3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba// de yi don dam yang dag mthong // zhes mthong ba yongasu bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// ye nas ma
344a4(rnying rgyud): bcos ji bzhin pa// mi skye mi 'gag rnam kun mkhyen// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur yin zhes ma bslad par dam par bsngag so// la la ni 'di skad du// 
344a5(rnying rgyud): de nyid de dang gang ldan pa// dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// de la ma gtogs gang zhig na// sangs rgyas bya ba ga la yod// ces ye nas sangs rgyas par bsngag so// la la
344a6(rnying rgyud): ni 'di skad du// brtan g.yod dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs// rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin bsngags// med rgyu rtags chags mtshon pa'i tsha gi/ bsgrub 'grub bltas snang 'bras bu'o zhes
344a7(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags dam pa'i tshig go// grogs po dag de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid las 'di skad du// thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa// tshig
344a8(rnying rgyud): gi tha snyad tsam dag las// 'di la bya ba ci yang med// rang bzhin de nyid ya sangs rgyas// a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las 'das te// bde ba chen po lhun dang bar gyur to// de
344b1(rnying rgyud): nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis tshigasu bcad de smras pa// dper na kun tu rgyu ba'i mi// 'dod pa'i yul du gang 'gro ba// yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang // bgrod yul lam gnas gcig las
344b2(rnying rgyud): med// de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rnam grangs chos sgo ji snyed kyang // bkrid pas drang ba'i tshig yin te// bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o// don rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yi// bslab par
344b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba dam pa ste// nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir// kun 'dus dam pa'i bslab par gces// dam pa 'dir 'dus kun shes na// de yi ye shes mtha' yas te// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
344b4(rnying rgyud): nyid pas// mdo don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs// grog sa po dag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da/ dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig tu 'dus par de bzhin gshig
344b5(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad 'dus nas bshad pa ste// thams cad kyi mdo de kho na nyid du 'das par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa dam pa rnams gcig tu nges pa dam pa
344b6(rnying rgyud): rnyed par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid la dman pa dam pa rnams yid rangs te// mngon par bstod pa/ a ma ho/ skyes chen gsang ba'i bdag/ rtsal chen smra ba sang+ge'i sgra// de bzhin
344b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// sangs rgyas kun sngon ya nas byung // khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mas// che mchog rje brtsan dam pa'i sku// bad gshegs kun gyi bshes gnyen mchog/ sems
344b8(rnying rgyud): dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// kun gyi 'byung gnas me long gsal// phyogs kun gsal 'grel nges pa'i mdo// theg chen rmad grags ngo mtshar che// gsang chen byung tshul ngo mtshar che// 
345a1(rnying rgyud): e ho zhes nges dam par mngon par bstod// de nas cang mi dmigs par 'gyur te// gang du nges par bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa dag lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du rgya cher
345a2(rnying rgyud): grags shing yongasu grags par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'das pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun bcu lnga pa'o// / 
345a3(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gis dgongs pa rnam par bgros pa na yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste// byung tshul
345a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma'o// // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon dpar rtogs pa chos thams cad kyi me long / bka' thams
345a5(rnying rgyud): cad kyi 'brel pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bad ga po phyag na rdo rjes drag shul can gyi rim la ya'i rtser
345a6(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yongasu bgros pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi dang / ring lugs chen po dA na rik+Sha ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsAH
345a7(rnying rgyud): cheb tsan skyes kyis bru sha'i yi ge las bru sha'i yul gyi khrom du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// bka' 'di la dbu zhabasu byung tshul bcu gnyis pa/ le'u bdun cu rtsa lnga pa/ bam po bcu dang / 
345a8(rnying rgyud): shu lo ko nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi bzad pa gter gyi sgron ma/ brtul zhugs
345b1(rnying rgyud): chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud/ ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
345b2(rnying rgyud): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po chen po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i bde bar gsheg
345b3(rnying rgyud): brnal 'byol gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen po// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// lhun gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po// chos ma lus mi lus
345b4(rnying rgyud): lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chen po/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i bdag nyid de 'og min dgyi gnas mtha' dang dbus brjod du med pa na rang bzhin lhun
345b5(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur
345b6(rnying rgyud): yongasu ma chad pa/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal ba// spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis pho brang gi snying po zlum por gyur pa// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur
345b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thugs rjes rgyas
345b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegasu shar ba/ phyi dang nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang
346a1(rnying rgyud): de na nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang phyed kyis 'od gsal bar snang ba dang / che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyang ba dang / shar du'i rgyan dang / bla
346a2(rnying rgyud): re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ta la'i ljon shing re ba skong ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i
346a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha dang lha'i bu mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo dang glu dbyangs kyi tshigasu bcad pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par rgyu rin po che sna tshogs las
346a4(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla dang ma chags ma gos pa'i pha ng+ga dang mi zad pa'i rin po che 'bar ba gdan khri dang
346a5(rnying rgyud): gzims cha dang rnam rten du ldan par gnas so// / gzhan yang khrag 'thung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gan su yang 'gyur te// du khrod kyi rgyan gyi khyad par gyi bye
346a6(rnying rgyud): brag zhing gi gdan dang sbrul nag gi chun 'phyang dang thod pa rnam gsum gyi mtshan ma dang / rlung nag gi phung po spungs shing rak+Sha'i rgya mtsho mi bzad par 'khrug pa dang / mau rI ser nag tu
346a7(rnying rgyud): 'khyil cing 'bar ba/ kang rus kyi ri rab las r-ik+ta'i khrag zhag gi nu 'bab pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na dregs pa khyo shug dang / sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas
346a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas kun tu bzang po'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshegs grub pa/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gyur pa na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor
346b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs brjod pa las 'das pa'i yang brjod pa las 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed 'khod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / khrag 'thung rol pa'i tshogs dang / dang
346b2(rnying rgyud): pas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ na mkha' dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
346b3(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi skyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod
346b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang / btsun mo dam pa dbyings phyug ma dang / btsun me dam pa sangs rgyas spyan dang / btsun mo dam pa mA ma kI da dang / btsun mo dam pa gos dkar mo dang / btsun mo dam pa/ 
346b5(rnying rgyud): sgrol ma dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'khor btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa na mkha' dang mnya ma pa rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa'i rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor/ 
346b6(rnying rgyud): chen po rin chen rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen po chos rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen po las rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen mo rdo rje sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo rin chen sems ma dang / rnal 'byor
346b7(rnying rgyud): chen mo chos kyi sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo las sems ma dang / gzhan yang na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa byang chub chen po sa'i snying
346b8(rnying rgyud): po dang / byang chub chen po na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / byang chub
347a1(rnying rgyud): chen po sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub chen po byams pa mai tri dang / byang chub chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub chen mo sgeg mo dang / byang chub chen mo phreng ba dang / 
347a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen mo dbyangs dang / byang chub chen mo gar dang / byang chub tshon mo pog me ma dang / byang chub chen me me tog ma dang / byang chub chen mo mar ma ma dang / byang chub chen mo dri dang / gzhan
347a3(rnying rgyud): yang 'joms pa chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa na mkha' dang mnyam pa 'joms pa chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / 'joms pa chen po stobs po che dang / 'joms pa chen po rnam/ 
347a4(rnying rgyud): par rgyal ba dang / 'joms pa chen po rta'i rgyal po dang / 'jonangs pa chen po bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dang / 'joms mtshan mo lcags kyu ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo zhags pa ma dang / 
347a5(rnying rgyud): 'joms ma chen mo lcags sgrogs ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo 'bebs ma dang / gzhan yang thub pa'i sras kyi 'kho ra rdul phra rab snyed dang mnyam pa/ thub pa chen po lha'i dbang po
347a6(rnying rgyud): dang / thub pa chen po lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po mi'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dud 'gro'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po yi dgas kyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dmyal ba'i dbang
347a7(rnying rgyud): po dang / de dag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sras kyi tshogs grangs med pa dang yang thabs cig tu bzhug so// gzhan yang khrag 'thung rol pa dpal he ru ka btsun mo'i tshegs
347a8(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa 'di lta ste/ khrag 'thung chen po dpal bud d+ha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal badz+ra he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal rad na he ru ka zhes bya ba
347b1(rnying rgyud): dang khrag 'thung chen po dpal pad+ma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang khrag 'thung chen po dang la karma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bung d+ha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo badz+ra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo/ 
347b2(rnying rgyud): rang na kre d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pad+ma kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo karma kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsang ba chen po 'khor btsun mau dang bcas pa gsang ba chen po r-ik+Sha he ru ka zhes bya
347b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / gsang po chen po yak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po bi sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po sa ma ya he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo rak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / 
347b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen mo yak+Sha kro d+hi zhis bya ba dang / gsang ba chen da mo bi shra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo sa ma ya kro d+hi zhis bya ba dang / gzhan yang 'phra men ma nyi shu'i cho gas/ 
347b5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor dkar mo'i tshigs shes bya ba dang / kun mo gas shes bya ba dang / lbos mo'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / gtum mo'i tshogs shes bya ba dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs
347b6(rnying rgyud): shes bya ba dang / thal byed ma'i tshegs shes bya ba dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / mtshogs shes bya ba dang / seng gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / stag gdong gi tshogs shes
347b7(rnying rgyud): bA ba dang / wa gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / khyi gdong gi tshegs shes bya ba dang / gzhan gdong gi tshegs shes bya ba dang / kang ka'i gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / dur bya'i gdong gi cho gas
347b8(rnying rgyud): shes bya ba dang / bya rog gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / rta gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / phag gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / seng gdong / 
348a1(rnying rgyud): gi tshogs shes bya ba dang / skye gdong gi tshogs shes bya ba la sogs pa 'phra men ma'i tshogs shin tu mang ba dang / gzhan yang rdo rje srin po khre za 'tshogs rdo rje srin po khrom
348a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang / gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang / mi g.yo mgon po zhes bya ba dang / rta mgrin zhes bya ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba
348a3(rnying rgyud): dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil po zhes bya ba dang / khams gsumi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / hU~M kA ra zhes bya ba dang / stobs po tsho zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang rdo rje srin mo'i khro mo'i 'khor rdo rje srin
348a4(rnying rgyud): mo snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / sdor mo zhes bya ba dang / dur khro dad ma zhes bya ba dang / gtun khung ma zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / sgra 'byin
348a5(rnying rgyud): ma zhes bya ba dang / gsod ma zhes bya ba dang / bskyod ma zhes bya ba dang / rlung 'byin ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor rigs 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam gyis
348a6(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / ston pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul gyis rang dbang med par 'khor du 'dus pa'i dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa
348a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad la sogs pa kun bran dang yang bran/ g.yog dang yang g.yog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs kyi 'khor 'dus pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyud ni thams cad zhi ba
348a8(rnying rgyud): dang / rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po dang dgug pa dang bcing ba dang gtang ba dang / dgrol ba dang / drang ba dang rengs pa dang rmugs pa dang dpral ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang 'jib pa
348b1(rnying rgyud): dang nyams pa dang gsad pa dang / gnan pa dang sbar ba dang pham pa dang / rgyal ba la sogs pa byed cing thabs gcig tu rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod do// de nas yang dpal 'bar yum kro
348b2(rnying rgyud): d+hi'i rgyal mo yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i sku la 'khril te bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po dang / btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo
348b3(rnying rgyud): yang gnyis su med par mdun gyis bltas te bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las glang gzhi'i le'u
348b4(rnying rgyud): sta dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gas dang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po ye she das rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
348b5(rnying rgyud): cad la rnam par gzig so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha ma sa cad la gzigs nas phyi snod kyi khams na mkha' dang nga sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri dang / tshal las
348b6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa thams cad la rnam par gzig so// de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas yang nang bcud kyi khams sems dang sems las byung ba'i g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / dmyal
348b7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i rigs so so'i khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / mu stegs kyi
348b8(rnying rgyud): khams dang / bdud chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / ru tra dang / ru tra can la sogs pa'i khams la rnam par gzigs so// de
349a1(rnying rgyud): dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas yang nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang / rig 'dzin sa pa'i tig na
349a2(rnying rgyud): dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas smra bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
349a3(rnying rgyud): par bzhugs te cang mi mdzad/ rnam par mi mdzad/ mdzad pa mi 'gogo// mdzad pa rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi mdzad pa yang mi gnas/ cang mi gsung mi sgrogs/ rnam par mi gsung mi
349a4(rnying rgyud): sgrogs/ gsung ba yang mi 'gog/ gsung ba rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi gsung mi 'gog pa la yang mi gnas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snod kyi khams thams cad
349a5(rnying rgyud): dang / sa'i khyad par thams cad la yang mi gzigs mi da gongs// gzigs shing dgongs pa la yang mi 'gro/ ga/ rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi 'gog pa la yang mi gan so// 
349a6(rnying rgyud): de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang / snod kyi khams de dag dang / bcud kyi khams de dag dang / sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang
349a7(rnying rgyud): rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid tsam du dmigasu med do// dper na na mkha' ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdagasu med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems
349a8(rnying rgyud): de yang chos thams cad la yang khyab la smra bas ma las kyang 'das so// de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du/ yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa'i kr-i d+hi'i rgyal mos/ 
349b1(rnying rgyud): stong nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo// oM snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku// smra bas ma las 'das don dam byang chub sems/ sdong nyid dang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis// snying rje rnam pa
349b2(rnying rgyud): ngo bo bstan du gsol zhes bskul bas bskul bar thugasu chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun skabs bdal bar khyab ste/ snying rje chen
349b3(rnying rgyud): po des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par mdzad do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par mdzad nas yang snod kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas yang bcud kyi khams kun
349b4(rnying rgyud): la khyab par mdzad do// bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par/ mdzad nas sa'i khyad par kun la khyab par mdzad do// dper na nyi ma par snang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms pa
349b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kya nga stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab gdal to// de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge
349b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin las langs nas snying rje na mkha'i ngo bo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug so// zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu
349b7(rnying rgyud): yin no// de nas yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo// ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung gnas las// long
349b8(rnying rgyud): spyod rdzogs dang thugs rjes sprul pa'i sku/ 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// oM la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des
350a1(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs na mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste/ dper na zla ba dri ma med pa na mkha' dang ba la sha
350a2(rnying rgyud): ba bzhin no// rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni dper na nyi 'od kyi 'od zer dus gcig shar ba lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag
350a3(rnying rgyud): bo des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo la gzigs
350a4(rnying rgyud): te/ 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do// de nas yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo das kyang spyan zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan dastong du ma la phyag 'tshal te g.yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis
350a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par bskul lo// e ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lha/ rdo rje gar gyis tshul gyis garamadzad cing // dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de/ 
350a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzum zhing 'a khyil pa'i pad+ma'i gnas su phob ho// e ma'o// dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang // chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du// gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin brlabs
350a7(rnying rgyud): bsam yas las// ye shes lha tshogs sprul srubs ma yas 'thon// ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye// dgen gdungs gnas nas byang chub myug gu skyed// zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par
350a8(rnying rgyud): slong zhes rnam par bskul bas gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dir ba dang / skul ba dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan
350b1(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang / dung sog gi phur bas g.yon pa slong ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'deg pa dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i rol pa'i gar gyis na mkha'i
350b2(rnying rgyud): khams kun tu khyab par mdzad de// rnam par rol pa des 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do// des sems dang sems las byung ba'i kun la khyab par mdzad pas
350b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil pas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod kyi khams dang / bcud kyi khams dang / bsam gtan dang / 'gog pa dang / so'i khyad par thams
350b4(rnying rgyud): cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa dang / sdom pa dang / bstim par dang / mnyes pa dang / gsol pa dang / myang ba dang / bcad pa dang / 
350b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba dang / spyod pa dang / 'jog pa la sogs pa bcom ldan/ 'das kun du bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam
350b6(rnying rgyud): bar dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung gi yog 'bru 'khor lo'i tshig su yang snang ngo // yig 'bru de nyid
350b7(rnying rgyud): thugs phyag mtshan du yang gyur/ thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang / sems dpa' dang / 
350b8(rnying rgyud): sems mo dang / thub pa dang / 'joms pa dang / 'joms mo rnams kyis skur yang rang rang gi dmachog gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje
351a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de/ de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor zham 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo// yang 'od
351a2(rnying rgyud): zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to// he ru ka re re la yang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zham 'bring dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do// he ru ka re re lA
351a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi glog gsal bar mdzad do// chos kyi glu dang / gar dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang / chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul
351a4(rnying rgyud): yan man snrel gzhi thams cad du ling long byed do// de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang / bdud dang srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs
351a5(rnying rgyud): pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing / dul bar gyur te/ rang rang gi dbang phrogs nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu
351a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus so// de'i tshe na byang chub kyi 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang / 'grog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de yang dri ma med pa'i byang chub
351a7(rnying rgyud): sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems thob ste 'gro ba'i don byed par gyur to// gzhan yang sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te/ 
351a8(rnying rgyud): las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi stan pa 'di la rab tu dad do// des na 'dus pa'i 'khor chags rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag te gsol ba btab
351b1(rnying rgyud): ga a ma'o e ma ya mtshan che// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// 'od zer 'phro 'dus ya mtshan che// byang chub char sprin ya mtshan che// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// sprul pa 'byung ba
351b2(rnying rgyud): ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// dgon gdungs rtsings pa ya mtshan che// 'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor chags
351b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can du byin rlabs mdzod/ bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod ces gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi/ 
351b4(rnying rgyud): bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya da ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byed pa po rdo
351b5(rnying rgyud): rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa ma dzad do// de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po des pa skul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mau kun tu
351b6(rnying rgyud): bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi bstan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar bteb nas lce pad+mo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang
351b7(rnying rgyud): phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa// gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongasu gsol// 'dus pa'i 'khor chog
351b8(rnying rgyud): mang po dgongasu gsol// gsang ba'i mdzod ye shes klog gi 'khor lo 'di chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos
352a1(rnying rgyud): byed pa po kun tu bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram
352a2(rnying rgyud): gcig lag tu bzhag ste/ las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun tu bzang por gtags te las kyi dbang thob par gyur to// chos kyi 'khor lo pad ma
352a3(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma brgyas pa lha stangasu bzhag ste/ smra ba'i sang ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskul te chos smra ba'i dbang po thob bo// de nas smra ba'i sang gi byed pa po rdo rje kun tu
352a4(rnying rgyud): bzang po de btsun mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs dpa can du gyur to// de nas smra ba'i seng ge kun tu bzang po des 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams snod du rung bar
352a5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlab pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo dang chos kyi 'kho ra lo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du bskor te tshe' phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/ zhing khams mtha'
352a6(rnying rgyud): dag kyang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ yan man dang snrel gzhi'i zhing khams mtha' dag kyang ling long phyed par gyur to// 
352a7(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan mas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gnas lngar rig par byas so// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya gu h+ya sa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya/ rdo rje 'du bar 'dus pa yi// 'dus pa chen
352a8(rnying rgyud): po'i rig dzin rnams// gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnom// bskal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das na brlag par 'gyur zhes bsgo bas 'dus pa'i
352b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gi sems rangs par byas te dam tshig thob nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod rnam par 'khod do// de nas byed pa po kun tu bzang po las kyi bka' ba des
352b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po lo gtsug gi bdud phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba mchod pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod de gsol/ 
352b3(rnying rgyud): ba btab po// 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras// ya mtshan chen po stong par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de// smra brjod yul las rab 'ang
352b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // ngag gi lam nas rab brjod cing // dpes mtshon tshig dgri lde mig gis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mo dzod// a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas
352b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab par ma khyen nas brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom sa par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// 
352b6(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun tu bzang po de la lugasu btud de brkyang phyag btsal nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas gsol ba
352b7(rnying rgyud): btab pa/ smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po khyod la bdag cag zhu bar spobs na gsang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol// smra ba'i seng ge kun tu bzang pos bka' sprul pa/ 
352b8(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa bdag la zhus shig/ bdag gis gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po
353a1(rnying rgyud): dang kun tu bzang po khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje bcan/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi phung/ chos thams cad kyi mdzod lags na/ 
353a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bdag cag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis ston par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du
353a3(rnying rgyud): gsol// smra ba'i sang+ge legs par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ oM AHhUM A la la ho// rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung // mi gsung ba nyid rgya cher
353a4(rnying rgyud): bshad// bshad du med pa'i don de ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi/ sa ma bshad de// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnam dpar brjod pa'i mi mdzad de// bka' mi sprul par dgongs pa'o// 
353a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ de bas na gsang ba do na dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bsam las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba legs pa ma yin
353a6(rnying rgyud): te/ tshig tu smos pa'i dus nyid gol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bshad de/ da ltar ston pa nyid kyang don de nyid dgongs nas ma gsungs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor chogs
353a7(rnying rgyud): rnams de bas na ma skyes pa'i snying po byang chub sems tshig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor pa rnams tshig gi 'brang ba'i phyir don rtogs/ 
353a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i bkri ba'i phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi tshig gi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsungs pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge de ltar na bdag cag dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor
353b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis don du rdo rje tshig gi lam du brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de smra ba'i seng ge las kyi bka' ba khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs shig/ smra ba'i seng+ge dbang
353b2(rnying rgyud): bas na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus shig dang / de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas
353b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la lan stong du skor ba byas te/ rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas 'di skad gsol ba btab po// e ma ho ston pa'i
353b4(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar khyod// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// tshig tu brjod pa ma la gus na'ang // mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa// don la
353b5(rnying rgyud): rtsing la tshig la zhing// tshig gi bsams pa rangs bya'i phyir// / snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon tshig gi lnga mig gis// gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsol zhes gsol
353b6(rnying rgyud): ba btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng ges gsol ba btab pa yang mkhyen/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshegs rnams kyis sems kyi rtog pa yang mkhyen nas
353b7(rnying rgyud): tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugasu chud nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum phyung ste/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra chen
353b8(rnying rgyud): po rab tu bsgrag so// oM AHhUM swA hA/ bo d+hi tsid ta gu ya sa ma ya/ 'di ni gsung ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// rab tu bsngags te brgyal bar 'gyur// 'khor tshogs
354a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan ma smos ci dgos// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig gang tshig gis brjod du rung ba thams cad ni kun
354a2(rnying rgyud): rdzob gi bden pa'o// ji srid brjod du rung ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o// gang tshig dang yi ge las 'ad pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// gang tshig dang yi ges
354a3(rnying rgyud): brjod du rung ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o// sngags kyi lta ba dang spyod pa yang de nyid yin te// gang don dam pa'i bden pa dang // chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi lta ba yin par shes pa
