354a4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de nyid rgyu'i tshul du gnas pa las 'bras bu'i tshul du kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang // gzugs kyi skur snang ste/ ji ltar spyad pa dang spyad du rung ba thams cad ni spyod par
354a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyis blta'o// de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed/ pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos a la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag
354a6(rnying rgyud): po la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags/ lta ba dang spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/ spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo/ 
354a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa ni gang lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng ge leg so// de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba ni log so// smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs
354a8(rnying rgyud): pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de bden pa gnyis
354b1(rnying rgyud): su yang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// lta ba dang spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni// rnal 'byor pa sa thob pa dang / sa la bsnyen pa rnams te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnal 'byor blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chud pa rnams
354b2(rnying rgyud): la ni// bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chud pa dang / kun rdzob du mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya ma'i tshul du yang med pa ma yin te/ mtshan ma
354b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rnal 'byor dang mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pa che
354b4(rnying rgyud): chung gis 'grub pa yin no// sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal la byor don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' shig la blo gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log pa'i kun
354b5(rnying rgyud): rdzob 'ba' zhig la rtog gi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lnga 'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo
354b6(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad shes par bya'o// yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don
354b7(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grag so// smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang
354b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin gang lags/ dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngag kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad
355a1(rnying rgyud): / kyis nyon cig / ngas yid tshim par bya'o// smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so// bcu
355a2(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang / gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang / gsad
355a3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang / gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo// smra ba'i seng ge de dag gi dper
355a4(rnying rgyud): brjod pa yang rnam pa bcu ste/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi la ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang /  breg cha dang / chu zla dang / chu'i chu bur dang / mig 'khrul dang
355a5(rnying rgyud): mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo // smra ba'i sang+ge/ de yang ji lta zhe na/ sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / sman dang sbyor bsngags kyi sbyor ba
355a6(rnying rgyud): las/ dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu bo'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang / yig 'bru dang rdzas
355a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sbyor ba las rtags dgra snang yang de la rang bzhin med do// smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu ba la chur mthong yang de
355a8(rnying rgyud): la chu'i rang bzhin med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang tha snyad btags pa yang ming nyid dmigasu ga la yod// rmi lam zhes bya
355b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigasu med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ji ltar spyad na yang spyad pa'i
355b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa kun dang bra'o// gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu'am me long ngam 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugasu snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do// de bzhin du
355b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang g.yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo// dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na
355b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang / gsang sngags gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la/ de
355b5(rnying rgyud): yang ther zug ma yin no// brag cha zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bla ga cha ngos la ji skad skyen pa skad brag cha la yang de ba zhin du 'byung ngo // 'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du
355b6(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra yang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o// chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do// de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil
355b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la yang bzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do// chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting
355b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyi rnam pa yang gcig tu mchad do// mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma mog nad can gyis bar snang la bltas na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do// de
356a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba yang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongasu mi blta'o// mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang
356a2(rnying rgyud): dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na// dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste// de la dbyibs med do// de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul ci ro yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos
356a3(rnying rgyud): por ma grub pa'o// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na gsong sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag par kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten
356a4(rnying rgyud): nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor da lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i
356a5(rnying rgyud): sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsong ba
356a6(rnying rgyud): mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du skor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun tu rab tu mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi
356a7(rnying rgyud): lugs su byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// a ma'o bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang / a ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don// e ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ e ma'o ye shes
356a8(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i glog/ e ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po/ e ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog/ e ma 'o rnam dag dpal khyod la/ a ma'o bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// byang chub sems 'di ji ltar
356b1(rnying rgyud): skyed// dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar lags// phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ci// bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi ji ltar lags/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam grangs ci// sngags kyi sdom pa ji ltar bsrung // 
356b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad// dregs pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar gdul// rnam bzhi'i las ni ji ltar bgyi// brnag pa'i nan tu ra ji ltar bgyi// rnal 'byor rnams la brtse ba dang // bdag
356b3(rnying rgyud): cag rnams la sman slad du// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol/ a la la ho zhes gsol pa las// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa thugasu chud
356b4(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// smra ba'i seng ge gsang sdug das mdo'i don rnams phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la daphan gdags pa dang / dad pa can gyi 'gro ba rnams yid ches
356b5(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir nga la zhu ba lag so// smra ba'i seng ge legs so// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas sngar 'dasapa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa rnams
356b6(rnying rgyud): kyis gsungs pa dang / klad kyis byon pa rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi don thog mar dge ba/ bar du dag ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ rgyud kyi 'brel ba/ don gyi bkod pa/ rtags
356b7(rnying rgyud): kyi rol pa/ ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor los rnam par bsgyings pa gzhung chen po 'di ngas bshad par bya yis// skal ba dang ldan pa rnams gsang sngags kyi don zab mo ni thos par
356b8(rnying rgyud): dka' na thos nas de'i don la gnas par dka' ste phal gyi thun mong du ma gyur pa'o// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las sngags kyi mdo
357a1(rnying rgyud): / bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de snying po byang chub la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
357a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor chags la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams chos thams cad ni byang chub sems su 'dus shing byang chub kyi sem
357a3(rnying rgyud): snang bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni lus dang ngag dang semasu 'dus la/ lus dang ngag dang sems nyid chos thams cad kyi rnam par snang ngo // 'dus pa'i 'khor/ 
357a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams kyis gsol po/ lus dang ngag dang sam/ ras bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ ga sang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' sprul pa/ rigs kyi tha
357a5(rnying rgyud): rnams lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan ni sems/ kyang lus dang ngag gi rnam pa lta bu/ ngag kyang lus dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu/ lus kyang tshig tu brjod pa dang
357a6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rnam pa lta bur rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig/ 'on kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des stong pa
357a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// e ma'o dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang
357a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pos// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes gsung so// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par
357b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung ba'i thugs// chos kun skye ba
357b2(rnying rgyud): med pa las// skye ba 'di ni rab grags pa// skye dang mi skye gnyis med pa// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas yang me long lta bu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
357b3(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun 'gag pa med pa las// 'gag pa 'di ni
357b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsgrags// 'gagau dang mi 'gag med pa ste// byad chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas ya dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
357b5(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gau sung so// a ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun gnas pa med pa
357b6(rnying rgyud): las/ gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste/ byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas yang chos thams cad so so kun tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i
357b7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung sau// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun dmigs pa med pa las/ 
357b8(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu sgrags// dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba la nan tan du grub pa zhes bya ba'i
358a1(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun spro bsdu med
358a2(rnying rgyud): pa las// spros dang bsdus par rab tu grags// spros bsngos yod dang med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsung so// de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos a la la
358a3(rnying rgyud): ho zhes sgra phyung ste// byang chub sems la bstod pa/ e me bde chen kun tu bzang // e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems// e ma'o dag pa dri ma med// e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o/ 
358a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid dbyer maud chos// e ma'o so sor rang rig sem ngas/ e ma'o byang chub lhun gyis grub/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
358a5(rnying rgyud): khyad par du gyur pa yang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi semos thugasu chud pa'o// bdag cag rig 'a dzin gyi tshogasu gyur pa rnams kyang byang chub sems la
358a6(rnying rgyud): smon par 'tshal// 'jug par 'tshal// ldang bar 'tshalo// gnas par 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi sems g.yos par bgyi/ reg par bgyi/ nye bar bgyi/ nyimasu myong bar bgyi
358a7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal na bdag cag de 'dra ba'i bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa dgongs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las
358a8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas snying rje byang chub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyis su med par mngon par 'du
358b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad pas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis thams cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no// de nas yang 'di gsung so// e
358b2(rnying rgyud): ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos// sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang / ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med// snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o// e ma'o srod gsum ya nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin
358b3(rnying rgyud): la/ bdag tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs kyis// yun rings dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams// mi sdug bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung // log rtog nor pa'i dbang gis
358b4(rnying rgyud): kun brtags kyang // rang bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsa ma med// e ma'o yun rings dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams// ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rmongs// 
358b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams// log/ rtog nyid la dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul 'a/ khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde
358b6(rnying rgyud): ldan gnas su gsal// phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub snying por gnas// phyi nang snod bcud yab yum ngang du gsal zhes gsungs pas
358b7(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad byang chub sems su gnas so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa'i glogau gi 'khor lo'i mdo las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
358b8(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung bar bzhed nas btsun mo dang gnyis su med par 'du mdzad do// 
359a1(rnying rgyud): / mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mdo 'di gsung so// 'dus pa'i
359a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ gsang sngags byin rlabs bsam yas la// dkyil 'khor bsam yis brjod mi lang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor
359a3(rnying rgyud): dang // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor te// gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// shes ched du glang ngo // de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po
359a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ca ga rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong lag so// de yang 'di skad ces gsol ba
359a5(rnying rgyud): btab bo// a ma'o gsang mchog bde ba che// ye nas lhun/ grub dag pa'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung / nas gtso// rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kun ye nas
359a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// rang bzhin lhun grub zab mo'i don// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du ga sol// a la la ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
359a7(rnying rgyud): gi bdag po des gsol ba btab pa'i don thugs su chud nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas yang
359a8(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor spros pa dang bral ba 'di gsung so// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ bla na med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i
359b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes gang de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin zhes gsung so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs 'di
359b2(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni spyir bsdus pa'o// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// phung po lnga don sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum// khams
359b3(rnying rgyud): dang skye mched mang po kun// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// des na srid gsum dkyil 'khor che zhes gsung so// de la phung po lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa
359b4(rnying rgyud): yang // srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// rgyu dang 'a dbras bu'i gzugs rnams kun// chos kyi dbyings/ las byung bas na// dbyer mod don gyi gti mug pas/ rnam
359b5(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// bde sdug tshor ba'i phung po kun// ma nyam nyid dbyings la snang bas na// nga rgyal chen po'i rang
359b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin pas// myong ba rin chen 'byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// yul dang shes pa phra rabs kyi// byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun// ma 'dres dbyings la snang
359b7(rnying rgyud): bas na// shes rab rlabs kyi 'dod chags pas// snang ba mtha' yas rang bzhin no// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dge dang mi dag gnyis ga ma ni// sems las byung dang
359b8(rnying rgyud): ma byung ba'i// 'du byed phung po thams cad kun/ spro bas dbyings las byung bas na// rnam par grol ba'i phrag dog pas// don yid grub pa'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can
360a1(rnying rgyud): / thams cad kyi// rnam smin rang sems rnam rig pa'i// shes brgyad rnam shes phung po kun// rig pa'i dbyings la shar bas na// zhe sdang chen po'i ye shes pas// rdo rje sems
360a2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni chen po lnga dbyings phyug lnga rang bzhin du gsung so// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// gsal stong mi sgrib go 'byed pa'i// snang stong na mkha'i
360a3(rnying rgyud): khams rnams kun// stong nyid dbyangs la sha ra bas na// thams cad gnas pa'i glog yin pas// bde gshegs dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// sra brtan
360a4(rnying rgyud): skyed skrun rten rnams kun// sa yi khams su grags pa rnam/ sa/ mi 'gyur dbyings la shar bas na// thams cad skyed dpa'i rten yin pas// rdo rje dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin// 
360a5(rnying rgyud): snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// gyes sdud gsher ba 'i mtshan nyid kun// chu yi khamasu grags pa ste/ kun sdu da dbyings su shar bas no// yon tan tshogs chen kun
360a6(rnying rgyud): sdud pas// rin chen dbyings phyug rang bzhin yani// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// gsal gro'i ngo bo thams cad kun// me yi khamasu grags pa rnams// snang gsal dbyings la
360a7(rnying rgyud): shar bas na// gsal dro sreg pa'i rang bzhin pas// pad+ma'i dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// yang g.yo 'degs bsod thams cad kun// rlung gi khams
360a8(rnying rgyud): su grags pa ste// bskyod chen dbyings la shar bran// thogs medo shugs bskyod rang bzhin pas// las kyi dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rnam par shes pa bzhi
360b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs la gcod pa kun// mig gi rnam shes zhes su grags// mthong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i
360b2(rnying rgyud): phyir/ sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sgra rnams kun la gcod pa kun// rna ba'i rnam shes zhes su grags// thos pa'i ye shes yin pas na// lag
360b3(rnying rgyud): na rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dri rnams kun la gcod pa kun// sna'i rnam shes zhes su grags// tshor ba'i ye shes yin pas na// na mkha'i snying po'i
360b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// ro rnams kun la gcod pa kun// lce yi rnam shes zhes/ su grags// myong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// spyan ras
360b5(rnying rgyud): gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la yul bzhi byang chub chen mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan
360b6(rnying rgyud): ma kun// gzugs kyi skye mched nyid du grags// mthong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas// gzugs mdzes lA s+ye'i rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// zin dang ma zin gnyi ga las// 
360b7(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i sgra yi khamasu grags// thos par bya ba'i yul yin pas/ ni ra ti ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// lhan cig skyes dang sbyar dang gyur// zhim dang nga dang de bzhin
360b8(rnying rgyud): gzhan// dri yi khams dang skye mched de// bsnam par bya ba'i yul yin pas// ma le nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// kha mang raM las sogs ro rnams kun// ro yi skye
361a1(rnying rgyud): / mched nyid du grags// myong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas/ gir ti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du
361a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mthong byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// mig gi khams zhes bya bar grags// mthong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ byams pa mai tri rang bzhin yin/ 
361a3(rnying rgyud): srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// thos par byed pa'i bdag nyid de// rna ba'i khams zhes bya bar grags// thos pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir// sgrib pa kun sel rang bzhin yin// srid gsum
361a4(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi// snom byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// sna'i khams zhes bya bar grags/ tshor bar bya ba bya/ dad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// srid
361a5(rnying rgyud): gsum sems can thams cad kyi// myong byed dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ lce'i khams zhes bya bar grags/ myong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyi// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin zhes
361a6(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la dus bzhi'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu 'bras kun tu rnam par spyad// sngon 'das dus su rnam par grags// sngon 'ang/ 
361a7(rnying rgyud): dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin// spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin no// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu spyang 'bras bu ma spyad kun/ da ltar dbyar gyi rang bzhin sen// me tog nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// snang
361a8(rnying rgyud): bdud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ rgyu 'bras yongs kyis ma spyad pa/ ma 'ongs dus su rnam par grags/ 'ong marag ston rang bzhin ni/ A lo ki yi rang bzhin yin/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ rgyu
361b1(rnying rgyud): 'bras nges par mtshogs pa/ 'byung bar ma nges dus shes grags// ma 'ongs kun gyi rang bzhin ni// gan d+he'i rang bzhin yin par nges shes gsung so// de la 'di ni lus kyi dbang po dang // rnam
361b2(rnying rgyud): par shes pa dang // yang de'i yul dang de las byung ba'i byang chub sems khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// reg byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// lus
361b3(rnying rgyud): kyi khams shes bya bar grags// reg par byed pa med pas na// gshin rje 'joms pa'i rang bzhin no// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// reg bya kun la gcod pa kun// lus kyi rnam shes
361b4(rnying rgyud): zhes su grags// reg pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// rnam pa dar rgyal ba'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems ca na thams cad kyi// byung dang 'byung 'gyur reg bya rnams// reg
361b5(rnying rgyud): bya'i skye mched nyid du grags// reg par bya ba'i yul yin pa sa// rta mchog dpal gyi rang bzhin no// srid gsum sem sa can thams cad kyi/ tshogs drug 'gag pa de ma thag/ go
361b6(rnying rgyud): 'byed gsal ba'i bdag nyid de// yid kyi khams zhes bya bar grags// nges gcod bya ba byed pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa bzhi'i
361b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du gsungs pa// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// 'jig dang skad cig mi rtag pa// rtag par ma yin zhes su grags// sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir// lcags kyu ma yi rang bzhin yin// 
361b8(rnying rgyud): snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyis// kun rtog gzhan dbang med min pa// chad par ma yin zhes su grags/ rmi lam lta bur sems snang phyir// zhags pa ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud
362a1(rnying rgyud): / 'gro ba thams cad kyi// gzung 'dzin dngos por ma grub pa// mtshan mar ma yin zhes su grags// smig rgyu lta bur sems snang phyir// lcags sgrog ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod
362a2(rnying rgyud): bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// skyes bu med par ma grub pa// bdag tu ma yin zhes su grags// sgra brnyan lta bu'i sems snang phyir// dril bu mo yi rang bzhin yin zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni
362a3(rnying rgyud): yid dang chos gtso gzungs gnyis kyi rang bzhin du bstan te// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// chos rnams kun la nges gcod pa'i// yid kyi rnam shes zhes su grags// rtog
362a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhi na yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kun// chos kyi skyed byed yin par
362a5(rnying rgyud): grags/ rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pas// kun tu ba/ zang po'i rang bzhin yin// de las sog te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i
362a6(rnying rgyud): khams kyi mtha' klas pa// ji snyed rnam grangs yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag brgya'i rang bzhin pas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi// rnam grangs yin par rgyal bas gsungs sha
362a7(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod pa gsung so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos des rang bzhin kun rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// kun rdzob mtshan ma'i gnas
362a8(rnying rgyud): chen kyang // 'og min bla min gnas mchog gam// lcang lo can nam bde ba can// pad ma can la sogs pa yi// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor de// mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor ngo la snang / 
362b1(rnying rgyud): de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ mkha' 'am yid kyi namakha' la// 'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhun gyis grub// de steng rin chen sna bzhi la// lhun gyis grub pa tshad dpag med// de la brten pa'i sa
362b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi ni// rin chen sna tshogs btsal du bkram// gnan nem bteg 'phar mdzes pa'i gzhi// de la pho brang gzhal med khang // gru bzhi lam pa mdzes par snang // rin chen sna bzhi'i rgyu
362b3(rnying rgyud): las grub// glo 'bur bzhi yang mkhar thabs tshul// bum pa'i rtse mo chos kyi tog/ rma bya'i mdongs dang ldan pa'o// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dbus
362b4(rnying rgyud): na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs darten ldan// gru chad par 'khyams mdzes par ldan// ngan chen 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs// sems can pad+ma nyi/ 
362b5(rnying rgyud): zla dang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gdun mchog ldan// rin chen khri rkang rnam rten ldan// pho brang de yi gdan mchog kyang / nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza'i
362b6(rnying rgyud): gdugs// dar dang bar mu tig phreng / dril bu dang ni rnga yab sogs/ rol mo'i chu byad sna chags brgyan/ 'jig rten lha tshogs mdzes pa dang // de la sogs te rgyan rnams kyang // bsam gyis mi
362b7(rnying rgyud): khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gzhal yas de yi sgo bzhin// glang chen rnams kyi mdzes par byas// rta babs rnams kyi tshong srong dang // gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag / dkon mchog gsum gyi
362b8(rnying rgyud): mtshan yang sgrogs// sgo drung de dag re re ne/ ta la'i skye shing cong tsong 'khril/ dri dang gzugs dang 'od du ldan// ta la'i skyed shing de dag la// khu byug la sogs bkra shis pa'i// bya rnams/ 
363a1(rnying rgyud): / snyan pa skad kyang 'byin// sgo drung de dag re re na// khrus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs pa/ blo mchog yan lag ldan pa'i chu// grangs med de dag re re na// lha dang lha mo bsam mi khyab// phyi
363a2(rnying rgyud): rol khor khor yug na// rtses 'chags sa brjod mi lang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub// lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// rgyu las grub par
363a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs// pho brang de na gnas pa yi// ye shes lha tshogs mang po rnams// gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste// dbus kyi pho brang snying po la// rnam par snang mdzad snying po che// 'dzam+bu na
363a4(rnying rgyud): ta'i gser 'od 'dra// rang rtags lag 'khor lo bsnams // dpa' bo de'i spyan snga na// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang // dung dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra// rang rtags lag na rdo rje
363a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te// bai DUr+ya'i kha da/ ga 'dra// rang rtags rin chen 'bru brgyad 'dzin// rgyal ba snang ba mtha' yas gtso// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // 
363a6(rnying rgyud): rang rtags pad+ma dmar po 'dzin// g.yon du don yid grub pa ste// in tA ni la ljang ku'i mdog/ rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin// kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te// thor tshugs rigs lnga dbul
363a7(rnying rgyud): brgyan// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs// do shal dpung brgyan sa mo do// phyag gdub snyan chas kun la mdzes// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// kun
363a8(rnying rgyud): tu bzang dang lo can// mA ma gos dkar sgron ma rnams// g.yas pas thabs kyis gcol ma byung // g.yon pas rang rtags dril bu 'dzin// sku mdog cha lugs yab dang 'dra/ 'khor lo
363b1(rnying rgyud): rtsibs la lhun gyis grag/ spyan nga'i blo bur mdzes pa la/ lag na rdo rje sngo skya'i mdog rang rtags rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// g.yas nas yi snying po ste/ ljang sngon rin chen myug gu 'dzin/ rgyub tu
363b2(rnying rgyud): na mkha'i snying po ste// mthing ka rang rtags ral gri 'dzin// g.yon du mdzes pa'i glo 'bur la// spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar skya ste// rang rtags pad+ma dkar po 'dzin// thor tshugs ye shes
363b3(rnying rgyud): sems pas brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs// rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// de dag gi ni g.yon rol no// gar dang sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs// g.yas pas thabs
363b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng / dbang 'dzin cing cha lugs gzhan// gtso bo nyid kyang 'ja na pa yin// mdzes pa'i gru tshon rnams la ni// byams pa me
363b5(rnying rgyud): tri dkar ba ste// mdzes pa'i glu yis 'gu de bsnams// shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la'o// sgrib pa rnam sel mthing ka ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste/ lho nub
363b6(rnying rgyud): mtshams mdzes par gnas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar skya'i mdog/ rang rtags ut+pal mthing ka 'dzin// nub byang mtsham su mdzes par gnas// kun tu bzang po ljang ser mdog/ 
363b7(rnying rgyud): rang rtags rin chen snye ma 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi gru la gnas// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// spos dang me tog gdug pa dri// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtsel 'khyud// g.yon par rang
363b8(rnying rgyud): rtags 'dzin pa'o// cha lugs thams cad snga ma bzhin// sgo khyud rnams la 'joms pa ni// gshin rje gshad po mthing nag 'bar// nir mgog dengs pa lag mtshan thogs// shar gyi sgor
364a1(rnying rgyud): ni rnam par gnas// rnam par rgyal ba sar nag 'bar// rdo rjes gnod pa lho sgor ro// rta 'grin dmar nag 'bar ba ste// thod sbrul thogs pa nub sgor gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
364a2(rnying rgyud): ljang nag 'bar// rgya gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor// stang thabs tshul du rab tu gnas// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta// ma dpung 'bar
364a3(rnying rgyud): bi'i klong du 'khyil/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra chen sgrogs// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// gshed mo dang ni rgyal ma dang // rta mgrin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams// lag mtshan lcags kyu zhags pa dang // 
364a4(rnying rgyud): sgrog dang dril bu thogs shing rngam/ cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra// sgo khyud dag tu lhun gyis grub// mdzes dpa'i bar 'khyams de nyid la// sbrul skra thugs pa chen mo
364a5(rnying rgyud): drug/ cis 'dul thabs kyi skur ston pas// cha lugs ma de/ sa 'dul bar ston// mdzes pa'i bar 'khams de nyid las// mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol la// byed pa po dang bya
364a6(rnying rgyud): ba me/ namakha'i yi ni mdog 'di la/ ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ brjod ming rjod du med pa yi// lha yi tshogs kyis gang bar gnas/ dkyil 'khor bsam/ 
364a7(rnying rgyud): yas lhun gyis grub// lha yi tshogs chen de dag gi/ thugs kar ya shes sems dpa' gnas// tshon gang 'od dang chas pa'o// ljang la rang rtags yi ge rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du
364a8(rnying rgyud): gsal/ de lha'i sku mchog re re la// tshul dgu dag dang ldan pa ste// mnyen dang lcug dang 'khril bag dang // ldem bag chags dang gzhon tshul can// gsal dang 'tsher dang lhun sdug dang // 
364b1(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid 'bar bar rab tu gnas// de ltar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas// spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul ba'i 'os shes gsungs pas chos thams cad/ 
364b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du ldan gyis grub bo// / de nas smra ba'i seng+ge la sogs pa'i 'dus po'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gi bsam pa rangs par gyur te/ a la la
364b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ho dmigs dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo chos kun lhun grub dpag mi lang // rang rig yon tan dpag med bsam
364b4(rnying rgyud): yas mang po de kun brjod mi lang / gsang sngags rgya mtsho/ de thugs rje bsam yas bsam khyab ji snyed dpag mi la dang // sprul pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gro ba chos ston zhing
364b5(rnying rgyud): khams khyab ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nasabacom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
364b6(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur du rung ba tsam du rtogs shig/ 
364b7(rnying rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar dbang bsgyur ba'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste// gsang sngags ya mtshan chen po 'di// ting 'dzin dkyil
364b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam yas kyang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de// bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // bskyed dang lhag pa'i ting 'dzin no// thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid bsgoms te/ 
365a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na// ting nge 'dzin kyang rnam gsum ste/ dang por de bzhin nyid kyi dang // de bzhin nyid la gnas bca'i
365a2(rnying rgyud): phyir// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gnyis pa kun snang na mkha' dang // snying rje yum gyis khyab pa'i phyir// mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam// 
365a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu bstan pa'i yig 'bru a// de las phra mo a 'phros 'dus// spros shing bsdus kyang 'phol 'grib med// de las bdag nyid chen por bsgom// ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa gsal/ 
365a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur bas/ rtsa ba'i dkyil/ 'khor rab tu rdzogs// de bzhin dbyings las shar/ bas na// bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste// mkha' dbyings
365a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pad mor ldan// de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ sked pa yang ni 'di lta ste// lha tshegs bdag gis sra sa su bskyed// de nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// de
365a6(rnying rgyud): yang ji ltar bskyed ce na// thog mar yab yum mkha' rnams gnyis// rdo rje pad mar byin gyis brlabs// gnyis med dgyes par 'khyilo ba las// b+ha gau'i dkyil du ling ga a// 'phro
365a7(rnying rgyud): 'du dbyingasu thim pa las// dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur// e yaM baM su bruM a nyid 'dus pas na mkhar gsal// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// baM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor
365a8(rnying rgyud): bskyed// su las gser gyi bris mar bskyed// bruM las ri rab gzhal med khang // dbyibs dang kha dog tshad dpag med// 'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// rang bzhin kun rdzob
365b1(rnying rgyud): ci 'dra ba'o// de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// brtan 'byung mkha'i yi ge a// 'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste// gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar// 
365b2(rnying rgyud): ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tshe dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ kA/ i I/ u U/ e AM/ o au// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// spro
365b3(rnying rgyud): bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las// thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar// de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba// Tha las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga// phung po lnga yi sa bon yin// tha las
365b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa 'byung ba lnga// bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par grag sa// ka las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga// rnam shes lnga yi sa bon yin// tsa las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga// mig
365b5(rnying rgyud): gi khams las sogs lnga// paM las sogs pa'i 'byung // pa lnga// gzugs sogs skye mched rnam lnga'i yin// / ya las sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi// dus bzhi yi son
365b6(rnying rgyud): rab tu grags// sha las sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/ phyin tso ma log dus bzhir bshad// i las sogs pa'i yig 'bru drug/ rdul snyed thub pa drug tu bshad// oM ni yid kyi kham
365b7(rnying rgyud): yin te/ kA ni yid kyi rnam shes khams// oM ni chos kyi khamasu bshad// so so'i thugs mtshan gsal ba las// sa bon rnams kyis mngon rdzogs bskyed// oM hUM badz+ra d+haM ka/ sA ra da na d+haM ka/ 
365b8(rnying rgyud): oM A ro l-ig hA pra dz+nyA d+h+ri ka/ muM d+hA tu shwa ri/ laM dwe sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ paM rA ga ra ti/ traM badz+ra ra ti/ kI ha rA dza yaM/ traM a gar b+ha a/ hIHha hUM pad+ma/ dzi ku ru pa na hI/ hUM lA s+ye/ tri mA l+ye/ hr-i gIr/ 
366a1(rnying rgyud): / ti/ a ni ra ti/ me d+ha ra na/ b+hI ma ni swa ra b+ha ya/ sA ra tsa ya/ mu shri A rA ga ya/ dza d+hU pa/ hUM puSh+pa/ baM dI pa ho gan d+he/ hU ya mAn ta krita/ hUM pad mAn ta krita/ hUM big+h+nAn+ta krita/ dza badz+ra kro d+hi hUM rad+ha/ 
366a2(rnying rgyud): kro d+hi baM pad+ma kro d+hi/ ho kar ma kro d+hi/ hUM badz+ri tsa ta/ a badz+ra sa ma ya/ mu ne kri/ mu ne sruM/ mu ne traM/ mu ni br-i/ mu ne kA/ mu ne ye/ de ltar so so'i snying po yis// mngon rdzogs skar ni gas la ba dang // ye shes lnga
366a3(rnying rgyud): yi dbang bskur te// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis brlab/ oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba
366a4(rnying rgyud): Ad ma ko hi/ oM ma hA pra ta be she dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA kr-i ta a nu rA ga dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba
366a5(rnying rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta tsi ta/ ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta the ga ta pUrdza/ badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ de las rdzogs pas sangs rgyas
366a6(rnying rgyud): rnams// sku mchog thugs mtshan bzhugs tshul dang // thor tshu ga la sogs cha lugs kun// rang bzhin kun rdzob dkyil 'kho ro 'di// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te// na mkha'i dbyings kyi
366a7(rnying rgyud): dbus su bsam/ yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun// yab yum mkha' las gsal bar bsgom// rnal 'byor
366a8(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur bar mthong ngo // 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes
366b1(rnying rgyud): rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos
366b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan lta bu rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka'
366b3(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam pa yin par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam
366b4(rnying rgyud): par snang zhing de las 'dus pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar bya yis nyon cig// de la 'di ni rgyud kyi rnam grang so// mi shes pa yi 'gro ba la// 
366b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon pas gsal ba'i don ston phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyi la 'khor bshad par bya// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ brtan zhing mdzes pa'i khang bu la// 'jam por zhal zhal byas nas ni/ 
366b6(rnying rgyud): kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris pa// de yang dngos grub rten du bshad// ras sam gro gam shing shun nam// ta la'i lo ma 'am dur khrod pas// zhing chen ras la sogs pa la// phyag rgya'i gzugasu
366b7(rnying rgyud): bris na yang // mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du bshad// rdo dang shel rdo la sogs dang // drang ngam pa so'i rgyud la ni// phyag rgya'am gzugasu 'bur btod nas// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten/ 
366b8(rnying rgyud): gser dngul zangs khang la sogs la// mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te// yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du bshad// klag sha byang chub shing bu 'am/ 
367a1(rnying rgyud): / rgyud shing mnyen la gzugs byas na// de rnams mtshan ma'i rten du bshad// sbyin zhing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams la// phyag rgya'i gzug su legs byas na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten yin no// 
367a2(rnying rgyud): sa stengs dbyibs legs mdzes pa la// rdul chen 'dus byas rgyu rnams kyis// brnyan mi'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang // de yang dngos grub rten du bshad// ri shig las kyi dang po las// sa stangs
367a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas par shig zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de// sa stengs pa yi gnas mchog kyang // skyon med bye brag shes pa las// spang blang gnyis shes par bya// ri bo
367a4(rnying rgyud): ri bran 'dus pa'i spyi// gangs ri brag dkar 'dabs rtsa ni/ sang can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// zhi ba'i las la de sh-i so// phug chen dgon pa chen po dang // brag chen rdo rje gtams
367a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil// gcan cin 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// mngon par gcod pa bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod gnas dang nga ma grog dang // sum mdo grog le bshung ba'i gnas// dur
367a6(rnying rgyud): gcan 'khra ba'i gnas bya'o// dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i gnas// nags tshal mang po gtibs pa dang // shin tu ba can dang 'jigs pa'i ngos// stag gzigs 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// 'dod pa
367a7(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i gnas yin no// mtshe gle chu mdo rgya mtsho'i 'dzings// chu yi gle ma btsan pa'i gnas// chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// las rnams kun la de shis so// ri bo bdun pa'i rtse rnams dang / 
367a8(rnying rgyud): tsan dan nags tshal me tog tshal// yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' yi// gnas su dkyil 'khor bri bar shis// gnam dang sa dang bar snang rnams// legs par brtags te dkyil 'khor bya// 
367b1(rnying rgyud): tshon cha lnga yi dbyibs dag tu// brtags na mngon pa'i namakha' shis// bar snang kha dog rnam lnga po// so sor ma 'dres gsal ba shis// sa gzhi shin tu ma nyams dang // ma grum mnyam por gnas
367b2(rnying rgyud): pa la/ tsha sgo sa len pa tsha med// de ltar brtags par las bya'o// spang bar bya ba'i gnas ngan no// gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rjes dang // srin po ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang // khro bo gnod sbyin lham rjes
367b3(rnying rgyud): dang // ma mo rngam pa'i sbar rjes dang // 'byung po rku ba'i 'dzil sa dang // gdug pa klu yi rgyun srang dang // skyon can rgyu ba'i lam srang dang // zhang blon gdug pa'i 'dug sa dang // kha nas ma tho yi 'dun
367b4(rnying rgyud): sa dang // gnyen 'brel ba yi gnas rnams ni// sbrul gdu dag pang du 'ongs pa ltar// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi ngas// lo yi bshugs te rab tu spang zhes gsung so// de la
367b5(rnying rgyud): 'di ni sa bslang ba'i las te// de nas bslang ba'i las rnam sa kyang // mngon dang mi mngon bdag po la// rtsod pa nye ba/ ra zhi bya'i phyir// ser sna spangs pa'i sems kyis ni// 
367b6(rnying rgyud): rin dang bden pas bsgom pa slang zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni sa gzung ba ste// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje dril bur ldan pa yis// rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu bskor// khros pas
367b7(rnying rgyud): hUM gi nga rgyal ba// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgeg/ dengs shig ces su bsgo nas kyang // seng ljang phur bu sor brgyad pa// khro bor byin brlabs gdab par bya zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni sa'i
367b8(rnying rgyud): lha mo spyan drang ba'o// de nas dbang gyur lha mo de// spyan drangs bskyed dang gnyis mamin par// mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// bdud btul mngon par
368a1(rnying rgyud): // rdzogs pa'i tshe/ ru tra tshogs kyis rgol ba la// dgyes pa'i las kyi don bgrangs te// bdag cags la bgrod pa'i tshe/ ru tA'i rgol ba byung ba na// spyan ldan de la dbang bcol
368a2(rnying rgyud): la zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rtags brtag pa'o// mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir/ ro lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya// dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'byung // gal te shes par ma gyur na// 
368a3(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pas spang bar bya// yang na sbyin sreg bya bar brtag ces gsung so// de la 'di ni rin chen gter sba ba'o// gnas te bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 
368a4(rnying rgyud): spos lnga 'phru lnga snying po lnga// ga bu'i nang du blugs nas su// sa dgazhi gter dang ldan par bya zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni das sbyang ba'o// sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga yi// khu ba sres nas
368a5(rnying rgyud): kun du ni// gru bzhi dbyingasu legs byas te// ba ko tsam du skya nga nul bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te/ 
368a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rang bzhin du// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang bar bya zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas lha rnams ji snyed pa// rang bzhin kun rdzob sprin
368a7(rnying rgyud): drangs te// spos kyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs bzhin// gdan sar byas te yon mchod la// lan gcig gshegs zhes sta gon bya// de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun// gsang dang snying kar bram
368a8(rnying rgyud): ba dang // ku sha brim dang srung skud gdags// so shing brim dang rmi ltas rtag/ mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang // rgyan du 'os pa'i rnam pa kun// tshang bar bsogs te byin gyis brlab// 'dus
368b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag kun// chos gtam rim pas dbugs phyung ste// gsang sngags che ba'i yon tan bshad// ces zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus so// 
368b2(rnying rgyud): rig byed dag gi yan lag las// dus rnams shes par bya ba ni/ bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang // 'byor ldan dus chod bzang ba ni// mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang // brtags na dngos grub
368b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'byung // zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// tshen dang thig skud rnam lnga la// sangs rgyas lnga yis byini brlabs te// sprul pa 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// spos sam
368b4(rnying rgyud): lce pog dkar po yi// dud pas rgyun mi bcad par bdug/ khros pas drag po'i sngags zlos shing // khro bo khro mo'i sta dngas kyis bskor// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam
368b5(rnying rgyud): bskul// thig skud sar pa gtsang ma 'am// gtsang ba'i lhung lo 'khril mdangs sam// rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs la// yum gyi grangs dang mthun par bsgrim// rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu
368b6(rnying rgyud): gu rgyud// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste// mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni// phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam
368b7(rnying rgyud): thig gdang// de nas sa thig gdab pa yang // 'dul ba'i dbang gi bye brag las// maN Dal tshad ma nges pa med// sor bzhi pa nas brtsam nas su// ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro// oM dz+nyA na tsakra su tra ma
368b8(rnying rgyud): ti kra ma hUM zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o// rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra dang // ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra bar/ brnyan ma yang ni de 'dra bri/ tshon sna 'bras dang 'byung khungs
369a1(rnying rgyud): / sam/ rdo khams rin chen dag la bya// sna gsum sna lnga dag dang ni// rin chen phung po'i tshon gyis ni// dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin// sgo la rnam lngas bskor bar bya/ phyag rgya gzhan la
369a2(rnying rgyud): brkyang bas so// dkar dmar ser ljang nag po rnams// go rims de yis bkod par bya// gtso bo gzugasu rdzogs par bri// 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya// phal pa dag la yig 'brus so zhes
369a3(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor gi brgyan dgod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan dang gdugs// pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / rdza rnga mu kun rdza
369a4(rnying rgyud): chen dang // darda ra dang mu tsa ra dang // dbyangs dang gar dang bzhad pa che// rol me'i yo byad ji snyed pas// dga' byed dkyil 'a 'khor dag la brgyan// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// gser dang
369a5(rnying rgyud): dngul las byas pa'o// rigs dang mthun pa'i gos kyis da kris// me tog 'bras bu brgyan pa la// bdud rtsi lnga yig nga byas pa// sman dang rin chen 'bru rnams lngas// gang ba brgyad
369a6(rnying rgyud): dam bcu drug gzhag/ dkyil 'khor bdag pos mngon bsngags pa'i// rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du// dbus nyid du ni gzhag par bya// yang na bum pa'i sbyin par ro// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba/ 
369a7(rnying rgyud): rab tu snam po dang // dbang po kun nas 'byung ba rnams// sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pas// gang ba'i ban da de bzhin gzhag/  rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram// de la sogs pa mtha' yas
369a8(rnying rgyud): mchog ci rigs rnams kyis mdzes par bya zhes gsung so// de la 'di dag ni 'phen sdud kyi las spyir bstan pa'o// de nas sngags pa mnyam bzhag ste/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar
369b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom// gsal pa gnyis med dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drangs dang / dang ba dang bzhugs dang brten pa dang / mi g.yod ma tshig zil gnon dang / phyag 'tshal mchod pa brjod pa dang
369b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsol po dang // dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya// des ni tshe 'di nyid la yang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta
369b3(rnying rgyud): smos ci dgos zhes gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / 
369b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog go bdag po de ro/ sa thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las mi 'ad dab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
369b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya dam tshig gi mtshan nyid rnams nyid kyi sku dang ga sung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gsang sngags rgya ma tsho chen po 'di// phyag brgya bas ma yas ji snyed pa// mdor
369b6(rnying rgyud): bsdus rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// dang por phyag rgya chen po ste// gnyis pa dam tshig rgya yin no// gsum pa chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya chen po sku yi rgya// rang bzhin chos sku
369b7(rnying rgyud): dngos med rgya// gzugs sku mtshan ma'i rgyu zhes bshad// gzugs sku rang bzhin kun rdzob dang // bsgom dang bskyed pa yin par bshad// gnyis pa'i rgyal gsum yod de// bsgom dang gzung dang bcing
369b8(rnying rgyud): ba'o// bsgom pa dam tshigs gsungs yin te// gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlab pa'o// gzung ba thugs mtshan nyid gzung ba'o// dam tshig lag rgya bcing bar bshad// yang na so so'i gtso gzung rnam/ 
370a1(rnying rgyud): / sbyor thabs phyag rgya nyid yin no// gsum pa'i rgyal gsum yod de// rang bzhin bsgom dang bzlas brjod do// rang bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya ni// chos kyi dbyingasu rgyal bas gsungs// bsgom
370a2(rnying rgyud): pa mtshan ma'i yig 'bru dag/ lha stong snying kha mkha' sogasu// mtshan ma'i rnam pa gsal ba'o// rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas pa yis// snying po tshig brjod bzlas pa'i rgya// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya la// rnam pa/ 
370a3(rnying rgyud): gsum du dpa' bos gsungs// bsgom dang 'phro 'du bcing ba'o// las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gang // bsgom pa sgom pa las kyi rgya// lta 'og mkha' 'am thugs kha nas// rnam bzhi las kyi 'phro 'du ni// 
370a4(rnying rgyud): 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya bca' dang stangs tshul rna/ mas// bcing ba las kyi phyag rgya bshad// lag brgya dam tshig phyag rgya rnams// rang gi sku ru rnam sgoms nas/ bcings
370a5(rnying rgyud): shing mkha' la rnam dkrol na// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bdag nyid phyag rgya cher bsgom pa// dbu
370a6(rnying rgyud): ni rnam par snang mdzad de// lag g.yas rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu// lag g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya// rkang pa g.yon pa snang mtha' yas// rkang g.yas las kyi sems dpa'i rgya// yan lag rigs
370a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor bas// bsgral bskod thams cad phyag rgya yin// sor mo rnams la bsgom bya ba// gung mo gnyis la oM dang laM// mdzub mo gnyis la hUM dang muM// dbang mo gnyis la swa dang maM// chung ngu
370a8(rnying rgyud): gnyis la oM dang paM// sbom po gnyis la haM dang traM// g.yas pa'i 'bru gdan nyi ma ste// g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM dang muM du rtse sbyar te// de bzhi ni hUM dang lam du sbyar// ha dang paM yang de
370b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin te/ aM dang taM du sbyar ba la// rgyab sbyar swa dang me bsgreng ba// 'di ni yab kyi spyi rgya yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las// oM dang mu sbyar hUM dang ni// lam sbyar swa dang paM du sbyar// aM dang maM sbyar haM
370b2(rnying rgyud): bsgreng / yum gyi spyi rgyu yin par bshad// rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bcangs// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// rin chen dril gsil chos la bstan/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rnam par
370b3(rnying rgyud): snang mdzad phyag rgya yin// rin chen khu tshur snying khar bcas// la bsgreng rtsal dril gsil 'bar// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// bde gshegs dbyings phyug
370b4(rnying rgyud): ma yi rgya// rdo rje bu tshur snying bar brtan// hUM bsgreng rtsel rdo rje 'ab ra/ rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i ma dngas dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje sems mi'i phyag rgya yin/ rin
370b5(rnying rgyud): chen khu tshur snying bar brtan// mu bsgreng rtsol dril gsil 'bar/ rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ 'dzum pa'i mang/ ngas dang bcas pa ni/ rdo rje dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// 
370b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khu chur snying bar brtan/ sa bsgreng rtsel rin chen 'bar/ ron chen chu chur snying khar na/ 'dzum pa'i mngangs dang bcas pan/ rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yim/ rin tshom bu chur rnying
370b7(rnying rgyud): khar brtan/ ma bsgreng rmel dril gsil 'bar// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khyi la// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ rin chen dbyings drug phyag rgya yin rdo rje khu chur snying khar brtan/ 
370b8(rnying rgyud): bsgreng tshul pad+mo' bar/ rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// snang ba mtha' yas phyag brgya yin/ rin chem bu chur snying bar brtan/ pa bsgreng rtsol
371a1(rnying rgyud): / dril gsil 'bar// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur snying khar brtan// haM bsgreng rtse la ral gri 'bar/ 
371a2(rnying rgyud): rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ rin chen khu tshur snying khar brtan// te bsgreng rtsel dril gsil 'bar// rdo rje thal mo
371a3(rnying rgyud): las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur thugs ka na// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ 
371a4(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen gar thabs bskor nas// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa'i tshul// gar gyi phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad/ 
371a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta ba ni// sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur/ bcangs pa ni// sku yi phyag kar 'dzin pa dang // 'dzum pI
371a6(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje ral gri thugs kha na// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// na mkha'i snying po'i
371a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yin// rdo rje rin chen rna rtag gzhag/ rin chen phreng ba gzung nas su// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// rdo rje pad+ma thugs kha nas// rin chen
371a8(rnying rgyud): dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta ba ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin// rin chen pi pang 'dzin pa la// rdo rje len par byas nas ni// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
371b1(rnying rgyud): kyis 'dud pa ni// dbyangs kyi phyag rgya yin par grags// rdo rje klu shing thugs kha na// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// byams pa me tri'i phyag rgya
371b2(rnying rgyud): yin// rin chen bdug spros thugs khar 'dzin// rdo rje las la rab tu 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis bdud pa ni// bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje po Ti thugs khar 'dzin/ 
371b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// sgrib pa kun sel phyag rgya yin// rdo rje rin chen rna rtag tu// me tog snod bcas 'dzin pa la// 'dzum pa'i
371b4(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// me tog phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje ut+pa la thugs kha na// rin chen dril gsil tshe das la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta ba ni// 'jam dpal
371b5(rnying rgyud): gyi ni phyag rgya yin// rin chen mar mo thugs kha nas/ rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// mar me'i phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad// rdo rje snyim
371b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kha na/ rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen dbyug pa thugs kan// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// rdo rje nyug
371b7(rnying rgyud): par byed pa ni// dri yi phyag rgya yin par bshad// nir mgo gdengs ka gshed po'i rgya// rdo rje gnon pa stobs po che// thong sbrul gnan pa rta yi rgya// rgya gram gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'dzub
371b8(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'khyud pa lcags kyu'i rgya// 'dzub gnyis rje spang zhags pa'i rgya// 'dzub gnyis 'khyud pa lu gu rgyud// bskyod par gyur pa 'bebs ma'o// pi bang len pa lha yi rgya/ mi yi sog par 'dzi
372a1(rnying rgyud): / 'dzin pa ste/ lha min phyag rgya go cha yin// chos kyi dkyil 'khor byol song rgya// zam tog ni yi dgas rgya// me chu gnyis ni dmyal ba'i rgya// yab kyi spyi rgya kun bzang gi'o// yum gyi
372a2(rnying rgyud): spyi rgya bzang mor bshad// yang na kun bzang yab yum gyi// rdo rje thal mo gnyis su bshad// bde gshegs rnams la rdzogs dkyil lo// sems dpa' rnams la sems dpa'i dkyil// 'joms
372a3(rnying rgyud): dang thub pa langs te bcing zhes gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
372a4(rnying rgyud): de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba ma cho ga gi bdag po he ru ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu lag
372a5(rnying rgyud): pa bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// gsang ba ma cho ga gi bdag pos bshad du gsol zhes gsol kha btab pa las// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi
372a6(rnying rgyud): bdag po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku khro bo chen por 'du mdzad/ 
372a7(rnying rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten na dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gdugs pa'i dbang du 'gro ba rnams gyur te/ khams gsum 'di na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab ze bar ston pa dang / 'jug
372a8(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bstan pa la gnas shing dkon mchog gsum la 'jug pa ni 'ga' yang med/ khros pas gtum po rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bsgribs pa
372b1(rnying rgyud): gtum zhing 'khrug dang // gzhan gyi srog dang sems 'phrog pa dang // mi dge ba bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig sha gcig gi za
372b2(rnying rgyud): dang / log pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos
372b3(rnying rgyud): rnam par gzigs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor klong rnam par 'phro ba 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka hA na da ha pa tsa/ bi shwa kro d+ha dzA ma
372b4(rnying rgyud): Na Ta la/ phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la/ 'di phyung ma thag tu khro po chen po'i mthus khams gsum 'di dag thams cadad g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur rab
372b5(rnying rgyud): tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'u ro// shig shig/ ra ba/ tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig/ gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu rab tu gtor gtor ro// 
372b6(rnying rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / na mkha' lding dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pas nyen pa de dag brgya byin la skyabasu song / brgya
372b7(rnying rgyud): bya ni yang 'jigs pas nyan te tshangs pa'i thad du phyin// tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug thad du song // khyab 'jug kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du song / dbang phyug chen po rang gi mthu yod yod
372b8(rnying rgyud): pa ston cing lha rnams ma skrag/ klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin dang / 'khor du gtogs pa rnams ma skrag shig/ nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang brdzi bar mi nus so zhes
373a1(rnying rgyud): spo bsring so//  brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyad 'jug rnams khyed kyang 'jig rten na mthu che ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas rang rang gi 'khor gdugs
373a2(rnying rgyud): de dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug rnams de ma thag tu rang rang gi mthu ci yod pa ston cing rdo rje'i skad dang gad mo drag po 'byin cing
373a3(rnying rgyud): rang rang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag ma dngang shig/ bdag cag gi mthu 'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so zhes spro sring ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i
373a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas yum rngam pa'i kri d+hi de'i rgyal po mngon par phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi ma dang das kyi rol pa'i dgyes pas thim par mdzad nas/ byang chub sems
373a5(rnying rgyud): kyi sprin las/ phaT phaT badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la ha la ha la zhe sa pas stong gsum khro bo tshol pas gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid ni dbu dgu phyag
373a6(rnying rgyud): bcwa brgyad zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyi rnam par snang ngo // de nas dgyes te hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad las 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ khrag
373a7(rnying rgyud): gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'i dkyil na kang rus gyi steng na rnam par gnas so// khro bo tshol ba de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bsgral te slar 'dus nas/ la la ni las kyi khrag
373a8(rnying rgyud): 'thung chen por gyur nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni ran chen khrag mthung du gyur te tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni pad+ma khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ ma hA
373b1(rnying rgyud): de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral khro bo de dag gis dregs pa can de dag gi nang grol kun drangs khrag 'thungs
373b2(rnying rgyud): rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas dgyes te oM ru lu ru lu dza dza zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po bcu gnyis dang brgyad kyi 'khor tshegs ma lus pa yud tsam cig gis dbang du 'dus par gyur pa ni/ 
373b3(rnying rgyud): dper na rdo khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i sku la rnam pa brgyad kyis 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas so// khrag 'thung bzhi la rnam pa lnga lngas 'khril ba'i
373b4(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa dang / dgyes te ha ha zhes brjo/ dad pas byang chub sems las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rku/ dan mo'i tshogs dang / lbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshegs
373b5(rnying rgyud): dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshegs dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'thon to// de nas yang dgyes te he he he zhes brjod pas/ byang chub sem
373b6(rnying rgyud): las seng gdong gi tshogs dang / stag gdong gi tshogs dang / wa gdong gi tshogs dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs dang / gzhad sdong gi tshogs dang / dur bya'i gdong gi tshogs dang / bya rog gdong gi tshogs
373b7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs rnams 'thon to// de nas yang dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas byang chub sems las rtag gdong gi tshogs dang / phag gdong gi tshogs dang / seng gdong gi tshogs dang / 
373b8(rnying rgyud): sbrul gdong gi tshogs mthon nas nyi shu brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par phaT ces smos so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
374a1(rnying rgyud): med pa rnams na dregs pa gang ji snyed yod pa thams cad tshul ji ltar 'dul ba dang / thabs cis 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thus 'dul bar gyur to// de nas
374a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs slar gsar gsos shig ces bka' stsal pas khro bo de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa
374a3(rnying rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hUM zhes pas bsdus te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so// de nas ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des phyag bcwa
374a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad bsnol te btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam chen por 'khyil to// de nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gnam nas rnam par
374a5(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mri ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri us+thi rmA badz+ra dzA mr-i ta hUM a/ de nas khro mo bdud rtsi chen mo de smin ma sbyar/ zhing shin tu rngam pa'i bgad bas ru lu ru lu khA he khA he zhes
374a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsir bsgrubs te gsol bas gdug pa can thams cad snga ma bzhin du rang rang gi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran nas dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya'i
374a7(rnying rgyud): phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgyar gnas shing yab khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad lhun gyis grub par mthong ngo // 'phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyang shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs rang rang gi
374a8(rnying rgyud): snyan dang lag char gnas pa mthong nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas zhum pa'i nga nas gsol ba btab gabadag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ rnga ma chen rgyal ba'i 'bangs su
374b1(rnying rgyud): mchi// 'bang su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying yang rul nas ni// bco bsreg gnas su 'bod sgrogs shog/ bdag cag rnams kyi ma dang sring // mchis brang dang ni bu mo rnams// 'bar
374b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhes su gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo bcad la// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes// bdag cag rnams kyi snying phyung la// dpal chen nyid kyi zhal du
374b3(rnying rgyud): gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi lpags shus la// dpa' bo chen po sku la gsol/ a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab ste/ la las ni rang gi lus gdun khrir phul/ la las ni rang gi 'gro bcad
374b4(rnying rgyud): nas 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhal bur phul// la las ni rang dgi snying phyung nas zhal du gsol/ la la ni rang gi lpagadas pa bshus te sku la g.yang gzhir gsol to// dbang
374b5(rnying rgyud): phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i sku la sbrul ltar 'khri/ la bas des dregs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/ bden pa mthong nas dam tshig dang ldan par
374b6(rnying rgyud): mthong bar gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma dang ldan te/ la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ma ring du 'phen/ la la ni ri rab glang
374b7(rnying rgyud): la skor/ la la ni nyi zla zhabs 'og gnon/ la la ni 'jig rten rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma ston cing a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to// de nas bcom ldan
374b8(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'jigs byed tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du// rag ta'i
375a1(rnying rgyud): / rba rlabs 'khrugs pa'i dkyil// keng rus ri rab 'bar ba'i steng // me 'bar sreg pa'i klong dkyil na// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // tshang dang rgya yongs ma chang ba/ phyi nang med
375a2(rnying rgyud): par gsal ba'i 'od// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhi pa/ gru chad par 'khyams bzhis brgyan pa// gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar bas mdzes/ khar 'khyams gnyis ni 'bar bar gsal// nyi zla sbrul dang / 
375a3(rnying rgyud): thod pas brgyan// khyu mchog dang ni ma he gzig / stag dang gtum thung dom dag gis// sder mos dregs pa brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung ba ni// gdan chen rnams kyang bzung ba'o// dbus
375a4(rnying rgyud): su 'jig byed chen po ni/ smug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugadas// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de/ spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bdun// zhabs brgyad thur du gtams pa'o// rngub pa'i
375a5(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshan skal par thogs// rdo rje gshog pa phyogs bcur/ gtams// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu bzhugs// bcu/ na mo rngam ba kro d+hi yang // cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po
375a6(rnying rgyud): ltar/ de yi phyogs kyi khro bo yang // khrag 'thung rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma las kyi he ru ka/ kun kyang dbu gsum phyag drug ste// zhabs bzhi dag tu rnam par bgrad// kro d+hi'i tshogs kyis rab tu 'khril/ 
375a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mtshan la// dkar mo la sogs ral pa can// rang stan lag char chas te gnas// phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas// seng gdong la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs// stan dang lag
375a8(rnying rgyud): cha de bzhin chas// sgo srungs gdong mo la sogs gnas// rang gi lag mtshan stan dang chas// 'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis pa la/ rdo rje srin po khro bo bcu/ hUM chen rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can// 
375b1(rnying rgyud): grwa shed ngom g.yon 'grin rgyal/ gzhan gyis mi thu bdud rtsi 'khyil khams gsum rnam rgyal spobs po che// de dag rnams dang gnyis med pa'i/ rdo rje srin mo khrel bcu/ rlung 'byin sems mo/ 
375b2(rnying rgyud): sder mo dang / dur khrod gtun dung gtum mo dang // mda' snyems sgra 'byin gsod ma dang / skul byed rnams kyis rab tu 'khril/ kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// nabs drug rdo rje brag ste/ 
375b3(rnying rgyud): ma 'jig rten skyong bas btud tshul lo// de dag rnams kyis bka' sdong na/ rdo rje 'phra men ga tu mobags na/ mcheg shog 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'khor/ spos dang bye ma bran mo dang // cing kyi las
375b4(rnying rgyud): po nya'i tshogs/ phyi rol mu ran dag la gnas/ zhes gsungs pas snang sring thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos gsung
375b5(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM bruM bi shA bi shud d+he dz+nyA na tsakra bruM/ oM oM oM oM/ babab pa badz+ra dz+wa dz+ra dzA dzA/ ma ma ma ma ma/ hA hA tra
375b6(rnying rgyud): bud d+ha/ bzla radam pad+ma kar+m+ma wI nI shrI shrI shI hi he he he swAru ru ru ru ru/ ka ka ka ka ka ts+tshad+hId+d+ha d+hUSh+T+r-i/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ oM mo mo oM oM bababab gadz+ra dz+radzAdz+dzarma/ dud d+ha/ badz+ra rung na/ padam/ 
375b7(rnying rgyud): kam/ kro kro kro kro kr-i d+h+r-i d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi/ shwa shwe shwa shwa shwa/ ra ri ri ra ri/ kha bab bab bab gadz+ra dz+wa dz+ra dzA dz+re dzA dz+wa pra/ go'u / tse'u ri/ bra ma ga/ be ta li/ pu ka si/ gas+phA rI/ sma shA ni/ tsaN Da li/ ha ha ha ha ha ha haH/ 
375b8(rnying rgyud): babab ba ba pa ba gadz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dzAdz+ra/ sing ha/ bya gri/ sri la/ sho na kri ta/ kang ka/ kha ga u lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ ka ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/ he he he hi hi he he he/ ba bi ba badz+ra dz+radzA dzA/ ar+yA te sa/ te / 
376a1(rnying rgyud): sa// ga smrag nasapad+hA sa shA byu / klu klu ng+gA rlu rgyu / m+b+ha y+YASh+Ta
376a2(rnying rgyud): ka.Ar+yA ma cal/ dz+wa la grIgs par ce// amr-i ta ku Na Na li/ trai lo ka bi dz+ra ka ma hA ba la/ hA hU~M hU~MhrIHhU~MhUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT laT phaT laT pag kro kro kro kr-i kr-i kre kro kro kri kr-id+hI
376a3(rnying rgyud): d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi/ kha ya be/ shaM ba ra ti/ le no ki tra ta hri/ stan pa ta/ mu ha la/ tsaN Da li/ ya ti/ sha ya ba ti/ bi yau ga ma ri Ni/ run d+he/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT b+h+yAM b+h+ya
376a4(rnying rgyud): b+h+yob+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo g+ho b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+hU b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yob+h+yo b+h+yo d+d+hon+d+ha b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo ru lu ru lu ru lu/ hU hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ zhes sospongs pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsu
376a5(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// // 'phags pa rgyu/ da kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam po glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i
376a6(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam pa'i rgyal po des stang stabs kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom pa zhug nas stang stabs 'di dag nyid kyi sku
376a7(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // chos kun mnyam pa'i ngang rtogs na/ bskul zhing gsigs pa thams cad kun/ phyag rgya yin par dpal pos bshad// rang gi lha yi ting 'dzin gyis// stang thabs
376a8(rnying rgyud): 'di la gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas nyid kyang skrag 'gyur na// dregs pa'i tshogs lta smos ci dgos// lag gnyis thal sbyar spyi bcug bzhag/ rkang gnyis mthil sprad rtse mo btsugs// mgo mtshan rdo rje
376b1(rnying rgyud): snying por bsgom// ce gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang / rtse dgu bcu gcig rdo rje bsgom/ sa stengs kun du 'chongs byas pa/ 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin// de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'tshong / 'jig
376b2(rnying rgyud): byed ma yi phyag rgya bshad// lag g.yas gung mo snying por bya// g.yon pa ban+d+ha ltar byas nas// dkrugs nas zhal du gsol ba ni// rdo rje khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa gcol 'khyud tshul du// 
376b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje kro d+hi kun gyi rgya// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// g.yon pa dung dmar rag ta 'thung // 'di ni rin chen khrag 'thung rgya// de nyid gung 'dzub srin lag gzhi bas// ral gri 'degs pa ltar byas
376b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ pad+ma khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin// de nyid g.yas pa/ tshur bcangs// mthe bo gung mdzub mthe'u chung rnams// so sor brkyang brgya gram tshul// las kyi khrag 'thung phyag brgyar
376b5(rnying rgyud): bshad// khrag 'thung g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul// kr-i d+hi g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul// stabasu mtsho bar dpa' bos bshad// g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas bsgru
376b6(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa 'dzin pa ltar byas pa// g.yas dang g.yon du lta zhing sbyar// go'u ri tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'i tshul du ni// 'bri tshugs mi 'gyur lta byed pa/ rkun mo'i tshogs kyi/ 
376b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yin// g.yas pas khu tshur bcangs pa ni// mthe mo mthe'u chung brkyang bar byas// g.yon pas 'dzin pa'i khro tshul lta// phra mo'i phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad// g.yas pa'i gung mo rtse mo brkyang // 
376b8(rnying rgyud): sor bzhi rtse bsdus rdo rje 'phyar// g.yon pa dku ru brten pa ni// 'bri tshugs lta ba be ta'i rgya// g.yon pas nyon mongs mtshan tshul la// g.yas pas rgyu 'dren za ba'i tshul// pu ka'i phyag brgyar
377a1(rnying rgyud): // bshad pa yin// g.yon pa dung khrag 'dzin pa la// g.yas pa 'khrug cing rngam tshul ston// gas ma ri yi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pas byis pa'i lus mnan nas// g.yas pas snying 'dren za
377a2(rnying rgyud): tshul du// sgrol tshul lta bas smra sha'i rgyu// g.yas pas mgo bcad phyar nas kyang // g.yon pas lus 'dzin stobs pa ltar// tsaN Da li yi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis brang la bsnol nas ni// kha na ro
377a3(rnying rgyud): thogs ral gsigs pa// seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya ya ni// lag gnyis thur du bsnol nas ni// zhing la 'bri tshugs mche ba bsnyer// stag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis zhing
377a4(rnying rgyud): khong kha phye nas// lce yis ldag par ltar byed na// wa gdong tshe gas kyi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas / 'bri tshugs lta ba sho na'i rgya// lag gnyis spu gre thogs
377a5(rnying rgyud): tshul du// g.yon pas rgyu ma bzang zhing za// bzhad sdong tsheg sa kyi phyag rgya yin// zhing chen phrag la bkal nas ni// keng rus thogs pa ltar byas pa// dur bya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya
377a6(rnying rgyud): yin// g.yon pa ban d+ha g.yas pa gri/ glo snying 'dren ltar byed pa/ khwa khA ma yi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur la// lcags kyu 'dzin pa hu lu'i rgya// 'dzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas// 
377a7(rnying rgyud): rta skad mcher ba ltar byas pa// rta gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// 'dzub gnyis rtse sbyar phag gdong gis// tha rgod rlog pa'i tshul bstan pa// phag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// 'dzub gnyis
377a8(rnying rgyud): lu gu rgyud du 'khyud// sang+ge'i tshul du ral gsigs pa// seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis rab tu bskyod bya zhing // phyogs bcur lta bar byed pa ni// sbrul gdong tshogs kyi phyag
377b1(rnying rgyud): rgya yin/ lag pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas shing // rkang pa 'jog tshul stabasu mchod// g.yas pa'i sdig 'dzub na mkhar 'phyar// g.yon pa ku ru brten pa ni// hUM ka ra yi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa
377b2(rnying rgyud): sder mor gdengs// g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgya// g.yas kyi sor mo dbyug par brkyang // g.yon pa gar thabs skor byed pa// dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa'i khu tshur na mkhar 'phyar// 
377b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon pas gru mo brten pa ni// g.yas pa'i gung 'dzub srin lag brkyang // mthe'u chung mthe bos gnan par bya// g.yon pa'ang de bzhin shugasu bya// mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis mthe'u
377b4(rnying rgyud): chung lu gu rgyud// lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa las// dpral ba da'i thad kar bzung ba ni// rta mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya yin/ nga lag gnyis khu tshur mdun du bcangs// zhags pa'i tshul du drangs
377b5(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bsnol// dril bu bsil tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil// la/ ga pa g.yas pa khu tshur phyar// rdeg pa'i stabasu byas pa ni// 
377b6(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur thur du brkyad // gnon pa'i stabasu bgrad pa ni// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// gyad kyi dor stobs tshul du gnas// stobasu 'tshong ba khro bo'i rgya/ srin
377b7(rnying rgyud): mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// rkang lag gar thabs bskor ba yin// yang na khro bo'i phyag rgya las// g.yas g.yon zlog pa yin par gsungs// ci bgyid bka' nyan phyag rgya ni// g.yas g.yon sor mo drag spags pa'o// 
377b8(rnying rgyud): zhes gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa grogs gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
378a1(rnying rgyud): / 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bsnyen bsgrub rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas kyang bsnyen bsgrub zab mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung
378a2(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bsam yas kyang // dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la// rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don gyi phyir// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhir bshad do// thog mA/ 
378a3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa yin par bshad// gnyis pa dag ni nye bsnyen pa// gsum pa bsgrub pa zhes su brjod// tha ma bsgrub chen po zhes bya// bye brag tu ni shes byas la// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// bsnyen
378a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub bye brag shes bya zhing // de la gnas pa rab tu gces// // de dag mi shes mi gnas pas// bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa / rimi 'gyur te// las rnams brtsams kyang don mod 'gyur// de
378a5(rnying rgyud): bas nan tan bskyed de bya// bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba/ byang chub sems ni shes par bya// nye bar bsnyen pa la gan sa pas// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por bsgom// de yang gsang
