378a6(rnying rgyud): sngags bdag po nyid// rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya ba// bsgrub pa zhesu rgyal bas gsungs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gsungs// gang yin rdo rje 'grub 'gyur ba/ 
378a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa chen po zhes su bya// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yang // dam pa'i don gyi sems yin te// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas// rang gi sems kyis shes bya ba// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yin par
378a8(rnying rgyud): gsungs// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ni// sngags kyi bdag po'i cha lugasu// ting 'dzin nan tan khugs par bsgom// thams cad lha'i rang bzhin la// bdag nyid lha yi mtshan nyid de// phyag rgya bzhi dang
378b1(rnying rgyud): rnams ldan par// shes pa nye bsnyen dam tshig yin// rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya ba'i// rten du bya ba shes rab ma/ mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i gzungs/ b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+mo ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi
378b2(rnying rgyud): pho brang ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba'i gnas/ slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul/ da ltar sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rten/ rnal 'byor ngol de ltar snang // ma rtogs pa la 'khor ba'i lam/ 
378b3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i rten// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya'o// chen po lngas bsdus thams cad kun// de nas yum du gnas mod kyi// mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bsgrub phyir rigs/ 
378b4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbye ba bya// smin ma'i sgyus ring lag sor pra// tshigs pa zla dam la sked skabs phyed// phra ba shad ud dpal ngad ldang zhing // so dkar sgra 'jam 'thon 'thil 'khril// mig kyang zar
378b5(rnying rgyud): ma'i me tog 'dra// sgra mtshoms 'khyug la mdog kyang gas 2// sna bzang ske ring sems ma 'dra// lus drang nu ma'i dad+ya/ lan mtho/ khong de la 'gro na 'jab pa 'dra// skad ni ngang pa'i rgyal
378b6(rnying rgyud): po 'dra// ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs ldan pa// spyi'i rigs dang mtshan du bshad// bzhin dbyibs sogs ka mdog kyang dmar// mig rings so chags rab tu dam// so la shel chags ko ko 'dra// lus la
378b7(rnying rgyud): zhim pa'i dri 'byung ba/ pad+ma can zhes bya bar bshad// zla ba'i mdangs ltar dkar la gsal// gtsug pud g.yas 'khyil skad kyang che// bong chung lus mdzes tshig tu snyan/ dung ltar lus bzhin g.yas su
378b8(rnying rgyud): 'khril/ dung can ma zhes bya bar grags// 'dod pa che la brtul shugs che// shes pa gsal la byad bzhin yangs// bu mo mig mangs ma ru bshad// sbas pa'i brda dang thabs la mkhas// phyi nang rlung khar
379a1(rnying rgyud): // gser ltar lci/ bsdig cing kun gyis drod mi lo mngon la gzhol la rtog pa med zla gsang dkar dmar rlung khar l+li/ rigs dang mtshan du bshad pa yin// sgra ni mthon ting ljang lor bshad/ 
379a2(rnying rgyud): srid du ring la pra la ldem// lcug phran mang po 'dab rgyas pa// ljon pa ma zhes bshad pa yin// phra zhing bshan la bzangs ring ba// bcu gnyis nyi shu lnga'i bar// mu la rag ta 'dzag pa la// rdo rje mtshon gyis
379a3(rnying rgyud): ma phog pa/ lcug phran ma yi rigasu bshad// sor mo gru bzhi skra yang kham/ smin tshogs che zhing mig kyang 'bur// 'gram rlung ring la skra mtshams dma'/ sha mdog che zhing rna ba ring // ba lang can
379a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya bar bai shad// bzhin mdog gru gsum kha dog nag/ skra rlub shal la khro gnyer mang / ri mo can zhes bya ba/ ra bshad// skye rgyud med cing bkra mi shis// gcig pur
379a5(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa gdong gcig ma'o// yan lag thams cad mes tshig bzhin// gtan du 'phel ba'i rgyu med pa// me reg ma'i gsu bshad// gzhan yang lha 'am lha min nam// gnod sbyin
379a6(rnying rgyud): srin po la sog pa// mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams na/ mo yi rigs can gang yang rung / yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i rten yin te/ thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya'o// 
379a7(rnying rgyud): de dag gang rnyed byin gyis brla// de yi spyi bo gtsug tu ni zla dkyil ma las kun bzang mo// snying khar zla dkyil la bsams te/ yangs pa'i spyan du bsgom par bya/ lce ltengs zla dkyil yi ge pheM/ gos
379a8(rnying rgyud): dkar ma yi lte ba la/ zla dkyil ma las ma ma ki/ yan lag bzhi yi dkyil 'khor la/ te las sgrol ma'i phyag rgyar gsal// lag g.yas ljags kyu'i sku ru sgom// lag g.yon dril bu ljags skrag
379b1(rnying rgyud): gzhags pa pad+ma dag la'o// rdo rje la ni yab rnams sgom// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // b+ha ga'i dbyibasu ma ri bsgom// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
379b2(rnying rgyud): sgom/ gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs bya'o// mtshan ldan shes rab de nyid la// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags// gser gyi rna cha gdu bu dang // do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// 'jam zhing gsal
379b3(rnying rgyud): bar byas pa yis// chas gos lnga dang ldan par bya/ a ka ru dang du ru ka dri spos tsan dan sbyar ba yi/ khrus kyi cho ga dag par bya// dri zhim byug pas lus la byug/ rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas// nang yang
379b4(rnying rgyud): dag po'i khrus bya'o// de nas byang chub sems bskyed de// mi dmi dgas don la sems sbyar phyir// skye med byang chub sems dkyi don// rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya// snang srid phyag rgya'i
379b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// lhun gyis grub par yid ches bya// de nas bskul bar bya ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i brda yis bsre bar bya// sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na// sa ma yi snyom zhes pas bsra/ 
379b6(rnying rgyud): ra ga ya mi zhes brjod ni/ ra ho hi zhes kyang ni bya/ ti bo mu ki zhes brjod na// ga ne de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon/ a ti pu ho zhes brjod na/ pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon/ g.yas pa smin ma bskyod na ni// g.yon
379b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sprin mas de bzhin mtshon// de bzhin brda' sna tshogs pas bsre'o// de nas bskul bar bya ba ni/ shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'ang zer la// bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad // 
379b8(rnying rgyud): mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongasu gsol// rnam par rtog bral shin tu dri med sku// 'od zer zla rgyas 'dra ba'i mdangs ldan zhal// dgyes pa'i rol pa'i don la gshegasu gsol// thabs mchog zla
380a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'od zer gyis/ shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer la/ bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do// 'byor ldan yid 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings/ shes rab zab mo rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs// rdzu 'phrul
380a2(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma// 'byor ldan yid 'ong cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston// ho nyi ma'i zer gyis bskul ba/ e ma'o pad+ma'i bar ba'i ze 'bru 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags na// 
380a3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab bsor nas// byang chub sems sprin dbab tu gsol// zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bskul pa/ e ma'o// 'od zer dga' ste yid 'ong ma// sems 'phreng gdung ba'i shes rab gzung // ga'u
380a4(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i pad+ma la// rdo rje bde ba'i byang chub 'bar/ a la la ho// de nas gnyis med bde mchog sems// sangs rgyas sprin dgyi tshogs chen la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// 
380a5(rnying rgyud): grub pa nyi zla'i snying po de// rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang // 'gro dU ga sems can bag chag bsreg zhi ba'i mtha' la shi ba bslang // phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bskul// de ltar
380a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsgrub pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de dag dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu/ rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms pa'i lam// sngags kyi bdag po bdag 'grub ste// gang yin las la 'jug
380a7(rnying rgyud): nus pa'i// dam tshig sgrub po chen po yin zhes gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu
380a8(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
380b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid la dngos grub kyi bye brag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi// thams cad
380b2(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa sgrub pa'i phyir// rang sems shin tu sbyangs pas na// phra mo'i dngos grub bsgrub pa gces/ rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// bdag nyid na mkha'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gan
380b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rang gi lhar ni rang bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam/ rin chen rgyu las grub pa yi// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams// che chung yungs kar
380b4(rnying rgyud): 'bru tshod tsam// snying kha'i dkyil du gsal ba las// hUM gis khong du drangs nas ni// khong nas kha ru byung bar bsam// hUM dgi dbugs la zhon nas su// sna yi rtse mor byung ba dang // sna rtse
380b5(rnying rgyud): nyid du gsal bar bsgom// ting 'dzin gsal bar khugs pa dang // sna yi rtse nas na mkha' la// je ring je ring phaT kyis spro// ring du spro ba goms pa dang // 'od dang bcas pa'i yig
380b6(rnying rgyud): 'bru des// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi yi ge ji snyed pa// dbyar gyi sprin spung 'dus pa bzhin// hUM gis snying kha nyid du bsdu// yungs dkar 'bru chod de nyid la// stong gsum 'jig
380b7(rnying rgyud): rten kun bcug kyang // de yi nang du sa la gsal// sngags kyis brtags pa'i lha rnams kyis// gnas su'ang de nyid gsal bar bsgom// de lta'i 'phro 'du yang dang yang // goms par ci nus dag tu bya// 
380b8(rnying rgyud): de ni gsung gi phra mor bshad// so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru las// phyag mtshan nyungs dkar tsam du gsal// snying kha nyid du gsal bas nas// rgyal po'i pho brang 'dus kyi bar// gong ma'i go rims de/ 
381a1(rnying rgyud): / yis bya/ de ni thugs kyi phra mor bshad// so so'i thun mtshams gsal ba las// rang rang lha yi rnam par gsal// thugs khar yungs dkar 'bru chod tsam// gong ma'i tshul du bya bar bshad
381a2(rnying rgyud): de ni sku yi phra mo yin// de ltar lha tshogs ma lus par// rims kyis yang na cig char ro// cig char bsgom pa shin tu dka'// bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul min// 
381a3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyis rims kyis ni// gtse nas 'khor gyi bar dag tu// yang nas yang du gsal bar bsgom// 'di dag bsgom pa'i yon tan ni// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par nges// thams cad mkhyen pa
381a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor kun// 'di nga las 'byung bar gdon mi za// 'di thos dngos grub pa/ zhan rnams kun// bsgrub mi dgos par grub pa yin// rnal 'byor/ 
381a5(rnying rgyud): can gyis bsgom byas na// zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub// za su/ bshang ci za ba'am/ sha rnams zos na 'grub pa yin/ zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// 
381a6(rnying rgyud): dgon par gnas sam ri bo dben// me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa ru// rang gi lus ngag sems rdo rje'i// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'jam dpal sa bon mam du bsgom// bdag lus dang ni zla
381a7(rnying rgyud): pab dang // ma rnams rim par je zhi la// stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa las// snying rje ma dang zla ba las// rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag brgya bsgom// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje las// rdo rje 'jam pa rab 'phros pas/ 
381a8(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dang bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan pa'i// 'jam dpal nyid du kun gyis mthong // mngon
381b1(rnying rgyud): shes ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis/ lus kyi rnam pa mthong mi 'gyur/ de nas slar ni bsdus pa las/ thugs ka'i mal thim pasams na// mchog tu shes rab rno ba dang / mkhyen rab kun gyi bdag por
381b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'ang thob 'gyur na// 'jig rten shes bya smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i thab so// na mkha'i dbyings kyis dbus dag tu// zla ba'i
381b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsams nas su// rang nyid gang 'dod lhar bsgoms te// sku gsung thugasu byin brlabs pa'i// dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/ sran ma tsam gyi r-i lu bya// lcags gsum ga'ur bcug/ 
381b4(rnying rgyud): nas ni// khar bcug rang gi snying po las// rab tu goms par 'di byas na// gang 'dod rig 'dzin gdon mi za// mtha' ya/ sa zhing khams thams cad kyi// rdul rnyed bzhugs pa'i sangs
381b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// de la sogs te mtha 'i yas mchog ces gsung so// yang na rang gi phyag rgya ste// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
381b6(rnying rgyud): steng du ni// bdag nyid gang 'dod ltar sgoms te// rang gi phyag rgya brnyan mar bya// lag tu thogs la rang rigs sngags// bzlas na rigs 'dzin gang yin 'gyur// rang gi lha ni gang yin pa'i// yon tan
381b7(rnying rgyud): dag ni de thob 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje lha dang lha mo dgug pa'i cho ga'o// shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo'am// mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su// bdag nyid btso bzung ldan
381b8(rnying rgyud): byas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid bsam// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// lag na kyo ba thogs pa yi/ sprul pa bsam yas 'phro bar bya// dza yA ra Na phaT/ gang dgug lha 'am bud med
382a1(rnying rgyud): med dam/ yaM las rlung gis btegs bsams te/ kyo bas gdan nam snying ka nas// bzung ste hUM gis bsdus byas na// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang // rang dbang med par
382a2(rnying rgyud): khugs 'gyur na// 'jig rten bu ma smos ci dgos// gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur zhes gsung so// de ni 'di ni rdo rje lci bsgrub pa'i thab so// bdag nyid sngags kyi skyes bu yi// rdo rje'i skur ni rab
382a3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te// lce la pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas hUM du bsam// de las rdo rje gasdang du gyur// bsam yas aM gi 'phro 'du las// sangs rgyas gsung dang sems can ngag/ bdag gi lce la
382a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa ru// yang nas yang du goms par bsdu// 'jig rten tshig gam chos kyi sgra/ ngag brjod bden zhing nyan pa dang // / brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub sogs// ngag gis nyes pa ci brjod kyang
382a5(rnying rgyud): lce grob spangs par gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni sha rnam pa lnga'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so// dang / nyid lus ngag sems rdo rje// rdo rje gsum du rnam par bsgom/ 
382a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// ye shes dam tshig snying khar bsgom// dbu rgyan rdo rje gsal bar bya/ sha chen dag ni thams cad la// sa bon oM gyis rnam par sbyang // srid gsum sems can
382a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// sha chen ji snyed yod pa kun/ aM gyis 'phro 'dus bsdus nas ni// spyad tshe bdag la thim par bsgom// glang po dag gi sha rnams la// hUM lI'i dam tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje can gyis hUM du bsgo// 
382a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga'i sbyor ba yis// zos na dam tshig sku gsung thugs// rdo rje thob par gdon miza// phyakan rdo rje'i mthu stobs 'grub/ cho ga go rims de yis ni// glang po dag gi sha rnams la// hUM gi phro
382b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus rab sbyangs te/ zos na mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur// rta sha dag ni thams cad la// swa'i 'phro 'du rab sbyangs te// zos na mi snang kun gyi mchog khyi sha dag ni thams cad la// ha yi 'phro 'dus rab
382b2(rnying rgyud): sbyangs na// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma kun// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// gnyis kyi dgra yang med la 'joms// bya yi sha ni thams cad la/ oM gyi 'phro 'dus sbyar byas te// cho ga bzhin du zos
382b3(rnying rgyud): no ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi longs spyod 'phro// mthu chen kun gyis bu mo yang // spyod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa'i thab so// rab tu dben
382b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas dag tu// bdag nyid rnam pa kun ldan pa'i// sdug das kyi lus su rnam sbyangs nas// mig gi dbang po thams cad la// yig 'bru lnga yis rab sbyangs te// 'od zer lngar ni 'phro
382b5(rnying rgyud): ba las// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// mig ni mngon shes kun bsdus nas/ dbang po de la thim pa nga // zos sam mig la rtags bskus na// sangs rgyas sems
382b6(rnying rgyud): can thams cad kyi// spyod yul ji snyed yod pa kun// shing thogs lag tu bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje mig gis gsal bar mthong // cho ga gong ma'i tshul gyis ni// rna ba'i dbang po thams cad la// sangs
382b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas/ zos sam rna ba'i nang bzhag na// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// sgra rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ rna ba'i drung du 'dod pa
382b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin// snying gi bye brag thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// dran pa'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas// zos sam snying khar bzhag na ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// 
383a1(rnying rgyud): / thugs dang sems can rgyud dag ni// mkhyen cing rig pa kun shes 'gyur// yum gyis mkha' las byung ba yi// rab tu dag ni thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// 
383a2(rnying rgyud): gnas rnams ma lus kun bsdus na// zas sam snying khar gzhag na ni// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur// snying khar ye shes sems dpa'
383a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bkug nas de dag rdzu 'phrul rnams// phrogs nas snying khar bsdu byas na// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul thams cad
383a4(rnying rgyud): kun// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i thab so// sku gsung thug/ sa ni rnam bsgoms la/ snying khar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor las/ 
383a5(rnying rgyud): khro bo 'od kyis phreng ba yis// bsrung bar bya ba'i zug rngu rnams// phyung ste med par bsams nas ni// lha rnams dag ni tham sa cad kyi// phyag rgya dag ni thams cad dam/ yang na rdo rje rgya gram
383a6(rnying rgyud): 'am// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis// lus dang ngag sems rab bsrungs na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs na// pal pa rnams kyis smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// las 'di sbyar bar bya ba yang // 
383a7(rnying rgyud): ljongs sam grong khyer grong dag tu// sngags kyi bdag po rab gnas la// nad kun spong ba'i las 'di bya// rdo rje rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba// bskal pa'i me bzhin bsams nas su// spros pas nad rnams
383a8(rnying rgyud): bsregs nas ni// slar yang rdo rje nyid la bsdu// de nas rdo rje de nyid las// 'od zer ser po spos pa yis// nad rnams gtong ba'i gnas de dag/ bskal pa yun du gang bsams te// gom par yang
383b1(rnying rgyud): dang yang bsams na// nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed// de na 'khod pa'i skye bo rnams// sprul pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// tshe ring lang 'tsho bde bar
383b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thab so// rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa ni// na mkha'i dbus su zla ba la// dkyil 'khor zlum po bsams
383b3(rnying rgyud): nas su// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor bskyed// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// bud d+ha lo tsa'i snying po bsam// de las lha mo'i skur spros pas// mkha' dbyings yongasu gang bar bsgom// slar
383b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus 'od kyi thig ler gsal// de nyid bdag gi lus la dang dab// bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin chen rab 'a phros te// 'dod pa'i lus nang gang bar bya// sangs rgyas sprin gyis
383b5(rnying rgyud): de lus la// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu stsol// de yis skad cig da 'i tshe// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// zhes gsu nga so// de la 'di ni rgyas pa'i bsgrub pa'i thab so// na mkha'i dbus
383b6(rnying rgyud): su zla ba la// chos kyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// gos dkar can gyi snying po bsam// de las gos dkar nyid 'phros pas// mkha' dbyings yongasu gang bar bsgo
383b7(rnying rgyud): de las 'od kyi gong bu ni// gru bzhi lam par gsal bar bsdu// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// rin chen sprin chen rab spros pas// rdo rje chos su bsgoms nas su// 'dod par bya ba'i lus nang dgang // yang nas
383b8(rnying rgyud): yang du 'di byas na// bar snang ci 'dod rgyas par 'gengs// nor bu rin chen bzhin 'drar 'gyur// dgos pa phra mo smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i thab so// 
384a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla gam ni// rnam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// rdo rje chos mchog gzungasu bsam// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// nyid kyi snying po bsam par bya// rgyal
384a2(rnying rgyud): sras dang bcas rnams kyi// mkha' dbyings thams cad ga bar bsgom// 'od zer sna lnga 'phros pa yis// 'dod pa la ni dbab par bya// de nas bsdus te bdag nyid kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi byin
384a3(rnying rgyud): bsdus na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang dbang 'dun// 'gro ba dbang med smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni drag po bsgrub pa'i thob so// nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus su no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
384a4(rnying rgyud): steng du ni// khros pa'i gzugs rnams bsgoms bya ste// bskal/ dpa'i me dpung 'phros pa las// khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang // sna tshogs lnga dang bya rog dang / bya rgod khyi la sogs pa yi
384a5(rnying rgyud): 'phra min bsam yas mi zad pas/ mkha' dbyings gang b.rabasgoms nas su// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed na/ dngos sam yang na bsams nas kyang / mtshan ma thogs pa
384a6(rnying rgyud): de dag gis// snying ngan grol dbang po kun// drangs te zos par rab bsgoms na// dgra rnams 'chi bar nges pa ste// de ltar rab tu bsgoms na ni// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // zla ba phyed kyis mchi
384a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur na// dam tshig nyams pa smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni skye 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bu bsgrub pa'i thab so// sdig pa byed dam gnod byed pa// rdo rje phur bus gdul bar bya// dur
384a8(rnying rgyud): khrod gnas sam rkang gcig tu// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'am ki li 'am// gang yang rung bar gnas byas la// rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom/ me stag 'phro ba'i 'od 'phro bas// ri rab gling bzhi'i
384b1(rnying rgyud): gzugs byas la// rang gi sngags kyis gdab par bya// de ltar rab tu gdab byas na// 'gro dang mi 'gro thams cad kun// dul bar gyur pa gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni gzhan gyi
384b2(rnying rgyud): rig sngags gnan pa bsgrub pa'i thab so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// las kyi sems par bdag gnas la// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag/ 
384b3(rnying rgyud): rig sngags byed pa bsams nas ni// las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pa dag/ de yi spyi nas mnan par bsgom// rig sngags nyid kyang mnan par bsam// des ni mu stegs can dag dang // phas kyi rgol ba tha
384b4(rnying rgyud): kun/ mnan par 'gyur te the tsom med// ces gsung so// de la 'od ni gzhan gyi dpung mnan pa bsgrub pa'i thab so// na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
384b5(rnying rgyud): gnas par// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// pad+ma dmar ser ma dog 'dra ba// shin tu che zhing brjid par bsgom// pha ro la dmag dpung 'og dag tu/ rlung dang mtsho dang sa skyed pa// de la
384b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis// stang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de stang rdo rje rgya gram gyi// stang du ri rab rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas dpung rnams gnon par nus// mi rgyal dpung la smos
384b7(rnying rgyud): ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dgra'i dpung rmongs par bya ba bsgrub pa'i thab so// dgra 'am dpung gi gzugs brnyan dag/ bsams sam gzugs su byas nas ni// rdo rje phur bu tshad ldan la// hUM/ 
384b8(rnying rgyud): las khro bo'i skur bskyed nas/ rang gi rig sngags rab bzlas to// snying khar btab par rab bsgoms nas// khros pa byas na sangs rgyas kyi// dpung yang myos par gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni/ 
385a1(rnying rgyud): / tshu la 'bying ba med pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so// nam pa' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sngags kyi bdag po rab tu bsgom// chu yi steng ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas dag gis gtams par
385a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// steng nas dal gyis bcag par bsam// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi// spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom// de ltar rab tu bsgoms pa dang // sa la 'gro bzhin nus par 'gyur// zhes
385a3(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni thogs med rlung gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so// na mkha' rdo rje dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha'i rnal 'byor sgom par bya// 'og gi phyogasu
385a4(rnying rgyud): yaM las ni// rlung gi rab tu bteg par bsgom// de ltar rab da tu sgom byas na// mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro bar nus/ zhing khams kun tu bgrod par 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la
385a5(rnying rgyud): 'di ni nyi ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab so// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ snying khar nyi ma'i da dkyil 'khor bsam// de las 'od du 'phros pa las// mun
385a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas rnams gsal bar nges zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rlung bcad pa bsgrub pa'i thab so// bdag nyid rlung gi phyogs song la// stegs bu gru bzhi lham par bya// spos kyi thig le bdun
385a7(rnying rgyud): byas te// yaM las rlung bdun bskyed par bya// rlung lha dgug par byas nas su// kha phor gyis ni dag pa byas te// de steng la las ri rab bsgom// ri rab rtse la khro bo ni// 'bar ba dag gis mnan par bsgo/ 
385a8(rnying rgyud): des ni 'jigs pa'i rlung rnams kyang // bcings par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni char dbab pa'i thab so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom/ 
385b1(rnying rgyud): dbus su khro bo stobs po che// 'dab ma la ni klu brgyad po// bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rung // khro bo'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// klu rnams rab tu mnan nas su// hUM gnyis bar du klu rnams kyi/ snying
385b2(rnying rgyud): spel cing gzir nas su// klu rnams gnas pa'i sa phyogasu// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya// khro bos mnan pas klu rnams kyi// kha nas char pa skyugs bsams na// 'jig dus lta bu'i char pa'ang
385b3(rnying rgyud): 'bab ces gsung so// de la 'di ni char pa dang ser ba gcad pa'i thab so// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mchog dpal ni rnam par bsam// nyi mI
385b4(rnying rgyud): mdog 'dra 'od bzang zhal// na mkha' khyab par rnam par/ gdangs// lce yi steng du hUM bzhag ste// mi ro 'od dang bcas dpa yis// char chus gang ba'i sprin rnams kun// rkam zhing lce
385b5(rnying rgyud): yis blangs bsams na// skam par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ yang na lce stengs de nyid du// yam las rlung du bsgoms nas ni// bus pas sprin rnams gtor bar 'gyur// yang na
385b6(rnying rgyud): ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// char sprin dang ni klu'i gzugs// bcad cing dum bur rabatub bsams te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sdig 'dzub kyis// bsdus te rang rig sngags bzlas na// 'jigs pa'i char ched
385b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang // skad cig na ni med par 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni bgegs bsal ba'i thab so// na mkha'i dbus su nyi ma yi// dbus su khro bo rnams bsgom pa// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag
385b8(rnying rgyud): rgya che// rig pa mang pos bskor ba'o// rang rig sngags dang stags tshul gyis// hUM dang phaT ces rnam bsgrags na// khams gsum dregs pa thams cad kyang // rdul phan bzhin du brlag por
386a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni chom rkun pacing ba'i thab so//  rjes sa dang kyi khrag las/ mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ mi mi rus pa'i phur bul/ 'od zer can gyi sngags
386a2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pas// lan grangs nyi shur bsngags nas ni// mig gnyis su ni gdab par bya// gzugs brnyan tshogs la phul nas ni// rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung / oM sum b+ha badz+ra mu na tsu ra nA yan
386a3(rnying rgyud): ra bi g+han hUM phaT/ las 'di brnam pa byas nas ni// mi rgod zlog par gdon mi za/ zhos gsung so// de la 'di ni me bsad pa'i thabs// me ni mched pa'i sa phyogasu/ mkha' lding rgyal po bya khyung ni// snang zil
386a4(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i kha dog la// sbrul nag stong gas rab brgyan pa'i// gshog/ dpa 'kha' la gdengs pa bsgom// klu rnams la ni sprin dag la/ rdo rje tshig tu bsko ba ni/ char chen po ba la mo sod ces/ thos nA
386a5(rnying rgyud): sprin tshogs bum pa yi/ char gyis me yang gsod par 'gyur// shog pas me nyid bkang nas su// mdus brkos rdus rnaM/ mtshams bcad na/ bskal pa'i mes kyang 'tshig mi nus/ oM badz+ra
386a6(rnying rgyud): na ra ya na// ni ra ba ba ya ti na baM bu me g+he hUM/ zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni thog bzlog pa'i thab so// na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// bde ba chen po zhes bya ba// zhal gsum phyag bzhir rnam par gnas// ston
386a7(rnying rgyud): ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba// snyems ma dang ni byams ma dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ me tog rol pa zhes bya yi// lha mo bzhi yis rnam par bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor// g.yon
386a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i dril bu skur brten pa/ phyag gnyis mad gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ sku las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin// khor tshugs gsal ba rnam par bsgom// nam pa' las ni bab pa yi// thog na rang rig sngags
386b1(rnying rgyud): kyis bzlog/ oM mahA su ka badz+ra che ge mo badz+ra/ oM sur ta ban+d+ha hU phaT ces gsung so// de la 'di ni gzhan gyi lce gnas pa'i thab so// mar gyi ches brgyad bcu bzhi la/ dur khrod sol ba blangs nas su// sngags
386b2(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag por bsgoms nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor sting du ni// mi snyan smra'am shags rgol ba'i// lce yi gzugasu bris pa yi// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rgya gram bsgoms pa yi// 
386b3(rnying rgyud): dbus su ri rab bskyed par bya ste/ de steng bdag gis mnan bsams na// tshig dbang lha yang dbang 'gyur na/ shags la sogs pa smos ci dgos// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni bri dbab pa bsgrub pa'i
386b4(rnying rgyud): thabs so// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi/ khye'u bu mo gang yang rung / mtshan nyid thams cad yangs rdzogs pa/ dbab don du rab tu brtag ting 'dzin rtsal dang ldan pas bya// gnon gyis
386b5(rnying rgyud): byas na dbyas par 'gyur/ dang por phyin pa khrus byas te/ sdig pa spang phyir 'dul khrims dngog 'od kyi 'dro'adu byin gyis brlag rgyan gyi khyad par rnams kyis brtson// snyi
386b6(rnying rgyud): hU~M ni bsgom par bya// spyi bo gtsug tu ha bsgom mo// a ni kha ru de bzhin te// de nas mdun gyi namapa' la/ 'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs te/ de las 'od zer bskul zhing dpag/ dz+nyA ni bskul ba'i sngags
386b7(rnying rgyud): tshig te// gang gad ba dz+ra yis bskul bar bya'o// byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam// byis pa'i tsi ta gzhal med khang // dbab pa'i lha nyid bzhugs bsams te/ lag rgyal thal mo las// ser mo phyir bsno
386b8(rnying rgyud): kha sbub la// mtheb gnyis so so'i mthil bkug pa'o// rdo rje tshig tu bzlas pa'i sngags// che ge mo zhig a a zhes/ brjod cing rab tu bskul byas na// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur// khru gang tsam
387a1(rnying rgyud): nas lnga yi bar// 'jigs skrag nas ni 'bar bar 'gyur// snying la gnas pa'i lha des ni// spu gsung kun dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ci 'dod gtam ni smra bar
387a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad bral ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang // cho ga 'di yis 'bab 'gyur na// 'jig rten pa lta smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs pa// de la 'di ni dug gtang ba'i thab so// sbrul ni mi sdug
387a3(rnying rgyud): gdug cing khro/ 'jigs byed nag po rab tu 'bar// dug gi lce gnyis mche ba can// sol ba rdo rgyus dag gis bri/ bskul ba'i yi ge snying po 'di// sbrul gyi khong par rab tu bsam// khe kha de'i nang mi zad duga'i dzis
387a4(rnying rgyud): par byed pa rab bsgoms na// sbrul de rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/ de nas zos shig ces bskul te/ mtshan ma nas ni zhug denas no// khong du song ste zos bsams na// dug gis gzung bar
387a5(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dug dbyung ba'i thabs// nam pa' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// spyan ras gzigs ni bsgom par bya// kha dog
387a6(rnying rgyud): dkar po hri spros te// dug can khong du zhugs pa yis// dug rnams hri la 'dus nas ni// hU~M gis khong nas phyir phyung dang // phaT kyis bar snang khams su gtor// yang na gzhan gyis khong du spro// des ni dam
387a7(rnying rgyud): thag tu yang // dug rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dug spo ba'i thab so// dug can snying kar oM dkar las// 'od zer dkar pos dug bsdus pas/ oM nyid nag por snar byung nas/ 
387a8(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi lce 'am mtshan ma 'am/ khong du zhugs par rab bsgoms na// 'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za/ zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug gso ba'i thab so// 'dze 'bras shu ba phol mig dang // 'brum
387b1(rnying rgyud): bul sogs nad rnams kun/ a dkar dag gi 'phro 'dra yis// grong ma bzhin du dbyung bar bya// spob yang ni de bzhin no// de ni khams las gyur pa yis// nad rnams thams cad sel bar nges/ zhes
387b2(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni bkres skom zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thab so// bkres skom can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am/ yang na bsgrub pa'am gang yang rung // sbyor ba 'dir ni brtsam par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs
387b3(rnying rgyud): chen po// na mkha'i dbus su bsgom par bya// ba ni kha yin nang du bsgom// oM ni lce la rnam bsams te// yid bzhin bdud rtsi lta bu yi// bza' ba'i gnas su de nyid bsams// des ni bkres skom sdug
387b4(rnying rgyud): bsngal sel// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rnam par dag pa ba sgrub pa'i thab so// oM ni mig la rab bsams te// yul kun rnam snang mdzad du bsgom// de ltar rtag tu goms pa dang / 
387b5(rnying rgyud): chos kun sku gsung rdo rje mthong // de nyid rnam dag spyan du gragazhes gsung so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i lha mthur che rnams zil gyis mnan cing tshig nyan pa bsgrub pa'i thabs
387b6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bas/ b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying po yis// mthu chen rnams ni drangs nas su// bsdigs pa dag kyang / 
387b7(rnying rgyud): byas nas ni// zil gyis gnon cing nyan par 'gyur zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni lha mo tsun d+ha bsgrub pa'i thab so// sngags kyi bdag por bdag gnas pa'i// snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// tsuM zhes
387b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i 'phro 'du las// bdag nyid tsun d+ha'i gzugasu bsgyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom// 'di ni chos dbyings grub pa ste// bud med thams cad 'grub
388a1(rnying rgyud): // par 'gyur/ zhes bshad do// de la 'di ni ji b+ha la nor bsgrub pa'i tha po// rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ snying khar rje gyi 'phro 'du las/ dza b+ha la
388a2(rnying rgyud): yi gzugs dag gis// bar snang khams kun gang ba ni// mdog sngon thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa// gsus po che la mi thung gzugs// yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa yis// dbul ba thams cad sel bar bas/ 
388a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa la ni de dag dpag/ des ni dbul ba sel bar byed// nor dang gter gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje a dzan bsgrub pa'i thab so// shing cig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am/ ma
388a4(rnying rgyud): mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// rdo rje a dza bsgrub par bya/  dam ban+d+ha kha sbyar du// tshil chen gshang gci khu ba dang // maHrag ta las byung ba'i// du ba ban+d+har chags pa dang // bshang gci
388a5(rnying rgyud): rag tas smras nas ni// ri lu ljags dang gsum gyis dkris pa// gsum du byas na de nyid la// rang gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu dgu yi na ma phyed na// btab na dngos grub grub
388a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// mi ge la bskus na ci yang mthong // mi snang ba dang rkang mgyogs dang // de la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams// thob par 'gyur te gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rol pa bsgrub pa'i thab so// 
388a7(rnying rgyud): namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnam par bsgom// du khrod ri brag gnyan pa'i sar// ro yi rdzas btsal de nas kyang // ro yi gnyen po bdag
388a8(rnying rgyud): bsams te// de yi steng du bdag gnas la/ de la dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// de sngags rgyun du bzlas bya zhing / dgug pa'i pho nya drag tu bskul// mdog mdangs bkrag snum byung ba dang / bdud rtsi
388b1(rnying rgyud): yis ni bskur bar bya// de nas 'gul bar gyur pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi yis gzhum par bya// sngags kyi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// de nas rab tu 'bar ba dang / 'gro ba rigs drug gang yin pa// rdo rje dag tu
388b2(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// rdo rje so yis gcad bya zhing // sngags zlos khong du bstim par bya// de nas langs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje byin nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya// las rnams gang 'dod
388b3(rnying rgyud): byed du gzhug// yang na gser ram gos mtshon nam// rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub rnams/ ji ltar 'dod pa rkyen gyis bsgyur// gang 'did pa de gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje sgyu ma
388b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i thab so// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rde'u shi dang bu'i rgyu dag las// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te/ she'u re sman gyis byugs byas nas ni// rdo rje sngags kyis tshig
388b5(rnying rgyud): 'di bzlas/ she'u re'u i na ya/ a mo ka a g+hus sa g+hus// shing bu dag gis gdab bya zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs/ su 'gyur// des ni sna tshogs gzugasu 'gyur// bsdu bar
388b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod na slar la bzlog/ de yang bkri drang thabasu 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni ro bsreg pa'i thab so// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms te// rol sngags
388b7(rnying rgyud): kyi btab nas ni// dri zhim chu yis byug par bya// zhun chen khu bas bcos pa yi// ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu// lha'i phyag rgya dgod par bya// gnas der sdong bu ra ra la/ 
388b8(rnying rgyud): lha rnams snying po bris pa gdags// ro'i phyi rol shun pa la// 'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni// rims kyi sbyang ba'i las su bya// thab khung dkyil gang yin pa yi// phyag rgya gzhung dang 'thun par dgod// 
389a1(rnying rgyud): bar khang klo dkar phyogs bzhinas/ gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla ma dbul// de mthar 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod// de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// me yi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad // rdo rje las kyi ka/ 
389a2(rnying rgyud): ma yis/ las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par rol// rdo rje bla ma gcig gis ni// ro mi nyes pa bgrang zhing bshags/ rdo rje skabs sbyor chen po yis// rdo rje mchod pa skabasu dbul/ bkra shis gnas kyi smon lam ni// 
389a3(rnying rgyud): skabs sam mjug tu gdab par bya// rdo rje grangs kyi gting 'dzin gyis// grangs gzung dkar byang bla ma dbul// sdig pa'i gnag sbyang gshegs shing bsreg/ me lha spyan drang mchod pa bya// bstod pa dag
389a4(rnying rgyud): kyang shes par bya/ ro yi sgrib pa 'byings ma 'byongs/ me la ltasu pa lta bar bya// mtshan mi mi sdug byung ba nas/ bsreg sbyang mog rgya cher bya// de ni tshogs rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes
389a5(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje thal chen sgrub pa'i thab so// de la thal ba thams cad kun// gu gul nag po dang sbyar ba/ r-i lu lA// gos gsum gyis dkris pa// rdo rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang // 
389a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab na// bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por 'gyur zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni 'phrin las bzhi'i bsgrub thab so// las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis// rdzas dang kha dog phyogs dang
389a7(rnying rgyud): dbyibs// yam shing khyad par bsreg rdzas las// dkar dang dmar ser 'thing nag las/ shar lho nub byang phyogs dag tu// zlum po le'u tshe pad+ma bzhi// gru bzhi zur brgyad 'khor lo rgyas// gru chad bzhu
389a8(rnying rgyud): dbyibs zla gam dngango // gru gsum b+ha ga mngon spyod pa'o// ting 'dzin byams dang dang bas zhi/ snying rje dga' bas rgyas pa ste/ dga' dang chags pas dbang du 'gyur// btang snyoms khros drag por 'gyur
389b1(rnying rgyud): so so'i las kyi lha rgyud la// sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang // glu rgyud 'byor pas mchod par bya// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la khro bos ye shes me ru sbyang // so so'i rgyud du bshad bstabs te// klong yangs
389b2(rnying rgyud): 'khyil pa'i hong khung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis// sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg par bya// nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas ni// ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul// phung po lnga ni yab lnga la// 'byung ba yum gyi dbyibasu bstin/ 
389b3(rnying rgyud): shes pa brgyad lam brgyad la'o// yul brgyad 'phra men brgyad la bstims// sgrib dang dngos grub don rnams ni// me la mkhas pas rtag par bya/ so so'i dbyibs dang kha dog la/ dbyibs dang kha dog shes par bya
389b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdzas sgrub pa'i thab so gsang ba'o// phun su mtshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// gnas dang sa bzhi brtags/ par ni// saM stengs tshon gyis bri bar bya// dbus su thig bzhi le'u
389b5(rnying rgyud): tshe dgu// de mtha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bri// mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri 'bar// dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri// phyogs mtshams brgyad du khaM brgyad bri// 'khor
389b6(rnying rgyud): lo'i bar 'khyams mu khyud la// nang du bltas pa'i kham brgyad gsal// rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad// mu khyud brgyad la phyir ltas brgyad// gru chad bzhi la nang ltas bzhi// sgo bzhir phyir lta bri bar bya// phyir rim
389b7(rnying rgyud): par 'khyams de dag la/ phyi lta nyi shu rtsa brgyad bri/ bskal pa'i me ri phyi khyams la/ phyir lha bcu ni bri bar bya// da la phyag rgya rim par dgod// ro yi tshol ltangs rnams bzhi yi/ dur khrod rdzas mchog mnyams btsal/ 
389b8(rnying rgyud): ye shes spyan gyis lta ba dang // rdo rje 'gros kyis dral ba dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang // ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jol tshul dang // btsal nas mnanyal sgo bzhi nas/ khro chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya/ shar
390a1(rnying rgyud): du dug gsum 'joms pa'i gro// lho ru khrag 'thung rol pa'i gro/ nub du rta mchog zhal gyi gro// byang du gdul skyong drag po'i bros// sbyang bar bya ba rab tu gces// de nas dbus su gzhag bya ste// mgo
390a2(rnying rgyud): bo shar du bstan pa de'i// phung po bruM las gzhal med khang // de ru phyag rgya'i tsho gas mchog sgom// so so'i rdzas kyi gnas rnams la/ rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod// bsnyen pas byin phebs rtags byung nas/ 
390a3(rnying rgyud): bam de byang shar mtsham su bsgral// rdo rje thig gis btab nas kyang / rdzas rnams so so'i skos su gdag/ des mtshon rnam lngas bgro bar bya/ 'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas bgro// rdo rjes snying kha'i phyogs nas bkro/ rin
390a4(rnying rgyud): chen zur brgyad lte bas nas// pad+mas kha'i phyogs nas so// ral dgris yan lag rnams nas spro// de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnams su// rdzas rnaMs go rims bzhin du dgod// dpal dang ldan pa'i
390a5(rnying rgyud): gdon dgu la/ sku gsung thugs dang ldan par ni// gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas par dgram// rdzas kyis mdzes par brgyan par bya/ rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram// mchod pa'i dam rdzas tshang
390a6(rnying rgyud): par bsham// de nas rnal 'byor chen po kun/ bdag nyid phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ bskyed pa'i ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed// rang bzhin rdzogs chen spyan drangs mchod// bsgrub pa nyams len bzlog par bya// 
390a7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur bya// de nas gtor mtsho gsum du/ dang por bcad de sbyin sreg bya/ bar mas mkha' 'gro tshim par bya/ tha ma mi bzad gter du s+tha/ las rnams rdzogs par byas nas ni/ 
390a8(rnying rgyud): dpal chen nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur na// dngos grub bzhin lta smos ci dgos/ zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thab so// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ sa stengs chag phyed
390b1(rnying rgyud): tshad du/ sum rtseg byas dbus zla gam brgyad// phyi mtha' thod pas bskor ba'o// de yi phyi rim dmar chen rgyas// dbus su ban+d+ha mtshan ldan la// yab yum snying po bris la bzhag zla gam brgyad la ma brgyad
390b2(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ mthing nag ma tha me ri 'bar// de 'og thod chang gsum du bya// sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis brgyan// sgo rtseg sgo khyud tha ma bran// gnas mchog rab tu dben pa yi/ ri yi rtse 'am nags tshal lam// snga
390b3(rnying rgyud): dpung phra mos mi tshugs shing // 'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad par shis// rnal 'byor sdeng dang rab ldan zhing // brjid cing sran tshugs khu 'phrig chung // brtul zhugs che la rtog pa med// las kyi phreng ba lhag chad
390b4(rnying rgyud): med/ dri zhim sman gyis phyi bkru zhing / shi ne d+he hus nang yang ba dkru/ tshad mar sbyar ba'i dka' dag dang / ldan pas dus btab nga bzhin du brtsam// rgyu yang brtag par bya ba ni// mdzes shing bkra
390b5(rnying rgyud): shis ldan pa la// bong tshod lo ni dar la bab// rigs lnga'i ma tshan rtags yod pa shis// bsgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de lta bu// dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrang nas/ byin gyis brlab pa
390b6(rnying rgyud): rab tu bya// d+ha hu ma 'das dbang po bsgyur// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis// dbang po lnga la gdab par bya// snang srid gtam ni dri ba 'am// legs nyes dri ba'i pra yang dbab// rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo
390b7(rnying rgyud): rnams su// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// phyag rgya bkod de bsgral bar bya// phung po gzhal yas khang du bya// nang grol thams cad lhar sgoms te// bsgral sbyangs sbyar ba byas na ni/ 
390b8(rnying rgyud): mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob nas blang // zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni mchog phran gtsang ma bsgrub pa'i thab so// maN Dal gru bzhi tshad ldan la// zla gam sgo
391a1(rnying rgyud): cig rdo rjes bskor// mu khyad sgo bzhi rab tu bri/ khyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan la/ phyi nang khrus kyang de bzhin pa/ dbus su bzhag ste shar du bstan/ lce la gzungs thag sna lngas
391a2(rnying rgyud): gdags// man ngag lung ldan phyag tu dbul// phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram// de yi khong du gzhal yas su// ye shes sems dpa' chen gang ba'i// thugs kar nor bu rin chen 'bar// 
391a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la// dpal be'u nyungs 'bru'i snying po la// til 'bru tsam gyi hUM dmar gnas// rdo rje 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// rdo rje phra yang dbab par bya// de nas mtshan rtags bzang ba dang // 
391a4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub blangs te bsgral bar bya// bskams te bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba shis zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dregs pa can ba sgrub pa'i thab so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// ji ltar
391a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa 'dus pa dang // maN Da la gzhi gcig brkyang nul bya// chag rams bstod pa'i maNaDa la bzhi// gru bzhir gzhi las spags par bya// de dag ma tang gzugs bya// snying khaman/ 
391a6(rnying rgyud): chad dbus su bsnol// maN Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ dbus su 'khor lo'i thig btab la// dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya gzhag khar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes pa// gnas dang yul
391a7(rnying rgyud): gyi phyog rgya dgod// sgo bzhir sgo srungs de bzhin gzhag/ yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas// phyi rol khyams la mi rir bya// de mtha' thod pa tshar gsum bstams// de yi phyi
391a8(rnying rgyud): rim me bur 'chub// gu gu thul dang zar chags// zhing dang sbrul chun sgo khyud la// ban d+ha snying por bcas pa dag/ so so'i gnas su de bzhin gzhag/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su/ 
391b1(rnying rgyud): brtsibs pa'i zab// zur bzhi kha bzhi dgal bya// snying khar 'khor lo'i thab du bya// rigs dang 'thun pa'i yam shing brtsig hom lta 'brel ba'i las chen
391b2(rnying rgyud): lag kyi zugs// rgyud drug sam shing smras pal/ ye shes lnga 'i mi k+Shong du/ nyon mongs rdzu mi bsreg sbyang ma
391b3(rnying rgyud): bya bar 'os pa mtha' dag kun/ rnal 'byor can gyis sa rig bya/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni ma tang 'greng bu gnan rje
391b4(rnying rgyud): thabs so// dkyil 'a ma tang gzugs su bya/ mgo lho nub mtshams
391b5(rnying rgyud): su bstan/ mgo lus yan lag rnams la ni/ maN Dal bcu gcig rang
391b6(rnying rgyud): tu bya/ zhal du hom khung gru gsum la yam shing dag gis brdzangs nas ni/ sbyin bsreg
391b7(rnying rgyud): hom gyi las rnams bya/ snying khar gru gsum rtse gsum la/ bang rim gsum par byas
391b8(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ phur bu nyi shu rtsa gsum dgod/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bya// legs par gru gsum mthing
392a1(rnying rgyud): / nag la/ zur la thod pa tshar gsum bri// gzhu bdun dgra sta brgyad kyang dgod// phur bu dgu dang kha T+wAM dgu// rtsang dmar drug bcu rtsa rgyad dgod// yum gyi mkha' ru bsgoms nasu/ 
392a2(rnying rgyud): gzir gnan drag po'i las rnams bya// yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon la// gnas kyi ma mo brgyad rnams kyi// bri 'am mtshan ma gzhag par bya// gzhan rnams kyang ni ci rigs par// ma tang dgug dang
392a3(rnying rgyud): dbab dang gnan// byin brlabs mkhas pas tshul bzhin bya// bya ba thams cad ci rigs bya// des ni gnan pa'i las chen 'grub// ces gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i thab so// thams cad 'byor
392a4(rnying rgyud): bar byas nas ni// sa stengs brkyang nul legs byas la// dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// zla gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan// rdo rje'i da ra bas bskor bar bya// dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod// rin
392a5(rnying rgyud): chen sna tshogs bum pa la// tshe yi rdzas kyis gang ba de// pad+ma/ ban das kha bkab la// gzungs thag btags nas dbusu/ gzhag/ tshe dpag med par de mnga' gsol// bum pa rin chen
392a6(rnying rgyud): las byas bzhi// gsang ba'i yum du de mnga' gsol// rigs dang 'thun pa'i bum pa bzhi// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso gzungs dang // so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams// gtso gzungs zung du 'brel
392a7(rnying rgyud): bar ni// phyogs phyogs dag tu tshom bur bri// sgo bzhir sgo srungs la sogs gzhag/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya kun bkod nas// tshe dpag med pa'i thugs ka nas// 'khyil cing 'tsher ba'i byang chub sem/ 
392a8(rnying rgyud): nyi zla'i ga'u gnas pa de// A yu byang chub semasu zhu// de las rgyal mtshan mchod ldan dang // rin chen gter dang dbang bskur mdzad// gsang ba'i tshe gter 'dzin dang bzhi// thugs kar 'phros nas de bzhin/ 
392b1(rnying rgyud): du 'tshom bu rims kyis spros nas ni// dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstims// skye med dbying su sbas nas ni// mi 'gyur phyag rgyas gdab par bya// yang na ting 'dzin khyad par gyis// lo 'am zla ba'i mthu
392b2(rnying rgyud): dag tu// skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni// phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa des// shar phyogs ngos kha bltas te// lha klu gnod sbyin ji snyed pa// shar phyogs na mkhar gnas pa rnams// thams cad khong du
392b3(rnying rgyud): rngubs pa las// phyir mi 'byung bar khong du bstims// dbugs de tha mar sna ru bsring // phyogs bcur de ltar goms byas nas// dpal tshe gzi byin thams cad thob// ces gsung so// de la 'di ni bdud
392b4(rnying rgyud): rtsi bsgrub pa'i thab so// maN+Dal tshad dang 'thun pa la// dbus pa d+ma 'dab brgyad bri// gru chad zla gam bzhi par bya// gzhan yang zla gam ci rigs dgra ma// pad+ma'i lce la rin po che// ge sar
392b5(rnying rgyud): ngag gis mdzes par bya// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha mchog dag // dbusu tshangs pa'o skud pa can// sul med dung can 'khro/ ra bar gzhag/ shar du sul 'greng de bzhin te// lho ru dpag
392b6(rnying rgyud): bsam shing bu can// nub du shong bu gnyis pa gzhag/ byang du bse por rgya gra mo// snod kyi mtshan nyid bkod na su// dri chen zhu ba maM sa dang // rag ta dri chu phyogs phyogasu// de dag skabasu sbyar ba yi/ ka ko la la
392b7(rnying rgyud): dang du ru ka/ 'dza ti pa la kha dri zhim// lce pog dkar po rims bzhin sbyar/ 'di dag kyang ni rim pa bzhin/ a ga ru dang ga pur dang // gur gum pad+ma l-i ga tur// de nas ra sa ya na'i tshogs// rigs dang las
392b8(rnying rgyud): dang kha dog gis/ ci rigs so sor dbye bar bya/ sa bon lnga yis rnam par sbyangs// gsang chen de nyid dam pa yi// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs brgya yis// sbyang pa mchog tu bya ba yin// khrol bu dag
393a1(rnying rgyud): ni sbyang ba na// gsal dang bsngo dang bsdu dang dbye// khrus dang bshags dang yon tan brjod// byin dbab bzlas pa rtags byung dang // bsdu dang btag bcag gzhal ba bya/ mtshan ldan snong
393a2(rnying rgyud): du rgya yis gdag/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzungs kyis gdags// dbang bskur byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// ting 'dzin mi g.yeng 'byongs pa dang // dngos grub blang ba la sogs bya// de nas ri lu 'am 'dra
393a3(rnying rgyud): gu 'am/ skyo ma la sogs ci rigs par// rnal 'byor mchog gis spyad par bya// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni stan bsgrub pa'i zab so// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// las bab pa yi rnal 'byor
393a4(rnying rgyud): pas/ raM ya~M khaM gis bsreg sbyong bya/ rgyud drug sa bon 'bru lngas sbyang // rol pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bya zhing // rnam shes sbyor ba'i lhum su 'phang / byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yi/ 
393a5(rnying rgyud): sku bskyed ye shes skur spros te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la so ma nyid med// ces gsung so// de la 'di ni ga na bsgrub pa 'i thab so// yid dam bcas pa btang na yang // bdag lus phyal
393a6(rnying rgyud): par mi gtang zhing // de nyid dran pa chen por bya// 'phags pa mchod par brtson pa dang // rang gi lta ba gsal ba dang // gsang sngags sdom la gnas pa dang / sngags dang phyag rgya ma nyams dang // yo
393a7(rnying rgyud): byad tshogs na nges par 'grub// mi ldan don rnams brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni mi 'grub pa'i chad pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub rim par ma rdzogs par// dngos la zhen cing bsgrub byed pa/ 
393a8(rnying rgyud): rang rgyud sreg par gdon mi za// zhes gsungaso// de la 'di ni bsgrubs nas ma grub pa yi chad pa'o// bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus bzhin grub par ma gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa' la
393b1(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i// ye shes las grub lha rnams kyang // tshal bar 'gags pa gdon mi za// zhes gsung so// dngos grub gzhan dag tu// mi zad bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag la sogs bsam yas mchog/ chos
393b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam dang // na mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// brjod med brjod las 'das pa yi// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub// ces gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes
393b3(rnying rgyud): rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de ma
393b4(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom sra par zhugs nas// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sdom pa zab mo 'di phyung ngo // de la 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa
393b5(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir bsrung ba'o// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// log rtog 'khrul pa bsam mi khyab// de nyid gzhi// la ba'i gdul thab su// phyi nang sdom pa ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul thab
393b6(rnying rgyud): su de snyed gsungs// zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi mdo kun 'dir 'dus pa'o// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas kun// gsong sngags rgya mtsho chen po las// 'dul ba'i thabasu so sor snang // snang
393b7(rnying rgyud): yang rtog 'dul ma grub phyir// rmad byung ngang du cig par 'dus// de bas gsang sngags ngo mtshar che zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dam tshig rnam par dag pa'o// chos kun ye nas dag pa'i phyir// log
393b8(rnying rgyud): rtog ye nas rnam par dag/ de bas sdom pa rnam par dag/ dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa'o// thams cad thig le rdo rje bas// bsrung ba'i tha snyad
394a1(rnying rgyud): rnams dang bral// kun khyab bdal ba'i ngang nyid la// bsrung du med na sdom pa yin// na mkha' bzhin du kun tu khyab/ ces gsung so// de la 'di ni rtogs pa'i dam tshig go// bde chen rnam dag
394a2(rnying rgyud): lhun grub par// lta bas rtogs shing chung gyur na// dam tshig nyid kyang rnam dag ste// lta ba khyad par ji bzhin du// 'dul ba'i khyad par de ltar gnas// de bas dam tshig zhes bya ba/ rang gi lta ba yin par
394a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi mdo gsang ba'o// gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po yi// dam tshig bsam yas ji snyed pa// rtsa ba yan lag gnyisu 'dus// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum
394a4(rnying rgyud): yin te/ sku gsung thugasu rgyal bas gsungs// yan lag dam tshig mi spang dang // mi 'dor spyad dang shes pa dang / grub pa yin te rnam lnga po// mdor na rnam pa brgyad du grags// 
394a5(rnying rgyud): zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni mdo rgyas pa'o// sku yi dam tshigaces bya ba/ bla ma spun la gdung sems ldan// mngan dpya sems spangs pa yin// bla ma la yang rnam gsum te/ dam tshig
394a6(rnying rgyud): dbang dang shes rab rgyud// man ngag lung ston slob dpon la// mngan dang dbye ba'i sems bor na// lus ngag sgo nas smos ci dgos// mgo dang mig dang gsang ma snying // rtag tu 'bral bar 'phangs pa ltar
394a7(rnying rgyud): bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la// mi 'bral sems kyis de ltar lta// de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'brang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // skongs na srog la'ang mi lta na// zang zing gzhan lta smos ci dgos// lus la dbang ba
394a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'am/ lus srog bskyed pa'i pha ma pas/ shin tu gnyen zhing bkur bar bya// ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi// sgo rnams de yi ston pa yin// dngos grub bye brag rdo skad pa// de la rag las rje su wad/ 
394b1(rnying rgyud): ma rig mun pas gtibs pa la// sems kyi smon ma de yis 'degs// lha mi yongs kyi 'dren ston yin/ dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i srog shing yin// yon tan dun
394b2(rnying rgyud): gyi gter mdzod yin// gal te yon tan mi ldan yang // bla mar bzung nas spang byas na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pa yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas bskur ba yin// de yi nyams pa brjod mi lang / yon
394b3(rnying rgyud): tan ldan pa'i bla ma de// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rgyal sras dang ni mthu chen rnams// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bkur sti byed// 'jig rten 'di ni mthu chen kun// de yi dgongs
394b4(rnying rgyud): paskong ba dang // khur zhong bran du khas len na/ rdo rje slob mas smos ci dgos// rdo rje dbun la gdung sems kyang / 'dres dang ma 'dres yongs kyi spyan/ yang dag lam du zhugs pa
394b5(rnying rgyud): la// mngan dang dpyas kyi sems tsam yang // rtag tu spang / bar bya ba yin// brtse zhing gdung ba'i shugs phyung la// gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin blta// mdor na srog la mi
394b6(rnying rgyud): chags par// spun dang ming sring dgos pa bsgrub/ ci phyir rdo rje spun rnams ni// 'di nas byang chub thug pa ru// mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i grogs mchog ste// mar me 'od dang sdong dang 'dra'o// dper
394b7(rnying rgyud): na 'jig rten mi rnams kyang // mang po 'dus na dka' ba'ang 'grub// de bzhin rdo rje ming sring spun// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog yin// dper na grogs dang ldan pa'i mi// 'tshe ba rnams
394b8(rnying rgyud): kyis mi tshugs bzhin// de bzhin rnal 'byor grogs ldan yang // rgol ba rnams kyis mi tshugs shing // 'bras bu myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung // de yang sku yi
395a1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig de// bsrung ba yin par rgyal bas gsungs// mdor na snang srid thams cad ni// gzugs su snang ba mtha' yas kun// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par// gzugs sku 'ja
395a2(rnying rgyud): tshon tshul du gsal// de nyid don las mi 'da' bar// rtogs pa sku yi dam tshig ces// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// gsung gi dam tshig ces bya ba// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gral sgo bas/ 
395a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi ru rnam gsal nas// rdo rje sngags rnams rgyun mi gcad// bsgom dang bzlas dang 'phro 'du'i sngags// ting 'dzin ma dang 'dra ba la// bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dras bskyod nas// sgrib pa'i bud shing
395a4(rnying rgyud): bsreg par bya// bzlas brjod sngags kyi brtul zhugs kyang // sgra chen ma yin chung mar min// mgyogs par ma yin bul bar min// drag par ma yin dal bar min// yig 'bru yan
395a5(rnying rgyud): lag nyams ma yin// yengs min gla la sogs par gcod min// rgyu ba'i sems rnams spangs pa dang // bzlas pa'i skyo/ na bcu spangs nas ni// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen
395a6(rnying rgyud): bar rab tu rdzogs pa gces// ye shes lha rnams nye ba dang // dbyings dang rnam thar 'dzom pa dang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob pa dang // 'phro 'dus 'gro don bya ba dang // de yis lha rnams mnyes pa dang // las de
395a7(rnying rgyud): myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// bsrung ba'i dam tshig yin par gsungs// mdor na snang srid thams cad kun// skye med gsung las ma g.yos kyang // gsung gi bye brag nyid yin par// rtogs shing slar yang dbyingasu thim/ 
395a8(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa gsung du rgyal bas gsungs// thugs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba// spyir gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi// gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad pa'i// gsang sngags gsang ba'i don rnams kun/ bum pa'i
395b1(rnying rgyud): nang gi me mar bzhin// snod ma yin pa'i gang zag la// dus dang gnas skabs kun tu gsang// snod dang ldan pa rnams la yang // dbang ma thob par bshad pa min/ ci phyir gsang don de nyid la// ma rtogs pa rnams srur
395b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'debs// log par rtog pa ltung bar 'gyur// don ma rtogs na yid ches med// khams gsum skye bo'i bcas kar 'gyur// dngos grub par gcod bgeg su 'gyur// de bas gzhan du bstan pa min// mdor
395b3(rnying rgyud): na thugs kyi dam tshig ni// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems rtog rnam pa thams cad kun// skye med dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // so sor rtogs pa thugs nyid snang // snang nyid dbyings las
395b4(rnying rgyud): mi 'da' bar// rtogs pa thugasu rgyal bas gsungs// de ni rtsa ba de'i dam tshig gi/ mdo nyid rgyas par bshad pa yin// rtsa ba'i da dam tshig gi mdo rgyas par bshad pa'o// mi spang dam tshig ces
395b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog lnga rnams ni// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas ngo bo ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// spangs na rnal 'byor don dang 'gal// mi
395b6(rnying rgyud): dor dang du blang ba ni// dri chen dri chu rag ta dang // maM sa dang ni zil pa lnga// 'bras bu lnga yis bsdus pa rnams// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bza'// 'di yang dam tshig rmad po che// spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 
395b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor dang sgrol dang ma byin len// brdzun dang ngag rtsug smra dang lnga// don ldan skyes bus spyad par bya// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/ dbang po yul lnga kha dog lnga/ rigs lnga ye she
395b8(rnying rgyud): lnga nyid du// don ldan skyes bus shes par bya// lung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// grub par bya ba'i don chen yang // sangs rgyas lnga las gzhan mi bsgrub// grub par bya ba'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag bsrung
396a1(rnying rgyud): / par rab tu gces// de yang ci phyir bsrung zhe na/ 'dod chags rang dang spyir snang ba/ chags shing zhen pa thams cad kun/ pad+ma rigs kyi ngo bo yin// zhe sdang de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs// gti
396a2(rnying rgyud): mug sangs rgyas yin par gsungs// nga rgyal yid bzhin nor bu ste/ phrag dog zhes bya las su bshad// de bas spang bar bya ba min// dri chen snang mdzad gtso bo yin// dri chu gdon mi za grub pa// rag ta snang
396a3(rnying rgyud): ba mtha' yas sku// mang sa rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// byang chub sems ni rdo rje sems// des na dang du blang bar gsungs// sems can thams cad gsad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yin// bud med
396a4(rnying rgyud): rnams la chags bya ba// snang ba mtha' yas dam tshig ste// ga zhan gyi nor 'phrog rnam snang gi/ rin chen 'byung ba'i brdzun da phra ma// ngag sdug gdon mi za 'grub pa'i// dam tshig yin par
396a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs// de bas spyad par bya ba'o// gzugasu snang ba rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan gtso/ 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// 'du byed gdon mi za grub pa/ 
396a6(rnying rgyud): rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'o// sa ni rdo rje zhes su bshad// rin chen chu ste pad+ma ma// thogs med rlung gi rang bzhin te// na mkha'i khams ni rnam snang mdzad// mig gi dbang po rnam snang mdzad// rna ba rin
396a7(rnying rgyud): chen 'byung ba'i tshul// snang ba mtha' yas sna zhes grags// lha ni gdon mi za grub pa// lus ni mi bskyod pa ru bshad// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// sgra ni rin chen 'byung ba ste// dri ni
396a8(rnying rgyud): snang ba mtha' yaso// ro ni don yod grub pa yin// reg rnams mi bskyod pa ru bshad// de bzhin dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// ser po bder gshegs rigasu bshad// mthing ka rin chen dmar po/ 
396b1(rnying rgyud): chos// ljang khu las kyi rigasu bshad// de phyir shes par bya ba yi// dam tshig yin par dpa' bos gsungs// grub par bya ba'i 'bras bu yang // rigs lnga nyid du grub pas na// de grub pa yi dam tshig
396b2(rnying rgyud): yin// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// yan lag dam tshig 'da' ba'o// zhes gsung so// yan lag gi dam tshig mdo rgyas pa'o// de la 'di ni dbye ba'o// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// bsrung ba rtog
396b3(rnying rgyud): pa gnyi su dbye// de dag dngosu bsrung bas na// mi 'da' bsrung ba'i sdom bcas yin// rnam par dag pa'i ngang nyid du// de dag rtogs pas khyad par du// rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin par gsungs// de la
396b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni dam tshig nyams pa ltung ba'i gnaso// rtsa ba nyams pa 'i skyon chen yang // bskal pa grangs med bgrangs par yang // / dmyal ba'i gnasu ltung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bla ma'i sku smad na/ 
396b5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas brnyas pa yin// byang chub sems la/ bskur bas na// de yi sdig pa brjod mi lang // dper na 'dzi/ ga rten sa yi rdul// grangs kyis bgrang bar shes kyang srid// rgya
396b6(rnying rgyud): mtsho chen po'i chu thigs kyang // grangs kyis bgrang zhing shesu rung // 'di yi sdig pa brjod mi nus// shin tu mi zad sdug bsngal las// thar bar nams kyang mi 'gyur te// srid gsum sems can
396b7(rnying rgyud): gsad pas ni// bla ma'i bka' bcag char mi phod// rdo rje spun la smad pa ni// nyams pa'i skyon yang brjod par dka'// bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// 
396b8(rnying rgyud): tshe 'dir bsgrub pa log pa dang // 'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// dbyings dang rnam par thar pa yi// sgo rnams nyams par gyur pas na// bsgrubs pa
397a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad log par 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su yun ring ste// lkug pa'i gnas gyur pa yin// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// yi dgas kyi ni lus su skye// thong gshol 'bar
397a2(rnying rgyud): ba lnga brgya yis// de yi lce la gshog par byed// bskal pa du mar myong ba dang // dngos grub 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mdor na rtsa ba nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung // rdo rje sems dpa'
397a3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid kyang // de yi snying khrag 'thung bar nges// mi spang dam tshig nyams gyur na// dngos grub thams cad spangs par 'gyur// mi dor dam tshig nyams gyur na// dngos grub 'bras bu mi 'thob cing // 
397a4(rnying rgyud): yi dgas spre'i'u gnas su skye// spyad pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'du shes med pa'i 'gog par ltung // shes pa'i dam chi ngag nyams gyur na// 'du shes med pa'i khros pas ltung // grub
397a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bdud kyi khams su lhung bar/ 'gyur// rtogs pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// ru tra chen po'i gnasu ltung // de la sogs te bsam mi khyab ces
397a6(rnying rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni nyams pa bskang ba'i tshad do// dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na// mgon btsun mnyam pa'i don rtogs na// de nyid skongs pa'i gnas su 'gyur// bla ma spun la smad gyur na// 
397a7(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la mnyes byas te// mthol gshegs drag pos 'gyod byas na// de ni skongs pa'i las su 'gyur// gal te bdag gam bla ma spun/ ma bskangs par du tshe 'phos nas// de ni bskang ba'i tshad
397a8(rnying rgyud): las 'das// gsung gi tha tshig ral gyur na// rdo rje chos su bdag bsgoms la// tha tshig gang brlag 'bum 'bum gdon// thugs kyi tha tshig ral gyur na// rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms pa la/ 
397b1(rnying rgyud): lo gsum bar du mi smra bar// bsam gtan sbyor bar rab tu bya// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// so so'i rigs kyis de bzhin bskang // zhes gsung so// de skad ces gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor/ 
397b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi dam tshig ni rang rang gi snying la gnas par mthong nas/ a la la zhes pa'i sgra phyung nas/ rang rang gi dam tshig la dmig so// 'phags pargyud kyi rgyal po ye shes
397b3(rnying rgyud): rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos brtul zhugs rnam
397b4(rnying rgyud): par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas kyang gsang sngags thams cad kyi brtul zhug/ sa rnam par rol pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las/ 
397b5(rnying rgyud): phyu // gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po yi// brtul zhugs ngo ma/ tshar rmad byung ba// chos kun rol par snang ba'i phyir// ji lta ra spyad kyang brtul zhugs te// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi
397b6(rnying rgyud): dgos// dka' thub sdom la rten pa'i mis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dka' thub sdom la mi gnas shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod rab brten pas// bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 
397b7(rnying rgyud): rigs ngan dang ni sma sha can// rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang // ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod// brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang / rtsub pa'i ngag la dga' ba ni// gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// / 
397b8(rnying rgyud): pha dang khu bo mes po la// zhe sdang sems kyis bsgral byas na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// ma dang bu mo sring mo la// 'dod chags sems kyis sbyar byas na// chags pa chen po'i dngos grub
398a1(rnying rgyud): thob/ snying rje med par gsod pa dang // 'jigs pa med par sbyor ba la// bshang gcizas su za ba dang / rang gi khu bas mchod pa dang / dur khrod rgyan la dga' ba ni// theg mchog 'di la
398a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// bsod snyoms zas la mi chags shing // ma bslangs pa la'ang chags mi bya// nags tshal dgon pa'i sa phyogs su// bsod snyoms blangs te bza' bar bya// sems kyi brtul zhugs chen
398a3(rnying rgyud): po yis// ting 'dzin stobs dang ldan par bya// lus kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis// thogs med stang thabs tshul du gnas// ngag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// sngags kyi yi ge drag tu brjod// dben pa'i
398a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs su gnas bcas la// g.yang gzhi gos su gon nas ni// tshe ra ba'i nga rgyal rtag tu bskyed// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po nga yis// spang bar bya ba'i thabs su spyad// cang shes brtul
398a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs chen po yis// shes bya kun la 'jug par bya// lus kyi rgyu/ la gyi bya ba dag/ gyi ling brtul zhugs chen pos bya// ga gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// gtsang sme med par kun
398a6(rnying rgyud): la spyad// glang chen myos pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// mi 'byed rmo lngaH bstan par bya// rtag mchog rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// dpal brtul gtum pa'i las chen bya// khyung chen mkha' lding brtul
398a7(rnying rgyud): zhugs kyis// lta ba spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcad// gtumathung don gyi brtul zhugs kyis// re ba med pa'i las chen bya// rgya mtsho gter gyi brtul zhugs kyis// yid thub mi ldog brtan par bya// lkugs
398a8(rnying rgyud): ba lug gi brtul zhugs kyis// gti mug bzhin du shes rab ldan// ri bo lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// mi 'gyur rab tu brtan par bya// nam mkha' lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// yangs dogs kun
398b1(rnying rgyud): dang bral bar bya// gnam lcags lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// drag shul las la sbyar bar bya// lag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis// mthu stobs dag la spyad par bya// kha rog brtul zhugs chen po
398b2(rnying rgyud): yis// zon bag khu 'phrig spyad par bya// glang chen chur 'jug brtul zhugs kyis// nges pa'i nga rgyal spyad par bya// ri dgas seng+ge'i brtul zhugs kyis// grogs ngan la sogs spang bar bya// reg
398b3(rnying rgyud): 'jam bya'i brtul zhugs kyis// 'grogs na bde zhing chags par bya// sgyu ma rgya yi brtul zhugs kyis// thabs la mkhas pa'i las chen bya// lce spyang khra yi brtul zhugs kyis// gtsang sme med
398b4(rnying rgyud): par spyad pa dang // thogs med gsod la brtson par bya// nga rgyal da stag mchog brtul zhugs kyis// che ba'i nga rgyal ba skye/ dad par bya// mkha' lding lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// kun tu
398b5(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i spyod pa spyad// rgyal po 'khor skyong brtul zhugs kyis// sa thub 'khor dang ldan par bya// bcu gnyis dang nga ni gsum dag gi/ brtul zhugs blo dang ldan par bya// de/ 
398b6(rnying rgyud): la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ ces gsung so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las rnal 'byor gyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
398b7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos 'phrin las rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams
398b8(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsung so// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ brtsal med lhun gyis dkyil 'khor las// 'phrin las rgya mtsho bsam yas kyang // rnal 'byor dgos pa'i dbang dag tu// las
399a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// dang po zhi ba'i lha yin te// gnyis pa rgyas pa zhes su bya// gsum pa dbang du sdud pa'i las// bzhi pa drag po'i las su gsungs// de dag lha yi
399a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang // gnas dang dus dang rdzas rnams dang // dbyibs dang kha dog maN+Dal dang // yum dang ting nge 'dzin dag dang // phyogs dang stan dang 'dug stangs dang // tho ba phur pa gtor ma dang // bzlas
399a3(rnying rgyud): brjod hom dang bskul tshig dang // 'khor lo me lha'i mtshan nyid do// yul dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ste// bcu gnyis dang ni gnyis dag gis// bya ba thams cad rdzogs par gsungs// ya ni zhi ba'i/ 
399a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid de// ma zhes bya ba rgyas pa yin// dbang du sdud dpa pa du bshad// e nyid drag po'i mtshan nyid do// lha yi darnal 'byor rim pa yang // rdo rje sems dpa' zhi drag bya// rnam
399a5(rnying rgyud): snang mdzad dang rin chen 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur// snang ba mtha' yas rgyas pa dang // dbang gi las ni byed par 'gyur// gdon mi za bas las kun byed// yang na
399a6(rnying rgyud): drag po nyid la'o// kun tu bzang pos ci yang byed// spyan ni zhi ba'i mchog yin te// bsrung ba ma ma ki yis byed// gos dkar can gyi dbang du byed// sgrol ma las rnams kun la sbyar// sa yi snying pos
399a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas par byed// nam mkha'i snying pos 'phel bar byed// phyag na rdo rjes drag por byed// spyan ras gzigs kyis snying brtse bar// yid kyis yid du 'ong bar byed// byams pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ 
399a8(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa sel bas rnam dag byed// kun tu bzang pos nor sgrub byed// 'jam dpal shes rab rno bar byed// sgeg mos sangs rgyas mtshan rnams grub// phreng bas rgyan dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas yul
399b1(rnying rgyud): du phyin par byed// glu yis dbyangs snyan grub par byed// rig ma dag dang lhan cig rtsen// gar gyi phyag rgya gar mchog dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs// bdug pas yid 'ong dngos
399b2(rnying rgyud): grub thob// me tog rab dgyes mdzes par byed// dI pas 'od gsal mdangs dang ldan// dri yi dri nga dag par byed// lcags kyu'i sa ni spyan drang dang // rdo rjes dgug pa'i las rnams byed// zhags
399b3(rnying rgyud): pas 'dren cing 'tshang bar byed// sgrog gis dbang du byed cing sdom// dril bus dgyes sgrol dbab par byed// byed pa mo dang bya ba mos// thams cad thams cad kun la sbyor// rdul snyed dbang po
399b4(rnying rgyud): drug rnams kyis// cis 'dul thabs kyis sna tshogs bye/ du// khrag 'thung chen pos gti mug 'joms// khrag 'thung rdo rjes zhe sdang 'joms// rin chen he rus nga rgyal 'joms// 
399b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma he rus 'dod chags 'joms// las kyi he rus phrag/ dog 'joms// khrag 'thung chen pos thim par byed// badz+ra kro d+hos 'khyud par byed// rang na kro d+his sbyor bar byed// 
399b6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma kro d+his bskyod par byed// karma kro d+his 'bebs par byed// dkar mo'i tshogs kyis 'gugs par byed// rkun mo'i tshogs kyis mthu 'phrog byed// rmongs ma'i tshogs kyis myos por byed/ 
399b7(rnying rgyud): thal byed mas ni thal bar klog/ lbos mo'i tshogs kyis dbang du byed// gtum mos sgrol zhing myos par byed// sme sha can gyis za bar byed// ma tshogs mas ni rgyud 'phel byed// seng gdong
399b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis zil gyis gnon// rtag gdong tshogs kyis 'joms par byed// wa gdong tshogs kyis rol par byed/ khyi gdong tshogs kyis gsod cing za// rgod gdong tshogs kyis rgyug par
400a1(rnying rgyud): byed// dur byas rnam par 'dren par byed// bya rog tshogs kyis dbang du 'du// 'ug gdong tshogs kyis 'dren cing lta// gshed pos 'gugs shing sgrol bar byed// bdud rtsi 'khyil
400a2(rnying rgyud): pas skrod par byed// gzhan gyis mi thub mngag gzhug byed// rta yis dug rnams 'joms par byed// dbyug sngon can gyis gsod par byed// stobs chen char 'bebs byed pa'i mchog mi g.yo
400a3(rnying rgyud): bas ni skrag cing 'khrug/ rdo rje hU~M gis 'ching bar byed// rnam par rgyal bas gnon par byed// khams gsum bdag pos 'joms par byed// phra men tshogs rnams mang po kun// mngag gzhug
400a4(rnying rgyud): pho nya'i las rnams byed// slas dang byi mo'i tshogs rnams dkyis// thams cad thams cad byed par 'gyur// mdor na lho'i rnal 'byor ni// cis 'dul thabs kyis de ltar ro// 
400a5(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong bkra shis dben pa ru// rdo rje zhi ba sgrub par shis/ me tog nags tshal skyed mos tshal// nyams dga' bar ni rgyas par shis// kha dog dmar zhing gcong rong mang / 
400a6(rnying rgyud): ri bor gnasu dbang du bya// sum mdo grog gli rkang gcig drung // rtsub pa'i gnasu drag po bya// snga dro zhi ba gung la rgyas// srod la dbang bya gung la ni// drag po'i las rnams brtsam par bya// rdzas
400a7(rnying rgyud): dang bsreg bya'i rdzas rnams dang // dkar zhing dmar ba'i rdzas rnams dang // zho dang ldan pa'i zhing dag gi rtse mo las byas zhi ba'i rdzas// ser zhing kha ba'i ror ldan pa'i// bar gyi shing las byas
400a8(rnying rgyud): ba kun// rgyas pa'i las su bsngags pa yin// sgyur zhing kha dog dmar ba dang // drungs pa las byas shing gi rnams// dbang gi las su rab tu grags// gnag cing rtsub pa tsha ba yi// ror ldan
400b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i shing las byas// rdo rje drag po nyid la'o// zlum po dang ni 'khor lo dag zhi ba yi ni las su gsungs// zur bzhi zur drug zur brgyad dam// pad+ma'am rin chen dbyibs 'drag/ rgyas pa'i las la
400b2(rnying rgyud): shis pa'o// zla ba kham dang gzhu yi dbyibs// pad+mo sprang po 'am mkha' 'dra ba// dbang du bya ba'i las yin no// gru gsum mam ni gru chad dam// rdo rje'i dbyibs dang mda' 'dra bar// byas pa rdo rje
400b3(rnying rgyud): drag po la'o// dkar po zhi ba ser po rgyas// dmar po dbang la nag po drag/ ljang khu spyi yi las su gsungs// ser skya zhi rgyas las yin te// dmar skya zhi ba dbang gi las// sngo skya zhi ba drag po'i/ 
400b4(rnying rgyud): las// rgyas dang dbang dang drag po la'ang // zhi ba'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// des na las rnams re re la'ang // bzhi bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// zlum po'i thab khung rdo rje yis// 
400b5(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// pad+ma grub bzhiro/ na po che so// brgyan pa rgyas pa'i las su shis// zla ga/ ma khung bu mda' gzhus brgyan// dbang du bsdu ba'i dkyil
400b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor yin// gru gsum rtsang thod kyis brgyan pa// drag po spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// ljon pa ma dang lcug phran ma// sdong cig mo dang me reg ma// spyan dang ma ma gos dkar sgrol// byin gyis brlab
400b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas byas te// dad byams snying rje dang ba dang // dga' chags btang snyoms khros pa yi// ting 'dzin dag gos zhi dang rgyas// dbang drag so so'i 'phro 'du bya// byang du bltas te zhi ba bya// rgyas pa'i tshe
400b8(rnying rgyud): na shar du blta// dbang la nub tu drag po lho// zhi pa ku sha'i khri steng su// rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du gnas// pad+ma'i steng du sems dpa' yi// skyil mo krung gi rgyas par bya// khri stengs dag tu phyed
401a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil gyis// dbang du bsdu ba'i las bya'o// sa gzhi gru gsum nyid la ni/ rus sbal gyi ni rgyas btab kyis// mngon par spyod pa brtson par bya/ zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang / zur/ 
401a2(rnying rgyud): gsum tho ba'i gtun tshogs kyis// las bzhi yum gyi gtun khung du// gti mug nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang mtshan ma brdul du brdung // gser dngul zangs dang lcags dag gam/ zho can
401a3(rnying rgyud): ser sbyar rtsub shing la// ri rab tshul du rab brjid pa'i// phur pa las rnams so so yi// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa la// rtse mo yaM baM ai yi dbyibs// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa la// btab
401a4(rnying rgyud): na zhi rgyas dbang brlag 'gyur// dngul phye 'bras can dkar po la// zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor mar sbyar// gser phye 'bru chan ser po las// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma sbyar// dbang la
401a5(rnying rgyud): zangs phye 'bru mar chan// drag po'i lcags phye sha khrag la/ 'o// shan+ting pu shIng pa shang dang // ma ra ya yi sngags che/ ga la// swA hA swA hA hUM phaT kyis// brgyan pa'i mgo la oM
401a6(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa// bzlas pa'i sngagasu shes par bya// ha~M khung zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam gru gsum gdengs pa ru// rdo rje rin chen mda' gzhu dang // rdo rje rtsa dgu'i phyag rgya gzhag/ zho can ser sbyar rtsub
401a7(rnying rgyud): pa yi// yam shing dag la me sbar te/ lhan ni gzi chen lhun chen dang // gtum chen rngam pa'i lha tshogs la// las bzhi'i tshul du bsreg na 'grub// sngags dang 'dod pa'i ming spel te// bskul
401a8(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i tshig tu bshad// ras sam grog shing shun la// zhi rgyas 'khor lo'i sngags bcas bri// lcags gsum ga pur bcug nas ni// mchod cing bskul na gdon mi za// zhing chen ras
401b1(rnying rgyud): sam smad dkris la// dbang dag 'khor lo'i sngags bcas bri/ kham phor nang ngam thod par gzhug dur khrod gnas la sogs pa ru// bskul zhing gnan pa byas na ni// gdon mi za bar gnan par 'gyur// las bzhi
401b2(rnying rgyud): me lha'i mtshan nyid ni// me yi lha ni snang mtha' yas// me yi lha mo gos dkar mo// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas ni// gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur// gdug rngub rnams la zhi ba sbyar// dbul 'phongs rnams
401b3(rnying rgyud): la rgyas pa sbyar// dbang ni 'dod gzir rnams la ste// zhe sdang can la drag po'i las// thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang // yid bzhin na mkha' 'gongs pa dang // 'gug cing phyi bzhin 'breng ba dang // myos nas gas te
401b4(rnying rgyud): 'tshog pa ni// las bzhi'i 'bras bur rgyal bas gsungs// 'pha dgas pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa 'khor lo'i mdo zhe sa bya ba las las kyi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 
401b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des skye'agro thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa
401b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzag pa dang // lu gu rgyud dang 'gal byed dang // rdo rje spun la 'khu byed pa// rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur dang // skye bo yongs la gnod pa dang // ma chags pa yi sems can la// brnag pa'i nan tur bya bar gsungs/ 
401b7(rnying rgyud): dgug pa'i las dag bya ba yang // bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan byas te// rkang rjes nyid kyis sa blangs la// mi rus bsregs pa'i thal ba dang // dur khrod ro yi ras dag dang // rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo yi// 'gram
