401b8(rnying rgyud): nyid nas ni blangs pa'i sa// rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo dang // grog mkhar sa rnams brtags nas su// lung bong gcin gyis slu bar bya// de nas yan lag tshang ba yi// gzugs la snying khar gro ga 'am// shing
402a1(rnying rgyud): shun legs par blan nas ni/ ra khyi khrag gis ming bris te/ hUM dang phaT kyi bar du gzhug drug po'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du// mgon lho nung mtsham su bstan/ gang na gnas pa de nyid nas/ de yi rnam pa
402a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa ni/ thogs med rlung dang 'dra ba ste// lcags kyu yis ni snying drangs te/ yi las rlung gis bteg nas ni/ bdag gi drung du phyin pa dang / gzugs brnyan nang du de bcug pa// srin bu ma khyer 'dra bar gsal// zhags pa'i/ 
402a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas dam du gzhug/ lcags sgrog phyag rgyas sgrog tu gzhug/ dril bu'i phyag rgyas brtan par bya/ gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug yungs dkar rgyal ba'i mtshon gyis brdeg rdo rje mig gis bltar mngon par/ 
402a4(rnying rgyud): nyams pa de nyid gnan par ni// nyin mtshan kun la drangs te bas// / yang na suM b+ha'ang lhag par 'jebs// de ni dgug pa'i mchog tu gsungs// gal te gsad pa'i las byas na// dgug pa de nyid sbyar
402a5(rnying rgyud): byas te/ dug shing snying po'i tsher ma yis// khugs pa'i gzugs te dbug par bya// drag por gyur pa'i phur pa yis// dpral ba snying mgrin dbus mo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu btab par bsgom/ 
402a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis gtab// rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgya dang / be con rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje brjid pas phur pa gnan// bskal pa'i mthar yang zug bsams te// gu gul dud pas spros su gzhug/ yungs skar
402a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos brdeg par bya// de nas gzugs kyi rgyal po de// rab tu rno ba'i mtshon cha yis// pho na rkang pa g.yas nas btub/ mo na rkang pa g.yon nas btub// rmad nas byung ba'i gtor ma dang // bcas te 'bar ba'i/ 
402a8(rnying rgyud): lha tshogs dang // drag po hom du sbyin bsreg bya// nyin mtshan gung la bya bar gsungs// las 'di byas na nges par yang // lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te skam pa'i las byas na// dgug pa de nyid
402b1(rnying rgyud): sbyar byas te// de yi ming nas smos nas ni// gzugs de dug gi tsher mas dbug/ dug dang skye tshe lan tshwa dang // 'bru mar tshwa bar rab bsres te/ tsha ba'i rims kyis gdab pa'i phyir// de yi lus nang gang bar dag / tsher
402b2(rnying rgyud): ma'i me la bskam par bya// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa ste// kham por ram ni thod par gzhug/ dgra yi sgo gar gnan byas na// skam par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// yang na tsha bas btab par 'gyur// gal te gnas/ 
402b3(rnying rgyud): nas spo bya na// ting 'dzin ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje mig gis mthong ba dang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// rdo rje rnga mo rabs bsams te// de nyid rgyab tu skyon nas ni// rdo rje
402b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo 'bar ba yis// gshin rje'i phyogs su khrid pa dang / gzhan gyis brdeg pa'i thabs su sbyar// ral gros sgyu ma gtubs pa dang // bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod kyis// za zhing 'thog par rnam par
402b5(rnying rgyud): bsams// de yi ming nas bskul byas na// des ni myur du skrod par/ 'gyur// rdo rje mi 'chi las kyis sbyar// yang na rkang rjes sa/ dang ni/ shing lo rlung gis btsugs pa la// mtshan ma ming du
402b6(rnying rgyud): bcas par bya/ ming nas drag tu bskul bya zhing // rdo rje 'bar ba'i khro bo yis// gshin rje'i drung du khrid pa dang // bgegs kyi drung du gnon byas na// des kyang bskrad pa'i lasu 'gyur// yang na dgra'i sgro ga ru/ 
402b7(rnying rgyud): thod pa ma gas ma chag par// rdo rje sngags kyi tshig bris te/ rdo rje mi 'chi rnam par bsgom// dgra yi sgo ru bzhag na ni// bskrad par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// gal te dbye ba'i las byas na// khro bo'i sngags dang ming
402b8(rnying rgyud): spel te// 'ug pa'i sgo la bris nas ni// bram ze 'am dge sbyong skas dkris te// lam gyi bzhi mdor bskos te gzhug/ de la rdo rje khro bo gnyis// 'thab cing rtsod par rnam bsams na// gsang sde dbye bar gdon
403a1(rnying rgyud): / mi za// gal te gnan pa'i las byas na// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te/ mngon sum khugs par gyur pa dang // de stengs dbang chen rim par bskyed// ri rab steng du bsgom pa ni/ las kyi lha ste/ 
403a2(rnying rgyud): don yod grub// rdo rje rgya gram brjid ldan pas// bskal pa yun du gnan par bsam// gzugs brnyan thod pa gang bar gzhug lam gyi gzhi mdor de bzhin bya// des ni rab tu gnan par 'gyur// gal te/ 
403a3(rnying rgyud): bcing bar 'dod pa na// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te/ mtshan ma ming du bcas pa de/ mtshon skud sna lngas mgo lus dkri/ rdo rje sgrog gis bcings bsams nas// zod pa ma nyams nang du gzhug lam
403a4(rnying rgyud): gyi bzhi mdo 'am dur khrod du// sbas na nges par bcings par 'a gyur// gzhan yang gsad pa'i brtul zhugs ni// khrag dang dri chu bshang gci yis// gsher bar byas pa'i gos gon
403a5(rnying rgyud): te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos sbyar byas nas// rkang pas gzugs brnyan mnan nas ni// khros pas gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// rdzogs par 'das na nges par 'chi// thal ba'i skyo ma spangs
403a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'am// skra bshig gcer bur phud pa'ang rung // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang 'chi 'gyur na// khams gsum skye bo smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
403a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'jigs skrag ste// rang rang gi stan la langs nas lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lug su byas te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma bstan nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshig bstod
403a8(rnying rgyud): brda e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// cho 'phrul kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// ngo mtshar kun gyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang // phyag
403b1(rnying rgyud): rgya bsnyen bsgrub bsgrub pa dang / sdom dang gsal zhugs las rnams dang / nan tur bdag po khyod la 'dud// khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi lag/ de bzhin rgyal sras snying por 'gyur// bdag cag rnams kyi rten/ 
403b2(rnying rgyud): nga'i gnas// ma rungs 'dul gtso khyod la 'dud// e ma'o snang dang mi snang brtan g.yo la sogs chos kun nyid kyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'khrul la snang // bsam yas bsam dpag las 'das chos kun ngomam
403b3(rnying rgyud): rmad byung cho 'phrul sna tshogs kun tu snang // rtog med mnyam nyid dbyings las ci srid 'phrul kyang dbyings la g.yos pa rdul gyi cha tsam med// don dam bden pa'i cho 'phrul kun rdzob gsang sngags che ba'i/ 
403b4(rnying rgyud): khyad par rmad 'byung e ma'o ngo mtshar che zhes mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab ste// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la dal ni byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid la sems shing cang mi smra
403b5(rnying rgyud): bar 'khod do// la la ni dkyil 'khor rnams rims kyis dgod// 2la ni lhun gyis grub pa'i gar dang phyag rgya nye bar ston/ la la ni gsang sngags kyi sgo zab mo bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhir
403b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug cing mi ldog/ la la ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i che ba dag ston to// la la ni gsang sngags kyi dam tshig snying la gnas par sdom// la la ni brtul zhugs zab mo la 'jol nyag tu rol// la la ni gdug
403b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs nyen cing tshar gcod// la la ni rmugs pa dang // rengs pa dang / 'dod gzir dang / dregs pa rnams dang / sbyor ba'i las kyi rol pas dgyes/ la la ni nan tur gyi che ba ston cing ling long byed// 
403b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad bla 'khyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni yum rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mo dang gnyi su med par de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la dgongs shing cad
404a1(rnying rgyud): mi gsung bar gyur to// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las nan tur gyi las rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// 
404a2(rnying rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra bi shA mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba gor be ro tsa nar khyi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / de nas yang smra ba'i se byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das
404a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de de bzhin nyid kyi ngang la mi g.yo bar brnal bzhin du cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i klu 'dis rnam par bskul to// e ma 'o mi dmigs chos dbyings dag pa las// 'bar ba'i sku ma
404a4(rnying rgyud): bdag la bstan du gsol// rol pa'i cho 'phrul mi zad rgyan tu che// don la rngam pa'i spyod pas rol tu gsol// a la dal ho zhes bskul bas bskul bar thugs su chud nas sku nya ma'i
404a5(rnying rgyud): snying po lta bu mngon du phyung ste cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa snod bcud dang sa'i khyad par thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'o// de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa rdo rje kun tu bzang pos mchod brgyas
404a6(rnying rgyud): pa de kho na nyid kyis mngon par mchod de brkyang phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa// e ma'o gsang mchog dag pa'i bdag ye shes shes bgyi ji ltar lags// rngam pa zhes ni gang la bgyi// glog dreng
404a7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ji ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes pa ji lta bu// mdo yi don ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab po// gsang ba mchog gis bdag pos gsol ba
404a8(rnying rgyud): btab pa thugs su chud nas ye shes snying po can rnams nyon cig/ ye shes ye shes shes bya ba// shes dang shes bya tha dad min// rig pa'i ngo bo rnam pa lnga// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas// byang chub sem
404b1(rnying rgyud): su rgyal bas gsungs// dregs pa 'dul zhing nan thur gyis// thogs chags med pa'i brtul zhugs pas// sngags spyod rngam pa'i khyad par de/ rngam pas rngam pa'i mtshan nyid yin// glog no myur du 'jug
404b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// 'jug pa'i yan lag bzhi dag dang // sdom dang las bzhi'i khyad par gyis// dngos grub las la myur 'jug pa'o// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dngos grub 'brel bcas ni// 
404b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo zhes su rgyal bas gsungs// de bas ming ni don 'thun grags// rig cing gsal ba'i ngo bo bas// ye shes shesu brjod pa yin// rngam pa zhes pa drag shul spyod// myur zhing bar chad med pas na// 
404b4(rnying rgyud): glog gi phreng ba zhes su bya/ skor dang gcod dang rgyun mi gcad/ 'khor lo lta bu'i rnam pa der// gsang ba kun 'dus mdo bya'o zhes gsungs so// de nas smra ba'i sre byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bang
404b5(rnying rgyud): pos gsol pa/ rgyud ces bgyi ba ji lta bu// mdo 'di 'brel ba ji ltar lags// de bzhin dgos dang yang dgos kyi/ brjod pa ji ltar shes par bgyi// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi
404b6(rnying rgyud): bdag pos bka' stsal pa// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa dang // phun sum tshogs phyir rgyud ces bya// 'di don rig pa'i skyes bu yis// gsang ba kun don shes pa'i phyir// phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags
404b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rgyud kun dang ni 'brel par bshad// gsang ba'i sgor zhugs rnal 'byor pa// byang chub sems dang dkyil 'khor dang // phyag rgya bsnyen dang dngos grub dang // sdom dang brtul zhugs ma rungs mnyes// 
404b8(rnying rgyud): las dang nan dur bya ba rnams// mchog tu dgos pas dgos pa yin// bde gnyis rtogs nas bdag gzhan don// grub pa yang dgos yin par bshad// dgos pa'i don yang brjod byed pa'i// don
405a1(rnying rgyud): bsdus mdo 'di brjod pa yin// de bas rnam pa bzhi po yis// bde blag tu ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes gsungs so// yang smra ba'i ses gsol pa// dbang mchog dam pa ma thob par/ bsgrub
405a2(rnying rgyud): pa ci yang mi 'grub pa// ji ltar dbang bskur mtshan nyid lags// snod ni ji lta bu dag lags// rnam grangs dag gi mtshan nyid ci// dbang thob rtags dang mtshan ma ci// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol/ 
405a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i tshig la gsal 'dris shing // don la gzhol zhing yid ches kyang // dbang bskur dka' rtags ma byin par// nor bu blon gral bskos pa ltar/ 
405a4(rnying rgyud): sa rnams thob par mi 'gyuraro// sems kyis chos la dbang tho dan/ rdzas tshig gang zag dbang rnams kun// ma skur na dayang thob par 'gyur// bskur na'ang nyes pa med par bshad// rig
405a5(rnying rgyud): pa rang dbang thob 'gyur na// bskur ba'i dbang la thogs pa med// / de ni dbang gi mtshan nyid yin// ra tshong byed cing rgyu/ mchos pa'i// dad dang mi ldan brtson 'grus chung // blo zhan nges
405a6(rnying rgyud): med 'phyar la g.yeng // bla ma spun la sri zhu chung // de ni dbang gi snod ma yin// dad dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che// mnyan bsam slob ma mi skyo ba// bla ma spun la bkur sti byed// gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang
405a7(rnying rgyud): bskur ro// rnam bzhi las kyi dgos pa tshang // bya ba'i las la ma rmongs na// kar ma las kyi dbang bskuro// lta bas mnyam pa'i don rtogs na// rgyal 'theb 'chad cing ston pa'i dbang // tshad ma gsum
405a8(rnying rgyud): dang rab ldan zhing // rkyen thub rdo rje slob dpon dbang // theg pa'i rim pa thams cad la// phyogs ris med cing ma rmongs na// rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang thob pa'o// rkyen thub brtul zhugs che ba dang // 
405b1(rnying rgyud): skyon rnams spangs shing dam tshig ldan// gsang ba sgrub pa'i dbang thob bo// dang po gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang // rin chen rigs kyi rna ba la'o// de nas rdo rje las kyi dbang // las kyi rigs kyi yan lag la'o// de nas
405b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bsgrub pa'i dbang // rdo rje rigs kyi snying khar ro// de nas rgyal 'theb rgyal po'i dbang // sangs rgyas rigs kyis spyi bo la'o// de nas gsang ba 'chad pa'i dbang // pad+ma'i rigs kyis lce la bskur/ 
405b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang // yan lag rigs lngas dbang bskuro// dang po gsum pa bdag gi don// gnyis pa bzhi pa gnyi ga ste// lnga pa drug pa gzhan don du// dbang mchog bskur ba'i go rims
405b4(rnying rgyud): yin// rnam grangs go rims mtshan nyid ni// dang por phye yi dbang da bcu bskur// de nas nang dbang bcu dang gcig/ de nas bsgrub dpa'i bcu dang gsum// tha mar gsang ba rnam pa gnyis/ bcu phrag
405b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dang drug // dbang mchog dam pa bskur ba yin//  nga po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang // gnyis pa rtags kyi mtshan ma'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab gzugs kyis te// bani
405b6(rnying rgyud): pa bkra shis bum pa'i dbang // lnga pa bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang // drug pa rin chen sna bdun dbang // bdun pa gdan mchog dam pa'i dbang // brgyad pa mdzes pa rgyan gyi dbang // dgu pa gsang ba ming gi dbang / 
405b7(rnying rgyud): bcu pa rgyal rtags 'khor lo ste/ phyi dbang bcu po rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje nang du gzhug par bya// dang po gsang ba nyan cing slob pa'i dbang // gnyis pa glegs bam zab mo gtad par bya// gsum pa rnam bzhi
405b8(rnying rgyud): las kyi rdzas kyang sbyin// bzhi pa rgyal 'tsha ba dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin// lnga pa slob dpon bzhi yi theg chen rtags// drug pa nyin zla pad+ma sems can gdan// bdun pa rgyal po gsang ba'i rin chen bdun// 
406a1(rnying rgyud): // brgyad pa gzugs brnyan spyi bor gzhag dgu pa sku gsum ye shes sbyin// bcu pa bkra shis dam rdzas dbang // de nas lag tu rdo rje sbyin// bcu dang gcig gis nang bcug nas// bsgrub
406a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// dang por sems kyi gtan tshogs sbyin// gnyis pa snying rje'i dbang bskur sbyin// gsum pa yi ge 'khor lo sbyin// bzhi pa thong gshol 'bar ba sbyin// ban+da gang ba sbyin dang
406a3(rnying rgyud): lnga// drug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs te// bdun pa skyon med pad+ma sbyin// brgyad pa sta ri'i dbyug pa sbyin// dgu pa sbrul nag chun po sbyin// bcu pa dri med lha mo sbyin// gcig pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun// gnyis pa/ 
406a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub rdzas rab tu sbyin// gsum pa rdo rje gsang mi sbyin/ bcu dang gsum po rdzogs pa dang // gsang ba dam pa sbyin pa yang // da dkar dmar 'dres pa'i byang chub sems// bu mchog de yi lce la
406a5(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ snying po don dam byang chub sems// de yi blo la gzhagapar bya// dbang mchog thob pa'i ltas rnams kyang // blo rtsal che ba'i bdag nyid dang // snang ba lus kyi lnga ltas dang // ngo mtshar che
406a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rdzas snyed dang // mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas 'byung // blo rtsal che ba'i khyad par du// yang dag bden pa'i don rnams la// mi skrag dga' dgu skye bar 'gyur// 'khor ba'i chos la skyo sems 'byung // rnam grangs
406a7(rnying rgyud): chos la dad mi 'gyur// ji ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma kun// sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi mthu chen la// 'jigs shing nyam nga med par 'gyur// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ snang
406a8(rnying rgyud): ba lus kyi lnga ltas kyang // lus kyis bzod pa thob pa dang // 'du ba'i nad dang bral ba dang // khams kyi zas dang bral ba dang // dbang po'i gzi mdangs gsal ba dang // bar snang dag la lding ba dang // shing bal lta/ 
406b1(rnying rgyud): bur yang ba dang // chu la mi 'bying mes mi tshig rlung gis khyer bar nus mi 'gyur// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ ngag gi ji snyed brjod pa bzhin// 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya// rdzas kyi dam pa yon
406b2(rnying rgyud): tan ldan// snyed cing thob pa dag tu 'gyur// nyams dang rmi lam dag tu yang // dbang mchog ji ltar bskur ba bzhin// de dag nus pa'i rnam pa 'byung // de dag dbang bskur thob pa'i rtags// shes gsungs so// 
406b3(rnying rgyud): nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// ye shes rnal 'byor can rnams kyis// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs tshul du// sbas pas grub pa'ang myur ba dang // gas
406b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam la gnas bya dang / brdal dga' ba'i mi rnams kun/ nye zhing gdung bar bya ba'i phyir// lus dang ngag gi brda rnams kun// gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol zhes gsol
406b5(rnying rgyud): ba btab pa dang // gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// ga sang ba sbas pa'i thabs tshul du// brda yi dam tshig bsha/ da par bya// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams legs par nyon// lus
406b6(rnying rgyud): brda dam tshig phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas pas bya ba kun// rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba'i brda// g.yon pas bya ba ma yi brda// spyi bor nyug pa'i lag brda ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi brda yi rgya// dpral bar
406b7(rnying rgyud): reg par phyag lan yin// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// mgo bo gtud par byas pa ni// khams bde 'am zhes 'dri ba'i brda// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni// g.yon du 'dud pa bde ba'i lam// 
406b8(rnying rgyud): mig gnyis dag la reg pa na// gzugs mdzes ston cig ces pa'i brda// g.yas pa skyes pa mdzes pa yin// g.yon pa bud med bzang mor bshad// rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda// g.yon pa legs
407a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i glu snyan brda// g.yas pa tshig snyan smra ba'i brda// sna phug gnyis la reg pa ni// g.yas pa bdug pa 'dod pa ste// g.yon pa dri dge slong ba'i brdal/ lces ni ldag par byed pa'i nga/ 
407a2(rnying rgyud): g.ya su ldag pa sha 'dod pa'o// g.yon du chang 'dod brda' ru bshad// mche bas ma mchu mnan pa ni// g.yon pa bud med reg bya 'dod// g.yas pa skyes pa de bzhin no// rkog mar reg pa g.yang ba yi// 
407a3(rnying rgyud): theg mchog gsang ba smra ba'i brda// ske la reg par byed pa ni// bdag nyid dbyangs snyan len pa'i brda// snying dka'i dkyil du reg pa ni// don rtogs pa yi brda ru bshad// reg nas phyir la 'gyed pa ni// spros pa'i
407a4(rnying rgyud): brda ru shes par bya// slar yang snying khar gtugs pa ni// slar ba sgrub yi brda yin no// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni/ dbu ma'i/ nan tan spyod pa yin// dbang po rab tu gsal byas na// ting 'dzin
407a5(rnying rgyud): sgrim zhes bya ba yin// phrag pa gnyis ni ston pa'i brda// g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i brda yin no// g.yon pa slar gtong ba yi brda// dpung pa gnyis la nyug pa'i brda// g.yas pa dregs pa
407a6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i brda// g.yon pa longs spyod grub pa'i brda// khu tshur g.yas bcangs dbang du bsdud// g.yon pa bcangs na thongs shig pa'o// brla gnyis myags pa'i brda dag kyang // g.yas pa chos la sbyor
407a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i brda// g.yon pa 'dod chags rtsom pa'i brda// pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang // g.yon pa rab tu 'dud pa yin// yang na bcing ba yin par bshad// g.yas pas rab tu dgrol ba yin// rkang pas
407a8(rnying rgyud): gnod pa'i brda dag kyang // g.yon pas thams cad gnon par byed// g.yas pas 'joms par byed pa yin// 'dzub mo bsgreng ba'i brda tshul gyis// khro bo'i brda ru bshad pa yin// dbang po gyen du bsgreng
407b1(rnying rgyud): bani// de tshe mdza' bar 'dod pa'i brda// chung ngu'i rtse mo bsgreng ba ni// de tshe sbyor bar 'dod pa'i brda// sngon po mngon par ston pa na// bkres shes bya ba'i brda yin no// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa
407b2(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal bskyed pa'i brda// khro mo lcags kyur drangs byas na// de tshe tshur shog brda yin no// de nyid bzlog pa khyed cig pa'o// lag gnyis gar thabs bskor nas kyang // se gol drag rdobs 'dren pa'i badz+ra/ 
407b3(rnying rgyud): bskor nas sbyar ba phyag rgya'i brda// bskor nas thal mo spyi bor gzhag// 'di ni mchod pa'i brda yin no// bskor nas snying khar gzhag pa ni// bsam gtan rtse gcig brda yin no// bskor nas gnyis kyis
407b4(rnying rgyud): ston pa na// mchod pa stob pa'i brda yin no// dbang mo lce la regadapa ni// tshogs mchog dus la bab pa'i brda'o// gar tha bskor nas dbang mor mthor// de nas lce la reg pa ni// mdza'
407b5(rnying rgyud): gang brim pa'i brda yin no// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ ga brda dam tshig phyag rgya yang // a ti bu zhes bya ba ni/ phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i brda yin no// pra ti bu zhes bya ba ni/ 
407b6(rnying rgyud): phyag lan 'tshal ba'i brda yin no// ri mo zhes bya gzugs kyi brda// glu ni sgra yi brda ru bshad// tshim byed dri yi brda yin no// ra sa a na ro yi brda// bde ba zhes bya reg pa yin// dga' ba zhes pa
407b7(rnying rgyud): rab tu reg/ sbyor ba zhes pa chos su bshad// me tog zhes bya khrag yin no// bdug pa zhes pa mdangs kyi brda// mar me zhes pa sha chen la'o// dpa' bo ches pa tshang du bshad// spos shes thal chen
407b8(rnying rgyud): dag la'o// 'dod chags sra ba tshwa yin te/ khu ba g.yon can skyur po yin// bran mo tshod ma'i brda yin no// chur ba zho la zlar rgyas te// sman gyi mchog ni sha yi brda// zan ni tshe zhes bya ba'i brda/ a mra
408a1(rnying rgyud): mi zhes bya ba'i brda/ rgun 'brum zhes pa rta yi brda// glang po pan se zhes bya/ na li ki ri kyi yi brda// a ru ka ni ba lang ngo // to zhes mkha' 'gro'i brdar bstan to// a ral zhes pa ma
408a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma// dar dir sil snyan sgra ru bshad// dza zhes bya ba 'dren pa'i brda// hU~M ni sdud pa'i brda yin no// baM ni sdom pa yin par bshad// ho ni zhugs nas dbang du 'gyur// e haM zhes pa tshur spyon brda// ya hi
408a3(rnying rgyud): par bzhud zhes pa'o// taM sta ha ni drongs shig pa'o// kha kha khA hi zo shig pa'o// a pa'i zhes pa yang nas yang // da ra dar byin cig pa'o// ru ta ma ta rol zhes pa'o// hU~M lu hU~M lu zhugs shig pa'o// a ra
408a4(rnying rgyud): rA ra bskul cig pa'o// de la sogs te bsam yas mchogazhes gsung so// de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge'i byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa// e ma'o gsang chen bde ba che// 
408a5(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur na mkha' dngos po med// lhun grub bde chen rnam par dag/ dag mchog lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba zhes bgyi rnam pa du// sbas pa zhes bgyi rnam pa du// thig le zhe
408a6(rnying rgyud): bgyi ji ltar gnas// mnyam nyid zhes pa rnam pa du// dag pa zhes pa rnam pa du// rtogs pa rnam pa du ru bzhed// mtshan nyid gsum zhes ji lta bu// ting 'dzin gsum po ji ltar lags// bdag cag
408a7(rnying rgyud): rnams la sman bslad du// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pas// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos thugasu chud de bka' stsal pa// gsang ba ces pa rnam pa bzhi// rang
408a8(rnying rgyud): bzhin don gyi gsang ba dang // gab pa sbas pa'i gsang ba dang // bstan med rdzas kyi gsang ba dang // snod med bka'i gsang ba dang / chos nyid rang bzhin gsang ba dang // thugs kyi klong nas bsrungs pa dang / 
408b1(rnying rgyud): dman la mi bstan rdzas rnams dang // gsang sngags theg chen zab mo'i don// rab tu shes pa bka' ba'i phyir// bstan par yang ni mi bya bas// gsang ba zhes su rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid sbas pas sbas
408b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i don// sbas pa rnam pa gsum yin te// phyi yi sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin nang gi sbas pa dang // gnyi gar ma nges smras pa de// rmad 'byung sngags kyi spyod pa ste// phyi rol sde pas mthong thos na// 
408b3(rnying rgyud): de la bzod pa thob min pas// de ni sbas pa phyi zhes bya// lhun grub bde chen zab mo de// ming gi rnal 'byor phal dag gis// rtogs shing khong du chud par dka'// de ni nang gi sbas pa yin// phyi nang gnyi su tha dad
408b4(rnying rgyud): min// bden pa gnyisu dbyer med pa// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod dayul de// ma nges sbas par rgyal bas gsungs// sbas pa'i don rnams gsal 'byin pa/ bla ma rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// des
408b5(rnying rgyud): na sbas shes nges par gsungs// thabs dang shes rab zhes bya// gnyi su med pa'i byang chub sems// de nyid thig le rnam gsum ste// thabs mchog yab kyi mkha' nyid dang // shes rab
408b6(rnying rgyud): yum gyi klong nyid dang // gnyis med bde chen dang nyid du// chos kun 'dus shing gcig pa dang // spros med thig ler gnas pa'i phyir// thig le zhesu rgyal bas gsungs// mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam gsum ste/ 
408b7(rnying rgyud): don dam dbying su mnyam pa dang // kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang // dbyer med gcig par mnyam pa ste/ ma skyes ma grub dbyer med par// chos kun mnyam par gnas pas na// mnyam pa rjes su brjod pa
408b8(rnying rgyud): yin// snod dang bcud dang rgyud rnams kun/ dag pas dag pa gsum yin te// yum gyi dbyings dang yab kyi mkha'// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin du// snod bcud rgyud kun dag pa'i phyir// dag pa gsum
409a1(rnying rgyud): du rgyal bas gsungs// rtogs pa yang ni rnam pa bzhir// rnal 'byor nang pa bzhed pa ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ byin gyis brlabs dang mngon gsum pas// rdzogs chen
409a2(rnying rgyud): don la 'jug 'gyur te// rgyu ni bden gnyis gcig pa ru// gcig pas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang // sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ru// chos kun rang bzhin rtogs pa dang // skye med dbyings kyi byin rlabs
409a3(rnying rgyud): las// chos kun snang bar shes pa dang / de lta bu yi rang bzhin te// gzhan la ma rten mi 'gal bar// mngon sum rig pas thag chod na// rnal 'byor sa la skabs pa yin// ma rtogs pa yang bzhi
409a4(rnying rgyud): yin te// ye nas ma rtogs blun pa dang // log pa'i rnam paradags pa dang // phyogs gcig rtogs pa'i khyad par dang / degasang ba de nyid ma gtogs par// bde gshegs rgyal ba
409a5(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis gsungs// des na rtogs pa rnam bzhi yid// rnal 'a byor sa la bsnyen pa yin// shes pa dang ni 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya bas// sa la nye dang sar chung
409a6(rnying rgyud): dang // sa thob 'bras bu rnam pa gsum// rgyu 'bras tshul du gnas pa ni// nus mthur ldan pa'i shes rab kyis// rigs 'dzin zhing ste shes rab gsum// yum yang mtshan nyid gsum yin te/ 
409a7(rnying rgyud): kun tu brtags dang gzhan dbang dang // yongasu grub pa zhesu brjod// log pa'i bsam pas mthong brtags pa// kun tu brtags te yod pa min// bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshal// 'brel pa/ 
409a8(rnying rgyud): gzhan dbang yin par gsungs// bden gnyis rgyu 'bras dbyer med par// yongasu grub par bde gshegs gsung // kun brtags log par shes pa ni/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya// gzhan
409b1(rnying rgyud): dbang tshul du goms bya ba// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid cesu bya// yongasu grub la gnas bcas ni// de nyid 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid yin// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting 'dzin rab bsgoms pas/ 
409b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa ste// yongasu grub pa'i blo gsal na// de bzhin nyid du rnam par grags// kun snang snying rje'i ngo bo dang // yig 'bru kha dog gsal ba yi// rgyu yi ting 'dzin gsal ba ni// 
409b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa gzhan gyi dbang yin te// de nyid log rtog kun brtags pa'o// des na rnal 'byor skyes bu yis// mtshan med ngang la gnas bcas nas// mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o// 
409b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yang // tha dad med par shes pa dar bya// de ltar rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nyid nga yis sa tho da ba yin// sangs rgyas shes kyang de la bya// sangs rgyas rnams
409b5(rnying rgyud): kyang mchod pa byed// byang chub sems dpa' smos ci dgos// 'jig rten lha klu mthu chen yang // de la mchod cing bku ra sti byed// phye bzhin 'breng zhing dgos pa skong zhes gsungs
409b6(rnying rgyud): pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis// rang rang gi lus sa la brdabs nas a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ shin tu ngo mtshar to// de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos/ 
409b7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i bdag po mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di nyid ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo chen po zhes bya ba rgyud kyi 'grel pa/ 
409b8(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi rol pa/ don gyi bkod pa rdo rje rnam par rol pa'i gzhung chen po 'di yi bla ma rdo rje slob dpon skyes bu dam pas ma nor bar rtogs shing // gzhan dag la yang ma nor bar ston pa de la bdag rnams
410a1(rnying rgyud): kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab
410a2(rnying rgyud): ba de mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsung so// smra ba'i seng+ge nga la zhu bar spobs pa legs// rab tu legs kyis nyon cig/ gzhung 'di bla ma rdo rje slob dpon de ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ de ni bla na
410a3(rnying rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du blta bar bya// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang // dbyer med cing tha mi dad te// bla ma de ni bskal pa chen po grangs med pa'i
410a4(rnying rgyud): pha mtha' yi yang mtha' 'das pa nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas bad+mo dra du med pa yi yang brjod pa rnams la chos thams cad yodasu rdzogs par sbyangs shing rang gi sems kyi rgyud rnam par
410a5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa'i nus mthus gsang ba 'di'i don la yid ches shing gas/ nga ba'i don 'di lta bu'i bla ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du/ rig par bya ste/ de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang tha mi dad cing byang chub
410a6(rnying rgyud): kyi sems nyid du blta bar bya'o// de la 'di ni phyogs bcu dus bzho'i sangs rgyas ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa rnams kyang spyi bo gtsug gis khur
410a7(rnying rgyud): zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa byed cing rje su 'breng na gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa ci zhig smos te/ 'jig rten gyi mthu bo che rnams kyang de'i
410a8(rnying rgyud): bran du khas len cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang skyong zhing ci bsgo ba thams cad kyang bsam pa yid bzhin du grub par byed do// de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar
410b1(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ston pa chen po yin par lta'o// sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang / rten
410b2(rnying rgyud): dang / gling dang / ded dpon dang / 'dren pa dang // sgrol ba'i gru lta bu yin par shes par bya'o// de ni ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas nyid du blta'o// de bas na bla ma de dang phrad bI
410b3(rnying rgyud): gang zag rnal 'byor pa des kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par rig par bya'o// // smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bla ma rdo rje slob dpon de'i rjesu 'brang zhing
410b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'di lta bu la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i dbang po sa nyan cing gzhung bzhin du sgrub pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor/ pa de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu zhig bdag cag rnams kyis
410b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos paka' stsal pa/ bla ma de'i rjesu 'breng zhing gsang ba 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i dbang pos nyan cing gzhung
410b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du sgrub pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa de ni gang zag 'ba' zhig ma lags te/ sa la bsnyen pa dang sa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang spun dang grogs po lta bur
410b7(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// gang phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa rnams kyang rnal 'byor pa de la nye ba'i sras dam par dgongs shing byin gyis rlob par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag
410b8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'di ni thos shing mos pa'o skal ba dang ldan pa yang bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha mtha' nas tshogs bsags shing sbyangs pa'i mthus des ltar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de bas na
411a1(rnying rgyud): // smra ba'i seng+ge khyod nyid la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams dang tha mi dad par rig par bya'o// de dag gi dngos grub kyang tshe 'di nyid la 'grub cing gzhan 'jig rten gyi mthu chen rnams
411a2(rnying rgyud): kyang bka' nyan cing las byed par 'gyuraro// / yang smra ba'i sedes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bla ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po rnal 'byor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gsang ba'i theg pa 'di
411a3(rnying rgyud): nyid la mos shing dad pa'i sems kyis g.yo sgyu dang gsog 'jog spangs pa'i phyi rabs kyi dad pa can gyi skye bo de'i rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur/ bdag cag la sogs pa rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ 
411a4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dad pa can gyi skye bo bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid la mos shing dad pa dang rna ba'i dbang pos nyan cing g.yo sgyu dang
411a5(rnying rgyud): gsog 'jog spangs pa de'i rnam par smin pa'i legs pa'i yon tan yang brjod cing tshad bzung bar rab tu dka'o// la/ la dag gis so so skye bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba la
411a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa byin pa 'am/ dge ba bcu dang / tshad med pa bcu dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis rgyu'i theg pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byas pa bas ni bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa dang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i sgo nas
411a7(rnying rgyud): skad cig tsam 'gro ba gcig gi don byas pa'i bsod nams kyi dge brirtsab 'bum gyi cha yang mi 'phod do// rigs kyi bu la la dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba'i nyan thos sam// rang sangs rgyas
411a8(rnying rgyud): sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de snyed la rim 'gro bkur sti tshul bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i yun du byas pa'i bsod nams kyis ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag/ 
411b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa gcig la than gro gcig gam/ skad cig yud tsam du skur ti tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid
411b2(rnying rgyud): las nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams 'byung zhing gsad pa'i theg pa nyid la 'gro ba bzung pa'i thab su bsti ba'i gnas su gsungs pa yin gyi gtan du bzhag pa'i/ 
411b3(rnying rgyud): sa ni ma yin no// de bas na nga nyid kyi sprul pa bas kyang chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji ltar 'dul bar ston pa yin no// de bas na gsang sngags kyi yon tan ni bsam gyis kyang mi khyab bo// rigs kyi bu gang
411b4(rnying rgyud): zag la la dag gis bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par rgyu'i theg pa'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas pa dar spyad pa bas ni gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i don skad cig tsam
411b5(rnying rgyud): yid la byas pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// rigs kyi bu gang zag la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du so so'i sku
411b6(rnying rgyud): bo 'am// nyan thos sam/ rang rgyal ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang ba snyed la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug spos dang / bla bre dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lhab
411b7(rnying rgyud): lbub dang / rol mo'i khyad par mang po la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang byas te phul ba bas tha na gsang ba'i theg pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gcig tsam la'ang g.yo sgyu dang / 
411b8(rnying rgyud): gsog 'jog spangs pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs skad cig tsam bteg cing longs spyad pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
412a1(rnying rgyud): so so'i skye bo'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po de dag pas gsang ba'i theg pa la gnas pa gcig gi baspu'i
412a2(rnying rgyud): cha gcig gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po khyad par du 'phags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// de bzhin du gang zag la la zhig gis me tog la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
412a3(rnying rgyud): gang ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po gang yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs chen po gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi cha tsam gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po gang yin pa de bas 'dod
412a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan tshogs chen po gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi cha/ da tsam gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po khyad par du 'dapags te 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// rigs kyi bu de bas
412a5(rnying rgyud): na dad pa can gyi skye bo gsang ba'i theg pa nyid dang / gsang ba'i theg pa la gnas pa'i bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa la da da pa'i sems kyis g.yo rgyu dang gsog 'jog spangs pa
412a6(rnying rgyud): de'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po ni tshad med do// de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi phung po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// // de nas smra ba'i
412a7(rnying rgyud): seng+ges 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bdag cag la so/ 
412a8(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams dri ba'i slad du sngon 'das pa'i lo rgyus kyi gtan tshigs rnams zhu bar 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka'
412b1(rnying rgyud): stsal ga smra ba'i sede khyod nga la zhu bar spobs kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// de nas smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i theg pa 'di rna ba'i
412b2(rnying rgyud): dbang pos zos pa'i yon tan dang rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig gsang ba'i theg pa 'di rna ba'i dbang pos thos pa'i
412b3(rnying rgyud): yon tan ni ming tsam thos pas kyang ngan 'gro las skyob par 'gyuraro// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus dran pa thog ma'i tshe gsang ba'i theg pa'i lha'i gnas rim pa gsum na tshul
412b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du spyod pa las 'od ldan zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu zhig mi/ rtag pa'i dus la bab ste 'chi ba'i snga stas rnams byung bar 'gyur te/ de rab tu mi dga' ba'i 'du shes su gyur nas tshe khyim
412b5(rnying rgyud): la gang du skye snyam pa'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig skyes pa las/ lha'i bu de nyid mngon par shes pa las mi gtsang ba za ba 'i byol song gi rigasu skye bar mthong ste shin tu 'jigs pa'i
412b6(rnying rgyud): sems skyes nas mgon skyabs gzhan med par mthong ste gsang ba'i theg pa'i mtshan thos nas de bzhin du yid la dran par byas// de'i tshe 'od ldan zhes bya ba lha'i bu de ngan 'gro'i lam de las
412b7(rnying rgyud): grol te gsang ba'i theg pa 'dzin pa'i gnas ga la ba der skyes so// der skyes nas kyang tshogs chen po la longs spyod pa skal ba can du gyur pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang gsol pa/ gas
412b8(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag po gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'dun pa skyes pa'i gang zag de ni rnam par smin pa'i yon tan ji lta bur 'gyur lung bstan du gsol// gas
413a1(rnying rgyud): mchag ga bdag pas bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i thag pa 'ang la dga' zhang mas pa dang 'dun pa spyad pa'i gang zag dam pa dan rag 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras dam par 'gyur bar gad ni/ 
413a2(rnying rgyud): ma za'// da yang ji ltar yang su shas zhe na/ sngan 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thag ma'i cha bram ze rgyal byed ces bya ba'i bu byams ldan zhes bya ba zhag gsang ba'i thag pa 'di la dga' zhang mas nas
413a3(rnying rgyud): 'dun pa skyes te gsang ba'i thag pa 'ang kun tu btsal bas rang ga sgrub pa'i bag chags stug pas gags byas nas rnyed par ma gyur ta sa phyags shin tu yang dben pa cag tu 'dug nas gsab
413a4(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i theg dpa 'di la dga' zhing mos pa dang 'dun pa bskyed pa'i gang zag dam pa de ni rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras dam par 'gyur ba/ 
413a5(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za'o// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'ad sa pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bram ze rgyal byed ces bya bI bu byams ldan zhes bya ba zhig gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la dga'
413a6(rnying rgyud): zhing mos nas 'dun pa skyes te gsang ba'i theg pa 'di kun tu btsal bas rang gi sgrib pa'i bag chags stug pos gags byas nas rnyed par ma gyur te sa phyogs shin tu yang dben pa cig tu 'dug
413a7(rnying rgyud): nas gsang ba la rab tu gdung ba'i shugs kyis ngu zhing smre sngags kyi tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma'o// bdag gi las 'di shin tu pham// thog ma skyes nas sbas bar du// 'bad de gsang ba'i
413a8(rnying rgyud): don btsal yang // gsang ba ma rnyed las re ngan// da yongs ji ltar btsal na rnyed// btsal yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na// thugs rjes bdag la skyabs mdzod cig/ ces smras nas na mkha' stong pa las
413b1(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad ces grag go// bram ze'i bu ni skal ldan khyod// yi dam brtan pa bzhin du legs// khyod ni don gyi skal pa can// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyis// khyod la byin gyis
413b2(rnying rgyud): rlob pa mdzod// rang nyid lta ba ma yengs par// bag chags sbyangs pa'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// rang gi khrag rnams drangs nas su/ dad cing gtsang ba tsan ldan chur// 
413b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod na// myur du gsang don rnyed par 'gyur// zhes par snang la lung bstan pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis lus kyi rtsa rnams khrag drangs nas 'phags
413b4(rnying rgyud): pa rnams la mchod pa de nyid du gsang ba'i don mthong te/ rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras dran par gyur pa de bzhin she/ nges par bya'o// de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa// bcom
413b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i sgor zhugs shing tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba'i gang zag dam pa de'i 'bras bu ji lta lags
413b6(rnying rgyud): lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i sgor zhugs shing tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
413b7(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i gang zag de ni dngos grub tu gyur to 'tshal ba thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyuraro// de na yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe lha'i/ 
413b8(rnying rgyud): gnas rim pa gsum na gsang ba spyod pa las dge ba'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu zhig tshom bu 'bum dang bcas nas gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las rin chen 'od ldan zhes bya ba'i
414a1(rnying rgyud): bu zhig gsang sngags rgya cher spyod pa de nyid las shin tu dad pa skyes pa las yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa gsang ba'i gnas der phyin te gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas
414a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang mthong bar byas te de nyid kyi dus kyi tshe dag tu dngos grub tu gyur to// 'tshal ba thams cad ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par gyur pa de bzhin du shes par
414a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// // de nas smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa// gsang ba'i theg pa 'di mngon du spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang zhig la dga' ba'i yid kyis mngon du phyogs pa de'i 'bras bu ji lta bur lung bstan
414a4(rnying rgyud): du gsol// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' sprul pa/ da smra ba'i sang+ge gzhan yang gsang ba'i theg pa la spyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i gang zag de'i rnam par smin pa ni gsang
414a5(rnying rgyud): ba dngos su spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de dang 'dra bar thob par 'a gyur ro// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'dasapa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan
414a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa zhig chom bu 'bum dang bcas nas sngags kyi spyod pa la rgya cher zhugs te 'bras bu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i thob par kun tu grags pa las/ gzhan gyi sde pa bram ze
414a7(rnying rgyud): dge slong bya ba zhig shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas 'byor pa'i yo byad mang po dang bcas nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'jug par gsol ba btab pa las rgyal pos ma gnang ste/ 
414a8(rnying rgyud): gsang sgo bsdam so// bram ze de dad pa ma log par 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod pa rgyal po'i spyan ngar phul te rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogasu yid kyis phyogs te smon lam btab cing rje su yid rang
414b1(rnying rgyud): bar byas so// de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po dang bram ze gnyis 'bras bu mthon dman med par thob pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di slab pa mthar
414b2(rnying rgyud): phyin pa 'di yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di'i bslab pa mthar phyin pa'i che ba'i khyad par gyis theg pa mtha' dag gi brlab
414b3(rnying rgyud): pa yang mthar phyin cing lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus sung dran pa thog ma'i tshe bram ze'i bu gsal sbyin zhes bya bas gsang ba chen po
414b4(rnying rgyud): 'di'i bslab pa mthar phyin te/ rang gi sems goms par byas/ pas theg pa mtha' dag gi bslab pa mthar phyin cing de nyid du bar snang las lung bstan pa'i sgra rigs kyi bu khyod dus
414b5(rnying rgyud): phyi ma'i tshe/ chos kyi rgyal por gyur nas zhing khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas nas smra ba'i seng+ge zhes bya bar grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar lung bstan pa de bzhin du shes
414b6(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ tshogs chen po gcig gis bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge so so'i skye bo 'am/ nyan
414b7(rnying rgyud): thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gang bsnyed la sbyin mchod sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyur bur bltam pas bskal pa 'am bskal pa
414b8(rnying rgyud): grangs med par byin pa'i bsod nams kyis ni rnal 'byor gcig la tshogs gcig skad gcig tu mchod pa rgya cher byas pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// / 
415a1(rnying rgyud): / de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus dran pa thog ma'i tshe las dag pa'i bram ze'i thugs la ldan zhes bya ba zhig gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la dad par 'gyur ro// 
415a2(rnying rgyud): bram ze'i bu dge ldan zhes bya ba zhig ni rgyu'i theg pa la dad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bram ze'i bu de gnyis tha tshig bcas te dge ldan gyis mchod sbyin bzang po rgya cher spel lo// gsal ldan
415a3(rnying rgyud): gyis ni tshogs mchod rgya cher byas so// de gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par ni sngags spyod pa'i bram ze gsal ldan ni tshe de nyid la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// rgyu'i theg pa la/ 
415a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i dge ldan ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' rab byas nas 'bras bu thob pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o// / yang smras pa'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i mdo
415a5(rnying rgyud): 'di rtag tu 'chang ba'i gang zag de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta/ khur 'gyur ba lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po sa bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge mdo 'di rtag tu 'chang zhing
415a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa de ni dpal rdo rje sems pa'i che ba'i yon tan gyi gzungs dang bcas pa thob bo// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe// khyim bdag dad pa can mes
415a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin bya ba de chom bu brgya dang bcas pas gsang ba'i theg pa'i mdo 'di rgyun brtag par bcangs pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra bar tshe 'di nyid kyis nges par
415a8(rnying rgyud): 'thob cing mi rjed pa'i gzungs thob pa'o// de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gsang ba'i mdo 'di'i don rtogs nas gzhan dag la smra bar byed pa de'i yon tan ji lta bu
415b1(rnying rgyud): lags/ lung bstan du gsol// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge gsang ba'i mdo 'di'i don rtogs nas gzhan snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba la bstan tam/ bshad na chos
415b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen por 'gyur te nga nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de yang ji ltar yongasu she na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i drang srong ka pa ya na zhes bya bas drang srong
415b3(rnying rgyud): mang po rnams la gsang ba'i don 'di bshad cing bkrol bas las drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin gyis thob ston pa'i drang srong gsang ba'i bdag por gyur to// de bzhin du yongasu shes par
415b4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de bas na gsang sngags che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par/ ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa dpo rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
415b5(rnying rgyud): the tsom zad gcod pa'i rgyal pos gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i skyon gyi rnam po zhu bar 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka'/ 
415b6(rnying rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i don la mi gnas pas gsang sngags kyi spyod par tshul 'chos pa'i nyes pa ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng ge
415b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don zab mos yis ches pa med par tshul 'chos shing g.yo sgyus bden par 'chos pa ni ngan 'gro log pa'i lam du lhung bar nges so// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das
415b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bskal pa kun tu bkod pa zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sangs rgyas mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de sku mya
416a1(rnying rgyud): ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i 'og du bzang rgyan zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor khas mches pa cig byung bar gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi shes pa'i 'khor rnams la
416a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshul du bcos nas log pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas chom bu lnga brgya dang bcas par yang dag pa'i don las gol zhing ngan 'gro log pa'i lam du ltung bar gyur pa de bzhin du shes
416a3(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// de nas yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/ gang zag la la dag gsang ba'i don zab mo rtogs pa med par dga' ba'i gzhung bor te gzhan nges pa'i rnal 'byor rnams la bskur pa 'deb
416a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam par smin pa ni ji lta bur 'gyur ba lags/ gsang rab mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng ge gang zag la la dag rang nyid gsang ba'i don la yid ches
416a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i nges pa med par gzhan nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la sgro skur gyis sun 'byin pa'i blo skye zhing bdag gi ni mi na/ gzhan gyi ni ma yin zhes bdag la stod cing gzhan la
416a6(rnying rgyud): smod pa ni don las 'ban thag chad de mnar med par lhung ngo // de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bskal pa kun tu bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dus de nyid la
416a7(rnying rgyud): dpal sbyin zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor zhig tu khas mchis pa zhig yang dag pa'i don la shed ma bye zhing lam gyi dgod thabs la mi mkhas pas des bka' nges pa'i gzhung ni ma rtogs/ chos
416a8(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa'i chos la chos su spyod cing nor bas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing log pa'i tshad mas gzhan nges pa'i don spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa la khyod kyi de ni yang dag pa'i don ma yin/ yang dag
416b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba ni nga'i chos 'di yin no zhes bdag bstod/ gzhan la ni smod pas yang dag pa'i don dang ni gtan du 'gyangs/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bskal pa
416b2(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'khyam par gyur to// de bzhin du shes par bya'o// // de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gang zag la la dag don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su 'byung
416b3(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan gyi dpon bstabs na mi shes bzhin dur gcos cing tshul 'chos shing sems gya gyus slob dpon gyis 'dzin pa'i rnam par smin pa ni ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi
416b4(rnying rgyud): bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge bla ma'i don la ma khas pa'i rjesu byung ba'i mi shes bzhin du tshul 'chos shing bla ma'i sa bzung nas tshogs skyong ba de ni dregs pa'i
416b5(rnying rgyud): ru tra chen por ltung bar nges so// de yang ji ltar yongasu she zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe bla ma don la mkhas pa dag gi rjes su 'byung ba'i dge slong dri med
416b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa zhes bya ba zhig rnal 'byor gyi tshul 'dra ba tsam du spyod de/ de don la mkhas pa'i bla ma rnams mi bzhugs nas bla ma de dag gi tshom bu 'bum gyi 'khor rnams kyis bdag cag rnams kyi bla
416b7(rnying rgyud): ma'i gdung 'tsho ba par gsol zhes dpon bstabs pas dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes bya ba de che ba'i dregs pa skyes te mi shes bzhin du tshul 'dra ba log par spyad pas de'i tshe de'i dus nyid du
416b8(rnying rgyud): dge slong tsham bu 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dregs pa chen po'i ru trar bskal pa chen po grangs med par skyes so// de bas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o// // yang smra ba'i seng+ges
417a1(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ gang zag la la dag bdag nyid kyis tshogs skyong ba'i 'khor bla ma gzhan gyis dbang du 'gyur du dogs nas dge ba'i bsgo 'gegs pa dag mchis na de'i rnam par smin
417a2(rnying rgyud): pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i sang+ge 'khor sgo rigs dang rkyen mtshan so sor bcad cing bla ma gzhan la nyon mongs pa'i sgro 'byed pa ni ngan song / 
417a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi kha brgyud cing sho gams gcan chen gyi rigasu skye bar nges so// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes par 'gyur zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe dge slong zhig gnas pa zhes bya
417a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i chom bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa don dang mi ldan pa zhig shin tu gsang ba'i sngags spyod do// zhes zer nas dgon pa'i gnas bzung ste yul khams chen po de na gnas pa'i mi
417a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kun 'dul ba'i dbang du spyod do// de'i tshe de'i dus/ su gzhan gyi sde par gyur pa'i dge slong grol ba'i blo// gros shes bya ba'i don dang ldan pa zhig yul khams de
417a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i don la gzud pa'i ched du 'ongs nas gsang ba'o theg pa'i don rgya cher bstan par bsams pa las/ zhi gnas pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong des nyon mongs pa'i bsgo ba drag po byas
417a7(rnying rgyud): te 'khor 'di dag ni bdag gi zhing khams yin pas na khyod 'di la ma rtogs shig ces bsgo ris so sor bcad pas/ de'i tshe dge slong zhi gnas pa'i tshom bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa nyon
417a8(rnying rgyud): mongs pa 'khor ba'i lam du lhung ste sho gams gcan chen gyi rigasu gyur to// de bas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o// de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gang zag la la dag rnal 'byor
417b1(rnying rgyud): pa tshogs kyi yo byad kyi tshogs su bsngos pa la ser snas gsog 'jog bgyid pa dag mchis na de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur ba lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka'
417b2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge gsang ba'i tshogs chen por bsngos pa'i yo byad la ser snas gsog 'jog byed cing gcig gi yid gcig gis 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag de ni nam zhar longs
417b3(rnying rgyud): spyod thams cad dang bral te yi dgas khyi'i lus su skye'o// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe rnal 'byor bde ldan zhes bya ba zhig tshom bu 'bum dang
417b4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las/ de'i 'khor na bu/ dad med bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma zhig cho ga/ sbyong ba'i gang du bskos pa las yo byad phun sum tshogs pa
417b5(rnying rgyud): la ser sna'i dbang gis gsog 'jog byas so// de'i tshe de 'i rnam par smin pas yi dgas kyi lus su skyes nas lo ngas spyod kyis brel zhing 'phongs par gyur ro// de bas na de bzhi
417b6(rnying rgyud): du shes par bya'o// de nas yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/ gal te gang zag la la dag rnal 'byor gyi tshogs log par spyod cing lta ba log pa can gyi spyi brtol dang / khro ga tu mche ba'i
417b7(rnying rgyud): sdig pa spyod cing don dang mi ldan yang bdag rnal 'byor pa'o zhes bab col du bka' rku zhing slu bar byed pa de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gis bdag pos bka' stsal/ 
417b8(rnying rgyud): pa/ smra ba'i seng ge lta spyod log pas rnal 'byor du khas mchis pa de ni mu stegs chen po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa
418a1(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i tshe don la mi mkhas pa'i dge slong pra ma de ba zhes bya ba zhig gis bdag ni yang dag pa'i lam la mkhas pa'o// zhes kun la bsgrags nas tshogs ni bskyangs/ 
418a2(rnying rgyud): spyi brtol dang khro gtum gyis sdig pa spyad pa'i rnam par smin pas mu stegs kyi spyod pa'i khams su lhung bar gyur to// de bas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/ 
418a3(rnying rgyud): gal te gang zag la la don la ni rmugs tha tshigs ni nyams/ dregs pa'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje rgyal po'i sa 'dzin par 'dod pa'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ gsang ba mchog gi
418a4(rnying rgyud): bdag pos bka' sprul pa/ khrel med pa'i spyi brtol gyi// sa mun sprul du byed pa de ni ti mug phag gi lus su skyes te de yang ji ltar yongs su shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i
418a5(rnying rgyud): dusang dran pa thog ma'i tshe rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams shing yan lag gi dam tshig rmugs shing dregs pa'i ngats+tsha l-i gyis sngags kyi tshul du spyod pa'i drang srong pi na ya zhes bya/ 
418a6(rnying rgyud): bzhig chom bu brgya dang bcas pa gnas so// de'i tshe rnam par smin pa des gti mug phag gi lus su lhung ba de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng+ges gsol pa/ gang zag la la dag
418a7(rnying rgyud): tshig tu mnyam zer yang blo mnyam pa dang mi nye bar chags sdang la 'chel bdag mchis na de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ mnyam pa
418a8(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs par chags sdang la 'ches pa de ni rag sha srin po'i rigs su 'gyur te/ de yang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs
418b1(rnying rgyud): bar chags sdang la 'chel ba'i dge slong de sbyin zhes bya ba chom bu stong dang bcas pa zhig gis gsang ba'i spyod pa mngon du spyad pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rag sha srin po'i gnas skyes
418b2(rnying rgyud): so// de bas na de ltar shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i sang+ges gsol pa/ gal te gang zag la la dag rdo rje 'chang gi gral du tshogs pa'i tshe don la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis yang dag pI/ 
418b3(rnying rgyud): don la gleng bslang ba de la 'jigs skrag zhum ste mi dga' zhing gud du byol ba'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i don gyis
418b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i phrag dog can de ni 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khya dmas te yag sha gnod sbyin gyi gnas su lhung ngo // de ya dang ji ltar yongasu shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa
418b5(rnying rgyud): thog ma'i tshe rnal 'byor las dang po'i sar slob pa'i dge slong lha sbyin zhes bya ba zhig don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'a byor phal chen tshogs par gyur pa las rnal 'byor de dag
418b6(rnying rgyud): gis yang dag pa'i don glengs pa las lha sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa gleng bslang ba mi dga' zhing ngan sems kyi phrag dog skye na rang gi gnas su byol te de dag la mi snyan par brjod pas
418b7(rnying rgyud): de'i rnam par smin pas/ yang dag pa'i don las gol te gnod sbyin kha 'bar ma'i gnas su skyes so// de bas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/ gal
418b8(rnying rgyud): te gang zag la la dag don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la mngan sems kyi sgro skur 'debs pa de'i rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags// gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ 
419a1(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan pa'i skyes bul mngan sems kyis byar 'dogs pa ni mnar med par lhung ste lce la thong gshol 'bar ba lnga brgyus 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de
419a2(rnying rgyud): yang ji ltar shes zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba la mi 'jigs blo gros zhes bya ba don dang mi ldan pa
419a3(rnying rgyud): zhig gis rnam par dag pa'i blo gros sde mang pos skyong ba'i sar mi 'jigs blo gros 'ongs te/ mngan sems kyi sgro skur mang po btab pas// de'i rnam par smin pas mi 'jigs blo gros mnapa
419a4(rnying rgyud): med par lhung nas lce la thong gshol 'bar ba lnga brgya das rmos par 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o// yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa
419a5(rnying rgyud): gang zag la la dag gi shes rab kyi rnal 'byor khro nga du ma chud par sgra thos pa tsam gyis gzhung spyadan ji lta bur 'gyur ba legs/ gsang ba mchog
419a6(rnying rgyud): gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sgra phyir 'breng ba'i rnal 'byor de ni long ba'i 'du shes thob par 'gyur ro// de yang ji ltar yongs su shes she na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus
419a7(rnying rgyud): nga dran pa thog ma'i tshe rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin zhes bya ba mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor can de shes rab kyi tshig med par spyi yud tsam la ltos nas rnal 'byor gyi tshul bzung bas de'i
419a8(rnying rgyud): dbang gis log pa'i khamasu lhung ba de bzhin du shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bas na shin tu gsang ba'i chos 'di ni shin du gol sa che bas mnyam pa nyid kyi don la goms
419b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo nas spyod cig ces gsungs so// de nas de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma ston cing nyes
419b2(rnying rgyud): legs kyi khyad par de dag la rab tu ngo mtshar nas 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces dam pa'i glu 'di blangs so// e ma ho// ngo mtshar rmad kyi ston pa gsang mchog
419b3(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang // gsang ba kun gyi mngal bdag ye shes rol pa'i mdzod// kun nas kun gyi dbang bskur dam pa'i bdag/ khyad bzhugs yid dang 'thad
419b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gas nga sngags yon tan rgya mtsho grangs mang bsam yas kyang // gzhung dang 'gal byas snod ngan
419b5(rnying rgyud): skyon nyid lhung gnas mang po brjod mi lang // legs dang nyes pa'i 'bras bu rnam smin de nyid// kyis rab gsungs pa// bdag cag
419b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor tshogs dga' spro gsang nyid don la 'jug ces dam par gyur// a la la ho/ zhes bya ba glu 'dis mnyes par byas so// de nas
419b7(rnying rgyud): smra ba'i seng ges phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te// mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod de gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di
419b8(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po gsang ba'i theg pa 'di bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bsgo bar
420a1(rnying rgyud): gsol/ na sa gang na 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir nan tan bgrib ban par ga sol// de nas gang / 
420a2(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag pos zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ smin rings bsgyur nas btsun mo rngam pa kro d+ha'i rgyal mo la rnam par 'jug par gyur to// de'i tshe chos thams cadag ci
420a3(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu
420a4(rnying rgyud): bzang mo dngo gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor lo thim dpar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga sang ba ma chog ging dag pos smra ba'i song ge la bka'
420a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa/ smra ba'i seng gled ngas chos 'di bsdus te/ bshad kyis nyon gyi/ gsang ba chen po'i rang bzhin bskyed pa med cing bsgrub pa
420a6(rnying rgyud): med/ bsgrim pa med cing gzugs kyang med/ phyag rgya med cing 'jug sgo'ang med// 'dod pa med cing bsrung ba med// brtul zhugs
420a7(rnying rgyud): med cing brtul pa'ang med// ya nas rnam dag brjod med chos/ ston dang yon tan dbyings dag/ ngom nyid ni brjod du med// de la gsal 'dris
420a8(rnying rgyud): gams par byeg// me pa 'dzin las kun 'byung ba// gsal 'dris gnas pa byang ba'i byor// sna ba'i ming gi khyod da kyis// tshig danam lus tham
420b1(rnying rgyud): gu/ skyes bsnol gsas pasnu / sa ldan mapa/  d+hAn rgyas tsun 'grus shes da do// denas
420b2(rnying rgyud): seng gis al la tsanas pa'i sgra byung ste yid kyi dkyil 'khor pad mo lta bu'i sgo phye ste gsang ba'i don 'di nyid thugs rin po che la bzhag ste gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gnas so// 
420b3(rnying rgyud): denas smra ba'i seng gis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi dag pad/ gsang ba'i mdo 'di nyid dang / 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bstod pa'i sku
420b4(rnying rgyud): 'di blangs so// i phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs/ dgasang ba mchog gi bdag po b+ha ga yongs kyi gter/ 
420b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba yum dang gnyis med rol pa'i cho 'phrul brda ga 'dul dbang 'jigs byed ni khwa kun gyi bdag po mchog/ thams cad
420b6(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ston mchog cig pu khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ oM bsam gyis mi khyab chos kun 'dus pa'i gtso// lung dang rigs pa gtan
420b7(rnying rgyud): tshigs kun gyi gnas// rgyud lung man ngag kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// phyi rabs rnal 'byor kun gyi yid ches gter// gsang ba'i
420b8(rnying rgyud): yang gsang mdzod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ oM/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun nas 'dus pa'i gtso// rgyal ba sras bcas yum tshogs sprul
